40017004	Mahten Piter in , “ Topa hilai aa a um uh hi nop leita na ti tacun ngiahbuuk pathum in sa tung ; pakhat cu nangma caa , pakhat cu Moses ii caa , pakhat cu Elijah caa , ” tin Jesuh lakah cun ti hi .
40017005	Mahtin a otlih laihtakin a dezetmi meingo cun tuam in meingo sung pen aw pakhat in , “ Hipa hi ka ihzetmi ka Capa hi ; A humah ka lungkim mahtak ing hi , a thu na ngai un , ” tin ti hi .
40017006	Mahmi aw cu nungzuitu ten a theih haw ten lau leita in lei ah bok haw hi .
40017007	Jesuh cu hung in amuhte cu zen in , ‘ Tho un lau pahsuh un hi , ” tin ti hi .
40017008	Mahtecun zo haw in Jesuh bek um khi mu haw hi .
40017009	Mualhum pen a tolhsuk leh haw ten Jesuh in , “ Hi na muhmi uh hi Mihing Capa thihnak pen thawhtiik ahih ma ceng kuamah hilh pahsuh un hi , ” tin celzetin cah hi .
40017010	Mahten nungzuitu ten Jesuh cu , “ Itakaw Daanthiam ten Elijah heng masa tuk a tih haw ? ” tin dong haw hi .
40017011	Jesuh in , “ Elijah cu hung masa tatak tuk aa i hempoh a man tuangtim khawng tuk hi .
40017012	Mahnaven nohte hilh ing hi . Elijah cu heng zotoh naven miten a kua him tih a theih haw ngawl hangin a nuamtawk haw in bawlsia haw hi . Mahtihbangbok leng cun Mihing Capa vang cu bawlsia bok haw tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
40017013	Mahten nungzuitu ten a hilhmi hi baptizam piatu Johan ii cungca ng hi , tih khi thei ciang haw hi .
40017014	Mipi tei lakah a kihleh haw ten mi pakhat cu Jesuh lakah hung in a maiah khukdin in ,
40017015	“ Topa , ka capa hi hehpihzal in hi . Thihtun nei in a nat a pat ten lungapnak ngangai hi ; meisung le tuisungte ah lum leh cet thong hi .
40017016	Na nungzui tei lakah hunpih naveng in damtiik thei haw ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
40017017	Jesuh in , “ Maw upnak nei ngawl misual mikhialte ! Itiktian kaw nang muhte ka umpih hih tuk ? Ituk tian kaw ka ngah hih tuk ? Naupang pa cu ka lak ah pui un , ” tin ti hi .
40017018	Jesuh in khuasia cu a tul tukin thu a piak ten naupang pai sung pen khuasia cu tul hi ; mahten naupang pa cu dam hi .
40017019	Mahten nungzuitute cu kuamah i theih ngawlin Jesuh lakah hung in , “ Itakaw koh ten khuasia ka hawlvawk theih uh ngawl ? ” tin dong haw hi .
40017020	Jesuh in , “ Na upnak uh a dawm hangin hi . Thungangai in hilh ing hi . ankam ci tia upnak na nei uh ta cun , ‘ Hi mual hi hilai pen thawn in nati tale thawn tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
40017021	Mahnaven thungetnak le ancannak tuah bek in hawlvawk thei hi , “ tin ti hi .
40017022	Nungzuitute cu a venghawng haw in Galilee ah a tawhdun khawm haw ten Jesuh in amuh tei lakah , “ Mihing Capa hi mihing tei khut ah piak in um tuk aa that haw tuk hi .
40017023	Mahnaven nithum nung ten tholeh tuk hi , ” tin hilh hi . Nungzuitute cu thasia ngangai haw hi .
40017024	Jesuh le a nungzuitute cu Kapernaum khua a hen haw ten Biakinn siah khontute Piter lakah hungin , “ Na Saya pa uh in biakinn siah pia awng maw ? ” tin dong haw hi .
40017025	Piter in , “ Pia e ” tin ti hi . Piter cu inn sungah a tum ten Jesuh in otpih masa in , “ Simon itin ngaisung cim ? Hi leihum kumpi tei lakah ngamdang pen thil ken tum man , mah matale siah a piatu a kua kaw , ngam sung miten maw , ngamdang mi in kaw ? ” tin dong hi .
40017026	Piter in , “ Ngamdang miten e , ” tin don hi . Jesuh in , “ Pha , mah a hi tale ngamsung mi cun piak kul ma tih nak si maw !
40017027	Mahnaven hi mitei thin uk tuk cu deih mang hi . Mahhangin tuiniim ah hawhten na ngasa sio in hi . Na awk masabel ngasa ii kam sungah nangmah le keima caa in Biakinn siah piak tuk tangka mu tuk ci , Mahmi cu la in na pia tan hi , ” tintiik hi .
40018001	Mahmi hun in nungzuitute cu Jesuh lakah hawhin , “ Vancung Uknak ah a kua ngengbel tuk him ? ” tin dong haw hi .
40018002	Mahten Jesuh in naupangno pakhat sam in amu laizang ah a dintiik cengten ,
40018003	Thungangai in hilh ing hi . . na lungmu uh thek in , hi naupang na bang uh ma ta le Vancung Uknak sungah tum tuk ma uh ci .
40018004	Vancung Uknak ah a ngengbel cu minuai ah a umtu hi naupang bangin lungmu a neitute hi .
40018005	Mahten keima min in hi naupang no a bawlphatu cu keimah a bawlphatu hi .
40018006	Kuahei in hihen hi naupangno bang pakhakhat keimah a upnak pen a pialtiiktu cu a ngawng ah cang ngawinak suangtum khaih in tuipi sungah khia a hin ama caa in pha saw hi .
40018007	Leihum ah hin mitei upnak a pialtiik thei thil tampi a um hi poi ngangai hi . Mahtihbang cun um leleng tuk laih hi , mahbangin a pialtiiktu cu thusia co haw tuk hi .
40018008	“ Na khut uh in hihen , na ke uh in hihen na upnak uh a pialtiik a hitale tan in vawk in hi . Khut panih le ke panih tuah kumkhua meipi sungah na caak tuk saangin khutngawl le ke ngawl in nunnak sungah na tum uh cu pha saw hi .
40018009	Mahten na mit uh in na upnak uh a paaitiik ahitale kheklet in hi . Mit panih tuah hell sungah na caak tuk saangin mit pakhat tuah nunnak sungah tum cu pha saw hi .
40018010	“ Hitihbang naupang note na zawnsak ngawlnak tukin ngaalling un hi . Thungangai in hilh ing hi . Amuhte cingkhawitu vancung mite cu vancung ka Pai maiah um leleng haw hi .
40018011	Mihing Capa cu a paimi zei tukin hung hi .
40018012	“ Tuu zakhat neitu pan pakhat a paaitiik tale i bawl tuk tin ngaisung uh cim ? Mualhum a hampa a eili laih tuu sawmkuah le kuahte cu zamhih in a paaimi tuu pakhat zei tukin hawh tuk hi .
40018013	Thungangai in hilh ing hi . A muh leh ten a paai ngawlmi sawmkuah le kuahte saangin a paaimi tuu pakhat humah a lungdam saw hi .
40018014	Mahtihbangbok leng in vancung aa a um na Pa uh in mahbangin naupang pakhat no hei a paai tuk cu awi ma hi .
40018015	“ Na unau uh pakhat in na humah a sual tale hawh unna a sualnak khi hilh un hi . Mahnaven kuamah i theih tuk ngawlin nangmah tuah bek in tawkdun un hi . Na thu uh a ngai ahitacun unau a ngah leh hi tuk uh ci .
40018016	Mahnaven na thu uh a ngai ta ngawl cun thutheitu pakhat maw panih maw hawhpih un hi . Lai Thiangtho in , “ Sual notdunnak hempoh cu thu theihpihtu panih maw , mahsaang tam saw maw um haw hen , ” a tihbangin na hawhpih mi cu thu theipihtu tetti hi tuk hi .
40018017	Mahnaven na thu uh a ngaingawl ahitale a thu le la a kimno in Pawlpi tei lakah hilh un hi . A dawlbelnak Pawlpi thu vang a ngaima ahitale amah cu lawki mi , mahma tale siahkhontu te bangin ngaisung un hi .
40018018	“ Mahten na venghawng uh in hilh ing hi . Leihum pen na khammi uh cu vancung hei ah kham hi bok tuk hi ; Mahten leihum pen na hotmi uh cu vancung hei pen hot hi bok tuk hi .
40018019	A dang hilh hih tung . Leihum pen thungen in na nget uh mi thu ah mi panih lungkim kawm in thu na ngen uh ahitale vancung ah a ummi ka Pan na nget uh hempoh pia tuk hi .
40018020	Itahimtitale ka min in mi panih hihen , pathum in hihen , na khopkhawm uh ten noh tei lakah um bok ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
40018021	Mahten Jesuh lakah cun Piter cu hung in , “ Topa , ka unau pa khakhat ka humah a sual a hin vei izong tian kaw ka ngaihdap tuk ? Vei salih tian maw ? ” tin dong hi .
40018022	Jesuh in , “ Mahma , veisalih tian bek hi ma hi , veisawm salih ii let salih tian ngaidam tuk ci ;
40018023	Itahimtitale Vancung Uknak cu hibangin hi . Veikhat kumpi pakhat um in a umlawh tei nadeh daan khi a dongkan tuk in ngaisung hi .
40018024	A dotkan bek ten tangka a thawng a za in a batu a umlawh pakhat a lakah hunpih haw hi .
40018025	Mah umlawh pa cun leiba lohnak tuk tangka i mah nei ma hi . Mahhangin kumpi pan mahpa cu a leiba lohnak tukin a nupi le a cate le a neihmi hempoh tuah sal ah zuak khawng tuk in thupia hi .
40018026	Kumpi bawipai mai ahcun umlawh pa cu bok in , ‘ Hehpih in na ngak hih zaal in hi . Loh leh khawng tuk poh ing hi , ’ tin kunli hi .
40018027	Kumpi pa cun ngaithiam in a leibat cu zah in hah hi .
40018028	“ Mahten mahpa cu hawh in ama lakah lei a batu a ngualcam umlawh pakhat cu tawk hi . Mahpa cu man in a ngawng pen saan in , ‘ Na baakmi leibat pia in hi , ’ tin ti hi .
40018029	Mah umlawh pa cun a bokin , ‘ Hehpih in na ngak hih zaal in hi . Loh leh tuk poh ing hi , ’ tin kun lo hi .
40018030	Mahnaven ngaidam nuam ma hi . A leiba a loh theih laklawh tian thawng ah cun khia hi .
40018031	Mahmi cu umlawh dang ten a muh haw ten a lungmu haw nop po ngawl in kumpi pai lakah hawh in mah thute cu hilh khawng haw hi .
40018032	Mahten kumpi bawipan mah umlawh pa cu sam in , ‘ Nang umlawh pha ngawl , na nget lo lih hangin na baakmi hempohte zah khawng ing hi .
40018033	Na hum aa hehpihnak ka neih bangin na ngualcam lakah hehpihnak nei bok tukin mawi ci , ’ tin ti hi .
40018034	Kumpi pa cu a thin uk mahtak in mahpa cu a leiba a venghawng a loh theih laklawh thawng ah khia hi , ” tin ti hi .
40018035	Mahten Jesuh in , “ Kuahei in na unaute uh khi na lungmu ngangai uh in na ngaithiam uh ta ngawl cun vancungah a ummi ka Pan mah umlawh pa bangcun bawlbok tuk hi , ” tin a dawltabel in hilh hi .
40019001	Mah thu cu Jesuh in a hilh celh ten Galilee pen tul in Judea ngam Jordan ngun ngaalkhat lam ah hawh hi .
40019002	Mitampi ten zui haw in mahlai pen mina tampi damtiik hi .
40019003	Farasi mi hekkhat ama lakah hung haw in a sual zei nuam in , “ Itihbangin thumaan a hita zongin pano in a nupi maak tukin a Daan uh in hon maw ? ” tin dong haw hi .
40019004	Jesuh in , “ Apattung in a bawltu Pathian in numei le pano bawl hi , tih khi Lai Thiangtho sungah sial awng ma uh cim ?
40019005	Mahlai ahcun Pathian in , ‘ Mahtihbang ahih hangin pano in a nu le pa zamsan in a nupi tuah kop dun haw tuk aa a panih haw cun pumkhat ah cang haw tuk hi , ’ tin ti hi .
40019006	Mahhangin amuh cu pumnih hi leh ngawl toh in , pumkhat hi haw hi . Pathian ii khoptuah sa mi cu kuamamah in khen haw ma hen , ” tin ti hi .
40019007	Farasi pawl ten , “ Mahtihbang a hitale itakaw Moses in , ‘ Pano in a zi cu maaknak lai pia in tultiik hen , ’ tin daan a piak ? ” tin dong haw hi .
40019008	Jesuh in , “ Thuzilh na haksa leita uh hangin Moses in zi maak theihnak tuk thu a piaknak hi . Mahnaven Nidanglaih cun mahtihbang hi ma hi .
40019009	Thungangai in hilh ing hi . Mipa pakhat in a zi khi , pano dang tuah sual haw ma naven maa in zi dang a huai ahitale mahpa cu nupa sualnak bawl hi , ” tin ti hi .
40019010	Nungzuitu ten , “ Zi le pasal laklawh ah hitihbang tuk a hitacun huaidun ngawl an pha saw , ” tin Jesuh lakah ti haw hi .
40019011	Mahten Jesuh in , “ Mah na tih uh mi cu mi hempoh tei caa in hi ma hi ; Pathian ii mah tih bang tukin a teek sa te bek in zui zo haw tuk hi .
40019012	Pano in zi a huaingawlnak san cu a thu a phuphun in um hi . Mi hekkhat cu pathaai hi haw hi , mi hekkhatte cu zi huaituk ngawlin til nget haw hi , mi hekkhatte cu Vancung Uknak ihangin nupi huaingawl in um haw hi . Mahtihbangin a zui theitu pawlte cun hi thu zilhnakte hi zui haw ta poh hen , ” tin ti hi .
40019013	Mi hekkhat ten a cate haw khi Jesuh in a lu hum haw ah khutsuan in thu a ngetsak tuk deih in hawhpih haw hi ; mahnaven nungzuitu ten liat haw hi .
40019014	Jesuh in , “ Naupangte cu ka lakah hung haw poh hen , kham pahsuh un hi ; itahimtitale Vancung Uknak cu hibang tei ta hi , ” tin ti hi .
40019015	A lu hum haw ah khut a suan ceng ten hawh leh hi .
40019016	Veikhat in mi pakhat cu Jesuh lakah hung in , “ Mipha Saya pa , kumkhua nunnak ka co theihnak tukin thil pha i bawl kam nang , ” tin dong hi .
40019017	Jesuh in , “ Ita mipha ti thei cim . Mipha pakhat bek um hi . A i thilpha kaw , tin i ta dong uh cim ? Nunnak co na nuam tale thukhamte khi zui in hi , ” tin ti hi .
40019018	Tangval pa cun , itibang thukhamte him ? tin dong hi . Jesuh in , “ Mi that pahsun ; nupa sualnak bawl pahsun ; nguca pahsun , a maan ngawlin mite sual nawn pahsun ;
40019019	Nanu le napa upat in hi ; na inn nelte khi nangmah le nangmah na it bang bok in it in hi , ” tin ti hi .
40019020	Tangval pan , “ Mah thukhamte cu zui khawng zo ing hi . A i bawl laih kam nang ? tin dong hi .
40019021	Jesuh cun a lakah , “ Mi cangkim na nuam ngai ta le hawh tenna na neihmi hempohte zuak in na ngahmi tangka cu mi ca-ngahte pia in hi ; mahtihcun vancung ah sum le pai nei tuk ci . Mahcengten keimah zui in , ” tin ti hi .
40019022	Mahmi thu cu tangval pan a theih ten a thasia in kik leh ta hi , itahimtitale amah cu milianzet hi .
40019023	Mahten Jesuh in a nungzuitu tei lakah , “ Thungangai in hilh ing hi . Milian tei ca in , Van cung Uknak tum tuk cu haksazet hi .
40019024	A dang pa khat hilh lehleu tung hi . Kalauk pakhat i hiokua sungah a tum tuk saangin milian pakhat i Pathian Uknak sungah a tumtuk haksa saw hi , ” tin ti hi .
40019025	Mahmi cu nungzuitu ten a theih haw ten lamdangsa mahtak in , “ Mahbangngai ahitacun a kua in kaw nunpatnak a ngah thei tuk , ” tin dong haw hi .
40019026	Jesuh in maicang zo in amu lakah , “ Hihi cu mihing tei ca in a cang thei ngawl mi hi , mahnaven Pathian ii caa cun i hempoh cang thei hi , ” tin ti hi .
40019027	Mahten Piter in , “ Ihempoh zam in nangmah zui zotoh ung . Ai heng ka ngah tuk uh ? ” tin dong hi .
40019028	Jesuh in amuh tei lakah , “ Thungangai in hilh ing hi santhak heng in Mihing Capa cu a khunnak sunglawi hum ah a khun ten noh ka nungzui sawm le panihte cu Israel miphun sawm le panih uktu hi bok tukin khunnak humahcun khung bok tuk uh ci .
40019029	Mahten kua heihihen keima caa in a nu le pa hihen , cate hihen , unau pih hihen , celnu hihen , inn hihen , lo hihen , pakhat pawpoh a zamtu cu a let zakhat in ngah leh tuk aa kumkhua nunnak piak hi tuk hi .
40019030	Mahnaven tu aa a masabel mite hi cu dawltabel hi leh haw tuk hi , tu aa a dawltabel mite cu masabel hi haw tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
40020001	Jesuh in , “ Vancung Uknak cu hibangin hi . Mi pakhat cu a cabit huansungah na dektu zei tukin zingtung no in tul hi .
40020002	A nidanglaihin a ngah awng meksa haw nikhat thaman ngun tangka cangkhat piak tuk lungkim in a huan ah na dektute cu hah hi .
40020003	Zinglam nazi kuah ten dawlmun ahcun hawh in imah dekngawl mi hekkhatte cu mu hi .
40020004	Mah mitei lakah , ‘ Nohte vang cabit huan ah hawhin na dek bok ta un ; na nitha uh a tawk zawn in pia tuk poh ing hi , ’ tin ti hi .
40020005	Mahtihcun hawh haw hi . Mahtihbangbok leng cun nazi sawm le panih ten le taaklam nazi pathum ten a dangte tiik lehleu hi .
40020006	Taaklam nazi panga kimkuan no ten dawlmun ahcun hawh lehleu in mi hekkhat a dingthong lengte khi mu hi . ‘ Itakaw imah dekngawl in sunnilui dingthong in hun na botiik thong uh ? ’ tin dong hi .
40020007	A muhten , ‘ Kuamah in nadeh atiik haw ngawlhang , ’ tin don haw hi . Mahten a man ‘ mahbang ahitale cabit huan ah hawhbok ta unna na dekbok ta un , ’ tin ti hi .
40020008	“ Taklam nadeh tawp hun a hen ten huanneitu pan huan uktu pa cu , ‘ Huan na dektute sam in na a dawlbel nadektute penpan in a masabel na a dektute tian in a thaman haw pia in hi , ’ tin ti hi .
40020009	Taaklam nazi panga ten nadeh a pantu pawlte cu a thaman haw ngun tangka cang khat teen pia hi .
40020010	Mahhangin a masabel in na dek a cialmi pawlte cu thaman la tukin a hawh bok haw ten tam deuh ngah bel tuk hung tin muang kuhnim haw hi ; mahnaven amuh tevang cu ngun tangka cang khat bok leng pia hi .
40020011	Tangka cu la haw in huan neitu bawipai humah cun phu haw hi .
40020012	‘ Hi a dawlbel in na a dektute hi nazi pakhat sung bek dek haw hi ; kohte cu nisazet lakah sun nilui in dek ung hi ; mahnaven keimuh bangbok leng in thaman pia sisi , ’ tin ti haw hi .
40020013	“ Mahten huannei tupan , ‘ Ngualcamte ngaihem un ! Nohte zol mang hi . Nikhat thaman cu ngun tangka cang khat tukin na lung uh kim si uh ci ?
40020014	Na thaman uh cu la unna inn ah pin ta un hi . A dawlbel in na dek tuk ka tiikmi pa vang cu nangmu ngah zah ngah bok tukin deih sak ing hi .
40020015	Ka tangka cu keima deihnak bangin mantheihnak tuk thu nei ing hi , amu hum aa ka phalnak hi iksik em uh cim ? ” tin hilh hi .
40020016	Mahten Jesuh in , “ Mahhangin a dawlbel te cu masabel in cang tuk aa a masabelte cu a nungdawlbel in cang tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
40020017	Jesuh cu Jerusalem lam ah a hawh lih laihtakkhin a nungzui sawm leh panihte khi a tum no ah pui in amuh nguakcang a hawhthah in , thu sonpih hi .
40020018	“ Ngaihem un ! Jerusalem ah hawh tuk hung hi mahlai pen Mihing Capa cu thiampi upa le Daanthiam pawltei khutah hengtiik haw tuk hi . Thah tukin son haw tuk hi .
40020019	Mahnung ten Gentail mitei khut ah hengtiik haw tuk hi . Gentail miten zawnsak haw tuk aa vaat in thinglamteh ah khen haw tuk hi , mahnaven nithum nung ten tholeh tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
40020020	Mahten Zebedi ii zi cu a cate panih tuah Jesuh lakah hawh haw in , Jesuh ii mai ah kuun in hehpih kuun haw hi .
40020021	“ Ikaw na deih ? ” tin Jesuh in dong hi . A man , “ Kumpi Bawipa na hih hun ten ka caa panihte hi pakhat na taklam ah , pakhat na veilam ah a khun theih haw nak tukin thu pia le ci , ” tin ti hi .
40020022	Jesuh cun , “ Na ngetmi uh hi a i ngen kam ung tih thei ma uh ci . Ka in tukmi thuaknak khuathai hi in thei ni uh cim ? ” tin dong hi . A capa panih ten , “ In thei tuk ung , ” tin don haw hi .
40020023	Jesuh in , “ Ka in tuk mi khuathai cu in thei men ngai tuk uh ci . Mahnaven ka taklam le ka veilam a khungtu tuk cu ten theihnak thu nei mang hi . Hi khunnakte hi cu ka Pai bawlsa mitei caa in hi , ” tin ti hi .
40020024	Mahmi thu cu nungzuitu a dang sawm ten a theih haw ten mah unau panih tei humah thin-uuk mahtak haw hi .
40020025	Mahhangin a venghawng haw cun Jesuh in samkhawm in , “ Na theih uh bangin leihum uktute cu a ukmi haw tei humah lal zet in , hotute vangin thuneizet haw hi .
40020026	Mahnaven nohtei lakah cun mahtihbangin hi tuk ma hi . Nohtei lak pen pa khakhat in midang saangin ngeng saw a nuam ta le midang tei umlawh na a deh kuul hi .
40020027	Nohtei lakpen a masabel a nuam a hitale nangmu sila in a um masak kuul hi .
40020028	Mihing Capa vang cu mahtihbang hi bok hi . Mihing Capa cu a tiiktu hi ngawlin mitei nadektu tukin le mitampi pansuak tukin le a nunnak pia tukin hung hi , ” tin ti hi .
40020029	Jesuh le a nungzuitute khi Jerikho khua pen a tul haw laih khin mitampi ten zui haw hi .
40020030	Lampi el aa a khung leng mi mitcaw panih ten Jesuh amu el no ah hawh tih khi a theih haw ten , “ Maw David Capa hehpih zazal in hi , ” tin au haw hi .
40020031	Mipi ten liat in mengdeen in um un tin ti haw hi . Mahnaven mengcuang ngawlin , David Capa hehpih poh in hi , tin nging seseem in au haw hi .
40020032	Jesuh cu ding in a panih haw cun sam hi . “ A i bawlsak tuk kaw na deih uh ? ” tin dong hi .
40020033	Amuh ten , “ Topa khua mutiik zal in hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
40020034	Jesuh cun hehpih in a mit haw cu zen hi . Thakhat in khuamu leh thei haw in amah cu zui haw hi .
40021001	Jesuh le a nungzuitute cu Jerusalem nai dedeuhli haw toh hi . Olif mual a ummi Bethfage khua heng haw hi . A nungzuite panih maiah hawh ham tiikin hitin thucah hi .
40021002	“ Na mai uh aa khua ah hawh unna laakpi a no tuah a khih haw mi mu paih tuk uh ci . A khau duuk in ka lakah hunpih un hi .
40021003	Miten i tuk kaw na kaih uh a ti haw tale , ‘ Topan kin hi , ’ tin ti unna , thakhat in phal haw tuk poh hi , ” tin ti hi .
40021004	Hihi cu kamsang ii hilhsami kimtiiknak tukin hi . Kamsang cun :
40021005	“ Zion khuapi khi hilh un , Na kumpipa cu na lakah hungli laih hi . Amah cu mi lungneemmi hi in laak humah in khung hi . Laakno hum ah in khung hi , ” tin ti hi .
40021006	Mahhangin nungzuitute cu hawhhaw in Jesuh ii hilhnak bangcun bawl haw hi .
40021007	Laak le a no cu hunpih haw in a ngumzaang haw ahcun a puan haw phah in Jesuh cu khung hi .
40021008	Mi tampi ten Jesuh ii hawhnak tuk lampi ah a puante haw cu phah in midang ten thingceh la in lampi ah phah bok haw hi .
40021009	Jesuh ii masuan ah a hawhmite hihen a nunglam pen a zuitute hihen a venghawng haw cun , “ Hosana David Capa cu thangphat un ! Topai min in a hungmicu Pathian in thupha pia ta hen ! Pathian cu thangphat un ! ” tin au tawtok haw hi .
40021010	Jesuh cu Jerusalem khua sungah a tum ten a khua buppi in au leilui haw in , “ Hipa hi a kua him ? ” tin khua miten dong haw hi .
40021011	Mahte cun mipi ten , “ Hipa cu Galilee ngam Nazereth khua kamsang pa Jesuh hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
40021012	Jesuh cu biakinn sungah tum in mahlai aa na a zuaktu le a leitu te khi hawlvawk khawng hi . Tangka thektu tei cabuai le laileng zuaktu tei khunnakte cu linglet sakkhawng hi .
40021013	Mahten a muhtei lakah Lai Thiangtho sungah Pathian in , ‘ Ka inn cu thu ngetnak inn tih hi tuk hi , ’ mahnaven noh ten nguca tei ngelhnak mun in bawl uh ci , ” tin ti hi .
40021014	Biakinn sung um mitcaw le kebai pawlte a lakah hung haw in damtiik hi .
40021015	Nalamdang thil a bawl ten Biakinn sung a naupang pawlten , “ David Capa cu thangphat un , ” tin a aumi haw cu thiampi upate le Daanthiam pawl ten a muh haw ten thin uk mahtak haw hi .
40021016	Mahhangin , mipi ten , “ A aulih haw mi hi thei cim ? ” tin dong haw hi . Jesuh in , ‘ thei ing ! Lai Thiangtho sungah Naupang le naunawi cawp naumom tei sung pen thangphatnak cangkim tultiik ci , ’ tin ngatmi khi sial awng ma uh cim ? ” tin ti hi .
40021017	Jesuh cun zamsan in Jerusalem khuapi sungpen tulin Bethani khua ah hawh in caam hi .
40021018	A zingten zingtung in Jerusalem khuapi lam ah a hawhleh ten a ngilkialzet hi .
40021019	Lampi el aa theikung cu mu in a el zuan hi ; mahnaven a ceh sialngawl a ngah i mah mu ma hi . Mahhangin theikung cu , “ Itukmah ten ngah leh toh pahsun , ” tin ti hi . Thakhat in theikung pi cu ko khawng hi .
40021020	Mahmi cu a nungzui ten a muh haw ten lamdangsazet haw hi . “ Itahitihbangin manlangzet in ko heng ? ” tin dong haw hi .
40021021	Jesuh in , “ Thungangai in hilh ing hi . Aicaannak neivingviang ngawlin na um tatak uh ta cun hi theikung pi hum aa ka bawlmi hi nangmuh vangin bawl thei bok tuk uh ci . Hi bek hei hi ngawlin hi mual hei hi , ’ Thawn inna tuipi sungah caak in , ’ na ti uh tale na tih uh bangin piang tuk hi .
40021022	Na um ngangai uh ahitale thungetnak tuah na ngetmi uh hempoh cu ngah tuk uh ci , ” tin ti hi .
40021023	Jesuh cu Biakinn sungah thu a zilh lihlaihtakin thiampi upa pawl le hotute a lakah hung haw in , “ Itakaw hitihbang thil na bawl ? Akua in kaw thu a piatu ? tin dong haw hi .
40021024	Jesuh in , “ Thu pakhat dong bok nangin na , na don thei uh ahitale , a koi thu in hitihbang thil ka bawl tih hilh tunghi , ” tin ti hi .
40021025	“ Johan ii baptizam a piak khi Pathian ii thu in maw mihing ii thu in kaw apiak ? ” tin dong hi . Mahten amu lakah el dunnak um in , “ I tin ti kam nung ? ‘ Pathian ii thu in bawl hi , ’ a ti uh a hin , ‘ Mah ngen Johan ii thu sang ma si uh si , ’ tin ti ol si .
40021026	‘ Mihing thu in e , ’ a ti leleu uh vangin Johan cu mi hempoh ten kamsang hi tin a up sih haw taak mipi ten eimuh lehlam i tih bang tin a ti pang haw a hin , tih lauhuai sih hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
40021027	Mahhangin , ‘ Theima ung ’ tin don haw hi . Mahten Jesuh in , “ Mahbang ahitale keivang in a koi thu in him ka bawl , tih hilh bok tuk mang hi , ” tin ti hi .
40021028	Jesuh in , “ Itin ngaisung kam uh ci ? Veikhatlaihin mi pakhat in capa panih nei hi . A capa upa saw lakah cun hawh in , ” Capa , tuni cabit huan ah hawh in na naa dek in hi , ” tintiik hi .
40021029	A capa upa saw cun , “ Nuam mang ” tin eel hi , mahnaven a nungten sikleh in cabit huan ah cun hawh leh hi .
40021030	Mahten a capa nauta saw lakah hawh lehleu in cabit huan ah nadek tukintiik bok hi . Mahpa cun , “ Hawh tung hi ka pa , tin ti hi , mahnaven hawh ma hi .
40021031	“ Hi capa panih tei lakpen a kuasaw in kaw a pai deihnak a bawltu ? ” tin dong hi . A muhten , “ A capa upa saw , ” tin don haw hi . Mahten Jesuh in , “ Thungangai in hilh ing hi : siahkhontu le tisa zuak pawlte hin nangmu laihngawlin Pathian Uknak sungah tum haw tuk hi .
40021032	itahimtitale Baptizam piatu Johan cu a maan mi lampi lak tukin nangmu lakah hung naven sang ma uh ci ; mahnaven siahkhontu tisa zuaktute cun um haw hi . Mahmi na muh nung uh hei ten na lungmu uh thek nuam cuang ma uh ci , umhei um cuang ma uh ci , ” tin ti hi .
40021033	Jesuh in , “ Hi thutehkipnak hi ngai hih hem un . Veikhatlaihin ngamneitu pakhat um in cabit huan bawl hi . Mahmi a huan cu seentiang in uum hi . Cabit suuknak tuk khukco in a cinnak tukin buuk sa hi . Mahnungten cabit huan nadektu tei lakah zawngtiik in amah cu khualzin tukin hawhta hi .
40021034	Cabit ngah thoih hun a hen ten a covo cian tukin a huan zawngtu tei lak ah cun a umlawh te hawhtiik hi .
40021035	Cabit huan a zawngtu ten a silate cu man in pakhat cu vaat in a dang pakhat cu that in a dang pakhat cu suang in sep haw hi .
40021036	Loneitu pa cun a silate tam saw deuh hawhtiik lehleu hi ; mahnaven huanzawngtu pawl ten a masa bang leleng in bawlsia haw hi .
40021037	A dawlbel ten a capatiik hi , “ Ka capa hi cu maisong rori haw tuk , ” tin ngaisung hi .
40021038	Mahnaven huanzawngtu pawl ten a capa a muh haw ten , “ Hipa hi huan nei tupai capa hi . Hung unna , that nung , a thilte eimun co tuk hung hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
40021039	A capa cu man in huan pualam ah doktul in that haw hi .
40021040	“ Huan neitu pa a hun ten mah huan a zawngtute cu ai tin bawl tuk hum tih i tin ngaisung uh cim ? ” tin dong hi .
40021041	A muhten , “ Mahtihbang miphangawlte cu that in ama covo a maan no in a pia theitu midang tei lakah a huan cu zawn tuk hi , ” tin don haw hi .
40021042	Jesuh in amu lakah , “ Lai Thiangtho ii tihmi khi sial awng ma uh cim ? Lai Thiangtho in , Inn satu tei imah manneingawl tin a zammi haw suang cu a thupi bel mi suang in cang hi . Hihi Topai bawl mi hi , oh tei mit zoh cun mawizet hi , ” tin ti hi .
40021043	“ Thungangai in hilh ing hi , Pathian Uknak hi nangmu lakpen laak hi tuk aa ngah pha no in a ngahsuaktiik theitu tei lakah piak hi tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
40021044	“ Kuahei hihen hi suangpi humah a caakmi cu kehkhawng in hi suang ii ngawi ngah mi pawpoh cu leivul bangin zan dihdiah haw tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
40021045	Jesuh ii hilhmi thu tehkipnakte cu thiampi upa le Farasi pawl ten a theih haw ten amu cungca ng son hi tih khi thei haw hi .
40021046	Mahhangin Jesuh cu mat tum haw hi . Mahnaven mipi ten Jesuh cu kamsang hi tin a ngaihsut haw hangin mipite lau in Jesuh cu man ngam haw ma hi .
40022001	Jesuh in mipite cu tehkipnak tuah in zilh hi .
40022002	“ Vancung Uknak cu hitihbangin hi . Veikhatlaihin kumpipa pakhat in a capa ii zi huainak puai bawl hi .
40022003	Mah mopuainak ah tel tukin a sammi hempohte hilh tukin a umlawhtetiik hi , mahnaven kuamah hung haw ma hi .
40022004	Mahhangin a sam mitei lakah a umlawh dangtetiik leh in hitin thu cah hi . “ An eih manzo ung . Ka khuicangte le ngan thauzette ngo khawng zotoh ung i hempoh in tuangtim khawng zotoh ung hi . An ei khawm tuk in hung toh un , ” tin ti hi .
40022005	Mahnaven samsa pawl ten imah sumsial kha ngawlin amu nadeh kel dek in um haw hi . Pakhat cu a lo ah hawh in a dang pakhat cu a dawl zuaknak ah hawh hi .
40022006	Midang a taang pawl ten a umlawhte cu man in a vahceng haw ten that haw hi .
40022007	Kumpipa cu a thin uukzet hi . Mahhangin a ngaalkaptetiik in mah mithat tute cu that in a khuate vang haal haw hi .
40022008	Mahnungten a umlawhte sam in , “ Mo puai ka bawlmi cu i hempoh in mankhawng zotoh naven ka sam mite hi sam taak hi haw ma hi .
40022009	Mahhangin mizapi hawhnak lampi ah hawh ta unna , na zop theih zazah uh in zawm ta un hi , ” tin ti hi .
40022010	Mahtihcun a umlawhte cu hawh haw in lampi ah a tawhmi haw pawpoh a pha a sia tih um ngawlin a sam haw taak , puaibawlnak innpi cu dim hi .
40022011	“ A sammi haw te zo tukin kumpipa cu tum in mopuan silh ngawlmi pakhat mu hi .
40022012	Kumpi bawipa cun , ‘ Ka ngualcam pa , mopuan silh ngawl in i tin kaw hi lai mun ah na tum theih ? ’ tin dong hi . Mahnaven aman imah hilh thei ma hi .
40022013	Mahten Kumpi pan a umlawh tei lakah , ‘ Akhut le a ke keen unna , pualam khuathimnak ah vawk ta un hi . Mahlai mun ah kah , le hacang ngawi in um tuk hi , ’ ti hi , ” tin hilh hi .
40022014	Mahnungten Jesuh in , “ Sammicu tampi naven ten mi cu demno hi , ” tin a dawlbelnak in hilh hi .
40022015	Farasi mite cu hawh haw in Jesuh sual zeitheihnak tukin thu dot tuk bawlcawm haw hi .
40022016	Mahten amuh zuitu hekkhatte le Herod ii mihiing hekkhatte Jesuh lakah hawhtiik in “ Saya pa , nangcu thumaan son ci tih thei ung hi . Pathian ii deihnak a i him tihmi thu vang miten i tin ngaisung haw nantim tih hei ngaisung ngawl in zilh ci . Itahimtitale nang cu mitei hihnak vang maisong ma ci .
40022017	Mahtaak na ngaihsutnak hilh in hi . Rom kumpi lakah siah piak hi a Daan uh in awi maw awi ma him ? ” tin dong haw hi .
40022018	Tuptahnak pha ngawl a neih haw mi khi Jesuh in a theih ten amu lakah in , “ Miphangawl te ai ta kei thang in awk tuk in na ngaihsut uh ?
40022019	Siah piak tuk mi tangka lak hem un , ” tin ti hi . Tangka cu a piak haw
40022020	ten , “ A koi mel le min kaw a cuang ? ” tin dong hi .
40022021	Amuh ten , “ Kumpi bawipa mel le a min hi ! ” tin don haw hi . Mahten Jesuh in , “ Mahtin ahitale kumpi pai ta cu kumpi pa pia un na ; Pathian ii ta cu Pathian pia un hi , ” tin don hi .
40022022	Mahmi a theih haw ten lamdangsa in pualam ah tul in hawhsan khawng haw ta hi .
40022023	Mah ni sun leleng ahcun Sadusi mi hekkhatte Jesuh lakah hunghaw hi . A muhte cu thawhlehnak um ma a titu te haw hi .
40022024	Amuh ten , ‘ Saya pa , Moses ii zilhnak ah , ’ Mi pakhat ca nei ngawlin a thi tale a nau pan a zi cu huai hihim hen hi . Mahticun huai in caa a nei haw tale cu mithi pai caa in cang tuk hi , ’ tin ti hi .
40022025	Hilaiah a um awngmi unau salih um haw hi . Upabel cu zi huai in canei ngawlin thi hi ; a zi cu a nau pan co hi .
40022026	Panihnak pa vang cu thi leleu in a pathumnak pan a zi cu co lehleu hi . Mahtihcun a unau hawng haw ii zi ahih nung ten unaute cu thi khawng haw hi .
40022027	A dawlbel ten mah nu vang cu thi bok hi .
40022028	Asalih haw in a zi teen haw hangin thihnak pen thawhleh ni ten a kua ii zi bel in um kam ni ? ” tin dong haw hi .
40022029	Jesuh in , “ Aiti lawlawm in khial thei uh cim ? Lai Thiangtho le Pathian ngilnak huham na theih uh ngawl hang in hi .
40022030	Itahimtitale mithi tei thawhleh tecun van ah a ummi vancung mi bang haw tuk a , huaidunnak tihte um tuk ma hi .
40022031	Mithi thawhlehnak thu ah Pathian ii hilhmi sial awng ma uh cim ?
40022032	Pathian in , ‘ Kei cu Abraham Pathian , Isak Pathian , Jakob Pathian ing hi , ’ tin ti hi . A nungmi ii Pathian hi aa , a thi mitei Pathian hi ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
40022033	Mahmicu mipi in a theih haw ten a thuhilh daan khi lamdangsazet haw hi .
40022034	Jesuh in Sadusi mite awnthei ngawlin bawl tih thu khi Farasi miten a theih haw ten tawkdun khawm in ,
40022035	amu lakpen pakhat , Daanthiam pan Jesuh khi a sual zeinuam in thu dong hi .
40022036	Saya pa , “ Daan sung pen i thukham kaw a ngeng bel ? ” tin dong hi .
40022037	Jesuh in , ‘ Topa na Pathian cu na lungmu hempoh , na nunnak hempoh le na ngaihsutnak hempoh tuah in it in hi , ’
40022038	tihmi hi ; a ngengbel le a thupibel thukham hi .
40022039	Panihnak ah a thupi bel mi thukham cu pakhatnak bang leleng hi : ‘ Nangmah na ih bangin na innneelte khi it in hi , ’ tih hi hi .
40022040	Moses Daan hempoh le kamsang tei zilhmi hempoh cu hi thukham panih hin huapkhawng in kaikhawmtu hi , ” tin ti hi .
40022041	Farasite munkhat ah a pumkhawm haw ten Jesuh in ,
40022042	“ Messiah hi itin ngaisung kam uh ci ? Akua ii casuan kaw ? ” tin dong hi . “ David casuan hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
40022043	Jesuh in , “ Mahtin a hitale i takaw Hawvang in David cu , ‘ Topa hi , ’ tin i tin sam tukintiik thei him ? David in ?
40022044	‘ Topa in ka Topa i lakah , ka ngaalte na ke nuaiah ka koih maceng , Ka taklam ah in khung in hi , ’ tin ti hi .
40022045	David in Topa a ti ta cun , itahim Messiah cu David casuan ahih theih tuk ? ” tin dong hi .
40022046	Jesuh ii thudot mi cu kuamah in don thei haw ngawlin mahni pen pan kuamah in thu dong leh ngam haw matoh hi .
40023001	Jesuh cu mipi le a nungzui tei lakah in thu zilh hi .
40023002	“ Daanthiamte le Farasite hi Moses ii piakmi Daan a zilhciangtu tuk mite haw hi .
40023003	Mahhangin a hilh haw mi thu hempohte cu na bawl tuk uh le na zui tukmi uh hi . Mahnaven a thil bawldaan haw maan ma hi .
40023004	Mi ko humah thil ngitzet suan haw hi , mahnaven amuh ten mah van ngit puakbawm tukin a khut lek no haw hei in tawngkha nuam haw ma hi .
40023005	Mitei muhtuk bek ah i hempoh bawl haw hi . A lu haw le a baan haw ah a khihmi haw hum aa Lai Thiangtho a ngat haw mi lupawng le baanvialte khi zo hem un ! Itihzah in ngeng him ! A puanceep haw te a sau daan khi zo hem un !
40023006	Puaibawlnak mun ah hihen Biakinn ah hihen a phabelnak mun ah a khun nuam haw hangin khunnak khi hamsa mek haw hi .
40023007	Dawl-tuan mipi tamnak mun pen mitei upat piak tuk nuam in le , ‘ Saya pa , Saya pa , ’ tin sam tuk khi nuamzet haw hi .
40023008	Mahnaven nohten , ‘ Saya pa ’ tin a sam haw tuk khi nuam pahsuh un ! Itahimtitale nohte cu unau teen hi uh ci , ‘ Saya pa ’ tin na sam tuk uh Khrih pakhat bek nei uh ci .
40023009	Mahten leihum pen a kua mamah khi ‘ ka pa ’ tin sam pahsuh un , itahimtitale vancung ah a um na Pa uhbek khi Pa tin sam tuk nei uh ci .
40023010	Mah i humah kuamah in ‘ Hotu ’ saya tin sam tuk nuam pahsuh un , itahimtitale Khrih tih mi Hotu saya pakhat bek nei uh ci .
40023011	Nohtei lak pen a ngengbel a nuammi in nangmu lakah sila ahih masak kul hi .
40023012	Kua heihihen amah le mah a thupi a sacop mite cu nuainep co tuk hi , mah leh mah a niamkhiat mite cu khaisan co haw tuk hi .
40023013	“ Daanthiamte le Farasite , noh caa in lauhuai zet hi . Noh mi ultung theite , Vancung Uknak kongka cu mitei tumtheih tuk ngawlin khak in nohte ta le tum nuam sih ngawl ; midang a tum nuam mitei caa in hon nuam ma uh ci .
40023014	Daanthiamte le Farasite , thusia cote uh ci . Noh nemlot mi ultung thei meivongte meivong ahih haw taak zawnsak in a inn haw tian in long uh ci ; mahten mipi muh in ngei zet thungen uh ci . Hitihbangin na hih uh taak bawlsiatnak nasiazet thuak tuk uh ci .
40023015	“ Daanthiam mi le Farasite , thusia cote uh ci . Noh mi nemlotte , mi pakhat ii lungmu thektiik tukin hawmkuang tuah ngam tampi ah vaak uh ci . Mi pakhat na ngah uh ten hel lah caak tukin nangmuh saangin a letnih in thuak tukin bawl uh ci .
40023016	“ Huaitu mitcaw pawlte ! ‘ Nohca Itihzah n lauhuai him ? Mi pakhat in Biakinn min saal in siat a cam tale imah kho ma hi , mahnaven biakinn sung a sui saal in siat a cam tale a tepmi khi kho hi , ’ tin mite zilh uh ci .
40023017	Mitcaw le misil pawl ! A i khi kaw a thupi deuh ? Sui maw , ahimatale sui khi sui thiang tho tuk in a bawltu Biakinn saw kaw ?
40023018	Mah i hum ah , ‘ Mi pakhat in biaklaandawh min saal in siat a cam ta cun a thutiam mi kho ma hi ; mahnaven biaklaandawh hum a ummi zehsa min saal in siat a cam tale na siatcam mi kho hi , ’ tin zilh uh ci .
40023019	Khuamu thei ma lawlawm si uh si ! A i khi kaw a thupi saw ? Zehsa maw zehsa a thiangtho tiiktu biaklaandawh him ?
40023020	Mahhangin mi pakhat in biaklaandawh saal in siatcam a bawl ten biaklaandawh le laandawh hum aa a ummi zehsa hempoh in siatcam hi .
40023021	Biakinn saal in siat a cam ten biakinn le biakinn sung aa a ummi Pathian min in siatcam hi .
40023022	Mahten vancung saal in siatcam tale Pathian khunnak tohkham le a hum a khungtu ii min in siatcam hi .
40023023	“ Daanthiam le Farasi pawl ! Thusia cote uh ci . Noh mitihem thei pawl ! Amu huncaan in laak mi putinan , lenmui , le thiingte khi Pathian lakah sawm a pakhat pia uh ci ; mahnaven Daan sung aa thupizet mi diknak , hehpihnak le thumaannakte cu zui ngawlin imah in sial ma uh ci . Sehsawm a sehkhat cu na piak tuk uh hihim hi . Mahnaven Daan sungah a ummi a dang tevang khi daithaang pahsuh un hi .
40023024	Hotu mitcaw pawl ! na in uh mi khuat sung a tho neuno diikvawk nave uh cin kalauk leh lam thon tum sial si uh si .
40023025	“ Daanthiam le Farasi pawl ! Thusia cote uh ci ! Noh mi nemlot pawl ! Na khuat uhle na pakaan uhte a pualam bek ciang lenglung in som nave uhcin a sung lam cu mitei thil na lonmi uh le duhhamnak pen na ngah mi uh tuah dim hi .
40023026	Farasi mitcaw pawl ! Na khuat uh a sunglam som masa unna , mahticun a pualam vang ciang bok tuk hi .
40023027	“ Daanthiam le Farasi pawl ! Thusia cote uh ci . Noh mitihem thei pawl ! Nohte cu a ngo noihmi mithi khaan bang uh ci ; a pualam cu mawizet nave uh cin a sungah cun nguh , a uih a muatmi tuah in dim hi .
40023028	Mahtihbangin na pualam uh zo ten mi hempoh caa cun miphazet bang uh ci , mahnaven na sunglam uh cu nemlotnak le sualnak a phuphun in dim uh ci .
40023029	“ Daanthiam le Farasi pawl ! Thusia cote uh ci ! kamsangte phum nak tuk khaan a phapha in bawl uh ci , mipha tei khanphut cu mawitiik zet uh ci .
40023030	Nohten , ‘ Hi a pupa uh tei khan ah in a nung uh bok ta a hin na a bawlmi pawlte hi bawl tuk ma hung hi , kamsangte hei thah hihim haw tuk ma ta naven , tin ti uh ci
40023031	Mahtihbang a hitale kamsangte a thattu pawltei casuan ung hi tih a langtiiktu hi uh ci .
40023032	Mahhangin na pupa uh tei a patsa haw mi na cu nangmu pawl ten bawl khawng un hi !
40023033	Noh ngul le ngul tei ca te ! Itinkaw hell sung khiaknak pen luat tuk hung tin na ngaihsut ngam uh ?
40023034	Thungangaiin hilh ing hi ; nangmu lakah kamsang le miciip zilhtu sayate hawhtiik tung ; mi hekkhatte cu that tuk uh ci , mi hekkhatte cu thinglamteh ah that tuk uh ci , mi hekkhatte cu pumkhawm innte pen vaat in khua khat pen khua khat ah hawlvawk pepel tuk uh ci .
40023035	Mahtihbang ahih hangin sualnak a neingawl mi thihnak na thuak tiiknak uh hangin bawlsiatnak cu nangmu humah hengkhawng tuk hi . Sual nei ngawl Abel penpan in Biakinn le biaklaandawh laklawh ah na thahmi uh Berakhiah ii capa Zakhariah tian , a thisan a suah haw man cu nangmu humah heng khawng tuk hi .
40023036	Thungangai in hilh ing hi : hi mite na thahnak uh i hangin bawlsiatnak cu tukhan mihing tei humah hengkhawng tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
40023037	Jesuh in , “ Jerusalem , Jerusalem ! Na lakah Pathian in a tiikmi kamsangte that in kamsang te suang in sep ci . Akpi ii aknote a hanuai ah a uap bangin na mite uap nuam li navengin nuam ma ci !
40023038	Mahtaak na Biakinn cu thacang tuk aa veng silsial tuk hi .
40023039	Hilhham ing hi : ‘ Topai min in a hungmi cu Pathian in thupha pia ta hen , ’ tin na tih theih laklawh tian cu tu pen pan keimah cu mu leh hihim tukma toh uh ci , ” tin ti hi .
40024001	Biakinn pen Jesuh a hawh tul laitak in nungzuitute a lakah hung haw in Biakinn sak a nasia dan sonpih haw hi .
40024002	Jesuh in , “ Mahngai , zo teen un . Thungangai in hilh ing hi : Biakinn suang pakhat no hei hi ama umnak keel ah um tuk ma hi ; a venghawng in khiakkulh khawng in um tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
40024003	Jesuh cu Olif mual humah a khun laihtak in a nungzuite kuamah ii theih ngawlin a lakah hawh haw in , “ Hilh hem in i tuk ten kaw na hilhmi bangin a hen tuk ? Na hunlehnak tuk le hun a bonak tuk , hun naizo tih theihnak tukin a ii melciknakte kaw a heng tuk , ” tin dong haw hi .
40024004	Jesuh in , “ Ngaalling un , kuamah in zol haw pahsuh hen .
40024005	Mitampite keima min in hung haw tuk hi , ‘ Keimah hi Messiah ing hi , ’ tin ti haw tuk aa mitampi zol haw tuk hi .
40024006	Lam naino ah hihen , lam khawla pi ah hihen , ngaaldonak thawmvang thei tuk uh ci , mahnaven lau pahsuh un . Mahtihbang thil cu um tuk hi , mahnaven a tawpnak heng tihnak hi malaih hi .
40024007	Ngamkhat le ngamkhat do dun haw tuk hi , kumpi pakhat le kumpi pakhat that dun haw tuk . Leihum mun hempoh ah paam le hinhiing um tuk hi .
40024008	Mahtihbang thilte cu naunei kuan von na pan bang tuk hi .
40024009	Mahten man haw tuk aa bawlsiat tuk le thah tukin mi khut ah hengtiik haw tuk hi . Keima hangin miphun hempoh ten hua haw tuk hi .
40024010	Mahten mi tampi ten a upnak haw zamsan haw tuk hi . Pakhat le pakhat zuak dun haw tuk aa pakhat le pakhat hua dun haw tuk hi .
40024011	Mahten Kamsang deu tampi piang haw tuk aa mitampi zol haw tuk hi .
40024012	Sualnak khang tuk aa mi tampi itnak kiam tuk hi .
40024013	Mahnaven a dawltawpnak bel tian in a thuak a nang zo miten nunpatnak ngah haw tuk hi .
40024014	Mahten miphun hempoh tei theih khawng tukin Vancung Uknak Thuthangpha hi leihum khua hempoh ah phuan hi tuk hi . Mahnungten a tawpnak cu heng tuk hi .
40024015	Kamsangpa Daniel in a hilh hamsa mi , ‘ Mulzahuai Thil Nawngkai , ’ cu mu tuk uh ci . Mahmi Thil nawngkai cu mun thiangtho ah ding tuk hi .
40024016	Mahten Judea ngam aa a umte cu mual humah taai haw hen .
40024017	A inn hum aa a ummi cu a inn sungah van la tuk in tolh pahsuh hen .
40024018	Lo aa a um mite a puan la tukin kikleh pahsuh hen .
40024019	Mahhun le mahni cu numei naupaai le naukaai nei mitei caa in itihzah in haksa kam ni ?
40024020	Phalbi hun le Sabbath ni ngelcel in thinsu in na taailih ngawlnak tuk uh in Pathian nel ah thungen un hi .
40024021	Itahimtitale leipi a pian tung penpan tuni tian a heng awng ngawlmi mulzahuai haksatnak a lauhuai nate hengtuk aa , mahtihbang a lauhuai haksatnak cu tunung hei ten hengleh tuk ma toh hi .
40024022	Mahnaven mahhun cu Pathian in a hun comtiik zo hi ; hun com ngawl in a um ta bang ahin kuamah suakca tuk ma hi . Mahnaven Pathian in a tensa mitei caa cun a ni cu comtiik tuk hi .
40024023	“ Mahten mi pakhakhat in , ‘ Zohem un , hilaihah Messiah um , ’ ‘ Mahma tale hilaikhah um , ’ tin a ti haw tale sang pahsuh un .
40024024	Itahhimtitale Messiah maan ngawl , nal kamsangte tul haw tuk aa nalamdang le thil thasiahhuai ngangaite bawlin a cang thei tawp in Pathian ii tensa mite khi zol haw tuk hi .
40024025	Phawkleng ta un hi . A laihngawl in hilhham ing hi .
40024026	“ Mi ten , ‘ Zo un , ngamkhiing ah um , ’ tin a ti haw a hitale hawh pahsuh un . ‘ Hilaihah ngelh hi , ’ a ti haw vang in sang pahsuh un .
40024027	Itahimtitale Mihing Capa cu nisuahnak lam pen nitumnak tian thakhat in a al pupum hawphelep bangin hung tuk hi .
40024028	“ Miluang umnak hempoh ah cun mulukolhte hulawm haw tuk hi .
40024029	“ Mahmi haksatnak hun a bo ten ni thimtuk , hade vaak leh tuk ma toh , van pen aksite caak in , van aa a ummi vaknak huhamte cu amu hawhnak lampi pen pial haw tuk hi .
40024030	Mahten Mihing Capa ii tolh leh hun melciknak tukin van ah cun langtuk hi . Mihing Capa cu vancung meingo hum pen vaknak huham tuah le sunloihnak ngengpi tuah a hun khi mu haw tuk aa leihum miphun hempohte cu kap haw tuk hi .
40024031	A ngingzet mi pengkul tum haw tuk aa lei ningli ahcun a vancung mitetiik in van mawkkhat lam deng pen khatlam deng tian ah a ummi a tensa mite cu khawmkhawm haw tuk hi .
40024032	“ Theikungpi in cihnak hilh hen . Theikung pi a kangkaak note tawt in a cehte a tawt ten khuakhaal hun nai zo tih khi thei uh ci .
40024033	Mahtihbang bokin hi thil hempohte na muh uh ten a hun naizet zo tih khi thei un hi .
40024034	Thungangai in hilh ing hi ; atu aa a nung laih mi hempoh a thihkhawng haw laih ngawlin hi thil hempohte hi kim khawng tuk hi .
40024035	Lei le van cu bo haw tuk naven , ka awnkam cu bo awng hihim tuk ma hi .
40024036	Mah ni le mah hun cu kuamah in thei ma hi ; van aa a ummi vancung mi hihen , Capa in hihen , thei haw ma hi ; Pa bek in thei hi .
40024037	Noah khan laih in na a piangmi bangin Mihing Capa ii hun leh ni ten mahbangin piangbok tuk hi .
40024038	Tuihautung laihngawl cun in le ei in , zi nei , pasal nei in um haw hi , Noah tangphawlawng sungah a tum ni tian nopzet in um haw hi .
40024039	Hitihcun tuihautung in a taikhawng laklawh tian a i piang tuk tih kuaman thei ham haw ma hi . Mihing Capa ii hun lehnak tuk vang mahtihbangbok leng tuk hi .
40024040	Mahhun a hen ten lo ah mi panih na dek haw tuk aa pakhat cu laakkai in , a pakhat cu zamsan in um tuk hi .
40024041	Andengli numei panihte cu andeng pakhat laakkai hi tuk aa a pakhat cu zamsan hi tuk hi .
40024042	“ Mahtaak ngaalling in um un hi ; itahimtitale itikten na Topa heng tuk him tih theiham ma uh ci .
40024043	Inn neitu pan nguca pai hen tuk a thei ham tacun hihbu ngawlin cing tuk hi , a nguca pa cu a inn keu in tumthei tuk ma hi tih cu na theihsa uh hi .
40024044	Mah ahih hangin ngaalling in mansa leleng in um un , itahimtitale Mihing Capa cu na muanmawh khak ngawl laihtak uh in heng tuk hi .
40024045	“ Mahtihbang ahitale a kuabel tuk him , muantaak le a cip umlawh cu ? Muanhuai le a cip umlawhpa cu a bawipan a dang umlawhte a khawngtu in koih hi , a hun maanzet in umlawh dangte an pia theimi khi hi tuk hi .
40024046	Pha no in naa a dehlih laihtak in a bawipa a hungkik leh ahitale itihzah in kaw mah umlawhpa cu a lung a dam tuk ?
40024047	Thungangai in hilh ing hi ; mah umlawh pa cu a bawipan a thil hempoh cingtu in koih tuk hi .
40024048	Mahnaven umlawh cip ngawl a hi tacun , ka bawipa pin pal tuk ma laih poh , ngei em tuklaih poh tin ti in ,
40024049	umlawh dangte khi zawnsak , le vat in zukhamte tuah zukham an ei in um haw tuk hi .
40024050	Mahten a bawipa cu a ngaallin ngawl le a theihkhak ngawl laih hun ah ngaihsut khak ngawlpi in hengkik leh tuk hi .
40024051	A bawipan mahpa cu hawlvawk in mi ultung tei umnak ahcun kuat tuk aa mahlai mun ahcun kap in hacang ngawi in um tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
40025001	Jesuh in , “ Mahhun ten Vancung Uknak cu mohuaitu tangvalpa muak tukin mei inn tuah a hawhtu khanglai sawmkhatte tuah bang ten tuk hi .
40025002	Mah khanglai sawm khat sung pen panga lam cu sil in a dang panga lam cu cip haw hi .
40025003	A sil khanglaite cun mei inn cu keng haw naven zinen keng haw ma hi .
40025004	A cip mite cun a mei inn haw zinen dimzet in keng haw hi .
40025005	Mohuaitu tangvalpa cu khuanu deuh hangin khanglaite cu hihbu hih haw hi .
40025006	“ Zanngil ten , ‘ Mohuaitu tangvalpa cu heng hi ! Tho unna muak un hi , ’ tin au thawm thang hi .
40025007	Khanglai sawmkhatte cu khangto in a mei inn haw tek cu vaak haw hi .
40025008	Mahten khanglai sil pawlte cun khanglai cip pawl tei lakah , ‘ Ka mei inn uh mitli toh hi , na zinen uh hoi bok un , ’ tin ngen haw hi .
40025009	Khanglai cipte cun , ‘ Cangthei tuk ma hi , nangmu ca ken ceem ma ung hi . Dawl ah hawh ta unna lei leh ta un , ’ tin ti haw hi .
40025010	Mahhangin khanglai a sil panga lamte cu zinen lei tukin dawl ah hawh haw hi ; a hawh haw laan in mohuaitu tangvalpa cu heng hi . Ngaallingzetsa in a ummi khanglai pangate cu tangvalpa tuah Mopuai an vaaknak sungah cun tum in kong cu khak hawhi .
40025011	Mahnung ten khanglai panga lam pawlte cu heng in , ‘ Topa , Topa , kong hon in hi , ’ tin au haw hi .
40025012	“ Hontuk mang hi , nohte thei kha mang , ” tin moneitu tangvalpan don hi , ” tin hilh hi .
40025013	Jesuh in , “ Mahticun a ni le hun na theih uh ngawl hangin ngaallingzet in ngak un , ” tin a dawltabel ten ti hi .
40025014	Jesuh in , “ Mahhun ten Vancung Uknak cu hitihbangin hi tuk hi . Veikhatlaih in mipa pakhat um in khualzin tukin ngaisung hi . A hawh laih ngawlin a umlawhte sam in a naa te cingtiik hi .
40025015	Amu tihtheih tawk teen in amu lakah pia hi ; pakhat pai lakah tangka thawngnga pia hi , a dang pakhat lakah thawngnih pia in , a dang pakhat pai lakah thawngkhat pia hi . Mahnungten amah cu khualzin ta hi .
40025016	Tangka thawngnga ngahtu umlawhpa cu thakhat sum bawl in a miat thawngnga ngah hi .
40025017	Mahbangbokin thawngnih a ngahtu pa vang cun a miat thawngnih ngah bok hi .
40025018	Mahnaven tangka thawngkhat a ngahtu pa cu hawh in khuk a cawh celh ten a bawipai tangka cu phum hi .
40025019	“ Hun ngeipi ten a bawipa haw cu pin in a tangka man daan haw ciangtiik tukin son khawm haw hi .
40025020	Tangka thawngnga ngahtu pa cu hung in a miat thawngnga pia hi . ‘ Bawipa tangka thawngnga na piak mi cu , a miat thawngnga ngah ing a tun ka ngahmi vang pia ing hi , ’ tin ti hi .
40025021	A Bawipa cun , ‘ Umlawh pha , muantaakzet umlawh pa ci ! A dawmno i humah muan taak na hih hangin tampi cingtu in bawl tung hi . Hung inna ka lungdamnak puai sungah tel bok in hi , ’ tin ti hi .
40025022	Mahten thawngnih a piak mi pa cu tum in , ‘ Bawipa kei na piakmi khi thawngnih ven hilaihah a miat ka ngahmi a dang thawngnih vang um hi , ’ tin ti hi .
40025023	A Bawipan , ‘ Pha ci , umlawh pha le muantaak umlawh ci . A dawmno humah muantaak na hih hangin tampi cingtu tukin koih tung hi . Hung inna ka lungdamnak sungah tel bok in hi , ’ tin ti hi .
40025024	Mahten thawngkhat a ngahtu pa cu tum in , ‘ Bawipa , nangcu mi ngeikhei pa hi ci tih thei ing hi ; na ciin ngawl mi aat in , na thehngawlnak a ante cawm ci .
40025025	Mahtihbang ahih hangin a lau in na tangka cu lei sungah phum ing hi . Zohem in ! Hilai hah um leng hi , ’ tin ti hi .
40025026	Mahten a bawipan , ‘ Nang umlawh pha ngawl thazawng pa ! Anci ka cinngawlnak a taa aat in , ka thehngawlnak a taa ka cop lam thei ngangai cim ?
40025027	Mahtihbang ahi ngangai tacun ita ka tangka cu ka hun leh ten a khang tuah ka ngah theihnak tukin tangka khawlnak bank ah ita koih ma cim ?
40025028	Hitihbang ahih hangin hi pai lak aa tangka cu la unna thawng sawm a neitu pai lakah pia un hi .
40025029	Itahimtitale tampi a neitute cu piak bet hi tuk aa a val in nei haw tuk hi . Mahnaven imah a neingawltu pai lak pen a neihcalam cawm in laksak hi tuk hi .
40025030	Hi nemcuamnak nei ngawl umlawh pa cu pualam khuathimnak ah vawk unna mahlai ahcun kap in hacang ngawi ta hen , ” tin ti hi .
40025031	Jesuh in , “ Mihing Capa cu Kumpi pa bangin vanmi hempoh tuah a hun ten Kumpi khunnak tohkham humah khung tuk hi .
40025032	Miphun hempoh cu a maiah khawm khawng hi haw tuk hi . Mahten tuukhal pan tuu le keel a khen bangin mi hempoh cu khen tuk hi .
40025033	Miphate cu a taklam ah koih tuk aa mipha ngawlte cu a veilam ah koih tuk hi .
40025034	Mahten Kumpi pan a taklam a mipha tei lakah , ’ Hung un ka pai thupha piak mite ! Hung unna leihum seemsuah penpan nangmu caa lepsami Vancung Uknak khi co ta un .
40025035	Itahimtitale ka ngilkial ten an pia uh ci ; ka dangdum ten in tuk tui pia uh ci , mikhual ka hih laihtak in na inn uh ah zintungtiik uh ci ;
40025036	Puan ka neih ngawl ten ka silh tuk puan pia uh ci ; ka nat laihin tuamlawm uh ci ; thawng ka taak laihin veh uh ci , ’ tin ti tuk hi .
40025037	Mahten miphate cun , ‘ Bawipa i tuklaih in kaw na ngilkial laih mu in an ka piak uh ; na dangdum laih mu in tui ka piak uh ?
40025038	Ituklaihinhim mikhual na hih lai mu in keimu inn ah zin ka tuntiik uh ; puan nei ngawl in puan ka piak uh ?
40025039	Itukinhim na nat mu in le thawng na taak laih ka veh uh ? ’ tin ti haw tuk hi .
40025040	Kumpi bawipan , ‘ Thungangai in hilh ing hi ; hi ka unaupih a nautabel hum ah na bawl uh mi khi keima hum ah a bawl hi uh ci , ’ tin ti tuk hi .
40025041	“ Mahten a veilam ah a um mitei lakah cun , ‘ Noh Pathian ii tamsiat mite ka lak pen taita un . Satan le a zuitu tei caa in bawlsami a mit awng ngawl meipi sungah hawh ta un .
40025042	Itahimtitale ka ngilkial ten an pia ma uh ci ; ka dangdum ten tui pia ma uh ci ;
40025043	Mikhual ka hih laih in na inn uh ah zintung tiik ma uh ci ; Puan nei ngawl ka hih laih in puan pia ma uh ci ; Naa in thawng ka taak laih in tuamlawm nuam ma uh ci , ’ tin ti tuk hi .
40025044	Mahten amuh ten , ‘ Topa itukinhim na ngil a kial , na dang a dum , mikhual na hih , puan nei ngawlin na um , naa in thawng na taak mu in ka bop nuam uh ngawl ? ’ tin ti haw tuk hi .
40025045	Kumpi pan , ‘ Thungangai in hilh ing hi : mi nautabel na bop nuam uh ngawl khi , keimah bawm nuam ngawl hi uh ci , ’ tin ti tuk hi .
40025046	Mahnungten mah mite cu kumkhua bawlsiatnak mun ah hawh haw tuk hi , midik , mipha te cu kumkhua nunnak ah hawh haw tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
40026001	Hi thute Jesuh in a zilh ceng ten a nungzui tei lakah ,
40026002	“ Na theih uh bangin tunung ninih ten Kaltan Puai hi tuk aa Mihing Capa cu thinglamteh hum ah khet cih tukin piak hi tuk hi , ” tin hi hi .
40026003	Mahten thiampi upate le upa dangte cu Thiampi Saang Kaiafas inn ah cun , tawkdun khawm in
40026004	Jesuh khi a thupno man in that tukin thu vaisiam haw hi .
40026005	“ Puai sungah ong cun that tuk ma hung , mipi buai kha haw tuk , ” tin ti haw hi .
40026006	Jesuh cu Bethani khua aa phaaknat a thuaktu Simon inn ah um in ,
40026007	an a eih laihtakin numei nu pakhat cu a lakah hungin alabaster thawl khat manhakzet zimui tui a kenmi cu Jesuh ii lu ah leih hi .
40026008	Mahmi cu nungzuitu ten a muh haw ten a thin haw uk in , “ Pamheizet si maw !
40026009	Hi zimui cu tangka tampi tuah zuak in a man khi mi ca-ngahte piak saw tuk hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
40026010	Mahtin a tihmi haw Jesuh in a theih ten amu lakah , “ A itahim hi numei nu na dondak lih uh cu ? Keima caa a bawlmi hi thil pha le thilmawizet hi .
40026011	Mi ca-ngahte cu nangmu lakah um leleng haw tuk hi , mahnaven kei cu noh tei lakah um leleng tuk mang hi .
40026012	Ka hum aa zimui tui a leihmi hi ka luang phumnak tukin a tuangtim ham hi .
40026013	Thungangai hilh ing hi ; Thuthangpha a hilhnak haw leihum khua le vannuai ah hi nu ii bawlmi hi amah phawhngilh tuk ngawlnak in son leleng hi tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
40026014	Mahten nungzuitu lak pen pakhat a himi Juda Iskariot a tihmi haw cu thiampi upa tei lakah hawh in ,
40026015	“ Nangmu lakah Jesuh ka pia a hin i him na piak tuk uh ? ” tin dong hi . Amuh ten tangka sawmthum sial in Juda cu pia haw hi .
40026016	Mahni penpan Jesuh ap theihnak tuk cun Juda in hun pha bek caang hi .
40026017	Naman tel ngawl Cangho Puai ni masabel ni in nungzuitute cu Jesuh lakah hung in , “ Ilai mun ah tuk him Kaltan Puai an eih khawmnak ka bawlsak tuk uh ? ” tin dong haw hi .
40026018	A man , “ Khuapi sung aa mi pakhat pai inn ah hawh ta unna , ‘ Saya pan ; ka hun kim zotoh hi ; ka nungzuite tuah na inn ah Kaltan Puai mang tuk ung hi , ’ tin ti un , ” tin ti hi .
40026019	Jesuh ii hilhnak bangin a nungzui ten Kaltan Puai taakeih cu tuangtim haw hi .
40026020	Taaklam ten Jesuh le a nungzuitute cu an ei tukin khungkhawm haw hi .
40026021	Taakeih a eih lih haw laihtak in Jesuh cun , “ Thungangai in hilh ing hi ; nangmu lakpen pakhat in keimah zuak tuk uh ci , ” tin ti hi .
40026022	Nungzuitu te cu a tha haw sia ngangai in pakhat nung pakhat in , “ Topa , keimah ing maw ! ” tin dong tek haw hi .
40026023	Jesuh in , “ Keimah tuah kuang pakhat sungah cangho a sawktu in keimah zuak tuk hi .
40026024	Lai Thiangtho in a hilh hamsa bangin Mihing Capa cu thi tuk hi , mahnaven Mihing Capa a zuaktu pai caa cun itihzah in lauhuai him ? Mahmi pa cu a nuipum sungpen tul ngawl lawlaw in a um a hin pha saw ta na ven ! ” tin ti hi .
40026025	Mi zuaktu Juda cun , “ Saya pa , na tih san mi cu keimah maw tin dong hi . Mahten Jesuh in , ” Na tihnak bang hi zuh hi , ” tin ti hi .
40026026	An a eih haw laihtakin Jesuh in cangho cu la in lungdam thu a hilh celh ten bothem in a nungzuitu tei lakah pia hi . “ La unna ei un ; hi hi ka taksa hi , ” tin ti hi .
40026027	Mahnungten khuat cu la in Pathian lakah lungdam thu a hilh ceng ten amu lakah pia hi . “ Na venghawng uh in in un ;
40026028	Hihi ka thisan hi , Pathian ii thutepnak a khotiiktu le mitampi tei sual ngaihthiamnak tuk in a luang tulmi ka thisan hi .
40026029	Thungangai in hilh ing hi ; ka Pai Uknak sungah nangmuh tuah cabit thak ka in leh laklawh hi cabit cu in leh tukma toh ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
40026030	Mahten lasa in Olif mual ah hawh haw hi .
40026031	Mahten Jesuh in amuh tei lakah , “ Tuzan rori ah na venghawng uh in keimah taaisan khawng tuk uh ci ; itahimtitale Lai Thiangtho in , ‘ tuukhal pa cu that tung aa tuu honte cu taikeh haw tuk hi , ’ tin ti hi .
40026032	Mahnaven thihnak pen thawhlehtiik ka hih hun ten nangmu masuan Galilee ah hawhtung hi , ” tin ti hi .
40026033	Piter in Jesuh lakah , “ Midang ten a taaisan khawng haw vang in kei cun taaisan tuk mang hi , ” tin ti hi .
40026034	Jesuh in Piter lakah , “ Thungangai in hilh ing hi ; tuzan ak a khuang laihngawl in , ‘ Amah cu thei awngmang hi , ’ tin veithum tian el tuk ci , ” tin ti hi .
40026035	Piter in , “ Nangmah tuah thi kawm tuk ka hi vangin mahticun el tuk mang hi , ” tin ti hi . Nungzuitu dang tevang cun mahtihcun ti tek haw hi .
40026036	Mahten Jesuh cu a nungzuite tuah Gethsemane a tihmi haw huan ah hawh haw in amu lakah , “ Hilaiah khin thu ka nget sungin hi laiah hin khung un , ” tin ti hi .
40026037	Piter le Zebedi capa panihte khi hawhpih in , a thasia in a lungkhamzet hi .
40026038	Mahten amu lakah , “ Ka lungmu hi thasiatnak tuah dim leita in a tam keh tuk bangin um hi . Hilai ah um unna hihbu ngawlin ngak un hi , ” tin ti hi .
40026039	A khawla deuh ah hawh in leihum ah bok in , “ Ka pa a cang thei tuk bang a hitale hi thuaknak khuathai pen luattiik in hi ! Mahnaven kei deihnak bang hi ngawl in , nangma eihnak bangin hi saw hen , ” tin thungen hi .
40026040	Mahten nungzuitu pathum tei lakah a kih leh ten a pathum haw in ahihbuh haw khi a muhten Piter lakah , “ I tinkaw hihbu ngawlin nazi pakhat no lawlawm ngak thei ma uh cim ?
40026041	Sualsohnak sungah caak kha tuk ngawlin hihbu ngawlin thungen un hi . Lungmu cun nuam em naven taksa cun a thaneem hi ? ” tin ti hi .
40026042	Jesuh cu hawh in thungen lehleu hi . “ Ka pa hi thuaknak khuat pen luat theih ngawl in ka in a kul a hitale nangma deihnak bangin hi tahen , ” tin ti hi .
40026043	Nungzuitu pathum tei lakah a kik leh ten hihbu leleng haw hi ; a mit haw hakzo haw ma hi .
40026044	Jesuh in zam in a hawhsan nungten a nget bang leng in a veithumnak thungen hi .
40026045	Mahten nungzuitu pathum tei lakah cun kik leh in “ Hihbu in cawlleng laih uh cim ? Zo un ! Mihing Capa cu misual tei khut sungah a hen tiiknak haw tuk hun hengzo hi .
40026046	Tho unna hawh tuk hung . Zo un , keimah zuaktu pa cu hi laihah hengzo hi , ” tin ti hi .
40026047	Jesuh cu a otlih laihtak in nungzuitu sawm le panih sungah a telbokmi Juda cu heng hi . A mah tuah in thiampi upate le Judah upa a dang tei tiikmi mihonpite cu ngaalnaam le tembeek tuah in heng haw hi .
40026048	Mi zuaktu pa cun mipi tei lakah theihtupnak tuk hilhhamsa in , “ Ka nap mipa cu na mat nuammi pa uh hi tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
40026049	Juda in Jesuh cu zuan nawnawm in , “ Saya pa , na humah daihnak um tahen , ” tin ti thah in nam hi .
40026050	Jesuh in , “ Ngualcampa na tuptahmi cu bawl nawm saw in hi , ” tin ti hi . Mahten heng haw in Jesuh cu a mat ceng haw ten khimzet in khih haw hi .
40026051	Jesuh tuah a ummi lakah pakhat pan a naam dawk in Thiampi Saang ii umlawh pai beng cu satvawk hi .
40026052	Mahten Jesuh in , “ Na naam cu a kawng sungah thiat leh in hi . Naam a mangtu cu naam leng in thi leh bok tuk hi .
40026053	Ka Pai lakah bopnak ka ngen tacun thakhat in vancung mi ngaalkap hon sawm le hon nihtiik thei hi tih khi thei ma uh cim ?
40026054	Mahnaven mahbang ahitacun Lai Thiangtho in hi tuk hi tin a hilhsa mi cu itinhim a kim theih tuk ? ” tin ti hi .
40026055	Mahten Jesuh in mi honpi tei lakah cun , “ Kei hi nguca hi ing maw , ngaalnaam le tembeek tuah , man tukin na hun lih uh ? A nisial Biakinn ah khung in thu ka zilhlih laih khin kuaman man ma si uh si .
40026056	Mahnaven kamsang tei Lai Thiangtho sungah a ngatmi haw a kim theihnak tukin hitihbangin piang hi , ” tin ti hi . Mahten nungzuitu ten zamsan in taaisan khawng haw ta hi
40026057	Amantu ten Jesuh cu Thiampi Saang Kaiafas inn ah hawhpih haw in mah laiah cun Daanthiamte le Judah upate cu tawk dun khawm haw hi .
40026058	Piter cun a khualathim pen zui in Thiampi Saang inn tual tian zui hi . Inntual ahcun tum in itihbang in thute piang tuk him tih thei nuam in ngaalviltu tei lakah khung hi .
40026059	Thiampi upate le Khonsil upa pawl ten Jesuh cu a thah theihnak haw tukin a venghawng haw in sualzei haw hi .
40026060	Zolthu phuahcop in a sualnak zeitu tampi tul haw naven a sualnak mu thei cuang haw ma hi . A tawpnak ten mi panih tul in ,
40026061	“ Hipa in , ‘ Pathian Biakinn hi phelet tung aa nithum sung in saleh thei tung , ’ ti , ” tin ti haw hi .
40026062	Mahten Thiampi Saang cu dingto in Jesuh cu , “ Hitihbangin sual a not haw hi a donnak thei ma cim ? ” tin dong hi .
40026063	Mahnaven Jesuh cu mengleng in um hi . Mahten Thiampi Saang cun awn lehleu in “ Anungmi Pathian minsal in thukam in hilh in hi . Pathian Capa Messiah hi maw hi ma cim hilh hem in , ” tin ti hi .
40026064	Jesuh in , “ Na hilhnak bang zuh hi ! Mahnaven thungangai in hilh ing hi : tu penpan Mihing Capa cu Cungnungbel taklam ah khung in mu tuk uh ci , vancung meingo hum pen a hunleh tuk vang mu tuk uh ci , ” tin ti hi .

40026066	Itin ngaisung kam uh ci ? ” tin dong hi . Amuh ten , “ Sual hi thah tuk hi , ” tin ti haw hi .

40026069	Piter cu pualam inn tual ah cun a khun ten thiampi inn aa umlawh numei pakhat hung in , “ Nangmah vang Galilee mi Jesuh tuah a phialdun mi pa ci , ” tin ti hi .

40026071	Mahten Piter cu kongka lam ahcun hawh hi . Umlawh numei a dang cun mu in “ Hipa hi Nazereth mi Jesuh tuah in a ummi pa hi , ” tin mahlaiah a ummi pano tei lakah in hilh hi .

40027001	Zingtungno in thiampi upa pawl hempoh le Judah upa pawl ten Jesuh cu thah tukin son haw hi .

40027003	Mizuaktu Juda in Jesuh cu a thu soncat zo haw toh tih thu a theihten sikleh mahtakin tangka sawmthum khi thiampi upa le Judah upa tei lakah san leh hi .
40027004	“ Sualnak nei ngawlpa cu thihnak tian heng tuk in ka zuak hangin sual leita ing hi , ” tin ti hi . Amuh ten , “ Kohte tuah imah seng kha leh ma toh ung ? Na deihnak babang in bawl ta va le , ” tin ti haw hi .
40027005	Juda cun tangka sawm thum cu Biakinn sungah vawktum in tuul hi . Mahten hawhtuul vawk in amah le mah ngui-awk in thi hi .

40027007	A thucu sonkhawmhaw in zapi lungkimnak in mah tangka cu beel bawlpai lo leinak in mang haw hi , mahmi lo ngam cu ngamdang mite phumnak in mang haw hi .
40027008	Mahhangin mah lo cu tuni tian in “ Thisan Lo , ” tin sam haw laih hi .

40027010	Topai thupiaknak bangin beel bawl pai lo leinak in mang haw hi , ” tin ti hi .

40027016	Mahlaihtakin akua abang ii theihmi thawngta pakhat um in a min cu Jesuh Barabbas hi .

40027030	Cilsiak in , ngolhte la in a lu pen vat haw hi .

41001001	Pathian Capa Jesuh Khrih ii Thuthangpha cu hitihbang in hi .
41001002	Pathian Kamsangpa Isaiah ii ngatmi laibu sungah tihbanghin ngan hi ; “ Pathian in na mataan ah na hawhnak lam sial tukin , ka thuthantu pa hawh hamtiik ing hi .
41001003	Hampalak a au pai awn cu , ‘ Pathian hunnak tuk lampi nabawl ham un . A hawhnak tuk lampi na camtiik un , ’ ti hi , ” tin ngan hi .
41001004	Hampalak pen baptizam piatu Johan tuul in , aman sualzahnak tuk in , “ Na sualnak uh sik unna baptizam la un . Mahten Pathian in nangmu sualnakte ngaithiam tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
41001005	Judah ngam hempoh le Jerusalem khua sung mihing hempohtecu Johan lakah hawh in , a sualnakte haw siik leh in Jordan ngun ah baptizam la haw hi .
41001006	Johan cu kalauk mul tahmi puan silh in , saphaw taaikap tuah a eel heet in , khau le hampalak aa khuaihum ei in um hi .

41001012	Mah ceng bek ten Hawvang in Jesuh cu ngamkhing ah hawhtiik hi .
41001013	Hampalak ngamkhing ah ni sawmli um in , Satan ii sualsohnak thuak hi .

41001015	“ A hun kim zotoh hi . Pathian Uknak nai zo hi . Na sualnak uh siik leh in , lungdamnak Pathian Thuthangpha um un , ” tin hilh hi .
41001016	Jesuh cu Galilee tuipi mawk lamah a hawh laihtakin , Simon le anau Andrew , suuk vawktu tei unau nihte cu tui sungah suukvawk li in mu hi .
41001017	Mahhangin Jesuh in , “ Ka nung zui un . Mi mantu in bawl tunghi , ” ti hi .

41001020	Jesuh in panih te sam paih in , panih ten apa Zebede le a sal haw te hawmkuang sungah zamin Jesuh cu zui haw hi .
41001021	Jesuh le a nungzuite cu Kapernaum khua lamah hawh haw hi . Sabbath ni in Jesuh cu pumkhawmnak inn sungah tumin thu hilh hi .

41001023	Thakhat in pumkhawm innsung aa a um , a sungaa khuasia nei pan ;
41001024	“ Nazareth khua mi Jesuh aw , koh tei lakah ai bawl tuk nei cim ? Keimuh siatsuah tukin hung cimmaw ? Nangmah cu a kuacim tih thei leng unghi ; A Thiangtho Pathian mi hi ci , ” tin ngingpin au hi .
41001025	Mahnaven Jesuh in , “ Mengdeen in , a sungpen tuul in , ” tin liat hi .

41001028	Jesuh ii min thannak cu mahlai mun penpan in Galilee ngamsung hempoh ah thangkeh paih hi .
41001029	Pumkhawminn sungpen a tuul haw ten Jeim le Johan tuah in Simon le Andrew tei inn ah hawh haw hi .

41001040	Ni khat ni in miphaak pakhat Jesuh lakah hunghi . Jesuh maiah khuukdin in bokin , “ Kei na bawl nuam a hin thiangtiik thei ci , ” tin kuun hi .

41001044	Na thiampi pai lakah hawh in lak ten , miten damciang na hih lam a theihnak haw tukin , Moses ii thupiaknak bangin , biakpiaknak na bawl ten , ” tintiik hi .
41001045	Mahnaven a hawhnak mi hempoh lakah hilh in a thu hempoh thangtiik hi . Mahhangin Jesuh cu mitei muh in khua sungah tum ngam ngawlin , dai pawleu mivengnak munah um hi . Mahtavangin khua tinkim pen mite cu ama lakah hawh haw hi .
41002001	Ni demlaih lawi ten Jesuh cu Kapernaum khua sungah heng leh in , mi hempoh ten Jesuh inn sungah um hi tih khi thei haw hi .
41002002	A theih bek haw ten , umnak hei tong ngawlin kongka cawm dim-uk in khawm paih haw hi . Amuh tei lakah Jesuh in thu hilh hi ;
41002003	Thu a hilh laihtakin khut le ke thi a phia thei ngawl mihing pakhat cu mihing pali in zawngin Jesuh lakah hawhpih haw hi .
41002004	Mihing dim-uk taak cu Jesuh lakah henpih thei haw ma hi . Mahhangin Jesuh ii umnak tawkkek innkuul hong let in , a tina pa cu a zaunak tuah khesuk cih haw hi .
41002005	Jesuh in a upnak haw a theih ten , khut le ke thi pai lakah , “ Capa aw na sualnakte maai zotoh hi , ” tin ti hi .
41002006	Mahnaven amu lak aa a khung Daanthiam khen khat ten ,
41002007	“ Hi pa ita tibanghin awn thei him ? Pathian humah awn sual hi . Pathian pakhat bek sialngawl a kua him sualnak a maaitiik thei ? ” tin a lungmu sung haw in ngaisung haw hi .
41002008	Jesuh in a lungmu sung haw aa a ngaihsut haw thei paih in , “ Nohte ita tibanghin , hi thu ngaisung uhcim ?
41002009	Khut le ke thi pai lakah itibang bel in ka ti an baih saw tuk him ? Na sualnak maai zo toh hi tih maw , tho in na zaunak la in hawh ten , tih ibang baih saw tuk him ?
41002010	Mahnaven Mihing Capa in leihum pen sualzah theihnak thu nei hi , tih na theihnak tukun , ” tin Jesuh in khut le ke thi pai lakah ,
41002011	“ Tho in na zaunak pua inna inn ah pin ten ti ing , ” tin ti hi .
41002012	A tina pa cu thakhat in tho to paih in , a zaunak pua in mi hempoh muh in pin hi . A mu hempoh ten lamdangsa in , “ Hitihbang thu itukmah in mu awngma hung hi ” tin Pathian thangphat haw hi .
41002013	Jesuh cu tuipi mawk lamah hawh leh in , mihonpi ten a nung zui haw hi . Jesuh in mi honpite cu thu zilh hi .
41002014	A hawh laihtakin , Alfia ii capa Levi cu siahdonnak zung sungah khungin mu hi . Jesuh in , “ Ka nung zui in , ” a tihbek ten Levi cu ding to in Jesuh nung zui hi .
41002015	Mahten Jesuh cu Levi inn ah an ei hi . Siahkhontu le misual tin a tihmi haw , mi tampi ten Jesuh cu zui haw in a hekkhatte cu Jesuh le a nungzui te tuah an ei langkhat haw hi .
41002016	Farasi le Daanthiam khenkhat pawl ten , Jesuh ii misualte le siahkhonte tuah an ei langkhat a muh haw ten Jesuh ii nungzui tei lakah , “ Amah cu ita misual le siahkhonte tuah an ei langkhat in tui in langkhat him ? ” ti haw hi .
41002017	Jesuh in hi thu a zaak ten amuh tei lakah , “ Tidam ten sibawi kin haw ma hi , tinate bek in kin haw hi . Mi thiangthote pui tukin hung mang hi , misualte pui tukin hung ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
41002018	Veikhat Johan ii nungzuite le Farasi te ancang in a um haw laihtakin , Jesuh lakah hawh haw in , “ Johan nungzuite le Farasi ten ancang haw si , i ta na nungzui ten ancang haw ma him ? ” tin dong haw hi .
41002019	Jesuh in , “ Zihuaitu tangval pa khi a ngualcamte tuah langkhat in a um haw laihtakin a ngualcam ten ancang thei haw aa ni maw ? ” tin dong hi . Zihuai pa tuah a um langkhat sungzong cu ancang thei haw tuk ma hi .
41002020	Mahnaven zihuaitu pa khi a ngualcamte tuah a khen ni heng tuk laih hi . Mah hun ten amuh ten ancang leh haw tuk laih hi .
41002021	Kuamah in puansia khi puanthak in dah awng haw ma hi . A dah a hin , a dahnak puan thak in a puansia cu ngengsaw deuh in baltiik tuk hi .
41002022	Savun thawl lun sungah kuamah in cabit tui thak thun awng haw ma hi . A thunmi haw cabit tui in savun cu pokkehtiik tuk hi . Cabit tui thak cu savun thawl thak sungah thun daan hi , ” tin hilh hi .
41002023	Veikhat Sabbath ni in Jesuh le a nungzuite sangvut lo lai ah a hawh laihtak haw in a nungzui ten sangvut ngui zuut in ei haw hi .
41002024	Mahhangin Farasi ten Jesuh lakah , “ Zo in ! Sabbath ni in bawl daan ngawl ita bawl haw him ? ” tin dong haw hi .
41002025	Mahten Jesuh in , “ David le a ngualcam tei ngilkial laihtak aa a bawlmi haw khi sial awngma uh cim maw ?
41002026	Thiampi Abiathar khan laih in David le a ngualcam tei ngilkial eem in a um haw ten David cu Pathian biaknak inn sung tum in thiampi sialngawl kuamah ii eih daan ngawl a thiangtho cangho ei in a ngualcamte a piak thu sial awngma uh cim maw ?
41002027	Sabbath ni cu mihing ii ta tuk a bawl mi hi , Sabbath ni ii ta tuk in mihing bawl hi ma hi .
41002028	Mahtibang hangin Mihing Capa cu Sabbath Ukto pa hi , ” tin don hi .
41003001	Jesuh ii pumkhawm inn sungah a tum leh ten , mahlai munah cun khut langkhat thi pa um hi .
41003002	Mi ten Jesuh sualnak man nuam in , Sabbath ni in tinate damtiik na maw tih ! tin zo nim leng haw hi .
41003003	Jesuh in khut thi pa cu , “ A laizangah in dingin , ” tin ti hi .
41003004	A tih celh ten , “ Sabbath ni in phatnak bawl pha tuk maw siatnak bawl pha tuk him ? A nunnak pat tuk maw , that a zam tuk ibang phasaw him ? ” tin a dot ten kuamah in don thei ngawlin mengdeen haw hi .
41003005	Jesuh cu a thin uuk in a eelkiim mihing hempoh zo hi . Mite thinlian ngeh ahih haw taak cu Jesuh a lungsia in , a khut thi pa cu , “ Na baan zaak in ! ” ti hi . A baan a zaak bek ten a khut cu dam hilhial paih hi .
41003006	Pumkhawm inn pawlam a tuul cengbek haw ten thakhat in Farasi te le Herod ii mi pawl ten Jesuh that nuam in a humah sualnak zei in thusiam li haw hi .
41003007	Jesuh cu a nungzuite tuah tuipi lamah kiik leh haw in Galilee ngamsung aa mi honpi ten zui haw hi .
41003008	Judah ngam Jerusalem khua , Idumea khua , Jordan ngunngaal lam pawlte le , Tai-ar le Sidon ngamsung aa miten , Jesuh ii thu hempoh a zaak haw ten a lakah hawh haw hi .
41003009	Mi honpi ten amah a nawkvawk khaak theih haw tuk ngawlnak in , a nungzui te hawmkuang koih hamtiik hi .
41003010	Itahimtitale , Jesuh in mihing tampi a damtiik taakcu natnak a vei hempoh ten amah zen nuamin neek tutuh haw hi .
41003011	Khuasia vei mi pawl ten Jesuh a muh hawten , “ Pathian Capa ci , ” tin a kebul ah bok in auli haw hi .
41003012	Mahnaven Jesuh in kuamah ii amah a theih haw ngawlnak tukin nasiazet in kham hi .
41003013	Jesuh cu mual humah kaai to in a tensa mite sam hi . A sam mite cu a lakah hawh haw hi .
41003014	Mahten a umpih tuk le thu hilh aa khual a zintiik tukin ,
41003015	Khuasia hawlvawk zawhnak tuk huham nei tukin mi sawm le panih teng hi .
41003016	A nungzui sawm le panih tei min cu Simon ( Piter tin minthak a phuah mi pa ; )
41003017	Zebede ii capa Jeim le a nau Johan ; Jeim le a nau Johan tei unau nihte cu Jesuh in a min haw ‘ Boanerges ’ sa hi . ( Boanerges tih cu vanthuum capa tihnak hi . )
41003018	Andrew , Filip , Bartholomeo , Matthai Thomas , Alfias capa James , Thaddias , Kanaan mi Simon le ,
41003019	Amah zuaktu Juda Iskariot te hi haw hi .
41003020	Mahten Jesuh cu a inn ah pin hi . Mi tam leita a khop haw tak cu a nung zuitute le Jesuh cu an eih nak hun hei nei haw ma hi .
41003021	Mahmi thu a inn kuapih ten a theih haw ten , “ Jesuh a lung am zo hi , ” tin miten a tih si bok haw taak a mah cing khawi tuk in hawh haw hi .
41003022	Jerusalem khua pen a hung Daanthiam pawlten , “ Hi pan Belzabul nei hi , a man dawimangpa suangin khuasia hawlvawk hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
41003023	Jesuh in amuhte sam in thu tehkipnak tuah thu na hilh hi . “ Itibangin Satan in Satan lala hawlvawk thei tuk hiim ?
41003024	A khen , a lem dun ngawl mi ngam cu kho tuk ma hi .
41003025	A lem ngawl innkua khi lal tuk hi .
41003026	Satan in amah le amah do in a khen a hin ding zo ngawlin a Uknak ngam cu lal thongin ngei phat tuk ma hi .
41003027	“ A thangil ngaalpha pa khi man in a keen masa haw ngawl an , itibangin a inn sungah tum in a vante laaksak thei haw tuk him ?
41003028	Nangmu lakah thungangai in hilh ing hi . Mihingte izahta sual in le awnsia tian in a awn li haw hei in ngaihthiam hi haw tuk hi .
41003029	Mahnaven Hawvang a sonsiatute cu sualzahnak ngah thei him haw tuk ma hi .
41003030	( Itahimtitale , “ A sungah khuasia um hi , ” a tih haw hangin hi . )
41003031	Mahlaihtakin a naute le a nu cu hungin , inn pawleu lam ah dingin , mi pakhat Jesuh samtiik haw hi .
41003032	Jesuh kimkot aa a khung mi honpi ten , “ Na nu le na nau ten nangmah zei in , pawleu lamah um haw hi , ” tin a hilh haw ten ,
41003033	Jesuh in , “ Ka nu le ka naute cu a kuate him ? ” tin dong hi .
41003034	A kimkot aa a khungte zo kawkawi in , “ Hite hi ka nu le ka naute hi ;
41003035	Itahimtitale , vancung khua aa Pathian deihnak bangin a nungtute cu ka unau , ka celnu , ka nute hi haw tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
41004001	Jesuh cu Galilee Tuipi mawkah thu zilh leh hi . A lakah a hungmi mihingte a tam leita hangin hawmkuang sungah tum in khung hi . Hawmkuang cu tuihum khuala thim ah um in mi honpite cu tuimawk tui umnak tian ding haw hi .
41004002	Jesuh in thu saantehnak tuah thu tampi zilh hi .
41004003	Jesuh in , “ Ngai un ! Veikhat laih in anci theh pa cu anci theh tukin lo ah hawh hi .
41004004	Anci a theh ten anci hekkhatte cu lam laiah cu in , vano ten khul khawng haw hi .
41004005	Anci hekkhatte cu suang lakah cu hi . Thakhatin poto naven ,
41004006	a zung matnak tuk lei a um ngawl taak cu ni suak in , ni a sat ten vuai ngawp in thi leh khawng haw ta hi .
41004007	Anci hekkhatte cu ling lakah cu in lingkung ten deep in a cang nei thei haw ma hi .
41004008	Anci hekkhatte cu lei ngampha munah cu in , phazet no khangto in a let sawmthum , a let sawmluk ; a let zakhat tian in ngah hi .
41004009	Zaaknak tuk beng a nei ten na za ta un , ” tin zilh hi .
41004010	Topa Jesuh amah nguakcang a um laihtakin a nungzui sawm le panih ten a thu saantehnak ii a khiaknak dong haw hi .
41004011	Jesuh in , “ Na theih awngngawl uh thumaan Pathian Uknak ngam thuthup na theihnak tuk uh cu thu piak zotoh hi . Mahnaven pawlam aa a um mitei lakah cun thu tehkipnak tuah bekin zilh na hi hi .
41004012	Mahhangin , “ Zo li haw tuk naven mu haw tuk ma hi . Ngai li haw tuk naven thei thei haw tuk ma hi . Itahimtitale , mu thei in a theithei haw ta cun Pathian lakah kikleh in ngaihthiam mi hi haw tuk naven , ” tin ti hi .
41004013	Hi thu tehkipnak hi thei ciang ma uh cim maw ? Hi na thei uh ta ngawl cun itibangin thu tehkipnak dangte thei thei tuk uh cim ? ” tin Jesuh in ti hi .
41004014	Anci theh pai a thehmi anci cu Pathian thu hi .
41004015	Lampi aa a cumi ancite cu Pathian thu a zaak bek haw ten Satan hungpaih in amu sung aa Pathian thu cu lonsak ta hi .
41004016	Mahbangbokin suang lak aa a cu mi ancite vang Pathian thu a zaakbek haw ten lungdam eem in sangpaih bok haw hi .
41004017	Mehnaven a mu sungah thukpi bun tum ngawl ahihtaak ngei kho ma hi . Mahhangin Pathian thu hang aa haksatnak le thuaknak a hen ten tha khat in let leh haw hi .
41004018	Mi hekkhat cu lingcam lak a cu mi an ci bang hi . Pathian thu cu thei haw ,
41004019	na ven hi leihum thinkhamnak , hauhsak nuamnak , a dang deihnak le makhelhnak ten deep in a khuh hangin a ngah ngah thei haw ma hi .
41004020	Lei ngampha mun aa a cumi ancite cu Pathian thu komno ngai in lungdamzet no saangin a let sawmthum , a let sawmluk , a let zakhat in ngah haw hi .
41004021	Jesuh in , “ Mei inn khi meivaaknak humah vaak ngawlin kho siinkhup in zaunak nuai aa koih tukin keng awng uh cim maw ?
41004022	A lang ngawl aa ipzawh imah um tuk ma hi .
41004023	A langtuk ngawl aa seel zawh imah um tuk ma hi . Zaaknak tuk beng a nei hempoh in za haw ta hen , ” tin ti hi .
41004024	Jesuh in , “ Na zaak uh mi thute komno in keem ta un . Midangte tehnak in na man mi khi Pathian in nangmah tehnak in mang leh bok tuk hi .
41004025	Itahimtitale a neite pebeet in a nei ngawl tei neel pen a neihcalam cawm in laksak tuk hi , ” tih hilh hi .
41004026	Jesuh in , “ Mahtibang thu hangin Vancung Uknak thu cu hibangin hi . Mi pakhat ii lolai aa anci theh tuah bangve hi .
41004027	Amah cu sun le zan in hihbu hi . A khatlawh ten a ancite cu po in khangto hi . Aman itibangin po in khang to hum tih thei ma hi .
41004028	Lei in ama thu in ancite po in nguitiik hi . A masabel in a kuung , mahcengten a ngui , mahceng bekten a nguisung ah a cang piangtiik hi .
41004029	Caang san ceng bekten a phio tuah in at hi . Itahimtitale caang ah hun zo toh hi , ” tin hilh hi .
41004030	Jesuh in , “ Vancung Uknak khi i tuah tehkim tuk hingngim ? I thu saantehnak tuah lak tuk hingngim ?
41004031	Ankam ci tuah bangve hi . Ankam ci cu leisung ciin hempoh anci lak pen a cang neubel anci hi .
41004032	Mahnaven ciin celh ten khangto in ankung hempoh lakpen a kung ngengbel in saizet hi . A kangkaak te ngeng pipi in ham lak aa vano ten a lim beel in , a sungah buseh in um haw hi , ” tin hilh hi .
41004033	Hitihbangin thu tehkipnak dadangte mangin amu lakah a theih theih tawp haw tuk tian in hilh hi .
41004034	Thu tehkipnak tel ngawlin thu hilh awng ma hi . Mahnaven a nungzuite tuah amuh bek a um haw ten i hempoh ciangzetin hilh hi .
41004035	Mah ni taaklam in Jesuh in a nungzui tei lakah , “ Ngaalkhat lamah hawh nung , ” a tih ten ,
41004036	mi honpite cu a nung lamah zam in hawmkuang sungah Jesuh tuah hawh haw hi . A dang hawmkuang tampi amu lakah umbok hi .
41004037	Tuipi hum a um laihtak haw in huihpi nasiazet in theu hi . Tuihualpi cawk in a hawmkuang haw cu sepvawk kawkawi in a sungah tui dim awn diak hi .
41004038	Jesuh cu hawmkuang tawlam khunnak humah hihbu leng hi . A nungzui ten phong haw in , “ Saya pa , ka lalthong uh hei in imah nopmawh kha ngawl bang um si ci , ” tin ti haw hi .
41004039	Jesuh cu tho in huihpi le tuipi cu , “ Daiden un , phia pahsuh un , ” tin a liat ten huihpi theu le tuihualpi cu cawlpaih hi .
41004040	Mahlaihtakin Jesuh in , “ Ita lau uh cim ? Ai ta upnak nei ngawl uh cim ? ” tin ti hi .
41004041	A nungzui ten lau em haw in , “ Hipa hi itibang mihing hi tuk hum ? huihpi le tuipi poh cawm in a thu mang thei cu ! ” tin pakhat le pakhat thukum li haw hi .
41005001	Jesuh le a nungzuite cu tuipi ngaal Gerasa mitei ngam ah heng haw hi .
41005002	Jesuh ii hawmkuang sungpen a tolh bek ten mithi khaan sungpen a tuul mi pan Jesuh cu muak hi . Ama sungah a dingdeihhuai khawsia ceeng hi . Amah cu mithi khaan lakah bial in um hi .
41005003	Kuamah in amah cu thiikkhau vawh thei haw ma hi .
41005004	Itahimtitale thiikkhau tuah keen in kol a bulh li haw tavangin thiikkhaute cu botcat lelem in a kolte kehtiik lelem hi , kuaman amah nehzo haw ma hi .
41005005	Asun azan in mithi khaan sung le mual humah um in a mah le mah suanghiam tuah at cop in ngingpi in haam ngungun in um hi .
41005006	Mahnaven Jesuh cu khawlapi pen hung li a muh ten thakhat taaingut in , a maai ah khukdin in bok in ,
41005007	“ A sangbel Pathian Capa Jesuh aw , kei neel ah na bawl tuk i nei cim ? Kei na bawlsiat ngawlnak tukin Pathian min suangin thupia in hi , ” tin ngingpin au hi .
41005008	Jesuh in , “ Dawi ngilo aw , mi pai sungpen tul ten ! ” tin thu pia hi .
41005009	Jesuh in na min kua cim ? tin a dot ten , “ Mahpa cun ka min cu ‘ honpi ’ hi , itahimtitale tam ngangai ung hi , ” tin don hi .
41005010	Mahlai ngam pen Jesuh ii hawlvawk ngawlnak tukin a lakah kuunli haw hi .
41005011	Mual humah vok honpi ta dawduam li in mu haw hi .
41005012	Khawsia ten , “ Kohte hilai vok tei sungah ka tum theihnak tuk un vok hon lakah hawh tiikin , ” tin ngen haw hi .
41005013	A ngetnak haw bangin Jesuh in thupia hi . Khawsiate cu tuul haw in vok sungah tum haw hi . A vok honpite cu thawngnih hawng hi haw hi . Tuipi hum aa liang sangpi pen peeksuk haw in tuipi sungah thi khawng belh haw hi .
41005014	Vok khaaltute cu khawsung le ngamsung hempoh ah tai kawkawi in a piangmi thute hilh in thangtiik haw hi .
41005015	Mite Jesuh lakah a hen haw ten Legion a nei khawsia polh mipa cu puan silh in , miciipbel bangin khungleng amuh haw ten lauzet haw hi .
41005016	Khawsia polhmi pa cu itibang damnak ngah him ? tih thu le vok honpi tei thu a mutu ten midangte hilh sawlawn haw hi .
41005017	Mahhangin Jesuh neel ah , “ Ka ngam sung uh ah um pahsun ; mundang lamah thawn le ci , ” tin kuun haw hi .
41005018	Jesuh hawmkuang sungah tum tuk a elh ten khawsia polhmi pan Jesuh amah zui tukin dong hi .
