41005019	Mahnaven Jesuh in zuituk awi ngawlin , na inn ah piin in Topa i na hum aa nemcuamnak ngengpi a bawlnak thu le nangma hum aa hehpihnak a neihnak thute na hilh ten , ” tin ti hi .
41005020	Amah cu piin leh in Jesuh ii amah a hehpihnak thu hempohte cu Dekhapolis , ngamsung hempoh ah hilh in mi hempoh ten mangbangin lamdangsa haw hi .
41005021	Jesuh hawmkuang sungah khungin tuipi ngaal lamah hawh hi . Ngaalkhatlam tuimawk aa a um laihtak khin mi honpi a lakah hung haw in , a kimkot ah dim-uk in um haw hi .
41005022	Mahlaihtakin pumkhawm inn uktu Jairus cu Jesuh lakah hawh hi .
41005023	Jesuh a muh ten a kebul ah bok in , “ Ka canu thi awndiak toh hi , damin a nunleh theih nak tuk hungin a humah na kut suan le ci , dam tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
41005024	Jesuh cu amah tuah hawh ngeelin mi tampi ten a nungzui in nawkdun phuphut haw hi .
41005025	Mahlaihtakin numei pakhat thi tuul nat kumsawm le kumnih vei numei pakhat um hi .
41005026	Anatnak cu sibawi tampi te bawltiik in a neih hempoh bo khawng zotoh naven , imah dam kha ngawlin luai seseem hi .
41005027	Mahtibang hangin aman Jesuh ii thu a theih ten , “ A puanceep no beek ka zen kha ahin dam bel tung , ” tin ngaisung hi .
41005028	Mihonpi tei nunglamno pen hawh dedeen in , Jesuh puanceep a mawkno cu zen ngah hi .
41005029	A zenkhaak bekten , a thitul cu cawl in kangpaih hi . A man ka sungaa natnak hi dam zotoh tih theih hi .
41005030	Jesuh in ama sungpen a hu le thawm a tuul lam a thei bek ten a nunglam heek in , “ Ka puan zentu akua him ? ” tin dong hi .
41005031	A nungzui ten mihing hizong nawkdun kha phuphut lih mu leng sici , a kua in ka puan zen hum tin ita dong theicim ? ” tin ti haw hi .
41005032	Mahtavangin Jesuh in amah zentu mu nuam in a eelkiim zo kawkawi hi .
41005033	Numei nun ka humah ii thu piang hum tih thei cawm in , lauzet in le a can tawtok in Jesuh mai-ah bokin a thu hempoh hilh khawng hi .
41005034	Mahhangin Jesuh in , “ Ka canu aw , na upnak in nang damtiik zo hi . Thinnop noin pin tenna , na tidam tahen , ” tin ti hi .
41005035	Jesuh ii thu son laihtakin Pumkhawmnak inn uktu Jairus inn pen mi hung in , “ Na canu thi zotoh hi , ita Saya pa noksak lengcim ? ” tin ti hi .
41005036	Mahnaven Jesuh in mah pai thu hilhnakte mang ngawlin , “ Lungmu tam pahsun , upnak bek nei in , ” tin Jairus lakah hilh hi .
41005037	Jesuh in amah cu midang kuamah zui phal ngawlin , Piter , Jeim le , James ii nau Johan te bek zuitiik hi .
41005038	Pumkhawmnak inn uktu pai in a hen haw ten mithawm lum leilui in mitampi kap li za haw hi .
41005039	Innsung a tum ten , aita tihbanghin kapli uh cim ? Numei nu cu thi mala hi , ahihbu hi , ” a tih ten mithi ngaalten nautat in nuihsan thong haw hi .
41005040	Mahhangin Jesuh in thi-ngaal hempohte cu hawlvawk in pawlam ah tuultiik hi . Jairus tei nupa le a pui mi pathum te tuah bek in numei nui umnak ah tum haw hi .
41005041	Jesuh in numei nu khut pen leen in , “ Talitha kumi , ” ti hi . Talitha kumi tihnopnak cu , “ Numei nu aw , tho in , ti ing hi , ” tihnak hi .
41005042	A tih celh bekten thakhat in numei nu cu dingto paih in lamciah thei paih hi . Mi hempoh ten lamdangsa in am dalh haw hi .
41005043	Hi thu piangte kuamai ii lakah sontuk ngawlin nasiazet kham hi . Mahcelh ten , “ Numei nu cu a eih tuk an napia un , ” tin hilh in zam hi .
41006001	Jesuh cu mahlai munpen thawn in a nungzui ten Jesuh ama suahnak ngam lamah hawhpih haw hi .
41006002	Sabbath ni in Jesuh in pumkhawmnak inn ah thu hilh hi . Mi tampi in a thu a zaak haw ten lamdangsa haw hi . “ Hipan hi thute ilai pen ngah hum ? Nalamdang hizat itibangin bawl thei him ? ” tin ti haw hi .
41006003	“ Amah cu Mary ii ca lettama hi ma ta maw , James , Josef , Juda le Simon tei u ta ngam maw ? A suahpih numei tevang hilaiah um bok haw hi , ” tili haw hi .
41006004	Hi miten Jesuh cu imah in sumsial haw ma hi . Mahhangin Jesuh in hitibangin amuhte thu hilh hi . “ Pathian kamsang pan a khua a tui , a phunpih le a innkua , tih sialngawl mundang ahcun upat co hi , ” ti hi .
41006005	Mahlai mun ah Jesuh in mi tina demlaih tei humah a khut suan in damnak a piak tih ngawl nalamdang imah bawl ma hi .
41006006	Amuh tei upngawlnak hangin Jesuh in lamdangsa ngangai hi . Mahcengten Jesuh cu a eelkiim khua dang lam ah Pathian thu hilh in vaak kawkawi hi .
41006007	Mahlaihtakin Jesuh in a nungzui sawm le panihte sam in a dingdeihhuai dawi ngilote hawlvawk zawhnak tukin huham neihtheihnak thu pia hi . Mahcelhten panih tek in vaaktiik hi .
41006008	“ Thiangkhut tih ngawl lam lak pen na man tuk uh a dang imah keng pahsuh un ; An donnak , angkidip , tangka , keng pahsuh un .
41006009	Kedam bulh un ; Angki silh thuah tuk keng pahsuh un .
41006010	A khua sung haw pen mun dang ah na thawn tian uh na tum masaknak tei inn ah na um leng un .
41006011	Munkhat pawpoh ah na thu hilh uh te ngai nuamngawlin a kiik haw ta le na tuul uh ten amuh tei humah phat ngawlnak thusia um tahen tihnak tukin na ke aa leivul te thing un . Mahmi cu amuh tei ca ngaallin piaknak hi tuk hi , ” tin thu pia hi .
41006012	A nungzuite hawh haw in sualsihnak thute hilh haw hi .
41006013	A sung haw aa khawsia a um mite hawlvawksak in mi tina tampite sathau tuah zuut in damtiik haw hi .
41006014	Jesuh cu a minthang hangin Herod kumpi pan a thu za hi . “ Baptizam petu Johan cu a thihnak pen tho leh zohi . Hi thu hangin ama sungah hu le thawm in na dek hi , ” tin miten son haw hi .
41006015	Mi khenkhat lam ten , “ Amah cu Elijah hi , ” tin son haw hi . Mahten a khenkhat lamten , “ Amah cu Pathian kamsang pa hi , taanglaih aa kamsang pakhat bang hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
41006016	Mahmi cu Herod kumpi pan a theih ten , “ A ngawng ka tansa Johan nungleh hi , ” tin ti hi .
41006017	Herod kumpi pan Johan cu mantiik in tu in thawng ah khum zotoh hi . Ita tihbanghin bawl him ti ahin , Herod in anau Filip ii zi Herodias cu lonsak in a huai hang hi .
41006018	Hi a nau ii zi Herodias a lonsaknak thu cu Johan in Herod ii lakah , “ Nanau Filip ii zi tuah na umkawm uh hi daan ma hi , ” tin a hilh meek hang in hi .
41006019	Mahtaak cu Herodias in Johan cu hua eem in that nuam hi . Mahnaven that thei ma hi .
41006020	Itahimtitale Herod in Johan cu thumaan a thiangtho mihing hi tin a theih taak cu lau eem in Johan cu hup lo hi . Herod in Johan ii amah thu a hilhte cu a zak sial ten a lungnop awng ma naven a thu hilhte cu ngainuam zet hi .
41006021	Lungdam ni Herod kumpi pa ama hin ni in , acozah bawi upate , ngaalbawi upate le Galilee ngamsung aa upate sam in puai bawl hi .
41006022	A puai bawl laihtak haw in Herodias ii canu cu hawh tum in laam cawm hi . Herod le a puaisimtu hempohte lungdamtiik hi . Mahhangin Herod in khanglai no lakah cun , “ Na deih pawpoh ngen in pia tung hi , ” ti hi .
41006023	“ Na deih pawpoh ngen in ka uk mi ngam a khen langkhat tian in pe tung hi , ” tin thutiam hi .
41006024	A khanglai no cu hawh tuul in a nui lakah , “ I bel ngen tuk hingngim ? ” tin dong hi . A nun , “ Baptizam petu Johan ii lu ngen in , ” tin hilh hi .
41006025	Khanglai no cu manlangin kumpi lakah hawh in a deihmi cu hilh hi . “ Baptizam petu Johan ii lu dalkuang sungah koih in pia in , ” tin ngen hi .
41006026	Kumpi pa cu thasia ngangai naven a thutiamsa hangin le a inn aa puaisim pawlte a zahcaak man in khanglai no ii thu cu nial ngam ma hi .
41006027	Kumpi pan Johan ii lu la tuk in thakhat in a ngaalkapte pakhat hawhtiik hi .
41006028	Ngaalkap pa cu hawh in thawnginn sungpen Johan ii lu a tan celhten dalkuang sungah koih in cawi in khanglai no cu pia hi . Khanglai no cun a nu pe sawlawn hi .
41006029	Johan ii nungzui pawlten hi thu a zaak haw ten a luang la tukin hung haw hi . A luangcu khaan sungah vui haw hi .
41006030	A nungzuite cu Jesuh lakah a hen leh haw ten a bawl hempohte haw le a thu hilhmi haw hempohte cu Jesuh lakah hilh leh haw hi .
41006031	Jesuh in , “ Hung un ngamvengnak ah hawh nung . Cawldam tukin demlaihno cawlhih nung , ” ti hi . Itahimtitale a hung lam , a hawhlam tih mihing tampi um leleng hangin an hei ei man haw ma hi .
41006032	Mahhangin hawmkuang sungah khungin hamlak mivengnak mun ah hawh haw hi .
41006033	Mahnaven mi tampi ten a hawh haw mu in hite hi ‘ Jesuh le a ngualte hi ’ tih a theih haw ten amu eel aa , khua hempoh pen mihingte cu a taai in hung haw in amuh saangin heng masa haw hi .
41006034	Jesuh in tuimawk a hen ten mi honpite cu mu in khaltu nei ngawl tuute bang tin hehpih eem in thu tampi hilh hi .
41006035	Taaklam nitum kuan ten a nungzui te cu Jesuh lak ah hawh haw in “ Hi laimun hi ngamveng hi , ni hei tum zo toh hi . hawh in a eih haw tuk an lei cawmtek haw leh pha tuk hi , ” tin Jesuh cu hilh haw hi .
41006036	Mahhangin hi te hi khawsung le lo lamah hawh in a cih haw tuk an lei cawm tek haw leh pha tule hi , ” tin Jesuh ur hilh hawhi .
41006037	Jesuh in , “ Amuh tei eih tuk an cu nangmu piak kuul tuk hi , ” tin don hi . A nungzui ten ngun tangka zanih man an lei tuk hawh in amuhte an pia tuk ung maw ? ” tin ti haw hi .
41006038	Mahten Jesuh in , “ Mahtale cangho i zong nei uh cim ? hawh in zo hem un , ” tin don hi . Hawh in a zoh haw ten , “ Cangho panga le ngasa panih um hi , ” tin hilh haw hi .
41006039	Mahcengten Jesuh in mi honpite cu a hon a hon in hamhing humah khungtiik hi .
41006040	A venghawng haw in zakhat hon um sawmnga hon um in khung haw hi .
41006041	Mahcengten Jesuh in cangho panga le ngasa panih cu la in van daakto in thungen hi . Thupha apiak celh ten cangho cu neuno teen bothem in sep tukin a nungzuite saan hi . Ngasa vang mi hempoh sem bok hi .
41006042	A venghawng haw in kham-uk in a eih celh haw ten ,
41006043	a kham baang haw cangho le ngasa cawm leh haw in bawm sawm le bawmnih ting hi .
41006044	Hi an eitu cu pano uhaam tiptep thawngnga kim haw hi .
41006045	Jesuh in mipite cu pintiik hi . A nungzuite vang hawmkuang sungah manlangzetin khungtiik hi . Mahten tuipi ngaalkhat Bethsaida khua lamah hawhhamtiik hi .
41006046	Jesuh amah cu mi honpite tuah a khehdun celh haw ten thungen tukin mualhum ah kaaito hi .
41006047	Taaklam nitum ceng diudeu ten Jesuh cu amah nguakcang in tuipi mawkah um hi . Mahten tuipi laizang aa hawmkuang um cu mu hi .
41006048	Huihpi in hawmkuang cu nunglam ah mut kiik hi . Mahhangin a nungzuite cu cimzet in a hawmkuang haw hotli in mu hi . Zing khuavak kuan nazi pathum le nazi paluk vengin Jesuh cu a nungzui tei lakah hawh tukin tuipi humah a ke in amuh makhelh in hawh hi .
41006049	Jesuh in a nungzuite cu makhelh tukin um naven a nungzui ten tuipi hum a hawhlih cu mu haw hi . Amun thila heng bawl in lauzet haw hi .
41006050	A venghawng haw in Jesuh cu mu haw hi . Mahnaven Jesuh in thakhatin otpih paih hi . “ Na lung uh dam ta un , keimah ing hi . Lau pahsuh un , ” tin don hi .
41006051	Amu neel hawmkuang sung aa Jesuh a kaaitoh bek ten huihpi theu ngawlin meng hi . Amuh ten a lungmu sung haw ah lamdangsa ngangai haw hi .
41006052	Itahimtitale a lungmu haw khoh leita in lungmu ngeng ahih haw taak cu a cangho eihnak haw thute hei ngaisung leh thei haw ma toh hi .
41006053	Tuipi ngaalkhat lam Kenesaret khua a hen haw ten a hawmkuang haw cu tui mawkah cawltiik haw hi .
41006054	Hawmkuang sung pen a tuul celh bek haw ten miten thakhat in thei paih haw hi .
41006055	Amu umnak khuakiim aa mite cu tai kawkawi haw in , Jesuh ii umnak a theih haw ten tina hempohte cu a zaunak kideen in puacih in Jesuh lakah hawhpih haw hi .
41006056	khaupi , khuaneu hampalak ti ngawlin a hennak mun hempoh aa natnak a neite le sumzuak tei siktuahnak mun lamlai ah koih in , a puanceep a zentiik tuk poh cawm in kuunli haw hi . A puanceep a tawng kha hempoh ten damnak ngah haw hi .
41007001	Nikhat ni in Jerusalem khua pen a hung Farasite le Daanthiam pawlkhatte cu Jesuh lakah hawh haw hi .
41007002	A nungzui hekkhat pawlte khut som ngawl in an a eih haw khi mu haw hi , an eih lai ngawl khut som tuk tih thu bangin a khut som haw ma ti nopnak hi .
41007003	Farasi pawl pepan in Judah mi hempoh ten taanglaih pupa tei daan zui in khutsom masa ngawlin an ei awng haw ma hi .
41007004	Dawl mun pen a pin haw hei ten tibual ngawlin an ei awng haw ma hi . Mahbek hei hi ngawlin daandang tampi khuat beel , kuang , som daan , tuibeel somdaante le dalkuang khazabeel le ihkhun somdaante zui in mang haw hi .
41007005	Mahtibang daan ahih hangin Farasi pawlte le Daanthiam pawlten , “ Ita taanglaih pupa tei thukhamte na nungzui ten zui ngawlin an ei haw him ? tin dong haw hi .
41007006	Kamsangpa Isaiah in , “ Noh mi ultting mi tihem pawlte aw , ” tin a thu hilhnak te hitih bangin ngan hi ; “ Hi mihing pawl ten a kam pawleu lambek haw in keimah upat haw hi . Mahnaven athin sung ngangai haw cu kei tuah kaangzet hi .
41007007	Phatnak neuno hei um ngawl aa a lolak in keimah bia haw hi . Itahimtitale mihing tei bawlcopmi daan cu , Pathian piakmi daan bang in zilh haw hi , ’ ti hi .
41007008	Noh ten Pathian thukhamte lawl in taanglaih mitei lak pen na ngahmi uh thukhamte zui uh ci , ” tin don hi .
41007009	“ Pathian thukham nial aa , taanglai thukham lui na let leng uh cu mawi hi , ti uh cim maw ?
41007010	Moses in nanu le napa upat un , nu le pai hum aa awn kha a hah ten thihnak daan thuak tahen ! ti hi .
41007011	Mah na ven nohten mi pakhat in a nu le pa bop theihnak nei leng na pi in “ hi cu Koban hi ” ( Koban ti cu Pathian ta tihnak hi ) a ti ta cun ,
41007012	Mahpa cu a nu le pa a bop tuk luat hi tin ngaisung hi uh ci .
41007013	Hihti bangin thu na hilhnak uh hin Pathian awnkam cu phiatkhawng uh ci , mahtihbangin na bawl uh mi tampi um hi , ” tin ti hi .
41007014	Mahlaihtakin Jesuh in mi honpite cu sam leh in , “ Na venghawng uh in ngai in thei ta un !
41007015	Mihing sungah tum in mi a setiik thei kuamah um ma hi .
41007016	Mahnaven mihing sungpen a tuulmi in amah siatiik thei hi , zaaknak beng a nei ten za haw ta hen , tin hilh hi .
41007017	Jesuh cu mi honpi tei lakpen thawn in , inn sungah a tum ten a nungzui ten a thu tehkipnakte donghaw hi .
41007018	Jesuh in , “ Nangmuhte hei in thei malaih uh cim maw ? Mihing sungah tum in misiatiik thei imah um ma hi , tih thei malaih uh cim maw ?
41007019	Itahimtitale mihing thin sungah tum ngawlin a pumpi sungah tumin pawlam ah tuul let hi . ( Hi thute cu an hempoh thiangtho hi , a tihnopnak hi . )
41007020	Mihing a nin tiiktu cu a sung pen a tuul mi khi hi .
41007021	A sung pen le a thinsung pen a pha ngawl ngaihsutnak tuul hi .
41007022	Ngukcaaknak , mi thahnak , mi zi hum a sualnak , duhhopnak , ngitlohnak , mizolnak , asiasuak deihnak , mi eennak , mi iiknak , ultungnak , tihsaknak , imah khenkhuai ngawl aa nun pawpoh nunnak ;
41007023	Hi ngitlohnak hempohte cu mi thin sung pen tuul in mi setiik thei hi , ” tin hilh hi .
41007024	Jesuh cu mahlai mun pen a thawn celh ten Tai-ar le Sidon ngam sungah hawh hi . Hilai pen kuamah ii theih tuk ngawlin innkhat ah tum deen naven ngelh thei cuang ma hi .
41007025	A canu ii sungah dingdeihhuai khawsia um ii nu cu Jesuh ii thu a theih bek ten a lakah hawh in a ke bul ah bok hi .
41007026	Hi nu cu ( Zentail nu hi ) , Siria ngam Fonisia peng pen suak hi . A canu ii sung aa khawsia hawlvawk sak tuk in kuun li hi .
41007027	Jesuh in , “ Ca ten an kham masa hih haw ta hen , catei eih tuk laksak in ui paih cu mawi ti uh cim maw ? ” a tih ten nupi nun ,
41007028	“ Hi ngai zuh hi , mahnaven Topa aw naupang tei cabuai nuai aa anthial a caaktiik haw te khi uico in khul mek bok poh si , ” tin don hi .
41007029	Jesuh in , “ Na tihnak bangin na inn ah piin leh ten , na canu ii sung pen khawsia cu tuul zotoh hi , ” tin ti hi .
41007030	Mahhangin nupi nu cu a inn ah piin leh hi . A inn a hen ten a canu ii sung aa khawsia cu tai zotoh in a canu cu zaunak hum ah zauleng in mu hi .
41007031	Tai-ar ngam pen thawn leleu in , Sidon khua tawn in khua sawm ngam a tihmi haw ‘ Dekhapolis ’ ngam kaltan in Galilee tuipi lamah hawh hi .
41007032	Mahlai mun ahcun a bengbul awn ngawi pa pakhat cu Jesuh lakah hawhpih haw in a hum ah khut suan tuk in kuun li haw hi .
41007033	Mahten Jesuh in bengbul awnngawi pa cu mi honpi neel pen tuul pih in mivengnak munah hawhpih hi . Jesuh in a khutzung in a bengsung tawhtum ceng ten a khut cilnop in a lei cu zen hi .
41007034	Mahten Jesuh cu daakto huisa in , “ Effatha , ” ti hi . Effatha tih cu , “ Vaak ta hen , ” tih nak hi .
41007035	A beng vaak leh paih in , a lei vang pheleh in baih no in awn leh thei hi .
41007036	Hi thute cu kuamah ii lakah son tuk ngawlin kham li naven , a kham nasia dedeuh ten , van nuai ah thang in son seseem haw hi .
41007037	Mi hempoh ten son theih ngawlin lamdangsazet haw hi . “ Zo in ! A man i ti tak in i zongza hempoh bawl thei him . Bengbulte thu za lehtiik thei sih in awn thei ngawlte awn lehtiik thei cu , ’ ti li haw hi .
41008001	Mi tampi khawmin , an eih tuk nei ngawlin a um laihtak haw in ;
41008002	Jesuh in a nungzuite samin , “ Hi mi honpi tei ca tukin ka ngaihsut ten heh pih zetin ing hi . Itahimtitale amuhte cu ka lakah ni thum um zo haw toh in an eih tuk nei haw ma hi .
41008003	Ngilkial in ka pintiik ahin , lam lakah tamsawl haw tuk hi . Mahbek sial ngawlin mi hekkhatte cu khawlapi pen hung haw hi , ” tin hilh hi .
41008004	“ Hitihbang ngam sung pen mihing hizong ii an eih tuk ilai ah zei tuk hung him , ” tin a nungzui ten dong haw hi .
41008005	Jesuh in , “ Cangho i zong nei uh cim ? ” tin a dot ten a nungzui ten , “ Cangho salih um hi , ” tin don haw hi .
41008006	Mahtaak cu Jesuh in mi honpite cu lei humah khungtiik hi . A khun ceng haw ten , cangho salih cu la in thungen in thupha pia hi . Thupha a piak celh ten cangho cu bothem in mi honpite sep tukin a nungzuite saan hi .
41008007	Ngasa vang demlaihno nei bok haw in thungen in thupha a piak celh ten a nungzuite saan in mi honpite semtiik hi .
41008008	A kham in a eih celh haw ten a khambaang haw te cawm leh haw in bawm salih kim hi .
41008009	A eitu cu mi thawngli laih ting haw hi .
41008010	Thakhatin Jesuh in mipite cu pintiik in amah cu a nungzuite tuah hawmkuang sungah khungin thawnbok haw in Dalmanutha ngam ah heng haw hi .
41008011	Mahlaihtakin Farasite cun Jesuh sual zei nuam in , “ Pathian ten mi na hih le hih ngawl vanhum pen thulamdang theihtupnak tukin lak le ci , ” tin ti haw hi .
41008012	Hi thudotnak hangin Jesuh cu a thin sung in huisa hi , “ Ita hi khang miten , thasiahhuai nalamdang lim lak tuk in ngen haw him ? A thu ngangai in hilh ing hi , hi khang mitei tukin lim imah lak tuk mang hi , ” tin ti hi .
41008013	Jesuh in amuhte cu zamin hawmkuang ah khungin tuipi ngaal lamah hawh hi .
41008014	A nungzui ten cangho kentuk phawkngil in hawmkuang sungah cangho pakhat bek nei haw hi .
41008015	Jesuh in , “ Ngai un ! Farasi te le Herod tei naman khi pha tak zetin ngaalling ta un , ” tin hilh hi .
41008016	Mahten a nungzui ten , “ Cangho nei ma si hung , ” tin pakhat le pakhat son li haw hi .
41008017	Jesuh in a thu son hawte a theih ten , “ Ita cangho nei ngawl thu meen poh sonli uh cim ? Tu tian imah ngaisung thei ngawlin um laih uh cimmaw ? Thu ngaihsut theihnak tukin na lungmu uh haksa eem laih uh cim maw ?
41008018	Mit nei si uh ci , mu thei ma uh cim ? beng nei si uh ci , za ma uh cimmaw ? Thei thei ma uh cim ?
41008019	Cangho panga tuah mi thawngnga an ka vaak ten na kham baang uh ii zong hum tih hei phawk leh matoh uh cim maw ? tin a tih ten a muh ten bawm sawm le bawmnih hi tin don haw hi .
41008020	Cangho salih mi ka vaak ten na khambaang uh bawm i zong cawm uh cim ? ” tin a dot ten , “ amuh ten bawm salih cawm ung , ” tin don haw hi .
41008021	Jesuh in , “ Noh ten imah thei thei malaih uh cim maw ? tin ti hi .
41008022	A nung ten Bethsaida khua ah heng haw in , mitcaw pa pakhat cu Jesuh lakah hunpih haw in , “ Zen poh in , ” tin kuunli haw hi .
41008023	Mahten Jesuh in mitcaw pa cu a khut pen leen in dai pawleu lamah hawhpih hi . A mit ah cilsiak in , a humah a khut nga in , “ Na muh theih um maw ? ” tin dong hi .
41008024	Mitcaw pan , zoto in , “ Mihingte thingkung thawnli bangin mu ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
41008025	Mahten Jesuh in a khut mitcaw pai humah nga leh saal in van zototiik hi . Mahbekten a mit vaak leh in a i a bang cangcianzet in mu leh thei hi .
41008026	Jesuh in , “ Na inn ah piindeen ten na khua sungah navaak pahsun , ” tin hilh hi .
41008027	Mahlai mun pen Jesuh le a nungzuite cu Sisaria ngam Filipi khua lamah a hawh laih haw in lampi pen Jesuh in , “ Kei hi a kua tin ti haw him ? ” tin a nungzui tei lakah dong hi .
41008028	Mi hekkhat ten , “ Baptizam petu Johan hi , ” ti haw hi ; A hekkhat ten , “ Elijah hi , ” ti haw tin a nungzui ten hilh haw hi .
41008029	Jesuh in a nungzuite dong leleu in , “ Nangmuh hihim in keimah hi akua him tih mi thei uh cim ? ” ti hi . Mahten Piter in , “ Nang cu Khrih hi ci , ” tin ti hi .
41008030	Jesuh in amah a kua hum tih mi kua ma lakah hilh tuk ngawlin a nungzuite nasiazet in kham hi .
41008031	Mahten Jesuh in , “ Mihing Capa in thuaknak tampi tawk tuk hi . Upate Thiampi upa te le Daanthiam pawl ten lawl haw tuk hi . Aman thahnak thuak in nithum lawi ten tho leh tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
41008032	Mahmi thu cu a muh tei lakah celzet in hilh hi . Piter in Jesuh samin , mawhthuk hi .
41008033	Mahnaven Jesuh in a nungzuite zo thah in Piter lakah , “ Satan aw , ka neel pen taai in , ” tin a eelkiim zo kawkawi in Piter liat hi . “ Na ngaihsutnakte Pathian lak pen a hungmi hi ma hi . Mihing ngaihsutnak bek hi , ” tin Piter cu liat hi .
41008034	A nungten Jesuh in mi honpite le a nungzuite samin , “ Mihing pakhat pawpoh in ka nung a zui nuam ta le ama deihnak zam in a thinglamteh pua in zui ta hen .
41008035	Itahimtitale a nunnak a pan suak nuam ten a hawvang nunnak bo tuk hi . Mahnaven Keima thu hang le lungdamnak Thuthangpha hangin a nunnak a bo tiiktu cu nunpatnak ngah tuk hi .
41008036	Itahimtitale mi pakhat in vanhangnuai leihum hempoh a nei tavang in a hawvang nunnak a paaitiik ahin a nemcuamnak i mah um tuk ma hi .
41008037	A hawvang nunnak cu imah tuah in lei leh thei tuk ma hi .
41008038	Sualnak tuah a dim hi khang mitei lak pen keima thu zilhnak heihihen a zahcaakpihtu cu Mihing Capa in a pai minthannak tuah in le a mi thiangtho vancung mite tuah a tolh leh ni ten zahcaakpih leh bok tuk hi .
41009001	A thungaingai in hilh ing hi , “ Hilai aa a ding hekkhat ten Vancung Uknak hu le thawm tuah a hen laklawh tian thi haw tuk ma hi , ” tin Jesuh in ti hi .
41009002	Hi nung niluk lawi ten Jesuh in ama lakah Piter , Jeim le Johan cu mual sangpi humah kaitohpih in a muh bek a um haw ten Jesuh cu a mel theek hi .
41009003	A puan silhte cu leihum puan sawp thiamtawp te hei i thiantiik zawh tuk ngawl tian in , khaap susul in de mahtak hi .
41009004	Mahbek sial ngawlin Elijah le Moses vang lang in Jesuh tuah thu sonngel li in um haw hi .
41009005	Mahlaihtakin Piter in , “ Saya pa hilai mun hi ei mu umnak awh eem hi . Nangma tukin buuk pakhat , Moses ii tukin buuk pakhat , Elijah ii tukin buuk pakhat , buuk pathum sa tuk hung hi , ” tin ti hi .
41009006	Aita tibanghin ti haw him ti a hin lau leita in imah a ot tuk a theih haw ngawl hangin hi .
41009007	Mahlaihtakin amuhte cu , meingo pi in uap paih in , “ Hipa hi ka ihbel ka Capa hi , a thu na ngai ta un , ” tin meingo sung pen aw ngingtuul hi .
41009008	Mahceng bekten a eelkiim zo kawkawi haw naven , kuamah mu hawma hi . Jesuh bek um in mu haw hi .
41009009	Mual humpen a tolhsuk leh haw ten Jesuh in , “ Mihing Capa cu a thihnak pen a thawhleh laklawh hi na muh mi uh kuamah ii lakah son pahsuh un , ” tin nasiazet in kham hi .
41009010	Amuh ten Jesuh ii hi thu a hilhte phatakzet in a thin sungah vongleng haw hi . “ Thihnak pen tho leh ti mi hi a i tih nopnak nentim ? ” tin pakhat le pakhat dongdun li haw hi .
41009011	Mahhangin amun , “ Elijah hung masa tuk hi tin ita Daanthiam ten son haw him , ” tin dong haw hi . Mah ten Jesuh in ,
41009012	“ Elijah hung masa ngangai tuk zuh hi . Aman na hempoh bawl ham khawng tuk hi . ‘ Mihing Capa hei in nuncimnak le thakemnak tampi thuak tuk hi , ’ tin Lai Thiangtho sungah ngan zotoh hi .
41009013	Thungangai in Elijah cu hung masa zotoh hi . Lai Thiangtho sungaa a ngatsa bangin mihing ten ama hum aa a bawl nuam haw zah in bawl zo haw toh hi , ” tin hilh hi .
41009014	Jesuh cu a nungzuite tuah khawm tuah leh in mi honpi in amuh uumcih in , Daanthiam te tuah nialdun li in um haw hi .
41009015	Mi honpi ten Jesuh amuh haw ten lamdangsa in a muak tukin zuan susuih haw hi .
41009016	Jesuh in , “ Noh ten amuh te tuah a ii thu sonli uh cim ? ” tin a dot laitak in , mi honpi lakpen mipa pakhat in , ‘ Saya pa , ’
41009017	“ A sungah ngamhuai um , a awn thei ngawl ka capa nangma lakah hunpih ing hi .
41009018	Ka capa cu ngamhuai ii zelh nungsang a pumpi leiseh nakin a kam pen cilphuan kaai in a ha ngawi in khikthong in bawl hi . Na nungzui tei lakah a sung ngamhuai hawlvawk saktiik naveng in hawlvawk zo haw ma hi , ” tin hilh hi .
41009019	“ Upnak hei nei ngawl mite aw , ” tin Jesuh in a nungzuite liat hi . “ I tuk tian nangmuh tuah um kawm tuk hingngim ? Nohte tuah i can thuak lo tuk hing ngim ? Naupang pa cu ka lakah hunpih un , ” tin Jesuh in ti hi .
41009020	Naupang cu Jesuh ii lakah hawhpih haw in naupang pan Jesuh amuh bek ten thakhat in ngamhuai in naupang cu caihtiik hi . Ati hiing tiikin , a pumpi leisehnak mang in , taal li in , a kam cilphuan kaai in cat li in um hi .
41009021	Jesuh in , “ Hitihbang a nat sawng ican toh hum , ” tin dong hi . A pan , “ A neulaih in pan awng toh hi .
41009022	Ngamhuai in ka capa cu susia nuam in mei sungah hihen tui sungah hihen sualin khaal li hi . Na bawl thei ol ta le hehpihnak in bawl zazaal poh in , ” tin kuunli hi .
41009023	Jesuh in , “ Na bawl thei ta le ti ci mei ! A um mitei tukin na hempoh a hi thei ngawl um ma hi , ” tin don hi .
41009024	Naupang ii pan , “ Ken um ing hi , ka up ngawlnak pen hi bawm in , ” tin thakhat in au in ngen hi .
41009025	Mahlaihtakin mi honpi ten a zot susuih li haw Jesuh in amuh ten , “ Awn thei ngawl bengbul ngamhuai aw , ama sungpen tuulvut in . Tunung ten ama sung hihim ah tum leh toh pahsun , tin thupia ing hi , ” tin Jesuh in ngamhuai cu liat hi .
41009026	Ngamhuai in naupang pa cu nasiazet in a ti pumpi hiing tawtok in a bawl celh ten haam tutui in au in tuul hi . Naupang pa cu ngamhuai ii tuul celh ten mi thisa bangin a um taak cu mi tampi ten thi zotoh hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
41009027	Mahnaven Jesuh in naupang pa cu a khut pen leen in a phot toh ten dingto hi .
41009028	Jesuh cu inn sungah a hawh tum celh ten a nungzui ten , “ Ita koh ten ngamhuai hawlvawk zo ngawl kam ung , ” tin a dot kuh deen haw ten Jesuh in ,
41009029	“ Hitihbang natnak cu thungetnak ancannak tuah bekin hawlvawk zawh hi , ” tin don hi .
41009030	A umnak mun haw pen , Jesuh le a nungzuite cu thawn haw in Galilee ngam lam tawn in hawh haw hi . Jesuh in mitei ama umnak a theih haw tuk cu awi hihim ma hi .
41009031	Itahimtitale Mihing Capa cu mitei khut sungah pia in that haw tuk laih hi . Mahnaven nithum nung ten amah cu tholeh tuk hi , ” tin a nungzuite hilh hi .
41009032	A nungzui ten a thu hilhte cu thei haw ma naven a khiaknak a dot leh haw tuk cu ngam haw ma hi .
41009033	Kapernaum khua ah heng haw in Jesuh cu inn sungah hawh tum hi . Jesuh in , “ Lampi ah a i thueeldun li uh cim ? ” tin a nungzuite dong hi .
41009034	Mahnaven mengdeen in um haw hi . Itahimtitale amuh ten eimu lak pen akua ngengbel hung ngim ? tin lampi pen a eldun lih haw hang hi .
41009035	Jesuh cu khungin a nungzui sawm le panih te samin , “ Mi pakhat pawpoh in a masabel a nuam ta le a nungdawlbel suakin mi hempoh tei sila a suah masak kuul tuk hi , ” tin hilh hi .
41009036	Jesuh in naupangno pakhat la in amu laizang ah khun in a aang ah cawi hi .
41009037	“ Keima min hangin hitihbang naupangnote a cosang hempoh ten keimah vang cosang hi bok tuk hi . Keimah cosang hempoh ten keimah a tiiktu pa vang cosang haw tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
41009038	Johan in , “ Saya pa , nangma min suangin khuasia a hawlvawk theitu mu nave ung in nangmah zuingawl mihing ahih taak cu kham ung hi , ” tin hilh hi .
41009039	Jesuh in , “ Kham pahsuh un . Itahimtitale keima min suang aa nalamdang a bawl theitu ten keimah son sia haw tuk ma hi .
41009040	Eimu lam tangte cu eimu mihingte haw hi .
41009041	Itahumtiahin keima mi nahih uh man in tui keukhat a piatu hempoh in laksawng ngah ngawl in um hihim haw tuk ma hi .
41009042	Jesuh in , “ llua hei hihen , hi tibang-naupang a upnak lampial tiiktu a um ta le a ngawng ah an ngawinak suang ngengpi khih in tuipi sungah khesuk a hin ama ca in pha saw tuk hi .
41009043	Na khutin nang a sualtiik ta le saat tan in . Khut kim nei aa , a mit awng ngawl meipi umnak hell sungah na tum saangin khut tawng in nunnak ngam sungah na tum a hin pha saw hi .
41009044	
41009045	Na ke in nang bah in a tutiik ta le saat tan in . Itahimtitale na ke him aa hell sung aa mei kaang na thuak saangin ke him ngawlin nunnak sungah na heng a hin phasaw tuk hi .
41009046	
41009047	Na mit in nang a sualtiik ta le kheek let in . Mit nih nei aa hell sung na tum saangin , mit khat nei in Pathian Uknak sungah na tum a hin phasaw tuk hi .
41009048	Hi a umnak hell sungpen a hawvang haw cu a thih ni um tuk ma hi . Mei alh hei a mit ni um tuk ma hi .
41009049	Itahumtiahin mi hempohte cu , biakpiaknak zehsa cu ci tuah thianthotiik ahih bang in thianthotiik khawng hi haw tuk hi .
41009050	Ci cu a phabel hi . Mahnaven ci in a alnak a paitiik ahin , a al leh theihnak tuk in a ii mang tuk uh cim ? Mahtibang hangin nangmu sungah ci neitek in pakhat le pakhat a lem no in um ta un , ” tin Jesuh in hilh hi .
41010001	Jesuh cu Kapernaum pen thawnin Jordan ngunngaal khat Judah ngam lamah hawh hi . A daansa bang leng in mi honpite cu Jesuh neel ah khawm leleu haw hi . Jesuh in amuhte cu thu hilh hi .
41010002	Angei um ngawlin Farasite hengpaih haw hi . Jesuh sual zei nuam in , “ Mi pakhat in a zi ama nuam a hin maaknak tukin a daan umni maw ? ” tin dong haw hi .
41010003	“ Moses in itibang thu pia him ? ” tin Jesuh in dongleh hi .
41010004	Farasi ten , “ A zi ama nuam mi in , a zi tuah a khehnak tuk thu le a maak nuamnak thu lai ah ngan in pia poh leh ma thei tuk hi , tin Moses in thu pia hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
41010005	Mahnaven Jesuh in , “ Moses in ita tihbangcun thupia hum ti ta le na lungmu uh khoh lei ta in hilh theih na hih uh ngawl hangin hi .
41010006	Lai Thiangtho tihnak bangin Pathian in van le lei a bawl penpan in pano le numei bawl bok hi .
41010007	Hih thu hangin pano in a nu le a pa zamin a zi zuan ta hen . Amu panih cu pumkhat suak haw ta hen .
41010008	Mahtihbang ahih hangin amuhte cu panih hi leh ngawl toh in pakhat hi zo haw toh hi .
41010009	Pathian ii khoptuah sa mi cu kuamah in khen haw pahsuh hen , ” tin ti hi .
41010010	Inn sungah a tum leh haw ten a nungzuitu ten mah thu cu dong haw hi .
41010011	Jesuh cun amu lakah , “ Mi pakhat in a nupi maa in nupi dang a nei ahitale a nupi ii hum pen numei dang tuah in sualnak bawl hi .
41010012	Mahtihbangbokin numei in a pasal zam in pano dang a nei ahitale pano dang tuah sualnak bawl hi , ” tin ti hi .
41010013	Mi hekkhat ten a cate haw khi Jesuh ii thupha piak tukin hawhpih haw hi . Mahnaven mah mite cu a nungzuitu ten liat haw hi .
41010014	Mah thu cu Jesuh in a theih ten a thin-uuk in a nungzui tei lak ah , “ Naupangte cu ka lakah hunpih un , kham pahsuh un ! Itahimtitale Vancung Uknak cu hitihbang naupang tei ca in hi .
41010015	A thungangai in hilh ing hi ; a kuakua heihihen naupang tei Vancung Uknak a saan haw bang khin a sang bok haw ma ta le Vancung Uknak ah cun tum thei haw tuk ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
41010016	Mahten naupangte cu pom in a hum haw ah a khut suan in thupha pia hi .
41010017	Jesuh cu khualzin a hawh lih laihtak in mi pakhat in a mah zuan hi . A khukdin vut in , “ Mipha Saya pa aw , kumkhua nunnak ka co theihnak tukin a i bawl kam nang ? ” tin dong hi .
41010018	Jesuh cun , “ Itakaw mipha saya pa na tih ? Pathian sial ngawl mipha kuamah um ma hi .
41010019	thukhamte khi thei leng ci , ” Mi that pahsun , nupa sualnak bawl pahsun , nguca pahsun , a maan ngawl mite sualnawh pahsun , mizol pahsun , na nu le na pa upat in , ” tin ti hi .
41010020	Mah pa cun , “ Saya pa , mah thukhamte cu ka naupangno laih penpan zui khawng zo ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
41010021	Mahmi pa cu Jesuh in itnak tuah zo cangcian in , “ Thil pakhat in sam laih ci . Hawh inna na neihmi hempoh zuakin tangka na ngah mi khi mizawng ca-ngahte pia in hi . Mahten vancung ah milian pa hi tuk ci , mahcengten keimah zui in hi , ” tin ti hi .
41010022	Mah thu a theih ten mahmi pa cu mi hausa ahih hangin thasia in tul ta hi .
41010023	Jesuh in a nungzuite cu zo pepel in , “ Milian tei caa in Vancung Uknak ” sung tum tuk cu itihzah in hak him ? ” tin ti hi .
41010024	Mahmi thu a theih haw ten nungzuitu ten cu lamdangsazet haw hi .
41010025	Milian pai Vancung Uknak sung a tum tuk saangin hiokua awng sung aa kalauk a tum tuk baih saw hi , ” tin ti hi .
41010026	Mahthu a theih haw ten nungzuitute cu lamdangsa seseem in , “ Mahtihbang ahitacun a kua kaw nunpatnak a ngah thei tuk ? ” tin pakhat le pakhat ti dun li haw hi .
41010027	Jesuh in a nungzuitute cu zo cangcian in , “ Hi thu cu mihing tei caa cun hi thei ma zuh hi . Mahnaven Pathian caa cun tih theih ngawl imamah um ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
41010028	Mahten Piter in , “ Mahbang ahitacun kohten i hempoh te zam in nangmah zui zotoh ung hi , ” tin ti hi .
41010029	Jesuh in , “ hi zuh hi , thungai in hilh ing hi : a kuakua hei in a inn hihen , a lo hihen , a unau hihen , a celnu hihen , a nu le a pa hihen , a cate hihen , keimah le Thuthangpha ii hangin pakhakhat a zamtute cu ,
41010030	tukhang hihim ah tam seseem in ngah tuk hi , a let zakhat in ngah tuk hi . Inn hihen , lo hihen , unau hihen , celnu hihen , nu hihen , cate hihen , a let zakhat in ngah tuk hi ; bawlsiatnak cu thuak tuk naven , a hengtuk laih khan ah kumkhua nunnak ngah tuk hi .
41010031	Mahnaven tu aa , dawltabelte cu masabel leh haw tuk hi , Masabelte cu dawltabel hi leh haw tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
41010032	Jesuh le a nungzuitute cu Jerusalem lamah hawh haw hi . Jesuh cu a nungzui tei masuan ah hawh hi . A nungzuitute cu a thin haw nop ma hi . A nunglam haw pen a zuitu midangte vang thinsuzet haw hi . Nungzuitu sawm le panihte cu mundang deuh ah pui in a humah a heng tuk thute hilh leh hi .
41010033	Aman , “ Ngai hem un ! Jerusalem khua ah heng tuk hung aa mahlai ah Mihing Capa cu thiampi upate le Daanthiam tei khut ah piak hi tuk hi . Amuh ten that tukin thu soncat haw tuk aa mahnungten Gentail mitei khut ah hen hi tuk hi .
41010034	Ceekpan bawlnak in mang in cilsiak in vaat in that haw tuk hi . Mahnaven nithum lawi ten tho leh tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
41010035	Mahten Zebedi capa Jeim le Johan cu Jesuh lakah hung haw in , “ Saya pa , thil pakhat na bawlsak tukin deih ung , ” tin kun haw hi .
41010036	Jesuh cun ; “ Ai bawlsak tuk kaw na deih uh ? ” tin dong hi .
41010037	“ A sunglawi mi na Uknak sung aa na bawi khunnak hum na khun ten na el ah in khungtiik bok in hi ; pakhat na taklam ah pakhat na veilam ah , ” tin ti haw hi .
41010038	Jesuh cun amuh tei lakah , “ I him ka nget uh tih thei ma uh ci . Ka in tuk mi thuaknak khuat khi in thei ni uh cim ? Baptizam ka laaknak bangkeek in la thei bok ni uh cim ? ” tin dong hi .
41010039	Amuh ten , “ In thei tuk ung ” tin don haw hi . Jesuh in amuh tei lakah , “ Ka in tuk khuat cu in thei kha men ngai tuk uh ci , ka baptizam laknak bangin la thei ngai men tuk uh ci .
41010040	Mahnaven ka taklam le ka veilam aa khung tuk , ten theihnak thu nei mang hi . Pathian in mahmi mun cu bawlsaksa mitei caa in pia tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
41010041	Mahmi thu cu a dang nungzuitu sawmkhat ten a theih haw ten Jeim le Johan tei humah thin-uuk mahtak haw hi .
41010042	Mahhangin , “ Leihum ngam uktute cu a ukmi haw tei humah lalzet haw in a hotute cu thuneizet haw tih khi thei uh ci .
41010043	Mahnaven amu lakah cun hitihbang cun hi tuk ma hi . Noh tei lak pen a ngengbel a nuam a hitale nangmuh hempoh tei nadektu sal hi tuk hi .
41010044	Nangmu lak pen lupibel a nuam mi cu nangmu sal hi tuk hi .
41010045	Itahimtitale Mihing Capa hei hi midangte na dektiik tukin a hungmi hi ma hi ; mitei na dektu tuk in , mi tampi tan tukin le a nunnak pia tukin hung hi saw hi , ” tin ti hi .
41010046	Jesuh cu a nungzuitute le mi honpite tuah Jerikho khua ah heng haw hi . Mahten Jerikho khua pen a tul haw laihtak in Timia capa Bartimia a tih haw mitcaw khutdawh pa lampi el ah khung leng hi .
41010047	Nazereth mi Jesuh hi tih khi a theih ten , “ David capa Jesuh ! Kei hehpih zazal in hi , ” tin au hi .
41010048	Mi tampi ten , “ Mengdeen in um poh in , ” tin liat haw hi . Mahnaven meng cuang ngawl in “ David Capa hehpih zazal in hi , ” tin nging sesem in au hi .
41010049	Jesuh cu cawl hih in , “ Sam hem un , ” tin ti hi . Mitcaw pa cu sam haw in , “ Na lungdam in , nangmah sam hi , tho in , ” tin ti haw hi .
41010050	A puansilh laih cu duk vut in tai vingveng in Jesuh lakah cun heng hi .
41010051	“ A i bawlsak tuk kaw na deih ” tin Jesuh cun ti hi . Mitcaw pa cun , “ Saya pa , khua mu thei leh nuam ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
41010052	Jesuh cun , “ Hawhtenna na upnak in damtiik zo hi , ” tin ti hi . Thakhat in khua mu in Jesuh cu zui ta hi .
41011001	Jerusalem khua nai dedeuh li haw toh in Bethfage le Bethani khua el Olif mual ah heng haw hi . Jesuh in a nungzuitu panihte cu mai ah hawhhamtiik in ,
41011002	Amu lakah cun , “ Na mataan uh aa a ummi khua ah hawh ta un , na hen uh ten kuamah i khun awng laih ngawl mi laakno khau khihsa mu tuk uh ci . A khau duuk in hunpih un hi .
41011003	Mi pakhat in i ta duuk kam uh ci a titale , ‘ Topan kin hi ’ saan leh paih tuk poh hi ! tin ti un , ” tin ti hi .
41011004	Mahtihcun hawh haw in khuasung zin pi ah cun inn pakhat ii kongkal ah laakno pakhat khih leng cu mu haw hi , a khau a duh lih haw laihtak cun ,
41011005	mahlai ah a dingmi mi hekkhat ten , “ Ituk kaw laakno khau na duh lih uh ? ” tin ti haw hi .
41011006	Amuh ten Jesuh ii hilhsanak bang cun hilh in thakhat in hawhpih paih haw hi .
41011007	Jesuh lakah laakno cu hawhpih haw in laak humah a puan haw te a phah celh haw ten , Jesuh cu khung hi .
41011008	Mitampi ten a hawhnak haw tuk lampi ah a puan haw phah in ; mi hekkhat ten thingceh te la in phah bok haw hi .
41011009	A mataan ah a hawhtute le nunglam pen a zuitu ten , “ Pathian cu thangphat un ! Topai min in a hungmi pa cu Pathian in thupha pia ta hen !
41011010	A pu uh David kumpi pai Uknak a heng tukmi cu Pathian in thupha pia ta hen ! Pathian cu thangphat un ! ” tin au tawtok haw hi .
41011011	Jesuh cu Jerusalem ah tum in Biakinn sungah hawh in i hempoh zo kawkawi hi . Mahnaven khuanu toh hangin a nungzuitu sawm le panihte tuah Bethani khua ah hawh haw hi .
41011012	A zing ten Bethani khua pen kik leh haw hi . Mahlaitakin Jesuh cu a ngilkial hi .
41011013	Lam khualathimnak ah a ceh sai-bimbem mi theikung pakhat mu in a ngah um maw tih a zo tukin zuan hi . Mahnaven thei bul el a hen ten a ceh bek mu hi . Itahimtitale thei min hun hi ma hi .
41011014	Jesuh in , “ Kuamah in na ngah cu ei leh haw ma toh hen , ” tin theikung cu ti hi . A nungzuitu ten mah tin a ot cu za bok haw hi .
41011015	Jerusalem a hen haw ten Jesuh cu Biakinn ah hawh in thil a leitu le a zuaktute khi hawlvawk khawng hi . Tangka thektu tei cabuai le laileng zuaktu tei khunnakte vang linglet sak khawng hi
41011016	Mahten Biakinn tual a vanpua a vaak li tevang cu kham khawng hi .
41011017	Mipite cu hitihbangin hilh hi , “ Lai Thiangtho sungah Pathian in , ‘ Ka inn cu miphun hempoh tei caa in thungetnak inn tih hi tuk hi , ’ tih ngat in um hi . Mahnaven nohte cun nguca tei ngelhnak suangkua hol in bawl uh ci , ” tin ti hi .
41011018	Thiampi upate le Daanthiam ten mahthu a theih haw ten Jesuh thahtheihnak tuk lampi zei haw hi . Amuh ten Jesuh cu lau mahtak haw hi . Itahimtitale Jesuh ii thuzilh mi in mipi tei lungmu a sawh ngah leita hangin hi .
41011019	Taaklam ten Jesuh le a nungzuitute cu khuapi sung pen tul haw hi .
41011020	A zing ten zingtungin lampi a hawhlih haw laihtakin theikung cu mu haw hi .
41011021	Azik pen a zung tian thi khawng hi . Piter in phawk leh in Jesuh lakah , “ Zo hem in , Saya pa ! Na tammi theikung khi thi zo toh hi ! ” tin ti hi .
41011022	Jesuh in amu lakah in , “ Pathian muang un ! Thungangai in hilh ing hi . Kua heihihen a lungmu sungah muan helhnak nei ngawl in a tihnak bangin piang rori tuk tin a muang tatak ta cun , ‘ Hi mual hi thawn in tuiniim sungah caak hen , ati ahin caak tuk hi .
41011023	
41011024	Mahhangin hitin hilh ing hi . Thungen in na pakhakhat na nget uh ten ngah zotoh ing hi , tin um unna ngah tuk uh ci .
41011025	Mahten thungen tukin na din toh uh ten mi pakhakhat ihumah lungkim ngawlnak na neihmi uh khi ngaithiam un hi , mahten vancung aa a um na Pa uh in na sualnakte uh ngaithiam bok tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
41011026	( Midang sualnak na ngaithiam uh ma ta cun vancung aa a um na pa uh in na sualnak uh te ngaithiam bok tuk ma hi ) .
41011027	Jesuh le a nungzuite cu Jerusalem ah heng leh haw hi . Jesuh cu Biakinn sungah a hawh lih laihtakin , Thiampi upa , Daanthiam pawl le upa dangte a lakah hung in ,
41011028	Jesuh cu , “ Itibang thuneihnak tuah in kaw hitihbang thilte hi na bawl ? A kua in kaw hitihbang thu neihnakte a pia ? ” tin dong haw hi .
41011029	Mahten Jesuh in , “ Thu pakhat dong hih tung hi , na don thei uh ahitale itihbang thuneihnak in kaw hitihbang thil hi ka bawl tih hilh tung hi .
41011030	Hilh hem un ; Johan ii baptizam a piak theihnak hi a koi lak pen kaw a ngah ? Pathian ak pen maw ? Mihing lak pen kaw ? ” tin ti hi .
41011031	Amuh le muh eldun in , “ I tin ti kam nung ? Pathian lak pen a ti uh a hin , ‘ Mahtihbang ahitale aita Johan cu sang ma uh cim ? ’ tin ti tuk hi .
41011032	‘ Mihing lak pen ’ a ti uh a hin , ‘ Mipite lauhuai sih si , aitahum ti an mipi ten Johan khi kamsang hi tih thei khawng zo haw toh si , ” tin ti haw hi
41011033	Mahhangin Jesuh lakah , “ Theima ung ” tin ti haw hi . Jesuh in amu lakah in , “ Kei hei in aitibang thu neihnak in hum hitihbang thil ka bawl , tih hilh bok tuk mang , ” tin ti hi .
41012001	Mahnungten Jesuh in amuh tei lakah thu tehkipnak tuah in thu hilh hi . “ Nidanglaih in mi pakhat um in Cabit huandum bawl hi . Seen uum in cabit suuknak tuk leikhuk co in ki hunnak tuk in buukzau sa hi . Mahcengten bunlawh a nuamtu tei lakah pia ta in amah cu khualzin tuk cun hawh ta hi .
41012002	Cabit ngah a thoih hun ten ama co tuk mi la tukin a umlawh pakhattiik hi .
41012003	Huan na dektute cun a umlawh pa cu man in a vahnek ceng haw ten a khut thacang in hah haw hi .
41012004	Mahten umlawh a dangtiik lehleu hi . Huan na dektute cun a lu pen vaat in mualpho le zakcazet in bawl haw hi .
41012005	Huanneitu pa cun umlawh dangtiik lehleu hi . Mahnaven amah cu that haw hi ; umlawh dang tampi vang mahbangleng cun bawl haw hi , mi hekkhatte vaat in mi hekkhat lam te cu that haw hi .
41012006	Tiik tukin a taanglaih mite cu huan neitu pai capa bek taang hi . A dawlbel ten huan bungtu tei lakah a capa cutiik in , “ Ka capa cu maizah deuh haw tuk , ” tin ti hi .
41012007	Mahnaven mah huan bungtu te cun , “ Hi pa hi huanneitu pai capa hi hung unna that tuk hung a thil hempoh eimu taa hi tuk hi , ” tin pakhat le pakhat ti dun li haw hi .
41012008	Mahticun a capa cu man in a thah nung haw ten a luang cu huan pualam ah vawk haw hi .
41012009	“ Mah thu cu huan neitu pan i tin bawl kam ni ? ” tin Jesuh cun dong hi . “ Huan neitu pa cu hung in huan bun lawhtute cu that khawng in a huan cu huan bunglawhtu tei lakah in pia tuk hi .
41012010	Lai Thiangtho in , “ Inn satu tei imah man pha ngawl tin a lawl haw mi suang cu a dang hempohte saangin man pha bel mi suang in suak zo hi .
41012011	Mahmi cu Topai bawlmi hi aa Itihzah in zoh mawi hum , tih ngatmi khi sial awng ma uh cim ? ” tin ti hi .
41012012	Judah mi upate cun mah tehkipnak cu amuh a tihsannak tih a theih haw hangin Jesuh mat tum haw hi . Mahnaven mipite a lau haw taakcu tul in Jesuh cu hawh san haw ta hi .
41012013	Farasi mi hekkhatte le Herod ii mihing hekkhatte khi thu dotnak tuah Jesuh awk ngah tukintiik haw hi .
41012014	Jesuh lakah a hen haw ten , “ Saya pa , nangcun miten itin ti haw tuk nantim tih hei ngaisung ngawl in thumaan son ci tih thei ung hi , Mi tei mitmai zo ngawl in mingeng , mineu , nauta deidannak lungmu nei ma ci . Pathian deihnak thu maan bek mi lakah in hilh ci . Mahhangin a ciangzet in hilh in hi . Rom kumpi lak aa siah piak mi hi a daan uh in phal maw phal ma hum ? Pe tuk ung maw pe tuk ma ung kaw ? ” tin dong haw hi .
41012015	Mahnaven a tihnak haw cu Jesuh in thei in , “ Itakaw thang in awktiik na tum uh ? Ngun tangka pia hem un zo nang , ” tin ti hi .
41012016	A lakhaw ten Jesuh in a hi hi a kuai mel le min kaw ? ” tin dong hi . Amuh ten Rom kumpi pai mel le min tin don haw hi .
41012017	Mahhangin Jesuh in , “ Kumpi pai ta cu kumpi pa pia un na , Pathian ta cu Pathian na pia un hi , ” tin ti hi . Mahtin a tih ten amthong khawng haw hi .
41012018	Mahten Sadusi mi hekkhat , thihnungten kuamah tholeh um tuk ma tih a sangtu pawlten , Jesuh lakah hung haw in ,
41012019	“ Saya pa , Moses in daan a ngatsak mi sungah , ‘ Mipa pakhat cu thi in canei ngawl in a nupi a zamta bang a hin , cano nei a suah leh theih nak tukin a thihsan mi a zi cu a nau in huai tuk ; tin um hi .
41012020	Veikhat laih in unau salih um haw hi ; upabel cun zi huai in ca nei ngawl in thi hi .
41012021	A panihnak pan mahmi nu cu huai in ca nei ngawl leng cun thi bok hi . Mahtihbang bok leng cun a pathumnak pa cun mahnu cu huai naven ca nei ngawl lengin thihsan lehleu hi .
41012022	A venghawng haw cun ca nei ngawlin thi khawng haw hi . A salih haw in mahnu cu huai haw na ven , ca nei ngawlin thikhawng haw hi . A dawlbel ten numei nu vang cu thi bok ta hi .
41012023	Mahhangin mithi tei thawhleh ni ten mah nu cu a kua ii zi bel in um kam ni ? A salih haw cun huai khawng sih haw ven , ” tin dong haw hi .
41012024	Jesuh in , “ Sual tatak uh ci maw ? Aita hitin khial thei kam hung tih thei uh cim ? Lai Thiangtho hihen , Pathian ii ngilnak hihen , na theih uh ngawl hangin hi .
41012025	Itahumtiahin mithite a thawhleh haw ta cun vancung mite bang haw tuk aa , huaidun tih um leh tuk ma toh hi .
41012026	Mithi thawhlehnak thu ah cun Moses ii laibu sung aa hampa kaang thu khi sial awng ma uh cim ? Mahlai pen Pathian in Moses lakah , “ Keimah cu Abraham ii Pathian , Isak ii Pathian , Jakob ii Pathian ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
41012027	Pathian cu a nungmi pawl tei Pathian hi aa a thi mitei Pathian hi ma hi . Mahhangin khial leita uh ci , ” tin ti hi .
41012028	Mahlaiah a thuson haw mi a thei boktu Daanthiam pakhat um hi . Jesuh in Sadusi tei thudot mi Daanthiam zet tih a theih ten Jesuh lakah hung in , “ A i thukham kaw thupi bel ? ” tin dong hi .
41012029	Jesuh in , “ A ngengbel mi thukham cu , Maw Israel mite , ngai un hi ,
41012030	Topa a Pathian uh bek hi Topa hi . Topa na Pathian uh cu na lungmu hempoh , na nunnak venghawng , na ngaihsutnak uh veng hawng , le na thaazaang venghawng tuah in it in hi .
41012031	Mahten a panihnak a thupi mi thukham cu , na inn neel te khi nangmah le nangmah na it bangin it in hi , ’ tih hi hi . Hi thukham panih te saangin a thupi saw mi thukham um leh matoh hi , ” tin ti hi .
41012032	Daanthiam pa cun Jesuh lakah , “ Saya pa , na tih mi cu pha ngangai hi . Na hilhnak bangin Topa bek hi Pathian hi aa , pathian dang um ma tih cu a maan ngangai mi hi .
41012033	Mahhangin mihing ten Pathian cu a lungmu hempoh , a ngaihsutnak hempoh le a ngil nak hempoh tuah it in , ama pumpi a ih bangin a inn neelte cu it bok tuk hi . Hi thukham panih zui cu meihaal biaknak piakte saangin thupi saw hi , ” tin ti hi .
41012034	Jesuh in cihthiamnak tuah don leh hi tih a theih ten a lakah , “ Nang cu Vancung Uknak tuah khawla dun ma ci , ” tin ti hi . Mahnung ten Jesuh cu kuamah in thudong leh ngam haw ma toh hi .
41012035	Jesuh in Biakinn sungah thu a zilh lih laihtak in hi tin thu pakhat dong hi . “ Aitin kaw Daanthiam pawlten Messiah cu David casuan hi tuk hi tin a tih theih haw ?
41012036	David cu Hawvang Thiangtho in hilh in , Topan ka Topai lakah , na ngaalte na ke nuai ah ka koih maceng , ka taklam ah khung in hi , ” tin ti hi .
41012037	David amah hei in Messiah cu , ‘ Topa ’ tin a sam ahitale aitinkaw David ii casuan ahih theih tuk ? ” tin ti hi . Mitampi ten Jesuh ii thu zilhmi cu lungdam aipuangzet in ngai haw hi .
41012038	Mahtihbangin thu a zilhten Jesuh in , “ Daanthiam te khi ngaallingzet un hi . A muhten puancualpi silh in vaak nuam in , mitamnak dawl tuan ah miten upatnak tuah nuksat haw na hen tih khi deih haw hi .
41012039	Pumkhawmnak ahcun khunnak phabelte ham in puai bawlnak mun ah mun phabelte teng haw hi .
41012040	Meivongte khi a miat zeinak in mangin , a inn haw te ngan khi lonsak haw hi . Mahten miten mu haw nahen tin ngei zezette in thu ngen haw hi . Daantatnak a tawh haw tuk mi cu midang tei tawh tuk mi saangin na sia saw tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
41012041	Jesuh cu Biakinn ngun tangka koihnak el ahcun khung in mitei sum khiak ngun tangka a piak lih haw laih khi zo leng hi . Milian tampi ten ngun tangka tampi khia haw hi .
41012042	Mahten mizawngzet mi numei nu hungin pia nga hawng man mi ngun tangka paisa san no panih cu khia bok hi .
41012043	A nungzuite khi munkhat ah sam khawm in amu lakah cun , “ Thungangai in hilh ing hi , hi mizawngzet numei nun sumpi khiaknak kuang sungah midang hempohte saangin tam bel khia hi .
41012044	Itahimtitale midangte cu a neihmi haw sung pen a vaal mi khia haw hi . Mahnaven hi numei nu cun zawngzet naven a neihmi hempoh in khia hi ; ama pumcawmnak tuk in a man tuk mi hempoh pia khawng hi , ” tin ti hi .
41013001	Jesuh cu Biakinn pen a tul laihtakin a nungzuitu pakhat in , ‘ Saya pa , zo hem in ! Hi inn le suang tei ngengdaante hi maksan thong si ! ’ tin ti hi .
41013002	Jesuh in , “ Hi a maksan a lamdang mi inn hi mu ci . Hi suang ngengpite hi pakhat nohei a umnak keel ah a um haw ngawlnak tuk hun heng tuk aa , a venghawngin cimkhawng leh tuk lai hi , ” tin ti hi .
41013003	Jesuh cu , Biakinn ngaal Olif mualah khungin mahlaiah cun Piter , Johan le Andru te cu kuamah ii theih ngawlin hung kuh haw hi .
41013004	Mah hun cu ituk ten tuk kaw ? Hilh hem in ! mah hun hengpal tuk tih theih tupnak tukin a i melciknakte um tuk kaw ? tin dong haw hi .
41013005	Jesuh in amuh tei lakah , “ Ngaalling zet un ! Kuamah in zol ngah haw pahsuh hen . Mi tampi keima min in hung haw tuk aa ,
41013006	Keimah cu Jesuh toh ing hi , tin mi tampi zol ngah haw tuk hi . Lam naino ah ngaaldonak thawm le ngam khawlapi ah ngaaldo dun nak thawmvangte na theih uh ten thinsu in lau pahsuh un . Mahtihbangte cu heng tuk hi .
41013007	
41013008	Mahnaven hunbonak tuk hi ma laih hi . Ngam khat le ngam khat , uknak pakhat le pakhat dodun haw tuk , khua hempoh ah hiinhiing tuk aa , paamnak vang heng tuk hi . Mahbangte cu numei naunei tuk vonna pan bang hi .
41013009	“ Nangmuh hihim ngaalling un . Man haw tuk aa , zungah in hawhpih haw tuk hi . Pumkhawm innte pen vaat haw tuk hi ; keima hangin hotu le kumpi tei mai ah dingtiik haw tuk hi . Mahmi hun cu ka Thuthangpha na hilhnak uh hun hi tuk hi .
41013010	Mahnaven hun bo laih ngawl in thuthangpha cu mi phun hempoh tei lakah hilh hi tuk hi .
41013011	Mahten man in zungah a het haw ten ai tin heng ka don tuk tin , a laihngawl in thinsu pah suh uh . A hun a hen ten na hilh tuk uh mi cu theihtiik hi tuk uh ci . Itahimtitale na hilh tuk uh , na ot uh mi cu nangmu ot hi tuk ma hi ; Hawvang Thiangtho ii hilh mi hi tuk hi .
41013012	Unau le unau thihnak tian in zuakdun haw tuk hi . Mahbangbok leng cun pa ten a ca haw tei hum ah bawlbok haw tuk hi . Caten a nu le pate do in thihnak tian in hengtiik haw tuk hi .
41013013	Keimah hangin nohte cu mi hempoh in hua haw tuk hi . Mahnaven a dawlbel tian a thuak a nang theitu ten nunpatnak ngah haw tuk hi .
41013014	Mulzakhuai thilnawngkai a dinnak tuk ngawl munah a din khi mu tuk uh ci .
41013015	Inn kuulhuum aa a um ten a ken tuk mi thil la tuk in inn sungah tolh pahsuh hen ,
41013016	lo ah a um ten a puan la tukin inn ah pin pahsuh hen .
41013017	Numei naupaai le naukai nei numei tei caa cun haksa ngangai tuk hi .
41013018	Mahmi haksatnakte cu phalbi laihtak in a hen khak tuk ngawlnak in Pathian lakah thungen un hi .
41013019	Aitahimtitale hi thil a heng tuk mi hi Pathian ii leipi a piantiik penpan in tu tian a um awng ngawl mi haksatnak hi tuk hi . Mailam i tuk mah hei ten a heng leh awng tuk ngawl toh mi hi .
41013020	Topan mahmi ni cu comtiik zotoh hi . A comtiik ngawl bang ta ahin kuamah in thuak zo haw tuk ma hi . Mahnaven a tensa mitei caa cun mahmi ni cu comtiik tuk hi .
41013021	Mahhangin mi pakhakhat in , “ Zo hem un ! Hilai hah Khrih um , hilai khah Khrih um , ” tin a ti vang in sang pahsuh un hi .
41013022	Itahimtitale Messiah maan ngawl le naal kamsang tampi piang haw tuk hi . Pathian ii tensa mite nangawn zol theih tawp zol tukin thasiahhuai le nalamdang tampi bawl haw tuk hi .
41013023	ngaalling un ! A laihngawl in hilh ham khawng zotoh ing hi .
41013024	Mahmi haksatnak hun nung ten nithim tuk aa , hade vang vaak tuk ma hi .
41013025	Van pen aksite caak tuk aa , van aa a um huham hempoh te khi hing tuk hi .
41013026	Mahten Mihing Capa cu lang tuk aa vaaknak le sunloihnak tuah in meingo hum pen hung tuk hi .
41013027	Leihum mawkkhat lam pen mawk khat lam tian aa a ummi Pathian ii tensa mite cawmkhawm tukin lei ningli ah vancung mitetiik tuk hi .
41013028	“ Theikung pen ngaallinnak cung un , A kangte hing in , a zik kuhkum in , a ceh dawn note a tawt ten khuakhaal hun nai zo tih thei uh ci .
41013029	Mahtihbang thilte na muh uh ten hun nai zo , heng awndiak toh tih khi thei un hi .
41013030	Hilai aa a um mite a thih khawng haw laih ngawl in hi thil hempohte heng khawng tuk hi tih khi phawkngil pahsuh un .
41013031	Van le lei cu bo tuk naven ka awnkam cu bothong hihim tuk ma hi .
41013032	Mahnaven ituk ten mah ni le mah hun heng tuk tih cu kuamah in thei haw ma hi . Van mite hei in thei haw ma hi . Capa vangin thei ma hi .
41013033	Pa bek in thei hi . Ituk ten a hun heng tuk hum tih na theih uh ngawl hangin ngaalling le cingcai no in um un hi .
41013034	Ai tuah bangve hum ti a hin mi pakhat khualzin tuk tul in a umlawhte khi a nadeh haw tuk celzet le kimzet in thu pia ta in , kongka cingtu pa vang hihbu sung ngawlin , kongka a cing tiiktu inn neipa bang hi .
41013035	Inn neitu bawi cu ituk ten heng tuk tih na theih uh ngawl hangin ngaalling zetin um un hi . Zanlam heihithei , zanngil heihithei , khuavak laihngawl heihithei , nisuak zawng hei ten hihen hithei hi .
41013036	Ngaihsut khak ngawlpi in a heng ahitale hihbu thong in tawk ma hen .
41013037	Nohtei lakah ka hilhmi hi , mi hempoh tei lakah a hilh hitoh ing hi ; Ngaalling in um un , ” tin Jesuh in ti hi .
41014001	Kaltan Puai le naman tel ngawl cangho puai a kimnak tuk ninih bek in sam hi . Thiampi upa le Daanthiam pawl ten Jesuh khi a kuhno in man deen in thahtheihnak tuk lampi zei haw hi .
41014002	Mahnaven , “ Puai hun sung cun bawl tuk ma hung , mipite buai bengbungtiik kha hawkawn , ” tin ti haw hi .
41014003	Jesuh cu Bethani khua aa phaaknat a thuaktu Simon inn ahcun um in an a eih laihtakin numei nun alabaster thawl pakhat , a manhakzet mi zimui tui a dim cu cawi hi . Mahmi thawl cu sukeh in zimui tui cu Jesuh ii lu ah leih hi .
41014004	Mahlai aa a um mite cun thin-uuk in , “ Pamhei zet si maw ?
41014005	Zimui cu ngun tangka zathum hum in zuak in mah tangka cun mi ca-ngahte bawm ahin phasaw tuk ma maw ? ” tin pakhat le pakhat tidun in numei nu cu mawhsiat li haw hi .
41014006	Mahten Jesuh in , “ Imamah ti pahsuh un ! Ai ta dondak kha li uh cim ?
41014007	Mi ca-ngahte cu a kumkhua nangmu lakah um haw tuk poh hi , na nuam uh a hi tacun i tuk pawpoh hei ten bawm thei uh ci .
41014008	Mahnaven kei cu nohtei lakah um leleng tuk mang hi . Ama tihtheih tawk in bawl zotoh hi . Keimah phum tukin tuangtim ham zo hi .
41014009	Thungangai in hilh ing hi . Leihum hempoh , Thuthangpha a phuannak haw hempoh ah hi a bawlmi hi amah theihlengnak in son leleng haw tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
41014010	Mahten nungzui sawm le panih lakpen pakhat Juda Iskariot cu
41014011	Jesuh zuaktuk in Thiampi upa tei lakah hawh hi . Amu lakah a otmi a theih haw ten a lunghaw damzet in tangka piak tukin thutiam haw hi . Mahten Juda cun Jesuh cu zuak ngah in amu khut sungah a hen theihnak tukin hun lemcaang bek caang hi .
41014012	Naman tel ngawl cangho puai , nikhatnak ni Kaltan Puai andonak tuk in Tuuno te a ngawh ni haw in nungzui ten , “ Ilai munah kaw Kaltan Puai taakeih ka tuangtip sak tuk uh na deih ? ” tin Jesuh cu dong haw hi .
41014013	Mahten Jesuh cun mi panihtiik in hitihbangin thucah hi . “ Khua sungah hawh ta unna , tuithawl tuah tui cawitu pa tawk tuk uh ci .
41014014	Amah cu zui unna , a tumnak inn neitu pai lakah , ‘ Saya pa le a nungzuite Kaltan Puai taakeih a eih khawmnak haw tuk inn khaan ilai khi hum tih dong un hi , ’ tin ti hi .
41014015	Mahten a mun humta khaan ngengpi lak haw tuk hi . I hempoh phano in le cangkim zetin tuangtipsa mi khaan hi tuk aa , mahlaiah cun taakeih eih khawmnak tukin bawl un , ” tin ti hi .
41014016	Nungzuite cu hawh in khua sung a hen haw ten Jesuh ii hilhhamsa bangin i hempoh a mansa khawng in mu haw hi . Mahlaiah cun Kaltan Puai taakeih cu bawl haw hi .
41014017	Taaklam ten Jesuh cu a nungzui sawm le panihte tuah heng haw hi .
41014018	Cabuai ah an a eih haw laihtak in , “ Thungangai in hilh ing hi . Nangmu lak pen keimah tuah an a ei langkhattu pan keimah zuak tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
41014019	Nungzuitu te cu thinnop ngawlzet in pakhat nung pakhat , “ Na tih nuammi cu keimah poh hi kha ing maw ? ” tin dong tek haw hi .
41014020	Jesuh in , “ Nangmu sawm le panih lakah a tel bok mi ; keimah tuah kuang pakhat sung aa cangho a nimtu pa hi tuk hi .
41014021	Mihing Capa cu thihnak thuak tuk , tin Lai Thiangtho sungah a tih bangin thi tuk hi . Mahnaven Mihing Capa a zuaktu pai ca cun a lauhuai mullinghahzet hi . Mahpa cu piang ngawlin a um ta ahin ama caa in pha saw tuk ta naven , ” tin ti hi .
41014022	Taakeih a eih haw laih takin cangho la in thu a nget celhten bot kek in , a nungzui tei lakah pia hi . “ La un , hi hi , ka taksa hi , ” tin ti hi .
41014023	Mahnungten khuat la in Pathian lakah lungdamnak a sat ceng ten amu lakah pia in , a venghawng haw cun in haw hi .
41014024	“ Hi hi mi tampi tei caa in ka sungpen a luangtul mi ka thisan hi ;
41014025	Pathian thutepmi a kho tiiktu ka thisan hi . Thungangai in hilh ing hi . Vancung Uknak sung aa cabit thak ka in leh tian hi cabit hi in leh tuk ma toh ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
41014026	La a sak nung haw ten tul in Olif mual ah hawh haw hi .
41014027	Jesuh in amu lakah , “ Naveng hawng un keimah zam tuk uh ci ; itahimtitale Lai Thiangtho sungah , ‘ Pathian in tuukhaaltu cu that tuk aa , tuute cu vak keh khawng haw tuk hi , ” tin ngatsa in um hi .
41014028	Mahnaven thihnak pen ka thawhleh nung ten nangmu masuan Galilee ah hawh tung hi , ” tin ti hi .
41014029	Piter in , “ Midang ten a taaisan khawng haw vangin , kei cun taaisan hihim tuk mang hi , ” tin ti hi .
41014030	Jesuh in Piter cu , “ Thungangai in hilh ing hi ; tuzan ak veinih khuanglai ngawlin veithum tian , ‘ thei mang hi ’ tin nial tuk ci , ” tin ti hi .
41014031	Piter cun na sia seseem in , “ Nangmah tuah thi bok tuk ka hihei in mahtihbangcun awn hihim tuk mang hi , ” tin ti hi . Nungzuitu dangte vang cun mahbangbok leng in ti haw hi .
41014032	Gethsemane tihmi mun ah heng haw in Jesuh in a nungzui tei lakah , “ Ka thunget sung hilai ah um un hi , ” tin ti hi .
41014033	Piter , Jeim le Johan tei lakah
41014034	thinhaksa le thasiazet in , “ Ka lungsia leita in a keh tuk bangin um hi . Hilai ah um unna , hihbu ngawl in ngak un hi , ” tin ti hi .
41014035	A cangthei tuk ahitale mah haksatnak cu a tawk kha tuk ngawl in ngen hi . Mai lam ah dem laik hawh in lei ah bok in thu ngen hi .
41014036	Ka pa , Maw Ka pa ! Nangcaa cun i hempoh cang thei khawng hi . Hi thuaknak khuat hi ka lak pen la zazal in hi . Mahnaven kei deihnak bang hi ngawl in nangma deihnak bang hi ta hen , ” tin ti hi .
41014037	Mahten kik leh in nungzuitu pathum tei hihbu leng khi mu hi . Piter lakah , “ Simon hihbu leng cim ? Nazi pakhat sung no hei hihbu ngawl in um thei ma uh cim maw ? ” tin ti hi .
41014038	Mahten amu lakah cun , “ Hihbu ngawlin ngak unna , sualsohnak sungah caak tuk ngawlin thungen un hi . Na lungmu uh cun deih naven , taksa uh thanem hi , ” tin ti hi .
41014039	Jesuh cu hawh lehleu in a masa bangleng cun thungen leh hi .
41014040	Mahten kik lehleu in a nungzuite hihbu khawng khi mu hi . A mit haw hakto thei haw ma hi , i tin don tuk him tih hei thei haw ma hi .
41014041	A veithumnak a kih leh ten amuh tei lakah cun , “ Hihbu laih uh cim ? Cawlleng thei laih uh cim ? Tawk hen . A hun heng zotoh hi ! Zo un ! Mihing Capa cu misual tei khut ah piak hi zotoh hi ! Tho unna , hawh nung hi .
41014042	Zo un , keimah zuaktu pa khi heng zotoh hi ! ” tin ti hi .
41014043	Jesuh cu a ot lih laihtak in nungzui sawm le panih tei lakah a tel bokmi Juda cu heng hi . Juda tuah munkhat in thiampi upate , Daanthiamte le Judah upa pawl teitiik mi mi honpite cu ngaalnaam le tembeekte cawi in hung haw hi .
41014044	Mi zuaktu pa cun mipite cu melciknak pia zotoh in , “ Ka napmi pa cu na mat nuam uh mipa hi tuk hi . Amah cu man in phano in cing unna hawhpih ta un , ” tin ti hi .
41014045	Juda cun a hen bek ten Jesuh cu zuan in , “ Saya pa ” tin nam hi .
41014046	Mahtihcun Jesuh cu man in khimzet in keen haw hi .
41014047	Mahlaihtak in a el haw ah a ding mi pakhat cun a naam cu dawk in Thiampi Saang ii umlawh pai beng cu satvawk hi .
41014048	Mahten Jesuh in , “ Kei hi nguca ing maw naam le tembeek tuah na hun uh ?
41014049	A nisial in Biakinn ah thu ka zilh lihlaih khin kuamah in man ma si uh si . Hizuh hi , Lai Thiangtho sung aa thu cu a kim kuul hi , ” tin ti hi .
41014050	Mahten a nungzui hempoh ten zamsan khawng haw hi .
41014051	Tangval no pakhat puan pano silhmi pan Jesuh cu zui hi . Amah vang cu mat tum haw hi .
41014052	Mahnaven a puan cu zam in a thacang in taaivawk ta hi .
41014053	Jesuh cu Thiampi Saang pai inn ahcun pui haw in mahlai ah thiampi upate , upa dangte le , Daanthiamte tuah tawkdun khawm haw hi .
41014054	A khawlathim pen Piter in zui in Thiampi Saang ii inntual ah tum hi . Inntual aa ngaalviltu tei lakah cun khung in meiawi hi .
41014055	Thiampi upate le thukhentu khonsil upa ten Jesuh cu a that nuam in a sualnak zei li haw naven mu zo haw ma hi .
41014056	Mi tampi ten zol thu polcop in Jesuh sual nawn haw hi , mahnaven a thu haw cun thei ma hi .
41014057	Mahten mi hekkhatte dingto in ,
41014058	Hipan , “ Mihing sakmi hi Biakinn hi phia khawngtung aa , nithum nungten mihing bawlngawl mi Biakinn sa tung ’ a tih thei ung , ” tin Jesuh cu zolthu nawn haw hi .
41014059	Mahtibang ahita vangin a thu haw cun thei cuang ma hi .
41014060	A venghawng haw tei maiah Thiampi Saang cu ding to in , Jesuh cu thu dong hi . “ Sual a not haw hi thei ma cim ? ” tin ti hi .
41014061	Mahnaven Jesuh cu daiden no in um in kam khat no hei don ma hi . Mahten Thiampi Saang cun , “ Sunloihmi Pathian Capa aa cim maw ? ” tin dong lehleu hi .
41014062	Jesuh in , “ Hi ing hi , Mihing Capa cu Cungnungbel Pathian taklam ah khung in vancung meingo tuah a hun leh mu tuk uh ci , ” tin ti hi .
41014063	Mahten Thiampi Saang cun a puan botkeek in , “ Thu theitu a dang hei kul leh matoh hi .
41014064	Pathian a nautat zia cu thei khawng zotoh uh ci ! Itin ngaisung uh cim ? ” tin ti hi .
41014065	Mi hekkhat ten Jesuh cu cilsiak haw hi . Amit hup in vat haw hi . “ A vattu akua him ? hilh in , ” ti haw hi , mahte'n ngaalkap ten hawhpih in beng pepel haw hi .
41014066	Piter cu Thiampi Saang pai inn tual a um laih in Thiampi Saang ii umlawh nu pakhat cu hung hi .
41014067	Piter cu meiawi leng a muh ten cangcianzet no zo in , “ Nangmah vang Nazereth mi Jesuh tuah a um langkhat mi hi ci , ” tin ti hi .
41014068	Mahnaven Piter in phadeen in , “ Thei kha mang , na otmi cu a i thu him tih thei mang hi , ” tin ti hi . Mahtihcun kongkal lampi ahcun thawn hi . Mahbekten ak khuang hi .
41014069	Umlawh nu cun mu lehleu in a eel aa mitei lakah , “ Hipa vang amu lakah telmi bok pah cuh ! ” tin ti lehleu hi
41014070	Mahnaven Piter cun eel leleng hi , a ngei ngawl no in a eelkim aa ding pawlten Piter cu , “ Kei tel kha mang tin nial thei hihim tuk ma ci ; itahimtitale nangmah vang Galilee mi ci , ” tin ti haw hi .
41014071	Mahten Piter cun , “ Siatcam in thukam ing hi , ka hilhmi hi a maanmi hi . A maan ma ahitale Pathian in bawlsia hen . Na tih uh mi pa khi thei kha mang hi , ” tin ti hi .
41014072	Mahbekten a veinihnak ak khuang in Piter cu Jesuh in ak veinih a khuan laih ngawl in veithum tian , “ Theimang hi ” tin phadeen tuk ci a tihmi khi thei leh in nasiazet in kap hi .
41015001	Ziingtuung no in Thiampi upate cu upa dangte , Daanthiamte , le thukhentu khonsil upate tuah manlangzet in tawkdun in , thu ngaisung khawm haw hi . Jesuh cu taicin khau tuah khih in hawh pih haw hi . Mahten Pilat khut ahcun hen haw hi .
41015002	Pilat in , “ Judah kumpipa cim ? ” tin dong hi . Jesuh in , “ Na tihnak bang zuh ing hi , ” tin don hi .
41015003	Thiampi upa pawl ten Jesuh cu sual a phuphun in nawn haw hi .
41015004	Mahhangin Pilat in , “ Athu haw hi don tuk ma cim ? Sual a notnak haw hempohte hi ngai hem in , ” tin ti lehleu hi .
41015005	Jesuh cu a ot nuam leleng ngawl hangin Pilat cu amthong hi .
41015006	Kaltan Puai bawl sial in Pilat in thawngta mi lak pen mipi tei ngetmi cu a hahsak daan hi .
41015007	Mahlaihtak cun Barabbas a tih haw mithatpa ngaalthotiik theipa cu ngaalthotiik thei a dangte tuah in thawngah khia haw hi .
41015008	Mipite cu tul haw in kumsial a bawl awngsa leng haw bang cun thawngta suah tuk vang cu Pilat lakah dong haw hi .
41015009	Pilat in , “ Nohtei ca in Judah Kumpi pa hah hen tih deih aa uh cim maw ? ” tin dong hi .
41015010	Jesuh a lakah a hentiik nak haw cu Thiampi upa ten Jesuh a halhsiiknak haw hangin hi tih Pilat in ciangzet in thei hi .
41015011	Mahnaven Thiampi ten mipite cu Barabbas hah saw in tin Pilat lakah ngen tukin so haw hi .
41015012	Pilat cun dong lehleu in , “ Mah tih bang a hi tale Judah Kumpi pa na tihmi uh hi itin bawl tuk kaw na deih uh ? ” tin dong hi .
41015013	Amuh ten , “ Thinglamteh humah that in hi tin au haw hi . ”
41015014	“ Ai sualnak kaw a bawl ? ” tin Pilat cun dong lehleu hi . “ Thinglamteh ah that in hi ” tin nasia seseem in au haw hi .
41015015	Pilat in mipi tei lungdam tuk a deih man in amu caa cun Barabbas cu hah hi . Mahten Jesuh cu vattiik in thinglamteh ah that tukin amu khut ah pia hi .
41015016	Ngaalkap ten Jesuh cu mangki bawipai inn tual ah tumpih haw in , mipi dangte vang cu sam bok haw hi .
41015017	Jesuh cu puansan silhtiik in ling tuah bawlmi lukhu cu a lu ah khutiik haw hi .
41015018	Mahten salaam pia haw in , “ Judah Kumpipa a nun khua sauzal tahen , ” tin au haw hi .
41015019	A lu pen ngolh in vaat in , cilsiak in , khukdin in , a mai pen a luhaw kun haw hi .
41015020	Mahtihcun a zotsak celh haw teh puansan a silh tiikmi haw cu duuk leh in ama puan leng cu silh lehtiik haw hi . Mahten thinglamteh ah khet tukin hawhpih haw hi .
41015021	Lampi pen Simon a tihmi pa tawk haw hi . Amah cu khuano pen khuapi ah a hung mi pa hi , ngaalkap ten Jesuh ii thinglamteh cu puatiik lo haw hi . ( Simon cu Sairin khua mi Alexander le Rufus tei capa hi . )
41015022	Jesuh cu Golgotha tihmi mun ah hawhpih haw hi . ( Golgotha cu lu-nguh mun ) tihnak hi .
41015023	Mahlaiah cun cabit tui Marrh a tih haw sikha tuah cawhhelsa mi pia haw hi .
41015024	Mahnaven Jesuh cun in nuam ma hi . Mahnungten thinglamteh ah khen haw in a puan cu awngbali sawk in sem haw hi .
41015025	Mahtin a khet haw cu zinglam nazi kuah hi .
41015026	A sual not nak haw lai cu , “ Judah Kumpi pa , ” tihmi hi .
41015027	Amah tuah munkhat in nguca panih , a taklam ah pakhat , a veilam ah pakhat that cih bok haw hi .
41015028	( Lai Thiangtho in misual tei lakah amah cu telhcih haw hi , tihmi a kimnak tuk in hi . )
41015029	Mi vaaktuakte vang cun aancim tin thincim in a lu haw saat in zawnsak haw hi . “ Nangmah cu Biakinn phialet in nithum sung in a sa leh thei tuk pa hi sisi maw ?
41015030	Atu in thinglamteh hum pen tolh inna , nangmah le nangmah pan cop in hi ! ” tin ausan li haw hi .
41015031	Mahtihbangbok leng in Thiampi upate le Daanthiam pawlten Jesuh cu nuihsan in “ Midangte luan thei naven amah le mah luan cop thei ma hi , ” tin zawnsak haw hi .
41015032	Israel Kumpi pa Messiah cu thinglamteh hum pen atu rori in a tolh suk khi mu le hung mahtale sang tuk hung hi tin pakhat le pakhat ti dun li haw hi .
41015033	Sun laihtak in mah ngam buppi ah nazi pathum sung thimzingtung hi .
41015034	Taaklam nazi pathum ten Jesuh cu , “ Eloi , Eloi , Lama Sabakthani , ” tin nasia zet in au hi . Asullam cu ka Pathian , Ka Pathian , ita kei zamsan cim ? ” tih nak hi .
41015035	Mahlai aa a ummi hekkhat ten za haw in , “ Ngai hem un , Elijah sam hi ! ” tin ti haw hi .
41015036	Mi pakhat cu tai vingveng in puansia khi cabit tui sungah nim in pumpeng leekah a keen ceng ten Jesuh muk ah cun noih hi , “ Ngak hih hem un ! hinglamteh hum pen a khia suk tukin Elijah hung maw hung ma hum tih zo hih nung ? ” tin ti haw hi .
41015037	Jesuh cu nging pin a au celh ten thi suk ta hi .
41015038	Mahbekten Biakinn puanzaak cu a lu lam pen a taw lam tian khennih in bal kek hi .
41015039	Thinglamteh mai ah a dingtu ngaalbawi pan Jesuh ii thih khi a muh ten , “ Hipa hi Pathian Capa ngangai hi , ” tin ti hi .
41015040	Mahlai aa numei hekkhat pawlte cu Mary Magdalin , Jeim nau ta saw le Josef ii nu Mary le Salome te haw hi .
41015041	Jesuh tuah in Jerusalem ah a hengmi numei dang tampite vang um dalh bok haw hi .
41015042	Taaklam ten Arimathea khua mi Josef khi heng hi . Amah cu thukhentu khonsil upa lak pen upazet mi sungtel hi aa , Vancung Uknak a hengtukmi khi a ngakhel zet tupa hi . Mahni cu tuangtip ni hi . ( Sabbath ni heng laihngawl tawngkai ninga ni hi . ) Mahhangin Josef cu ngaalphazet in Pilat lakah tum in Jesuh ii luang khi ngen hi .
41015043	
41015044	Pilat in Jesuh cu thi zotoh tih a theih ten lamdangsa mahtak hi .
41015045	Ngaal bawipa cu sam in , “ Jesuh cu a thihnak ngei toh maw ? ” tin dong hi . Jesuh cu thi ciang zo tih ngaal bawipai lak pen a theih ten Pilat in Jesuh ii luang cu Josef latiik hi .
41015046	Josef cun puan neemno lei in Jesuh ii luang cu thinglamteh hum pen la suk in puanneem no in a tuam celhten suangpi kuat mi khan sungah cun phum hi . Mahten suang phengpi in khaan cu a khaak taa in zam hi .
41015047	Mary Magdalin le Josef nu Mary ten a eel pen zo bok haw in Jesuh luang a koihnak haw cu mu bok haw hi .
41016001	Sabbath ni ceng a zingten Mary Magdalin , James ii nu Mary le Salome cun Jesuh luang noih tukin zimui lei haw hi .
41016002	Nipi zing nisuak ten khaan ahcun hawh haw hi .
41016003	Lampi a hawh thah haw laih cun , “ A kua bel in khaan kongkhah suangpi nawm zo tuk kam hung ? ” tin pakhat le pakhat dongdun li haw hi . ( Mah suangpi cu suangpeek ngengpi hi ) Mahten a zo haw ten khaan kongkhah honsa in mu haw hi .
41016004	
41016005	Khaan sungah cun tum haw in tangval pakhat puanngo silh taklam siik ah a khung leng khi mu haw in lau mahtak haw hi .
41016006	Aman , “ Lau pahsuh un ! Thinglamteh ah a thah haw mi Nazereth Jesuh zei uh ci tih thei ing hi . Hilai ah um leh matoh tho leh zo hi . A koihnak haw mun hi zo un hi .
41016007	Tuin hawh ta unna a nungzuitu te le Piter cu ama hilh hamsa bang kek khin , ‘ nangmu masuan Galilee ah hawh in mahlai mun ah mu tuk uh ci , ’ tin hilh ta un , ” tin ti hi .
41016008	Mahten khaan pen thinsu le lauthah cun tul in taai haw hi . A lau leita haw taak kuamah lakah imah thu hei son haw ma hi .
41016009	Nipi ni in thihnak pen Jesuh a thawhleh nung ten a masabel in Mary Magdalin lakah in lang hi ; Mary Magdalin cu a sung pen khuasia salih a hawlvawk sakmi nu khi hi .
41016010	Mary Magdalin cu hawh in a ngualcamte cu hilh hi . Mah mite cu Jesuh a thih hangin lungsia khawngai in kap li haw hi .
41016011	“ Jesuh nungleh zo , mu ing hi , ” tin a hilhmi khi sang haw ma hi .
41016012	Mahnungten nungzuitu panih khuano lamah a hawh lih haw laih in phun dang in amu lakah lang hi .
41016013	Kik leh in midang tei lakah hilh haw hi . Mahnaven amuhte vang in sang haw ma hi .
41016014	A nungdawlbel Jesuh cu nungzuitu sawm le pakhatte an a eih laihtak haw in amu lakah lang hi . Upnak a neih haw ngawl hangin le amah a nungleh in a mutu tei son mite a up haw ngawl hangin liat hi .
41016015	Mahten amuh tei lakah , “ Leihum khua le ngam hempoh ah hawh ta unna , mi hempoh tei lakah lungdamnak Thuthangpha hilh ta un .
41016016	A kuakua heihihen um in baptizam-nak a ngahtu pawpoh cu nunpat hi haw tuk hi . Mahnaven a sangngawlte cu sual thaman thihnak thuak haw tuk hi .
41016017	A umtute cu nalamdang bawl theihnak huham piak hi haw tuk hi . Ka min in ngamhuai hawlvawk thei haw tuk hi ; awnthak in awn haw tuk hi .
41016018	Ngul a mat haw ten hihen , thihsi a in haw ten heihihen , imamah poisa haw tuk ma hi . Mina hum ah a khut haw te nga in minate vang damtiik haw tuk hi .
41016019	Topa Jesuh cu amu lakah thu a hilh ceng ten vancung ah laak toh in um hi . Mahten Pathian taklam ah khung hi .
41016020	Mahten nungzuitu te cu hawh in , ngam hempoh ah thu hilh haw hi . Topa cu amu lakah nadek in , nalamdang tampi a bawlmi haw in maan hi tih khi langtiik hi .
42001001	Ka ihmi Theofilas , Mi tampi ten ohtei laklawh aa a piangmi thute a pha thei tawp in ngan haw hi .
42001002	Hi thu a ngat haw ten a piangmi thu a tawpat penpan mit tuah a mutute le mahmi thu a hilhtu tei hilhnak bangkeekin a-ngatmi haw hi .
42001003	Mahhangin Bawipa aw , kei hei in hi thu te a tawpat pen pan ka dot cangcian nung ten nangma ca tukin pakhat nung pakhat ka ngan ahin pha tuk hi tin ngaisung ing hi .
42001004	A hilh hawmi thu le a zilh hawmi thute cangkim no in na theih ciang theihnak tukin hi lai hi kuat ing hi .
42001005	Herod cu Judea ngam kumpi bawi a deh laih in Abijah thiampi phun sung aa a telbokmi thiampi Zekhariah tih pa na um hi . A zi cu Aaron Elizabeth hi .
42001006	A panih haw in Pathian maiah nuncan pha in a nung mi hi haw hi . Topai piakmi daan le thute hempoh khi pha no in zui haw hi .
42001007	Elizabeth cu a ciing ahihnak bangin nau nei haw ma hi . A nupa haw in teekzet zo haw hi .
42001008	Veikhat in Zakhariah cu ni sial a nadeh huncaan kimin Pathian biakinn sungah thiampi na dek hi .
42001009	Thiampi pawl tei zuimi daan bangin biaklaandawh humah paaknamtui haaltu tuk ama caan a kim bangbokin Biakinn sungah tum hi .
42001010	Paaknamtui haal hun ten Biakinn pawleu lam aa a-um pawlte cu thungen haw hi .
42001011	Vancung mi pakhat cu a lakah lang in paaknamtui haalnak taklam ah ding hi .
42001012	Zekhariah in a muh ten a thinsu in lau hi .
42001013	Mahnaven vancung mi in , “ Zekhariah aw lau pahsun ! Pathian in na thungetnak cu sang zotoh hi . Na zi Elizabeth in capa hing tuk hi . Amin cu Johan tin sa tuk ci .
42001014	Na capa a hin ten na lungdamzet tuk ci . Midang tampi te vang lungdamzet bok haw tuk hi .
42001015	Amah cu Topai mai pen mi thawmngeng ngangai pakhat hi tuk hi . Cabit tui le a nguithei zu te in ngawlin , a nui pum sung hihim pen Hawvang Thiangtho tuah dim tuk hi .
42001016	Israel mi tampi te a Topa a Pathian haw ii lakah kik lehtiik tuk hi .
42001017	Topai mai aa a hawhhamtu kamtai pa hi tuk ama kamsangpa Elijah bangin thacak le thil tithei zet na hi tuk hi . Pa te le capa te khi lemduntiik leh tuk hi . Thu mangngawl mite cu mi dikcang tei ngaihsutnak lampi ah in pui leh tuk hi . Topai mihing te cu Topai ca in tuangtim mi mihing hi thei tukin bawl tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
42001018	Zekhariah in Vancung mi ii lakah , “ Na hilh bangkeek in hi ngangai tuk hi tih cu itibangin thei tuk hing ngim ? Kei cu teekzet zotoh ing , ka zi vang teekzet bok zotoh hi ” tin don hi .
42001019	Mahticun Vancung mi in , “ Kei cu Gabriel ing hi . Pathian mai aa a ding leleng mi ing hi . Pathian in hi lungdamnak Thuthangpha nangmah hilh tukintiik hi .
42001020	Mahnaven ka thu hilhmi sang kha ma ci , na sang kha ngawl tavang cun a huncaan a kim ten ka hilhmi thu cu kim tuk hi ; Na san zawh ngawl hangin na lak aa ka thu hilh mi a hen kim laklawh awn thei tuk ma ci , ” tin ti hi .
42001021	Hi hun sung hempoh cu mi honpi ten Zekhariah cu ngakleng haw hi . Biakinn sungah ita tutian um leng nantim tin lamdangsamahtak haw hi .
42001022	Biakinn sung pen a tul ten awn thei ngawlin um a muh haw ten Biakinn sungah muhnak nei hi tih thei haw hi . Awnkam khat no hei awn thei ngawlin khut tuah in thuson hi .
42001023	Biakinn sungah nadeh a celh ten Zekhariah cu inn ah pin hi .
42001024	A nung ten a zi Elizabeth cu thacang ngawl in ha nga sung pikpek pualam tul ngawlin um hi .
42001025	Elizabeth in , “ A tawpnak in Topan kei bawm hi , mipi mai aa ka zahcaaknak seelsak hi ” tin ti hi .
42001026	Elizabeth ii naupaai a ha luknak ten Pathian in vancung mi Gabriel cu Galilee peng Nazareth khua ah hawhtiik hi .
42001027	Kumpi bawi David ii cikhaih Josef tuah huaidun tukin thawlthan sa khanglai nui lakah thu pakhat hilhtiik hi . Mah mi khanglai nui min cu Mary hi .
42001028	Vancung mi cu a lakah hungin , “ Na humah daihnak um ta hen ! Topa cu na lakah um hi . Thupha Muicu tampi pia zotoh hi , ” tin ti hi .
42001029	Vancung mi ii thu hilh a zakten Mary cu a thinkham mahtak hi . A i tihnak nantim tin lamdangsazet hi .
42001030	Vancung mi in , “ Mary , lau pahsun hi ! Pathian in na humah hehpihnak nei hi .
42001031	Naupaai tuk ci , capa hing tuk ci . A min Jesuh sa tuk ci .
42001032	Amah cu mi thawmlian hi tuk aa Cungnungbel Pathian Capa tin sammi hi tuk hi . Amah cu Pathian in a cikhaihtu David bangbokin Kumpi in bawl tuk hi .
42001033	Jakob casuan pawl tei humah kumkhua in kumpi hi tuk hi . A uknak cu bo awng tuk ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
42001034	Mary in vancung mi lakah , “ Kei cu khanglai him ing hi . Hibang thu cu itin hi thei tuk him ? ” tin ti hi .
42001035	Vancung mi in , “ Hawvang Thiangtho cu na humah heng tuk hi Pathian huham cu na humah heng tuk hi . Mahhangin hi a thiangthomi nau cu Pathian Capa tin sam hi tuk hi .
42001036	Na nungual Elizabeth khi na phawkleng in hi . Ca nei leh thei matoh tihmi khi hi naven tu in nau a pai sawng ha luk kim zotoh hi .
42001037	Itahimtitale Pathian ii bawl theih ngawl mi imamah um ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
42001038	Mary in , “ Kei cu Topai salnu ing hi , Na tihnakbang cun piang ta hen , ” tin don hi . Mah ceng ten Vancung mi cu hawh leh ta hi .
42001039	Mah nung bek ten Mary cu tuangtim in Judea ngam mualhum khua ah manlang in hawh hi .
42001040	Mahlai a hen ten Zekhariah ii inn ah tum in Elizabeth cu nuksat hi .
42001041	Mary ii aw Elizabeth in a zaak bek ten a pumsung aa nauno cu phia hi . Elizabeth cu Hawvang Thiangtho tuah dim hi .
42001042	Ngingzetin , “ Nang cu numei hempoh lak pen thupha muicu dong bel mi hi ci . Na hin tuk mi nau hei cu thupha muicu tuah dim mi nauno hi !
42001043	Itahim ka Topai nu in kei lak ngawpoh leng nuam ?
42001044	Itahimtitale na awn za in na nuksat bek ten ka pumsung aa nauno cu lungdamzetin dawk hi .
42001045	Topai thu nahum aa a heng tuk na zakmi heng ngangai tuk hi tin na muan ngam hi thupha um hi , ” tin ti hi .
42001046	Mary in , “ Ka thinsung ! in Topa thangphat hi .
42001047	Kei nunpantu Pathian sungah ka Hawvang a lungdam hi ;
42001048	Itahimtitale mi nauta a salnu kei phawk leleng hi . Tu penpan mi hempoh in thupha muicu cotu nu tin sam haw tuk hi .
42001049	Cungnungbel Pathian in kei ca in thil ngengpi bawl zotoh hi . Amin cu Thiangtho hi .
42001050	Khangkhat nung khangkhat , Amah a upat in maizahtu tei humah ; A hehpih itnak langtiik hi .
42001051	A baan thangil cu zaak in , Mi pualthau tei a ngaihsut tuptah haw te hempoh cu leengkektiik khawng hi .
42001052	Kumpi thacak dedeuh pawlte khi , a kumpi khunnak haw pen khesuk in , mi nautate khi dangto hi .
42001053	Ngilkial pawlte thilpha tuah in vaak hi , Milian pawlte khut thacang in kiktiik hi .
42001054	A pupa uh tei hum aa a thutiammi kimtiik hi . A sal Israel bawm tukin hung zo hi .
42001055	Abraham le a casuan tei humah , hehpihnak langtiik tukin phawk ngil hihim ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
42001056	Mary cu Elizabeth lakah ha thum laih a um nungten inn ah pin leh hi .
42001057	Elizabeth cu nau a hin tuk hun kim in capa hing hi .
