43018028	Zingtuung no in Jesuh cu Kaiafas inn pen mangki bawipai inn ah hawhpih haw hi . Judah mi hotu te cu a mu daansa bangin thiangthozet in Kaltan Puai an a eih nuam haw hangin mangki bawipai inn sung ahcun tum haw ma hi .
43018029	Mahhangin Pilat bawipa cu tuul in amuhtei lakah , “ Hipa hi a i sualnak kaw a neih ? ” tin dong hi .
43018030	Amuhten , “ Sualnak a nei ngawl ahin nangma lakah hen tuk ma ung hi , ” tin don haw hi .
43018031	Pilat cun amu lakah , “ Mahtibangahitale nangmun pui unna nangmu daan bangin a thu na khen un hi , ” tin ti hi . Mahten amuh ten , “ Kohte cun mithah theihnak thu nei ma ung hi , ” tin don haw hi .
43018032	( Jesuh in itibang thihnak nantim ka thuak tuk tin a sonsami awnkam a kimnak tuk hitihbangin a piannak cu na hi hi . )
43018033	Pilat cu a inn sungah tumleh in Jesuh cu sam hi , “ Judah kumpi pa cim ? ” tin dong hi .
43018034	Jesuh in , “ Hi thu na dotmi hi nangma thinthawh in maw , midang ten keima thu a hilh hangin kaw ? ” tin dong hi .
43018035	Pilat in , “ Keima hi Judah mi hi tin maw na ngaihsut ? Keima lakah a hentu hi na miphun le thiampi upate pah cuh ! Na bawlmi thil cu a i kaw ? ” tin dong hi .
43018036	Jesuh in , “ Kei ka uknak ngam cu hi leihum ahhin hi ma hi , hi leihum ah bang a hi ahin Judah mi hotu tei khutsung ah heng tuk ngawlin ka nungzuitu ten do haw tuk hi . Kei uknak ngam cu hi leihum ahhin hi ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
43018037	Mahten Pilat cun , “ Kumpi hi ngai a cim maw ? ” tin dong hi . Jesuh in , “ Nang cun Kumpi pa ci tin ti ci . Leihum ah ka hensan le ka hunsannak cu thu pakhatbek hi . Mahmi cu thutak lamah tetti khan tukin hi . Thutak sung aa a ummi hempohte cun ka thu hilhmi ngai haw hi , ” tin ti hi .
43018038	Mahten Pilat cun , “ Thutak cu a i kaw ? ” tin dong hi . Mahten Pilat cu mipi tei lak ah tuul leh in amuh tei lak ahcun , “ A humah thah tuk taak in a sualnak mu mang hi .
43018039	Mahnaven daan na neihmi uh bangin , Kaltan Puai ten thawngta pakhakhat hahsak mek ing hi . Judah Kumpi pa hi ka hahsak ahin awi uh cim , ” tin dong hi .
43018040	Amuhten , “ Amah hah tukin awi ma ung Barabbas hah in hi , ” tin au tawtok haw hi . ( Barabbas cu nguca hi . )
43019001	Mahten Pilat in Jesuh cu kai tul in ngaalkapte vattiik hi .
43019002	Ngaalkap ten lingkung tuah phanmi lukhu khutiik in , puansan silhtiik haw hi .
43019003	A lakah hawh in , “ Judah Kumpi pa hi a nun khua sau ta hen , ” tin ti in beeng haw hi .
43019004	Pilat cu tuul leh in mipi tei lakah , “ Ngai hem un ! A humah thah tuk taakin sualnak mu mang hi , tih lang tiiknak in nangmu lakah hunpih tung hi , ” tin ti hi .
43019005	Mahtihcun ling lukhu khu in le puansan silh in Jesuh cu tul hi . Pilat cun amuh tei lakah , “ Zo hem un ! Hilaihah na mihing pa uh cu um hi ! ” tin ti hi .
43019006	Thiampi upate le Biakinn cingtu palik pawlten amuh haw ten , “ Thinglamteh ah that in hi ! Thinglamteh ah that in hi , ” tin au haw hi . Pilat cun amu lakah , “ Nangmun pui unna thinglamteh ah that ta un ! Kei cun a humah thihnak tham tianin a sualnak mu mang hi , ” tin ti hi .
43019007	Mipite cun , “ Daan nei ung hi . Mahmi daanbangin a thih kuul hi . Itahimtitale Pathian Capa ing hi tin ti hi , ” tin don haw hi .
43019008	Mahmi cu Pilat in a theih ten lau deuh hi .
43019009	A inn sungah tum lehleu in Jesuh cu , “ Ilai pen hung kam ? ” tin dong hi . Mahnaven Jesuh cun don ma hi .
43019010	Pilat cun , “ Don tuk ma cim ? Nangmah hah theihnak le thah theihnak thu ka neihlam hi thei ma cim ? ” tin ti hi .
43019011	Jesuh cun , “ Ka hum aa thu na neih theihnak hi Pathian in a piak hangin hi . Mahhangin nang saangin nangma khut ah a heng tiiktu khi sual saw hi , ” tin ti hi .
43019012	Mahmi cu Pilat in a theih ten Jesuh ii luat theihnak tuk lampi khi zei hi . Mahnaven mipite cun , “ Hi pa na hah a hitale Rom kumpi pa Sizar ngualcam hi ma ci . A kuakua heihihen kumpi ing a ti dun coptu cu Rom kumpi pai ngaal hi , ” tin au tawtok haw hi .
43019013	Mahmi awnkam cu Pilat in a theih ten Jesuh cu pualam ah tuulpih in , “ Suangphah inntual , ” tihmi thukhentu ii khunnak ah khung hi . ( Mahlai mun cu Hebru awn in “ Gabbatha ” ti haw . )
43019014	Kaltan Puainak tuk nikhat sap mah a sun hawng ten Pilat cun mipite cu , “ Na kumpi pa uh hi maw thinglamteh hum ah ka thah tuk ? ” tin dong hi .
43019015	Amuhten , “ That in ! That in ! Thinglamteh humah that in hi , ” tin au tawtok haw hi . Pilat cun , “ Na kumpi pa uh hi maw thinglamteh humah ka thah tuk ? ” tin dong lehleu hi . Thiampi upa pawlten , “ Kohtei kumpi pa cu Sizar bek hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
43019016	Mahten Pilat in Jesuh cu thah tukin amu khut sungah pia hi .
43019017	Mahticun Jesuh cu hawhpih haw hi . A thinglamteh pua in tuul hi , “ Lu-nguh mun a tih hawmi mun ah cun heng hi . ( Mahlai mun cu Hebru awn in “ Golgotha ” tin sam haw hi . )
43019018	Mahlai ahcun Jesuh cu thinglamteh ah khen haw hi . A dangmi pa nih tevang khen bok haw in a laklawh ah Jesuh cu taak haw hi ,
43019019	Pilat cun laingan in thinglamteh humah taaktiik hi . Mah lai a ngatmi cu , “ Nazareth mi Jesuh , Judah kumpi pa , ” tin ngan hi .
43019020	Jesuh a taaknak haw mun cu khuapi pen a khuala ngialngawl hangin mah laingat cu mitampi ten sial haw hi .
43019021	Thiampi upa pawlten Pilat cu , “ ‘ Judah kumpi pa , ’ tih hi ngawlin ‘ Judah kumpi pa ing titu , ’ tin ngan in hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
43019022	Pilat in , “ Ngan zo ing , ka ngatsa bangin um poh hen , ” tin ti hi .
43019023	Ngaalkap ten Jesuh cu thinglamteh humah a khet celh haw ten , a puan cu la in pakhat tek co tukin khen li in khen haw hi . Mah ten cet in khui ngawl a tahmi a angki cualpi hei cu la haw hi .
43019024	Ngaalkapte cun , “ Hi angki cualpi ong cu botkeek tuk ma hung . A kua in co tuk tih theihnak in awngbali sawk saw tuk hung , ” tin ti haw hi . Hitibangin thil a piannak cu Lai Thiangtho sung aa , “ Ka puan cu sem haw in , ka angki pi cu awngbali sawk haw , ” tihthu a kimnak tukin hi . Mahtihbang kekek in ngaalkapte in bawl haw hi .
43019025	Jesuh ii thinglamteh el ah a nu le a nui naunu le Klopas ii zi Mary le Mary Magdalin-te ding leng haw hi .
43019026	Jesuh cun a nu le a ihmi a nungzuitu te mahlaiah a dinleng haw khi mu in a nui lak ah , “ Ka nu hilaihah na capa zo in hi , ” tin ti hi .
43019027	Mahten a nungzuitu tei lakah , “ Amah cu nanu uh hi , ” tin ti hi . Mahpen pan in nungzuitu pa cun a nu cu a neem in pin pih hi .
43019028	Jesuh in i hempoh kim khawngzo hi tih khi thei hi . Lai Thiangtho sung ummi kimtiiknak tukin , “ Ka dangdum , ” tin ti hi .
43019029	Mahlaiah cabit tuithuuk beelkhat um hi . Mah tuithuuk sungah puansia tuah nim in ngolhleek ah keencih in Jesuh i kam ah noih haw hi .
43019030	Jesuh in mah tuithuuk cu cawp in , “ Ceng zo , ” tin ti hi . Mahten a lu kuunsuk in thi hi .
43019031	Mahten Judah mi hotute cu Pilat lakah hawh in thinglamteh humah a thah haw mitei ke ektuah tukin le a luang la tuk cun ngen haw hi . A nget ni haw cu tawngkai ninga ni hi . Ita ngenhaw him titale a thah hawmi miluang te cu Sabbath ni in thinglamteh humah zancaam tuk khi deih haw ma hi . Mah Sabbath ni cu ni thiangtho cuang hangin hi .
43019032	Mahhangin ngaalkapte hawh in Jesuh tuah a thah hawmi pakhat pai ke ektuah in mahcengten a dang pakhat pai kevang cu ektuah bok haw hi .
43019033	Mahnaven Jesuh lakah a hen haw ten thi ciang zo tih khi a muh haw hangin amah cu a ke ektuah haw ma hi .
43019034	Ngaalkap pa pakhat in Jesuh ii naak pen a ceipi tuah dawtin thakhat in thi le tuithiang luang tul hi .
43019035	( Mahmi thil a mutu amah rori ii otmi hi aa na uptheihnak tuk uh in hi . A hilhmi cu a dikmi hi , amah vangcun thudik son ing hi tih khi thei hi . )
43019036	Hitihbangin thil a piannak cu Lai Thiangtho sungah , “ A nguh pakhat no hei ektuah haw tuk ma hi , ” tin a ummi khi a kimnak tukin hi .
43019037	Mahten Lai Thiangtho mundang ah , “ A dawh hawmi khi miten zo haw tuk hi , ” tihvang in um hi .
43019038	Mahnung ten Arithmathea kuami Josef in Jesuh luang la tukin Pilat lak ah ngen hi . ( Josef cu Jesuh nungzui pakhat hinaven Judah hotu te a lau hangin a kuh no in zuingut hi . ) Pilat in Jesuh luang cu la thei ci , a tih ten Josef cun la hi .
43019039	Jesuh tawk tukin Zanlam in a hungtu Nikodemas vang Josef lakah telbok in zimui pawng zakhat hawng mura zimui le cingnai loihmi khi keng hi .
43019040	A panih haw cun Jesuh ii luangcu la in Judah mitei mithi phum daan bangin zimuituah puanngo neemno in cuun haw hi .
43019041	Jesuh a thahnak munah huan pakhat um in mah huan sungah kuamah phum awng ngawlnak khaanthak pakhat um hi .
43019042	Sabbath ni heng awndiak toh hangin mahlai ah phum haw hi .
43020001	Sabbath ceng a zing khuavak lai ngawlin , Mary Magdalin cu khaan ah hawh in khaankhaknak suangpeekpi cu a thawnsa in mu hi .
43020002	Simon Piter le Jesuh ii ihmi nungzuitu a dang tei lakah taai in amu lakah , “ Khaan pen Topa thiakkuh zo haw , ilai koih haw him tih thei ma hung hi , ” tin hilh hi .
43020003	Mahten Piter le a dang nungzuitute cu khaan ahcun hawh haw hi .
43020004	A panih haw cun taai in a dang nungzuitu cu Piter saangin a taai caksawdeuh taak khaan ahcun heng masa deuh hi .
43020005	Khaan sung cu zo tum in luangtuamnak puanneem no cu mu hi . Mahnaven khaan sung cu tum ma hi .
43020006	A ma nungten Simon Piter cu hengin khaan sungah tum hi . Luangtuamnak puanneem no le Jesuh ii lukeennak cu mu hi .
43020007	Mahnaven a lukeennak puan cu luangtuamnak puanneemno lakah um kha ma hi . Mundang no ah zialtum deen no in um hi .
43020008	Mahten nungzuitu dang a heng masate vang cun khaan sungah tumbok in a muhbok taak sangbok hi .
43020009	( Thihnak pen tho leh tuk tin Lai Thiangtho ii tihmi cu a tihnopnak thei zo haw ma lai hi . )
43020010	Mahten nungzuitute cu a mu inn ah pinleh haw hi .
43020011	Mary cu khaan pualam ah dingin kapli hi . Mahtihcun a kap thah in kuunin khaan sung cu zo tum hi .
43020012	Vanmi panih cu puanngo silh in Jesuh ii luang a koihnak haw ahkhin a lulam ah pakhat a kelam ah pakhat a khung leng khi mu hi .
43020013	Vanmi cun , “ Ita kapli Cim ? ” tin Mary cu dong hi . Mahten , “ Ka Topa a kua nantim a latu , i laiah koih haw nantim tih thei mang hi . ” tin don hi .
43020014	Mahten Mary heekleh in mahlai ahcun Jesuh dingleng cu mu hi . Mahnaven Jesuh ahih lam thei ma hi .
43020015	Jesuh cun , “ Numei nu , aita kapli cim hi . Akua kaw na zei ? ” tin dong hi . Mahtin a otpihtu cu huan cingtu bel tuk tin ngaisung in Mary cun , “ Saya pa , nangman na la ahitale na koihnak khi hilh in na hawh in la tung hi , ” tin ti hi .
43020016	Jesuh cun , “ Mary ” tin sam hi . Mary cun Jesuh ii lakah heek in , Hebru awn in , “ Rabboni ” tin ti hi . ( Rabboni tih cu Saya pa tihnak hi . )
43020017	Jesuh in Mary cu , “ Hi zen hih pahsun ! Itahimtitale pai lakah heng malaih ing hi . Mahnaven ka unau tei lakah hilh tenna , Apa haw a hi bokmi ka Pa , a Pathian haw a hibokmi ka Pathian lakah hawh tung hi , tin hilh ten hi , ” tin ti hi .
43020018	Mahtihcun Mary Magdalin cu hawh in Topa a muhnak thu le a lakah a otmi hempohte cu nungzuitu tei lakah hilh hi .
43020019	Mah thawhlehni taaklam ten nungzuite munkhat ah tawkdun khawm haw hi . Judah mite a lau haw hangin kongka hempoh khak khawng haw hi . Mahten Jesuh cu langin amulak ah ding hi . Mahten , “ Nohtei lakah daihnak um ta hen , ” tin ti hi .
43020020	Mahtin a ot celh ten a khut le a naak lak hi . Nungzuitu te cu a Topa haw amuh haw ten a lungdam mahtak haw hi .
43020021	Jesuh cun amuh tei neel ahcun , “ Nohtei lakah daihnak um tahen ! Ka Pan atiik bangin nangmuhvang tiikbok ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
43020022	A hum haw ahcun a haihawh cu hawl tul in , “ Hawvang Thiangtho co ta un hi !
43020023	Mi sualnak na ngaidam uh tale ngaihdam hi haw tuk hi , na ngaidam uh ma a hitale ngaihdam ngawl hi haw tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
43020024	Nungzuitu sawm le panih lak pen pakhat a hi mi ( Caphil tihmi ) Thomas cu Jesuh a lang laih in a mu lakah um kha ma hi .
43020025	Mahhangin nungzuitu dang pawl ten , “ Topa mu ung hi , ” tin hilh haw hi . Thomas cun amu lakah , “ A khut thik in a khetnak haw meimapawn mu in , ka khut in mah meima pawn zen in le a pang ka zen laih ngawl cun sang tuk mang , ” tin ti hi .
43020026	A nung nipi khat lawi ten nungzuitu te cu innkhan sungah um haw in Thomas te vang cu um bok hi . Kong khak khawng haw naven Jesuh cu langin a laklawh ahcun dingin , “ Nohtei lakah daihnak um tahen , ” tin ti hi .
43020027	Mahten Thomas ii lakah , “ Hilah na khutzung tuah zen in ka khut zo in hi , na khut tuah ka naak hi zen in hi . Ai can leh toh pahsun ; sang toh in hi , ” tin ti hi .
43020028	Thomas cun , “ Ka Topa le ka Pathian , ” tin ti hi .
43020029	Jesuh in , “ Na muh hangin sang poh sisi ? Keimah mu ngawl napi in a sangtu cu thupha ngah mi hi haw hi , ” tin ti hi .
43020030	A nungzuitu tei mitmuh ah , Jesuh ii nalamdang tampi a bawlmi hi laibu sungah ngat khak ngawl tampi um hi .
43020031	Mahnaven hizonghi ngan ing hi , ka ngatnak sullam cu nohten Jesuh cu Messiah , Pathian Capa hi tih saangin amah na sannak uh ii hangin nunnak na neihnak tuk uh in hi .
43021001	Mahnungten Jesuh cu a nungzuitu tei lakah Tiberius tuitingpi ah lang lehleu hi . A langnak cu hitihbang hin hi .
43021002	Simon Piter le Caphil tihmi Thomas le Galilee ngam Kana khua Nathanel le Zebedi ca te le Jesuh nungzuitu panih tevang munkhat ah tawkdun khawm haw hi .
43021003	Simon Piter in , “ Kei cu suuk vawk tung , ” tin ti hi . Midang tevang cun , “ Kei telbok tung , ” tin ti tek haw hi . Mahticun hawmkuang pakhat tuah in hawh haw hi ? Mahnaven mahni taak cu imah man ngah haw ma hi .
43021004	Ni suak tuungno in Jesuh cu tui mawk ah ding hi . Mahnaven a nungzuitu ten Jesuh hi tih khi thei haw ma hi .
43021005	Jesuh in , “ Tangval te , i poh beek man ma uh cim ? ” tin dong hi . Amuh ten , “ Imah man ma ung , ” tin don haw hi .
43021006	Jesuh in , “ Na hawmkuang uh ii taklam deuh ah vawk le uh ci , dawm beek ngah tuk ve uh cin , ” tin ti hi . Mahtihcun vawk ngangai haw in tamzet a vawk ngah haw hangin a suuk haw hei cu dok leh thei miau haw ma hi .
43021007	Jesuh ii ihbelmi a nungzuitu cun Piter ii lakah , “ Topa hi , ” tin ti hi . Piter in Topa hi tih a theih ten ( a van te a duhsa khawng hangin ) a angki puante khi manlangzet in silh in tui sungah dawk suk hi .
43021008	Nungzuitu dangte hei khin ngasa tuah a dimmi a suuk haw khi dok nguut in tuimawkah hen haw hi . Leihum pen a khawla ngialngawl pi zathum hawng ah in hi .
43021009	Tui mawk ah a kaih suak ngah haw ten meiling lak aa ngasa le cangho emsami khi mu haw hi .
43021010	Mahten Jesuh in amuh tei lakah , “ Na matsa uh ngasa cu cawi hem un , ” tin ti hi .
43021011	Simon Piter cu hawmkuang sung ahcun kaito in ngasa ngengpi za le sawmnga le pathum hi . Mahtizah cun tamnaven suuk cu balma hi .
43021012	Jesuh cun amu lakah , hung unna zingeih ei hem un , ” tin ti hi . Nungzuitu tei lakpen kuamah in , “ Nang a kua kam , ” tih a dong ngamtu um haw ma hi . Itahimtitale Topa hi tih cu thei haw hi .
43021013	Jesuh cun hawh in cangho la in pia hi , ngasa vang cu pia bok hi .
43021014	Hihi cu Jesuh thihnak pen a thawhkik nungte a nungzui tei lakah veithum langnak hi .
43021015	Zingeih a eih ceng haw ten Jesuh in Simon Piter cu , “ Johan capa Simon , midang tei keimah a ih haw saangin nangin kei itsaw cim ? ” tin dong hi . Simon cun , “ Topa , ka ih lam cu thei ci , ” tin ti hi . Jesuh in a lakah , “ Ka tuu no te cingkhawi in hi , ” tin ti hi .
43021016	A veinihnak Jesuh cun , “ Johan capa Simon , Keimah it cim ? ” tin dong lehleu hi . Simon cun , “ Topa ka ihnak cu thei ci , ” tin don hi . Jesuh in , “ Ka tuute cing in hi , ” tin ti hi .
43021017	Jesuh in , “ Johan capa Simon , keimah it cim ? ” tin a veithumnak dong lehleu hi . Mahtin veithum tian Jesuh in , “ Keimah it cim ? ” tin a dot hangin Piter cu a thasia in Jesuh ii lak ah , “ Topa nang cun i hempoh thei khawng ci . It ing hi tihvang cu thei khawng poh sisi , ” tin ti hi . Mahten Jesuh in , “ Ka tuu te cawm in vak in hi .
43021018	Thu ngangai in hilh ing hi , na khanno lai cun na van silh cawm in na nuamnak mun ah hawh hi ci , mahnaven na teek te cun na ban zaak tuk ci aa , miten na van silhsak in na tai het sak haw tuk aa , na nuam ngawlnak mun ah hawhpih haw tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
43021019	( Hitin a tihten Piter itihbang thuak in itibangin Pathian lakah sunloihnak pia tuk him tih khi Jesuh ii theihtiiknak hi ) Mahten Jesuh in , “ Ka nung zui in hi , ” tin ti hi .
43021020	Piter cu nungheek leh in a nunglam ah Jesuh ii ihzetmi nungzuitu pakhat mu hi . Hi nungzuitu pa cun an a eih haw lai in Jesuh neek in , “ Topa zuaktu tuk cu a kua him ? tin a dongtu khi hi .
43021021	Piter in mahpa khi a muhten , “ Topa , hipa khi itibang kam ni ? ” tin Jesuh khi dong hi .
43021022	Jesuh in , “ Ka hun leh laklawh tian nung tukin ka deih ta cun nangcaa i kaw a poi ? Keimah zuipoh in hi ! ” tin ti hi .
43021023	Mahhangin hi nungzuitu pa cu thi tuk ma hi , tin Jesuh ii nungzuitu tei lak ahcun thuthan hi . Mahnaven Jesuh in , “ Thi tukma hi a tihnak hi kha ma hi . Ka hun leh tian nung tukin ka deihmi a hi tacun nangcaa in i kaw poinak a um ” a tihnak hi .
43021024	Hi nungzuitu pa cu hi thute a hilhtu hi aa , a ngantu hei hibok hi . Mahten a hilhmi cu dik hi tih thei hung hi .
43021025	Jesuh ii bawlmi thildang tampi um laih hi . Pakhat nung pakhat in ngan khawng bang a hin a ngatmi laibute cu leihum buppi hei ah va tuk ma hi tin ngaisung ing hi .
44001001	Ka ih mi Theofilas , Ka laibu masa sungah khin Jesuh ii nadeh a pat penpan vancung ah laaktoh ahih ni tian ,
44001002	A thilbawlmi hempoh le a thu zilhmi hempoh khi kimzetin ngan ing hi . Vancung ah laak ahih lai ngawlin a tenmi a nungzuitu te cu Hawvang Thiangtho cahnak huham tuah in thu phano in a zilh celh ten van ah laak toh in um ta hi .
44001003	A thih nung ten ni sawmli sung amu lakah vei tampi langin nungleh zo hi tih kuamah ii eel thei hihim tuk ngawlin phun tampi in langtiik hi .
44001004	Amuhten amah cu mitcang rori in mu haw in Pathian uknak thu cu amu lakah hilh hi . Mahten munkhat ah a tawhdun khawmhaw laih in , amu lakah hitih hin thu pia hi ; “ Jerusalem pen puakang in imah laiah hawh ta pahsuh un . Ka pan laksawng piatuk hi tin ka sonsa mi saw khi ngak un hi .
44001005	Johan cun tui tuahin baptizam-nak pia hi ; mahnaven a ngei ngawl in Hawvang Thiangtho tuah baptizam-nak piak hi tuk uh ci ” tin ti hi .
44001006	Nungzuite cu Jesuh tuah a tawhdun hawten , “ Topa , tu in Israel mitei lakah uknak cu pe leh ni cim ? ” tin dong haw hi .
44001007	Jesuh in amu lakah “ Mah mi hun le ni le haa cu ka pai thu hi , notei theih kul mi hi ma hi .
44001008	Mahnaven nangmu lakah Hawvang Thiangtho a hen ten cahnak huham tuah dim tuk uh ci , mahten Jerusalem , Judah ngam , Samaria ngam hempoh le leihum khua hempoh ah keima tetti hi tuk uh ci , ” tin ti hi .
44001009	Mahtin a hilh celh ten Jesuh cu mit in a muh cilcel haw in vanah laaktoh in um ta aa meingo limin mu leh thei haw ma toh hi .
44001010	Mahtin a kainak vaan lam a zoh lih laihtak haw in puanngo silh in mi panih cu thakhat in a el haw ah ding in ,
44001011	“ Galilee mite aw , i tahim vanlam cuan in na ding diamduam leng uh ? Nangmu lak pen van ah a kaai mi Jesuh cu van a kai laih na mu uh bang keekin hungsuk leh tuk hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44001012	Mahten Jesuh ii nungzuitu te cu Olif Mual pen Jerusalem ah kiikleh haw hi . Olif Mual cu Jerusalem pen penglang hawng khawla hi .
44001013	Khuapi sungah hawh haw in amu umnak khaan ah tum haw hi . Piter , Johan , Jeim le Andru , Filip le Thomas , Bartholomeo le Matthai , Alfia capa James nam tangtu Simon le Jeim ii capa Juda te hi haw hi .
44001014	Munkhat thungen khawm tuk cun tawkdun khawm mek haw in numei pen , Jesuh ii nu Mary le Jesuh ii nau te pawl vang tel bok haw hi .
44001015	Ni demlaih ngei nung ten umtu te cu tawkdun khawm in mihing cu za le sawmnih bang hi haw hi . Piter cu dingto in ,
44001016	“ Ute naute , Hawvang Thiangtho in David muk le kam mangin a sonsa mi Jesuh thattu te a lamhuaitu Juda ii thu cu Lai Thiangtho sung aa a ngat mi haw bangin a kim kuul hi .
44001017	Juda cu eimu nadehnak ah telbok tukin tenmi ahih hangin eimu pawl sungah sungtel hi bok hi . ” tin ti hi .
44001018	( Juda in thilsual a bawlmi ii manin a ngahmi tangka cun lo pakhat lei in mah lo sungah bahin thi hi ; Apum keh in a sungngil hempoh lawt tuul khawng hi . )
44001019	Mahmi thu cu Jerusalem ah a ummi hempoh ten thei in a mu awn in mahmi lo cu Akeldama tin ti haw hi ; a sullam cu “ Thisan lo ” tihnak hi .
44001020	Piter in , “ Itahimtitale Saam sungah , ‘ A inn cu thacang henna , A sungah kuamah um ma hen , ’ tin ngatsami um hi . Mahten mundang ah , ‘ Midang ten a nadeh cu la haw hen , tin um bok hi .
44001021	“ Mahbangcun hi aa , Topa Jesuh ii thawhlehnak thutheitu tetti pakhakhat in na tel pih uh kul hi . Amah cu Topa Jesuh khual a zin pepel sung hempoh keimu lakah tel bok in , Johan ii baptizam piaknak thu a hilhnak penpan Jesuh kei mu lak pen vanah laaktoh ahih ni tian keimu lakah a tel bok mi hi tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
44001022	
44001023	Mahhangin mi panih i min pia haw hi . A muhte cu Josef , Barsabbas tih vangin sammi ( mahmata le Justas tihhei sam mi ) le Matthias te hi haw hi .
44001024	Mahten thungen haw in , “ Topa , nang cun mitei lungmu sung theikhawng ci ; hi panih tei lak pen a kuasaw teng cim tih langtiik in hi ;
44001025	Amah tuah a kaihdun mi munah a hawhsantu Juda i ai-awhtu tuk na ten-mi cu langciang tiikin hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44001026	Mahten a mu panih lakpen a kua saw in nungzuitu na dek saw tuk him tih theihnak tukin awngbali sawk haw in , Matthias in ngah hi . Matthias cu nungzuitu sawm le pakhat tei lakah betcih leh haw hi .
44002001	Penticost ni a hen ten umtu hempoh te cu munkhat ah in um haw hi .
44002002	Thakhatin vanpen huihpi bangin thawmvang cu hengin a umnak khaan haw ah dim khawng hi .
44002003	Mahten lei tuah bangvemi meialh tuul zuazuak in mah khaan sung ummi hempohte cu tawngkha khawng hi .
44002004	Avenghawng haw in Hawvang Thiangtho tuah dim in Hawvang cun ot theihnak pia in awn dadang in awn haw hi .
44002005	Jerusalem khua sungah leihum mun le ngam tihkim pen a hungmi Judahte a um laihtak haw hi aa , biaknak lam heipen a zuam ngangai mite ngeh haw hi .
44002006	Mahmi awn dang in a ot haw mi thawmvang a theih haw ten mipite hengkhawm haw hi . Umtu tei ot cu a hungmi pawlten amu awntek in a zak hawten lamdangsa mahtak haw hi .
44002007	Lamdangsa le ngaihsut haksa in , “ Hitihbangin a awnli mite hi Galilee mi hi hawzuh si maw ?
44002008	Aitin heng eimu awntek in a theihtheih uh ?
44002009	Ohte hicu Parthia ngam , Media ngam , Elam ngam , Mesopotamia ngam , Judah ngam , Kappadosia ngam , Pontas ngam , Asia ngam ,
44002010	Frizia ngam , Pamfilia ngam , Izip ngam le Libia ngamsung Sairin khua el te pen a hung mite hung hi . A hekkhatte cu Rom khua pen a hung mite hung hi .
44002011	Judah mi le Gentail mi Judah biaknak ah a tum mite hung hi . Mi hekkhatte cu Krit tui kulh le Arabia ngam pen a hung mite hi . Mahnaven Pathian ii thasiahhuai thil a bawlmi thu cu amu awn in a son hawmi khi eimu awntek in thei hung hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44002012	Thinsu le lamdang sa in , “ Hihi a sullam a i nantim ? ” tin pakhat le pakhat dongdunli haw hi .
44002013	Mahnaven midang ten umtute cu nuihsan in , “ Hi mite hi zukham haw si maw ! ” tin ti haw hi .
44002014	Mahten Piter cu a dang nungzuitu sawm le pakhatte tuah dingto in aw ngingzetin mipi tei lakah thu hilh hi . Ka phunpih Judah mi le Jerusalem aa a um mite , na venghawng in ngai unna , hi thil ii sullam cu na hilh tung hi .
44002015	Na ngaihsut uh bangma hi ; hi mite hi zukham haw ma hi ; zinglam nazi kuah bek laih hi .
44002016	A i him titale Kamsangpa Joel ii sonsa mi a kimnak hi saw hi . Kamsangpa Joel i sonsa mi cu ;
44002017	“ Pathian in , ni dawllam ten hitih bangin bawltung hi ; Mi hempoh tei humah ka Hawvang leih tung ; na canu uh le na capa uh ten ka thu cu phuang haw tuk , na khangno uhten muh nak nei haw tuk hi ; na puteek piteek uhten mangman haw tuk hi .
44002018	Hi zuh hi , ka na dektu pano , numei tei humah mahni tecun , Ka Hawvang leihtung aa , ka thu phuang haw tuk hi .
44002019	Humlam vanah thasiahhuai bawltung aa , nuailam lei humah hei in nalamdang bawltung hi . Thisan le meileek le meikhu te sahzet in um tuk hi .
44002020	Nithim tuk aa , Hade khi thisan bangin san tuk hi ; Topai Ni maksan le nisunglawi a hen deuh laihngawl in ,
44002021	Topai minin thungen in a neek hempoh te cu humhim hi haw tuk hi , ” tin ’ ti hi .
44002022	“ Ka phunpih Israel mite hithu hi ngai un ! Nazereth mi Jesuh cu mihing hi naven Pathian ii thuneihnak nei hi , tih cu ama sung pen Pathian in melciknak le thasiahhuai a bawl mite pen langtiik zo hi . Hihi cu nangmuh rori i theihmi hi , itahim titale nangmu lak aa a piangmi thilte na hi hi .
44002023	Pathian in ama khuakhannak sa bangin nangmu khut sungah Jesuh piak tuk khi a khen catsa hi . Misual mitei sawmsiatnak hangin Jesuh cu thinglamteh ah khen in that uh ci .
44002024	Mahnaven Pathian in thihnak pen tholehtiik in thihnak huham sung pen luattiik zotoh hi , itahimtitale amah cu thihnak i hetcihlo theih mi hi ma hi .
44002025	David in ama thu le la cu hibangin hilh hi . “ Topa cu ka mitmai ah mu leleng ing hi ; ka elno ah um leng in imah lau mang hi .
44002026	Mahhangin lungdam in , ka thinlung cu nopnak tuah in dim hi . Mahhangin kei hi a thi thei mi hi na vengin , muansannak sungah thinnop zetin cawl tung hi .
44002027	Itahimtitale mithi khua ah cun zamthongtaa tuk ma in , muantaakmi na salpa cu khaan sungah muat thong tuk cun phal tuk ma ci .
44002028	Nunnak mun a hennak lampi cu lak zotoh in , a umpihnak hangin lungdamnak tuahin dim tung hi , ” tin ti hi .
44002029	“ Ka u le naute , mi minthang a pu uh kumpi David ii thu cu nangmu lakah a ciangzet in hilh nuam ing hi . David cu thi in phum haw hi , a khaan vangcu tunitian eimu lakah um hi .
44002030	Amah cu kamsangpa hi aa , Pathian ii tepsa mi thu cu thei hi . David bangbokin David ii casuan pakhakhat khi kumpi hi tukin Pathian in thutiam hi .
44002031	Pathian in mailam hun ten a i bawl tuk tih cu David in muham zo hi ; mahhangin Messiah a thawh lehnak tuk thu cu hi tihbangin hilh hi . “ Mithi khua ah a mahcu zamsan tuk ma hi , a taksa luangpi khi khaan sungah muat taa thong tuk ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
44002032	Pathian in Jesuh rori cu thihnak pen tholehtiik in mahmi a theihpihtu tetti cu keimu te hi ung hi .
44002033	A pa , Pathian ii taklam ah sunglawizetin hentiik hi zotoh in a tepsanak bangin Hawvang Thiangtho cu a Pai lakpen co zo hi . Tu aa na muh mi uh le na theih mi uh cu eimu hum aa a leihsukmi ama laksawng hi .
44002034	Itahimtitale vanhum ah a hengtu cu David hi kha ma hi ; David a man ; “ Topan ka Topai lakah , na ngaal te na ke nuaiah ,
44002035	na kesihnak in a can haw tian ka taklam ah khung in ti , ” tin ti hi .
44002036	“ Israel mite aw , thinglamteh humah na thah uh mi Jesuh khi , Pathian in Topa le Messiah in bawl zotoh hi , tih hi ciangzet in na theih khawng theihnak tuk uh in kuul hihim hi , ” tin ti hi .
44002037	Mahtin Piter ii otmi a theih haw ten a lungmu haw thatho zetin Piter le a dang nungzuitu te cu , “ U le nau te , a i bawl kam nung ? ” tin dong haw hi .
44002038	Piter in a muhtei lakah , “ Na venghawng uh in na sualnak uh te zamtek un naa Jesuh Khrih min in baptizam-nak la un hi , mahticun na sualnak uh ngaithiam hi tuk uh ci aa Pathian ii laksawng Hawvang Thiangtho ngah tuk uh ci .
44002039	Itahimtitale Pathian ii thutepnak cu , nangmuh le na cate uh le Pathian tuah a kang dun mitei lak pen Pathian ii sammi hempohte tuah in aseng dun mi hi , ” tin ti hi .
44002040	Piter cun awnkam tampi tuah in tettikhan in sosuah li hi . ” “ Hi mipha ngawl tei humah a hengtuk mi bawl siatnak pen a luat tukin zuam un , ” tin hilh hi .
44002041	Piter ii hilhmi cu mitampi in saangin baptizam-nak la haw hi ; mahni nikhat sung cun a pawl mipum cu thawngthum hawng in khang hi .
44002042	Nungzuitu tei thuhilh cu ngai haw in , an eih khawm langkhatnak le thunget khawmnak tuahin phialdun khawmnak nei leleng haw hi .
44002043	Nungzuitu ten nalamdang le thasiah huai thil tampi bawlin mi hempoh tei thin sungah launak le maizahnak dim hi .
44002044	Umtu hempohte cu phialdun khawmin thulualzetin a thil neihmi hawte mang khawmdun haw hi .
44002045	Thil a neih hawmi le a neih le lamte haw zuakin a ngah haw mi tangka cu a mu kuulnak bangin sem khawm haw hi .
44002046	Nikhat nung nikhat Biakinn sungah tawkdun khawm haw in ; A inn haw ah ante khawm in niamkhiatnak le lungdam thanop no in ei langkhat haw hi .
44002047	Pathian khi thangphat in mi hempoh tei lakpen mitmai pha ngah haw hi . Mahtihcun Topan a pawlsung haw ah cun nunpatnak a cotu a dang bet tawto hi .
44003001	Nikhat cu Piter le Johan thunget hun taaklam nazi pathum ten Biakinn ah hawh haw hi .
44003002	Mahlai kongka mawi a tihmi haw ah cun pianpih a ke zawngsa mipa um leng hi . Nisial Biakinn ah a hawhtu tei lakpen tangka ngen tukin mah kongka mawi ah cun koih meek haw hi .
44003003	Piter le Johan tei tum khi a muh ten i pawpoh beek pia hem un , tin ngen hi .
44003004	Kom zetin zo cangcian haw in , Piter cun , “ Keimuh zo hem in ! ” tin ti hi .
44003005	I poh beek ngah nave nang maw tin muansan zetnak tuah cun zo hi .
44003006	Mahten Piter in , “ Tangka piaktuk imamah nei mang hi ; mahnaven ka neihmi pia ing hi , Nazareth khua mi Jesuh Khrih min in tho in hawh in hi , ” tin ti hi .
44003007	Mahten a taklam khutpen leen in dokto hi . Thakhatin a ke le kemit te cu khoh leh hi .
44003008	Thakhat thoin a mahno ding in hawh thei hi . Mahten Piter le Johan te tuah Biakinn sungah tum bok hi . Hawhin , dawk le laam in , Pathian thangphat hi .
44003009	Mahtihbangin a hawh theih le Pathian a thangphat theih cu mipi ten mu haw hi .
44003010	Kongka mawi aa tangka ngen in aum lelengtu awng tih khi atheih haw ten a hum aa thil a piang mi hangin lamdangsa in am bialbual haw hi .
44003011	Mahpa cu Solomon maisap tihmi ahcun Piter le Johan tei lakah a umleng khi a muh haw ten mipite cu lamdangsa in amu lakah zuan haw hi .
44003012	Mahmi cu Piter in amuh ten a muh tei lakah , “ Ka phunpih Israel mite , itakaw hithu ah lamdang sa in keimuh lehlam mitphelep ngawlin na zo uh ? Hipai hawh theihnak hi kei muhtei cahnak le Pathian ii deihzawngin a nungtheitu kahihnak uh i hangin a piangmi heng in maw na ngaihsut uh ?
44003013	Abraham , Isak le Jakob tei Pathian , a pu le pa uhtei Pathian in ama sunloihnak cu a Capa Jesuh lakah in pia zotoh hi . Mahnaven nohten amah cu thuneitu tei khutsungah pia uh ci . Pilat in hahtung hi tin thu a sonsami cawm in Pilat ii maicang rori pen el zotoh uh ci .
44003014	Jesuh cu mithiangtho le miphazet hi napi in nohten kik uh ci ; Mah i hum ah Pilat lakah hehpih kuunin laithattu saw hah tukin ngen uh ci .
44003015	Nohten nunnak ah mi a puitu pa khi that uh ci , mahnaven Pathian in thihnak pen tholehtiik in keimuhte hi mahmi a theihpihtu tettite hi ung hi .
44003016	Mahpai min ii huham hangin hi kezawngpa hin thacahnak ngah thei hi . Na muhmi uh le na theih uhmi a min muannak hangin bawlmi hi . Na venghawng un na muh khawng uh bangin Jesuh upnak in hipa hi damtiik hi .
44003017	Mahhangin ka u le ka nau te , nangmuh le na hotu uh ten Jesuh ii humah na bawl uh mi hi na theihuh ngawl hang bawl uh ci tih khi thei ing hi .
44003018	Nidang laihcawngin Pathian in a tenmi Messiah cu haksatnak thuak tuk hi tin kamsang tei sung pen phuang zotoh hi ; mahmi cu tuin kim hi .
44003019	Sikkik unna Pathian lakah kikleh un hi . Mahtihbang a hitale na sualnak uh khi ngaidam tuk hi . Mahtihbangin na ti uh ahitale ,
44003020	Topa lakpen hawvang cahnak hun hengtuk aa , nangmu ca a tensami Messiah tihmi Jesuh cu nohtei lakah pia tuk hi .
44003021	Pathian in taanglaih a kamsang thiangtho tei sungpen a sonsa bangin , i hempoh bawlthak hun akim laklawh Jesuh cu vancung ah umtuk hi .
44003022	Itahimtitale Moses in , Topa na Pathian uh in keimah atiik bangin nangmu miphun a hi mi kamsang pakhat nangmu lakahtiik tuk hi . A ma hilhmi hempoh cu na zui khawng uh kuul hi .
44003023	Mah kamsang thu a zui nuamngawltu cu Pathian ii miphun sungpen hawlvawk hituk aa , siatsuahnak tawk tuk hi , tin ti hi .
44003024	Mahten thuthattuk a neitu kamsang hempoh , kamsang Samuel le ama nung aa a hungmi kamsang hempoh te hei in , atu aa a piangmi hi theitiik khawng zo hawtoh hi .
44003025	Kamsang tei sungpen Pathian ii thu kapmi cu nangmuh teica in hi tuk aa , Pathian in napu napa uhtei lakah a bawlmi thukapnak a co boktu hi uh ci . Pathian in Abraham lakah “ Na casuante sungpen leihum aa mihing hempohte cu thupha pia tung hi , ” tin ti hi .
44003026	Mahtibang ahih hangin Pathian in a kua abang a phat ngawlnak pe in kikleh in a thupha piak theihnak tukin a masabel ah a Salpa a tenmi nangmu lakahtiik hi , ” tin ti hi .
44004001	Piter le Johan te cu mipi tei maiah thu a hilhlih haw laihtak in thiampi hekkhat le biakinn cingtu hotu bawite le Sadusi hekkhatte cu heng haw hi .
44004002	Jesuh ii nungzuitu panih ten Jesuh cu thihnak pen tholeh hi tin mipi te a hilh haw mi in , mithi te nungleh hawtuk hi tih khi a theihciangtiik hangin thin-uuk haw hi .
44004003	Mahhangin mah nungzui panihte cu man in a khuanu tohtaak cu a zingtian in thawngah cun khia haw hi .
44004004	Mahtavangcun a thu hilhhammi a thei le a zatu mi tampi tecun um haw hi , a umtute cu khang seseem in thawngnga bang ting haw hi .
44004005	A zingten Judah mi hotute pawl le Daan thiam pawlte cu Jerusalem ah tawk dun khawm haw hi .
44004006	Mahlai ahcun Thiampi Saang Annas tawk haw hi ; mahten Kaiafas , Johan , Elexander le Thiampi Saang ii unaupihte tuah tawkdun khawm haw hi .
44004007	Nungzuitute cu amu mai ah dingtiik in , “ Hi thil piangmi hi i tin kaw na bawl uh a i huham nei in kaw na bawl uh ? ” tin dong haw hi .
44004008	Piter cu Hawvang Thiangtho tuah dimin a muhtei lakah , “ mipi hotu le upate
44004009	tuni in hi kezawng pai damnak thu le a hum aa thilpha bawlmi thu dong na hi uh tacun ,
44004010	na theihtuk uh mi le Israel mi hempoh tei theihkhawng haw tuk mi cu nangmu mai aa a dingmi pai damciangnak cu Nazereth mi , thinglamteh ah na thah uh mi , thihnak pen Pathian ii thawhlehtiik mi , Jesuh ii cahnak huham le a min hangin hi , ” tin ti hi .
44004011	Jesuh ii thu ah Lai Thiangtho in , “ Innsatu tei vawkmi suang cu suangthupi bel in cangzo hi , ” tin ti hi .
44004012	Nunpatnak cu amu sungbek ah um hi ; leihum hempoh ah in Pathian ii piakmi nunpantu dang le luan theitu min dang kuamah um ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
44004013	Khonsil upa pawl ten Piter le Johan cu cihnak nei ngawl mi thawthong hi haw naven i tihzah in ngaalpha haw him tih khi a muh hawten lamdangsa mahtak haw hi . Mahten amuhte cu Jesuh ii ngualcam ahihlam haw khi theileh haw hi .
44004014	Mahnaven a damtiik haw mipa cu Piter le Johan el ah a din leleng hangin a ot theih hawnak tuk thu i mamah um ma hi .
44004015	Mahhangin a thusonnak haw mun khaan pen pualam ah tuultiik haw in amuh nguakcang khaan sungah cun thuson haw hi .
44004016	Pakhat le pakhat “ I tin bawl kamnung ? kuamah i bawltheih ngawl tian bawl thei haw in , Jerusalem khuasung mi hempoh in theikhawng zo ahih hawtaak kuamah i eltheih mi hilehma toh hi .
44004017	Mahnaven hithu hi mipi tei lakah a zarhkeh tuk ngawlin Jesuh min in kuamai lakah thu phuang leh toh pahsuh un , tin ti nung , ” tin son haw hi .
44004018	Mahten sam kikleh haw in , Jesuh ii minin kuamah zilh leh toh pahsuh unna , kuama lakah thu phuang hihim tuk ma toh uh ci , tin cangcian zetin kham haw hi .
44004019	Mahnaven Piter le Johan cun , “ Nangmu thu zui maw ! Pathian ii thu zui ii bang maan saw hum ? nangmun khenkhuai saw un hi .
44004020	Itahimtitale keimuh rori in ka muh uhmi le ka theihuh mi cu phuang ngawlin um thei ma ung hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44004021	Mahhangin khonsil upa pawl ten daan piaktaak sualnak a muh haw ngawl hangin na sia seseem in ngaallinnak a piak celh haw ten hah haw hi . Mi hempoh ten amu lakpen na piang mi mu haw in Pathian a thangphat haw hangin nungzuitu te bawlsiat cu cang thei tuk ma hi tih khi mu haw hi .
44004022	Nalamdang damnak bawlsak a hi mipa cu kum sawmli hum mi hi .
44004023	Piter le Johan cu a luat haw bekten a ngualcam tei lakah kikleh in thiampi le upa pawltei thuhilh mi thute cu sonpih haw hi .
44004024	Mahmi cu umtu pawlten a theih haw ten munkhat noin Pathian lakah thungen in , “ Topa van le lei le tuipi le asung a ummi hempoh bawltu cungnungbel Topa ”
44004025	Na Hawvang Thiangtho mang in na salpa David sungpen thu hilh ci aa ; Aita him ! Gentail mite thin uk mahtak in a umlih haw , aita heng mihing ten i mamah nemcuam ngawl mi a sawmun lih haw ?
44004026	Topa le Messiah dodal tukin , leihum kumpite tuang tiim in , uktu bawite tuah munkhat ah a tawhdun khawm haw , ” tin ti ci .
44004027	Itahimtitale Herod le Pontius Pilat ten Messiah in na tenmi na salpa Thiangtho Jesuh dodal tukin khuapi sungah hin Gentail mite le Israel mite tuah tawhdun khawm ngangai haw hi .
44004028	Na huham le na tuptahnak in a hengleh a piangleh tuk mi na ngaihsutsa mi kimtiik khawngtukin tawkdun khawm haw hi .
44004029	Oh Topa , atu koh lakaa lau hawhen tin thuupnak a bawllih haw mite hi nangman theihpih zazal in na koh na sal ten na thu cu ngaalphazet in ka hilh theihnak tuk uh in bawm zazal in hi .
44004030	Mi damnak tukin na baan phalh in na na sal Thiangtho Jesuh ii min in nalamdang le thasiahhuai nate bawl theihnak tuk thu pia zazal in hi , ” tin thungen haw hi .
44004031	Thu a ngetcelh bek haw ten mah a tawhdun khawmnak haw inn cu hiing in , Hawvang Thiangtho tuah dim in Pathian ii thu cu ngaalphazet in phuang haw hi .
44004032	Umtu te cu lungmu le ngaihsutnak luallemzet no in um khawm haw hi . Kuamah in a neihmi thil te ‘ ka bulta hi , ’ tin ti haw ma hi ; a neihmi hempoh haw khi pakhat le pakhat mang kawmdun haw hi .
44004033	Topa Jesuh ii thawhlehnak thu cu nungzuitu ten a nasiazetmi huham tuah tettikhan in Pathian in a venghawng haw humah thupha muicu buak hi .
44004034	A pawl sung haw pen kuamah a tingsam peng um haw ma hi . Lo neitu le inn a neitu ten a lo a inn haw te cu zuak in a ngahmi haw tangka cu ,
44004035	Nungzuitu tei khut ah pe haw hi . Mahten mahmi tangka cu a kuulnak bangin sem pepel haw hi .
44004036	Mahtihbang cun Saipras tuikulh pen a hingmi Levi mi Josef cun ,
44004037	a lo zuakin angahmi tangka cu nungzuitu tei khut ah pia hi . Josef cu nungzuitu pawl ten Barnabas tin ti haw hi . Barnabas tih cu , “ thazaang piatu , ” tihnak hi .
44005001	Mahnaven Ananias a tih haw mi pa le a nupi Safira ten a neihmi na zuak haw in ,
44005002	a nupi ii lungkimnak tuah tangka a heek cu amu ca koih in a hekkhat lam cu nungzuitu tei khut ah pia haw hi .
44005003	Mahten Piter cun , “ Ananias , itakaw Satan in neh in na thilzuaknak pen na ngahmi tangka a hekkhat lam suup in Hawvang Thiangtho na zol ?
44005004	Na naa cu na zuak laihngawl cun nangma ta hi ; na zuakceng heiten na ngahmi tangka cu nangma ta leleng hi . Mahnaven i ta hi tih bangin bawl tukin na lungmu hihim in na ngaihsut ? Mihing zolma ci , Pathian zol ci , ” tin ti hi .
44005005	Mahmi cu Ananias in a theih bekten lumin thi hi ; mahten mahthu a theitu hempoh ten lau in thinsu linglawng khawng haw hi .
44005006	Tangvalte hung in aluang a cuun ceng hawten pualam ah puatuul in phum haw hi .
44005007	Nazi pathum nungten a i pianghim tih thei ngawlin a zi cu tum bok hi .
44005008	Piter cun , “ Hi tangka hi naa na zuak uh mi pen na ngahmi uh tangka venghawng toh maw , hilh hem in ? ” tin dong hi . Safira cun , “ Mah e , ka ngahmi uh a venghawng hi , ” tin don hi .
44005009	Mahten Piter cun , “ I takaw na pasal tuah na panih uh in Topa Hawvang zoltuk in na lungkim ngeel uh ? Na pasal a phumtu tangval te kongka bul khah um haw laih hi ; nangmah vang cu zawng tul bok haw tuk ven , ” tin ti hi .
44005010	Thakhat in amah vang cu Piter i kebul ah lum in thi bok hi . Tangval te cu tum in thi zotoh tih a muh haw ten a pualam ah zawng tuul in a pasal i khan el ah phum bok haw hi .
44005011	Pawlpi le mahthu a theitu hempohte cun lau leita mulling in um haw hi .
44005012	Mipi tei lakah nungzuituten thasiahhuai nalamdang naa tampi bawl haw hi . Umtu hempoh te cu Solomon maisap a tihmi ah cun tawkdun khawm haw hi .
44005013	Apawl haw cu midang ten pahcawi zet hawnaven , a pualam mite kuamah tel ngam haw ma hi .
44005014	Mahnaven numei hihen , pano hihen Topa aum tute cu apawl sung haw ah in tam sesem in tum haw hi .
44005015	Nungzuitu tei thil bawlmi a muh haw ten mina tampite cu khua sung lampi ah zawngin Piter ii hawh ten panih pathum beek a lim in a lip khak tuk in tin ihkhun le lawhlei phahin sial pepel haw hi .
44005016	Mahten mi tampite cu Jerusalem khua el te pen hung in minaa hihen , khuasia tei polh mi hihen , zawng in a venghawng dam khawng haw hi .
44005017	Thiampi Saang le a ngualcamte hempoh le mahlaihawng aa aum mi Sadusi pawlte cun nungzui tute khi a halhsiik leita haw hangin thil pakhakhat bawltum haw hi .
44005018	Nungzuitu te khi manin mipi thawnginn ah cun khia haw hi .
44005019	Mahnaven mahmi zan in Topai vancungmi cun kongkate cu hong in nungzuitute a suahtul nungten amu lakah
44005020	“ Hawhta unna Biakinn sungah ding in mipitei lakah hi nunthaknak thu hi cangkim zet in hilh un hi . ” tin ti hi .
44005021	A hilhnak bangcun nungzui ten bawl-in zingtung no in Biakinn sungah thuzilh pan haw hi . Thiampi Saang le a ngualcam pawl ten khonsil thusonnak thupizet nei tukin Judah mi upa hempohte samkhawm haw hi . Nungzuitu tecu thawnginn pen amu maiah pui tukin mitiik haw hi .
44005022	Mahnaven bawi pawlte thawnginn a hen haw ten thawnginn sungah nungzuitu te cu mu leh haw ma toh hi ; mahtaak cu kikleh in khonsilte hilh haw hi .
44005023	“ Thawnginn ka hen uhten tawh kom noin kalh leng hi , a cingtute vang kongka phano in cing leng haw naven kong ka hon uh ten a sungah kua mamah um ma hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44005024	Mahmi cu thiampi upa le Biakinn cingtu bawi ten a theih haw ten lamdang sa in nungzuitute hi a i cang haw nantim tin ngaihsut hak in um li haw hi .
44005025	Mahten mi pakhat cu tum in , “ Ngai hemun ! Thawngah na khiak mi uh te khi Biakinn ah thuzilh li haw hi , ” tin ti hi .
44005026	Mahhangin Biakinn cingtu bawi le a khutnuai aa mihingte cu hawh in nungzuitu te cu pui kikleh haw hi . Pui haw naven hung zazal un tin puilo hawma hi , itahimtitale miten suangin sep haw kawn tih khi lauhaw hi .
44005027	Nungzuitute cu tumpih haw in khonsil mai ah dingtiik haw hi . Mahten Thiampi Saang cun thu dong hi .
44005028	“ Hipai minin thuzilh toh pahsuh un tin nasiazet in hilh zo ung hi theima uh cim ? bangleng si uh ci . Na thuzilh mi thu cu Jerusalem dimtiik zotoh uh ci aa a thihnakthu ah vang keimuh te nawn nuam uh ci , ” tin ti hi .
44005029	Piter le a dang nungzuitu te cun “ Mihingtei thu saangin Pathian ii thu ngaisaw tuk ung hi .
44005030	Nangmuh ten Jesuh cu thinglamteh ah that uh ci ; mahnaven a pupa uh tei Pathian in thihnak pen tholehtiik zo hi .
44005031	Pathian in tholehtiik in Israel miten sualsihnak hun nei in a sualnak haw te ngaihdam ahihnak tukin Pathian in lampuitu le nunpantu tukin ataklam ah khungtiik zo hi .
44005032	Hi thil hempoh a theihpihtu tetti cu keimuh te hi ung hi ; keimuh bek hei hi ngawlin , Pathian in ama thu a ngaitu tei lakah laksawng in apiaksa mi Hawvang Thiangtho vangcu thu theihpitu hi bok hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44005033	Mahtin a tih haw mi cu khonsil sungtel pawl ten a theih haw ten a thinhaw uuk-leita in nungzuitu te cu that khawng nuam ngangai haw hi .
44005034	Mahnaven amu lak pen Farasi a himi a min Gamaliel , mi hempoh tei upatmi Daanthiam pa cu khonsil tei mai ah ding in , nungzuitute cu demlaihno sung a pualam ah tuulhihtiik tukin thupia hi .
44005035	Mahten khonsil upa tei lakah cun , ka phunpih Israel mite aw , himitei hum aa thil na bawl uh mi ah hin ngaalling un hi .
44005036	Nunglam laihin Theudas a tih haw mi pan keimah hi mi thawthong hi kha mang hi tin ti in mi zali laih in zui haw hi . Mahnaven amah cu that haw in a zuitute cu vaakkeh khawng haw hi mahten a nadehnak vang cu bo bok hi .
44005037	Mahnungten mipum sial laihkhin Galilee mi Juda tul lehleu in mitampi ten zui dudut haw hi ; mahnaven thah hi bok in a zuitute cu vakkeh khawng lehleu bok haw hi .
44005038	Tu aa thu ah vangin ciangzet in hilh ing hi , hi mitei humah i mamah bawl pahsuh un . A muh no zam deen un hi ! Atuptah haw mi le a bawl mi haw hi mihing tei tuptahnak thongmi ahitacun phathong lehtuk poh hi .
44005039	Mahnaven Pathian bawlmi a hi tacun neh thei cuang tuk ma uh ci . Pathian dodaltu lehlam in cang thei ve uh cin , ” tin ti hi . Mahhangin khonsil upa pawl te cun Gamaliel ii ngaihsutnak piak mi cu zui haw hi .
44005040	Nungzuitute cu sam in vatnekin Jesuh min in thuson leh tuk ngawltoh in thu a piak nung ten hah haw hi .
44005041	Nungzuitu te cu khonsil upa tei lak pen a tuul haw ten lungdamzet haw hi ; Itahimtitale Jesuh min hangin zotsaknak a thuak zoh ten lung dam huai hi tin a ngaihsut haw hangin hi .
44005042	Mahten a nisial in Messiah Jesuh ii Thuthangpha cu Biakinn ah hihen inn ah hihen tawp ngawlin zilhin phuang pepel haw hi .
44006001	Hunte a ngeideuh ten nungzuitute cu tam dedeuh in Judah mi le Grik awnin a awntu Judah mitei laklawh ah buainak um hi . Grik awn a mangtu Judah mi pawl ten nisial in a kuulmi leinak tangka a sep haw ten meivong ten a co haw tuk zah co haw ma hi tin , “ phuciak li ” haw hi .
44006002	Mahhangin nungzuitu sawm le panih pawl ten umtu hempoh te cu munkhat ah samkhawm in , “ Sumlepai tangka hangin Pathian thu phuannak ah a daithaang uh tale pha tuk ma hi .
44006003	Mahhangin ute naute , nohtei lakah Hawvang Thiangtho cahnak tuah a dimmi mihing salih teng un na amuh te cu hi thu a vaihawmtu tukin koih tuk hung hi .
44006004	Kohte cu ka hun can uh a venghawng in thungetnak le thuhilhnak in mang tuk ung hi .
44006005	Nungzuitu sawm le panih tei ngaihsutnak piakmi i humah a venghawng haw in lungdamzet in upnak le Hawvang Thiangtho tuah in a dimmi Stefen teng haw in , Filip , Prokholas , Nikanor , Timon Parmenas le Antiok khua pen Gentail mi Judah biaknak sungah a tummi Nikolas te teng haw hi .
44006006	A salih haw cun nungzui tei lakah hawhpih haw in nungzuitu ten a luhum haw ah khutsuan in thunget sak haw hi .
44006007	Mahtihcun Pathian thu cu khang pepel hi . Umtu nungzuitute Jerusalem ah khang dedeuh in thiampi tampi ten a upnak haw cu pom bok haw hi .
44006008	Pathian ii thupha piakmi le cahnak huham tuah a dimmi Stefen in mipi tei lakah nalamdang le thasiahhuai tampi bawl hi .
44006009	Mahnaven salsuak pawl tei sungpen Stefen tuah thu eeldunnak piangin mahmi Stefen ii thu eeltu lakpen , Sairin khua le Elexandria khua pen a hengmi Judah mite vang tel haw hi . Mahten Silisia le Asia ngam aa Judah mite hei cu tel bok haw hi .
44006010	Mahnaven Stefen cu Hawvang in cahnak pia in a ot ten kuamah in eel thei haw ma hi .
44006011	Mahhangin mi hekkhat te khi nawhthuh pia in mah miten , “ Moses le Pathian dodal in awn hi tin thei ung hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44006012	Mahtincun mipi te , upa te le Daanthiam mite khi a thinhaw uuktuk vo in so haw hi . Stefen cu man in khonsil upa tei maiah hen haw hi .
44006013	Mahten zolthu bawltu tukin mi hekkhat te pui haw in mah miten “ Hi pa hin ka Biakinn thiangtho uh le Moses Daan te hi zawnsak le nautat kam in awn leleng hi .
44006014	“ Hi Nazareth mi Jesuh in hi biakinn hi phialet khawngin Moses i khan pen keimu khan tian a ummi apupa uh tei daan vang cu theekkhawng tuk hi , tin a ot laih thei ung hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44006015	Khonsil pumkhawmnak sungah a telmi hempoh ten Stefen cu zo in Stefen ii maicang cu vancung mitei mai bangin mu haw hi .
44007001	Thiampi Saang cun Stefen cu , “ Mahtin a tih haw mi khi thu ngangai maw ? ” tin dong hi .
44007002	Stefen cun “ U le naute , nu le pate , ngai hemun ! A pu uh Abraham hi Haran ah um tukin a hawh laihngawlin Mesopotamia pen Pathian ii sunloihnak a lakah langin ,
44007003	‘ Na nampih le na mun le ngam zam in na , ka laktukmi ngamah hawh in hi , ” tin ti hi .
44007004	Mahtihcun a ngam pen tuul in Haran khua ahcun um hi . Abraham ii thihnung ten a tu na umnak uh ngam ah hin Pathian in ceengtiik hi .
44007005	Mahlaihcun hi ngam hi Pathian in hi tihhin thutiam a bawl lai in Abraham pia malaih hi ; mahnaven a lakah piaktukin thutiam in , hi ngam hi nangmah le na casuan tei ta tuk hi , tin ti hi . Pathian in hi tihhin thutiam a bawl lai in Abraham cu ca nei ma hi .
44007006	Pathian in a lakah , ‘ Na casuan te cu ngamdang ah um haw tuk hi ; mahlai ngam ah cun mi sal in kum zali sung cimnak thuak haw tuk hi .
44007007	Mahnaven naa a dehsak haw mi miphun tei humah cun thukhen nak neitung aa , mahnungte cun mahngam pen tuul in hi ngam pen keimah bia haw tuk hi , ’ tin ti hi .
44007008	Mahten Pathian in Abraham cu vunceep tannak daan a thutep mi melciknak tuk in pia hi . Mahhangin Abraham in a capa Isak a hinceng nipi khat ten a vunceep tan leh hi . Isak in a capa Zakop ii vunceep tansak in , Jakob vang in a capa sawm le panih tei vunceep te tan sak hi . A capa sawm le panihte cu a miphun uh cihahtu a pu uh mi minthang mite hi haw hi
44007009	“ Jakob capa pawlten a naupa Josef cu iksik in Izip tei lakah salin zuak haw hi . Mahnaven Pathian cu ama lakah um in a haksatnak sung pen himdam no in puisuak hi .
44007010	Izip kumpi pai maiah a dinten Pathian in Josef cu ziaza mawi le cahnak pia in Izip kumpi pan a ngambuppi humah hihen , a innsang hum ah hi hen uktu bawi dektiik hi .
44007011	Izip ngam le Kanaan ngam sungah paampi a henten mipi tei caa in haksatnak tampi heng hi . A pupa te uh vang an ngahthei haw ma hi .
44007012	Jakob in Izip ngam ah an um tih a theihten a capa te , a pu le pa uhte cu veikhatnak hawhtiik hi .
44007013	A veinihnak Izip a hen haw ten a u tei lakah Josef cun a mah le mah phuangdun in Izip kumpi pan Josef ii unaupih te hi tin thei ngah hi .
44007014	Mahhangin Josef in apa Jakob le a unaupih tei lakah Izip ngam ah vaaitukin thucah hi . A enghawng hawin mihing sawm salih le panga haw hi .
44007015	Mahten Jakob cu Izip ngam ah hawh hi ; mahlai pen amah le a cate cu thi haw hi .
44007016	A luangcu Shekem ah hawhpih in Abraham in Hamor miphun tei lakpen tangka in a leimi khaan ah phum haw hi .
44007017	“ Pathian in Abraham lakah thu a tepmi a kimnak hun a nai dedeuh ten Izip ngam aa a ummi a miphun pih uhte cu tam dedeuh haw hi .
44007018	A dawltabelten Josef i thu a theingawltu kumpi pakhat in Izip ngam cu uk hi .
44007019	A pulepate uh cu zolin bawlsia hi ; a cate vang cu thi hen tin a inn sung hawpen pualam ah vawktuultiik hi .
44007020	Mahhun laihkhin nauno mawizet Moses tih mi khi hing hi . Moses cu inn ah ha thum sung phano in cawm haw hi .
44007021	Pualam ah a vawk haw ten kumpi bawipai canu in la in , a capa a cang tuk in , cing khawi hi .
44007022	Izip mitei cihnak hempoh te zilhin a awnkam le a dehnak in mi maktak ahihnak khi langtiik hi .
44007023	“ Moses cu kum sawmli a kimten a phunpih Israel mite i tin nung haw him tih thei nuam in zo kawkawi hi .
44007024	Mahlaihtak cun a phunpih Israel mi pakhat cu Izip pai bawl siat lih mi khi a muhten bawmin Izip pa cu that hi .
44007025	( Pathian in amuh te luattiiktu tukin mangin ka phunpih te hei cun theitum haw tuk , tin ngaisung naven thei haw ma hi . )
44007026	A zing ten Israel mi panih a sual dun li khi mu in a khen tukin um hi . ‘ Unaupih te , ngai hem un ! Noh te cu mi phunkhat Israel mi veve uh ci ! Itakaw hiticun na sualdun lih uh ? tin ti hi .
44007027	Mahnaven a phunpih a zawnsaktu pan Moses cu nawmvawkin Akua in kaw koh humah uktu le thukhentu tukin a bawl ?
44007028	Zantak aa Izip mipa na thah bangkhin that nuam bok cim ? ’ tin ti hi .
44007029	Mahmicu Moses in a theih ten Izip ngam pen taai in Midian ngam ah um hi . Mahlai pen capa panih nei hi .
44007030	“ Kum sawmli nungten Sinai Mual eel ngamkhing mun aa hampa alh sung pen Moses lakah vancungmi pakhat lang hi .
44007031	Mahmicu Moses in amuh ten lamdangsa in zo cangcian tukin hampa alh ii eel ah cun neek hi . Mahnaven Topai aw cu thei in ,
44007032	‘ Keimah hi na pupa uhtei Pathian , Abraham ii Pathian , Isak le Jakob ii Pathian ing hi , ” tin ti hi . Moses cu thinsu in caantawtok in a zo hei zo ngam ma hi .
44007033	Topa cun , ‘ Na kedam duuk in , itahimtitale na dinnak mun cu mun thianghi !
44007034	Izip ngam aa ka mihingte a thuaknak haw le a cim khamnak haw mu ing hi . Ataunak haw thei ing aa amuh te luattiik tukin hung ing hi . Hung in , Izip ngamah hahtung , ’ tinti hi .
44007035	“ Moses cu Israel mitei lawlawng mi pa hi . ‘ Akua in kaw koh hum ah uktu le thukhentu tuk in a bawl ? ’ tin ti haw hi . Hampa alh sungpen a lakah a langmi vancungmi i bopnak hangin Pathian in Israel mi uktu tuk in le luattiiktu tukin a hahmi pa hi .
44007036	Izip ngam pen Israel mite cu puitul suakin Izip ngam le tuipisan le ngamkhing lakah kum sawmli sung nalamdang le thil thasiahhuai tampi bawl hi .
44007037	Moses cu Israel mitei lakah , ‘ Pathian in nangmu lakah keimah a hah bangin kamsang hah tuk aa mahpa cu nangmu miphun sungpen hi tuk hi , ’ tin titu pa hi .
44007038	Amahcu Israel mite ngamkhing aa a um haw laihin amu lakah a tel lelengtu pa hi ; a pu le pa uh tei lakah um bokin Sinai mual pen vancungmi ii awnkam a saangtu le a lakah a umtu hi ; Mahten Pa Pathian ii thunung ohtei lakah a hen theihnak tukin a sangtu hi sih hi .
44007039	Mahnaven a pu le pa uh ten amah cu zui nuam haw ma hi ; Amah cu zamin Izip ngamah kikleh nuam saw haw hi .
44007040	Mahhangin Aron lakah , “ Lampuitu tukin pathian tampi bawlsak in hi . Izip ngam pen a pui tuultu Moses humah a i pianghum tih theileh matoh ung hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44007041	Mahtihbang ahih hangin khuicang mel cuangin khui milim bawlin dawi biakpiak nak khut in bawlcopmi ii caa in upatnak puai bawlli haw hi .
44007042	Mahhangin Pathian in nungheekin kamsang tei laibu sung a ngat bangin van a aksi te biatiik hi . Mah laibu sungah cun : “ Israel mite , kum sawmli sung ngan te ngo in dawi biakpiaknak na bawl mi uh khi keima lakah na bawlmi uh hi ma hi .
44007043	Na puakmi uh buuk cu Molek ngamhuai tei puanbuuk hi . Na puak uh mi milim cu na aksi khuasia uh Refan zuk hi . A muhte biatuk in na bawlmi uh te hi khuahuai milim hi . Mahhangin nohte cu Babilon kal lamah , hawlvawk tung , ” tin um hi .
44007044	“ A pu le pa uh ten Thutepnak Puanbuuk cu ngunphil ngam ah nei leleng haw hi . Mah Puanbuuk cu Pathian in Moses lakah a langtiik mi pungsaan bangin sak mi hi .
44007045	Anung ten apu le pa uh ten mah puan buuk cu a pulepa haw tei lak pen la in Joshua tuah a hawh haw tian hawhpih haw in ; mailam not in Pathian in mahlai ngam aa a um miphun te hawlvawksak in mahlai ngamte cu a laak pepel haw ten puanbuuk cu keng pepel in mahlaiah cun David khan tian in um hi .
44007046	David cu Pathian maiah mitmai pha ngahin Jakob Pathian ii umnak tukin inn pakhat sa thei tukin Pathian lakah in ngen hi .
44007047	Mahnaven inn a satu ngangai cu Solomon hi .
44007048	“ Mahnaven Cungnungbel Pathian cu mihing tei khut bawlmi inn ah um ma hi ; Kamsang ten hitin son haw hi .
44007049	‘ Vancung hi ka khunnak hi aa leihum cu ka ke sihnak hi , tin Topan ti hi . Kei caa in i tibang in him na sak tum uh ? Ka um nuamnak mun cu i lai tawk him ?
44007050	Hi thil hempoh a bawltu hi keimah hi ma tang maw ? tin ti hi .
44007051	“ Na lungmu uh khoh zet si uh ci ! Na lungmu uh cu Pathian thei ngawl lai lungmu hi . Pathian thu ngaihnak tuk cun na beng uh bul thong si maw ? Nangmuh tevang cu na pulepate bangbok leng thong si uh ci . Hawvang Thiangtho dodal leleng uh ci !
44007052	Napu napa uh tei bawlsiat ngawl mi kamsang pakhat beek um haw ni maw ? A dikmi Pathian ii Salpa hungtuk hi tin nidang laih cawngin a phuangtu Pathian ii palai te that haw . Tu in mah a dikmi a salpa cu zuakin that uh ci !
44007053	Vancung mitei kenmi Pathian ii daan cotu cu nangmuh te hi hi uh ci ; mahnaven mah daan a zui ngawltu cu nangmuh leleng hi uh ci , ” tin Stefen in ti hi .
44007054	Khonsil upa ten Stefen ii thu son a theih haw ten thin uuk leita in hacang ngawisan haw hi .
44007055	Mahnaven Stefen cu Hawvang Thaingtho tuah dim in van zo to in Pathian sunloihnak le Pathian taklam ah Jesuh a dingleng khi mu hi .
44007056	Mahten , “ Zo hem un ! Van hong in Pathian taklam ah mi capa a ding leng khi mu ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
44007057	Mahten khonsil upa pawlte cu a benghaw hupin ngingpin au in Stefen cu man haw hi .
44007058	Khuapi sung pen kai tuul in suangtuah sep haw hi . A septu ten a puan haw te cu Sawl a tih haw mi tangval pai lakah koih taa haw hi .
44007059	Suangin a seh lih haw lai cun Stefen in Topa sam in , “ Topa , Jesuh , ka Hawvang la zazal in hi ! ” tin au hi .
44007060	A khukdin in , “ Topa , a sualnak haw te hi ciingleleng ta pah sun ! ” tin ngingpin au hi . Mahtin a au cengten catsuk tahi . Mahtibangin Stefen a thah haw cu Sawl vangin a lungkim bok hi .
44008001	Mahni penpan Jerusalem a Pawlpi te cu na siazetin bawlsiatnak thuak haw hi . Nungzuitu te sialngawl , a dang umtu hempoh cu Judah ngam le Samaria ngamsungah khenkeh khawng haw hi .
44008002	Stefen cu Pathian a lautu hekkhat ten phum in nasiazet in kah haw hi .
44008003	Mahnaven Saul cun samtuam Pawlpi siatsuah tukin innkhat nung innkhat ah tum in numei , pano tih umgawl umtu hempohte cu a in hawpen dok tul in thawngah khia hi .
44008004	A khenkhek mi umtu te cu khua tihkim ah hengin a hennak munkim pen Thuthangpha phuang haw hi .
44008005	Filip cu Samaria khuapi ah hawhin Messiah ii thu cu phuang hi .
44008006	Mi tampi ten a thu hilh mi cu phanoin ngai haw in nalamdang a bawlmite vang mu haw hi .
44008007	Mi tampi tei sung pen khuasia te nasiapi in au ngungun thah cun tuul in mizeng le kezawng pawlte hei cu dam haw hi .
44008008	Mahhangin mah khuapi sungah cun lungdamnak tampi um hi .
44008009	Mahlai khua ahcun Simon a tih haw mi pa um hi . Hun ngeithim sung cu a mitzial thiamnak in Samaria mite cu mangbang vo in bawl hi . Keimah hibel ing , tin ngaisung bok in ,
44008010	khuapi sung aa a ummi hempoh aneu a ngeng in a thu cu ngai haw hi . Amuh cun , “ Amah hi , ‘ A maksan mi Huham , ’ tihmi Pathian ii cahnak huham hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44008011	Hun ngeipi sung cu mitzial a thiamnak i hangin amthong in a bawl hangin a thu a zuinak haw cu na hi hi .
44008012	Mahnaven Filip ii hilhmi Pathian Uknak Thuthangpha le Jesuh Khrih ii thu le la a theih haw ten um in numei hihen , pano hihen , baptizam-nak la haw hi .
44008013	Simon vang cun um bok hi ; baptizam-nak a lak celh ten Filip cu zui in lamdangzet le thasiahhuai thil tampi Filip ii bawlmi khi a muhten lamdang sa mahtak hi .
44008014	Jerusalem aa a ummi nungzuitu pawl ten Samaria mite hei in Pathian ii awnkam pom bok li haw zo tih a theih haw ten amu lakah Piter le Johan hawhtiik haw hi .
44008015	A lak haw ah a hen haw ten umtu pawl ten Hawvang Thiangtho a ngah theihnak haw tukin amu caa in thungen haw hi .
44008016	Itahimtitale Hawvang Thiangtho cu kuamah i lakah heng malaih hi ; Topa Jesuh minbek in baptizam nak la bek tu hi haw laih hi .
44008017	Mahten Piter le Johan te cun a hum haw ah a khut haw suangin thu angen haw ten Hawvang Thiangtho cu ngah haw hi .
44008018	Nungzuitu ten a khut haw a suan haw ten umtu tei Hawvang Thiangtho a ngah haw khi Simon in mu hi . Mahten Piter le Johan i lakah cun ,
44008019	“ Kei hei in a hum haw ah ka khut ka suan mi hempoh ten Hawvang Thiangtho a ngah theih haw nak tuk in hi cahnak huham pia bok un hi , ” tin ti hi .
44008020	Mahnaven Piter cun , “ Pathian ii piakmi laksawng hi tangka in lei thei tung tin na ngaihsut hang in nangmah le na tangka cu siatnak ah heng ta hen ,
44008021	Pathian ii muhnak ah na lungmu a maanngawl hangin kei mu nadehnak sungah tel ma ci , covo vang neima ci .
44008022	Hitihbang thil pha ngawl na ngaihsut sualnak pen sikkik in na , hitihbang thilpha ngawl na ngaihsut sualmi a ngaihthiam theihnak tukin Topai lakah thungen in hi .
44008023	Itahimtitale iiksiiknak tuah a dimmi le sualnak thawng sungah ata mi ci , tih hi mu ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
44008024	Mahten Simon cun Piter le Johan lakah , “ Hehpihnak in hi na otmi uhte hi ka humah a hen tuk ngawlnak in Pathian lakah thungetsak zazal un hi , ” tin ngen hi .
44008025	Pathian awnkamte phuangin amuh mi le a tawh haw mite a hilh ceng haw ten Piter le Johan cu Jerusalem ah kik leh haw hi . A kihleh lam haw ten Samaria ngamsung khua no tampite ah Thuthangpha cu hilh pepel haw hi .
44008026	Topai vancungmi in Filip lakah cun , “ Na vanthawi in na hanglam ah Jerusalem pen Gaza hawhnak lampi ah hawh in hi , ” tin ti hi . ( Tulaih cun hi lampi cu mang haw ma hi . )
44008027	A tihbang cun bawmbawl in Filip cu hawh hi . Mahlaihtak cun Ethiopia pa pakhat amu khua lam ah a pin li cu tawk hi . Mahmi pa cu tilngeh mi hi aa Ethiopia kumpi nui neih mi sum le paai hempoh a cingkhawitu bawi hi . Amah cu Jerusalem ah Pathian bia tukin hung hi , a cipuh leeng tuah a inn lamah a pin mi hi . A cipuh leeng hum pen laisial thah in , a sial lih mi cu kamsang Isaiah laibu hi .
44008028	
44008029	Hawvang Thiangtho in Filip lakah cun , “ Hawh inna hi cipuh leeng khi neek in hi , ” tin ti hi .
44008030	Filip cu tai in Isaiah lai a sial lihmi cu za hi . Filip cun , “ Na sial lihmi cu a sullam thei cim ? ” tin dong hi .
44008031	Mahmi bawi cun , “ Kuamah in a hilh ciang haw ta ngawl cun a i tang theithei tuk him ? ” tin don hi . Mahten Filip cu , a cipuh leeng hum ah kaito in hi tin zawm hi .
44008032	A sial mi Lai Thiangtho caang cu a nuailam a bang in hi : “ Amah cu thah tukin puimi tuu bangin hawhpih haw aa , tuuno a mul a meh hawten a haampo ngawl bangin , awn ngawlin daiden no in um hi .
44008033	Zotsak nautatnak thuak in , pantu kuamah hei nei ma hi : leihum pen a nunnak a laaksak haw hangin , a ci hah mi kuamah hilhtuk um haw ma hi , ” tin um hi .
44008034	Mah bawi cun Filip cu , “ Hilh hem in ! Kamsang Isaiah i ot mi hi a koi thu kaw ? ” tin dong hi .
44008035	Mahten Filip cun mah Lai Thiangtho caang penpan Topa Jesuh ii Thuthangpha cu hilh khawng hi .
44008036	Mahtihcun hawh ngut haw in , tui umnak mun heng haw hi . Mah bawi cun , “ Hilaihah tui um . Baptizam laaknak tukin a i kaw a khaktu ? ” tin ti hi .
44008037	( Filip cun , “ Na lungmu hempoh in na um ta cun baptizam-nak pia tuk poh e , ” tin ti hi . Mahmi bawi cun , “ Um ing , Jesuh Khrih cu Pathian Capa hi tin um ing , ” tin ti hi . )
44008038	Mah bawi cun a cipuh leeng cu dingtiik in Filip tuah tui sungah cun tolhsuk in Filip in baptizam-nak pia hi .
44008039	Tuisung pen a suah hawten Topai Hawvang cun Filip cu thiak ta hi . Mah bawi in Filip cu mu leh ma toh hi ; mahnaven lungdamzet cun a inn lam ah in pin hi .
44008040	Filip cu Ashdod ah henghi . Sisaria ah cun hawh in lampi tuan lamel khua sung hempoh ah Thuthangpha cu hilh pepel hi .
44009001	Mahhun hawngah Saul cu Topai nungzui tute khi that tukin thuum li hi . Thiampi Saang lakah cun hawh in ,
44009002	Damaskas khua Pumkhawm inn uktu pawl ten amah khi a theih haw nak tukin lai ket tuk khi ngen hi . A tuptah mi cu mahlai ah Topai lampi a zuitu a um haw tale numei pano ti ngawlin man khawng in Jerusalem ah pui tung , tin ti hi .
44009003	Saul cu Damaskas khua a henkuan no ten thakhat in vanpen vaaknak in a mah cu Kap suk hi .
44009004	Saul cu leiah lumin “ Saul , Saul , itahim kei na bawlsiat ? ” tin aw pakhat za hi .
44009005	Saul cun , “ Topa , a kua cim ? ” tin dong hi . Mahmi aw cun , “ Na bawlsiat lihmi Jesuh ing hi .
44009006	Tho in khuapi sungah hawh inna na bawlkuul mi khi hilh haw tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
44009007	Saul tuah khual a zin mi pawl te cu cawl khawng haw in kamkhat no hei awn haw ma hi ; aw cu zaten haw naven kuamah mu haw ma hi .
44009008	Saul cu lei pen thoto in a mit hakto naven i mah mu thei ma hi . Mah ahih hangin a khut pen kaai in Damaskas khua sungah cun hawhpih haw hi .
44009009	Nithum sungcu khua mu thei ma hi ; mah nithumsung cu i mah eima hi , tui hei in ma hi .
44009010	Damaskas khua sungah cun Khristian pakhat Ananias tihmi um hi . Muhnak a muhmi pakhat nei in mah amuhmi sungpen Topan , “ Ananias ” tin sam hi . Amah cun , “ Topa , hilah um ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
44009011	Topa cun , “ Na vaithawi in na Lampi Cam tihmi ah hawhin hi . Juda ii inn ah Tarsas khua mi Saul tihmi pa um maw tin dong in hi . Amah cu thungen li laihtak hi ;
44009012	Amah vangcun muhnak mu in mah muhnak sungah cun a mit khua a muh leh theihnak tukin Ananias tihmi pacu tum in a lu humah a khut koih in mu hi , ” tin ti hi .
44009013	Ananias cun , “ Topa , hipai thu hi mi tampi ten hilh li zo haw toh hi , Jerusalem khua aa na mihing tei humah thilpha ngawl a bawl mitevang hilh haw hi .
44009014	Mahten tu hei in Thiampi upa pawl tei thuneihnak tuah nangmah a biatu hempoh te man tukin Damaskas ah hin heng hi , ” tin ti hi .
44009015	Topan a lakah in , “ Hawhin hi , itahimtitale amah cu Gentail mi le kumpi tei lakah le Israel mitei lakah ka minthangtiik tukin le ka nadektu tukin teng zo ing hi .
44009016	Mahten keiman keima caa a thuaktuk mite cu lak tung hi , ” tin ti hi .
44009017	Mahhangin Ananias cu hawhin Saul ii umnak inn ah cun tumin Saul ii lu humah a khut suangin , “ Unau pa Saul , hilailam na hun laihin lampi pen nangma lakah a langmi Jesuh Topa amah rori in na lakahtiik hi . Khua na muh leh theihnak tukin le Hawvang Thiangtho tuah na dim theihnak tukin nangma lakahtiik hi , ” tin ti hi .
44009018	Thakhat in Saul ii mit pen ngasa lip bang cu caak in khua mu leh thei hi . Dingto in baptizam-nak la hi .
44009019	Mahten an ei in thazaang nei leh hi . Saul cu Damaskas khua aa umtu tei lakah ni demno sung um hi .
44009020	A pumkhawm inn Pumkhawmnak te ah cun hawh in Jesuh cu Pathian Capa hi tih thu te phuang hi .
44009021	A theitu hempoh te cun lamdangsa mahtak in , “ Jerusalem pen Jesuh a umtu pawpoh a that litu khi amah hizuh ma maw ? Mahtihbangleng cun hilai mun ah hei in mahtihbang um tute cu man in thiampi upa tei lakah henpih tukin a hungmi hi si maw ? ” tin dongdun leilui li haw hi .
44009022	Mahnaven Saul ii thuhilh mi cu mualnei dedeuh in Jesuh cu Messiah rori hi tih a sonmi khin mi thin sungah ciangzet in tumin Damaskas khua aa a ummi Judah miten a thu cu don thei haw ma hi .
44009023	Ni tamthim a ngeiten Judah mite cu tawkdun khawm hawin Saul that tukin thuvai kum haw hi .
44009024	Mahnaven mahtihbangin a vaikup haw mi cu a hilhtu um haw in Saul cun thei hi . Amah that nuambel te cun khuapi kongka te cu a sun a zan in cing haw hi .
44009025	Mahnaven Saul a zuitu pawl ten zankhat cu bawm sungah koih in khuapi upnak pang awng pen a pualam ah cun khiasuk haw hi .
44009026	Saul cu Jerusalem ahcun hawh in nungzuitu te khi phialtum hi . Mahnaven nungzuitu te cun nungzui hi bokzo tih khi sangthei ngawl in amah cu lau zet haw hi .
44009027	Mahten Barnabas cun bawmin nungzui tei lakah hawhpih hi . Barnabas in nungzuitei lakah cun Damaskas lampi pen Topa a tawhnak le Topai a lak aa a otmi khi ciangzet in hilh hi . Mahten Saul in Jesuh min in Damaskas khua ah ngaalpha zet in a thuphuannak te khi son hi .
44009028	Mahhangin Saul cu amuhtei lakah cun um in Jerusalem khua sung le khua hempoh ah hawh in ngaalhangzetin Jesuh min in thu phuang hi .
44009029	Grik awn mangtu Judah mitei lakah vang thuhilh in eeldun haw hi , mahnaven amuh te cun thah tuk ngeh tum haw hi .
44009030	Mahmi cu umtu ten a theih haw ten Saul cu Sisaria ah pui haw in Tarsas ah kuat haw hi .
44009031	Mahtih cun Judah ngam , Galilee ngam le Samaria ngamsung a Pawlpi te cu ngimta noin um haw hi . Pawlpi cu Hawvang Thiangtho ii bopnak tuah cak dedeuh in , mipum vang khang tawto haw hi . Pathian kihca no in um haw hi .
44009032	Piter cu khua le vannuai ah hawh in veikhat cu Lidda khua aa a ummi Pathian thu awih pawl tei lakah zin tukin hawh hi .
44009033	Mahlaiah cun Aenias a tih haw mi pa tawk hi . Aenias cu a tizawng in kumliat sung ihkhun pen a tho thei ngawl in a na mi hi .
44009034	Piter in , “ Aenias , Jesuh Khrih in nangmah damtiik hi . Tho inna na zau phah zial in hi , ” tin ti hi . Thakhatin Aenias cu tho hi .
44009035	Lidda le Sharon aa a um hempoh ten Aenias a muh haw hangin Topa cu zuan li haw hi .
44009036	Joppa khua ah cun Tabitha a tih haw mi numei nu um in , Jesuh umtu hi . ( A Grik min cu Dorka tih hi aa , a sullam cu “ Sazuk ” tihnak hi . ) A hun neih hempoh cu thilpha bawlnak le mi ca-ngah bopnak in mang hi .
44009037	Mah hun ah mahnu cu nasiazet in naa in thi hi . A luangcu som in humta khaan ahcun koih haw hi .
44009038	Joppa khua cu Lidda khua pen naino hi . Mahten Joppa khua ah a ummi umtu pawlten Lidda ah Piter um tih a theih haw ten mi panih tetiik in , “ Manlangzetin keimu lakah hungin hi , ” tin thucah haw hi .
44009039	Mahtaak Piter cun a vaithawi in a muh te cu zui hi . A hen ten Piter cu humta khaan ah puito haw hi . Mahlaiah cun meivong pawlten zuan in kap thah in a damlaih aa Dorka ii angki le kawtangki a tah mite khi lak haw hi .
44009040	Piter in khaansung pen tultiik khawngin , a khukdin in thungen hi ; mahten Dorkas ii luang lamah cun heek in , Tabitha , tho in ” tin ti hi . Dorkas cu a mit hak in Piter a muh ten khung hi .
44009041	Piter Can phong in dingtiik hi . Mahten mithiangtho te , meivongte le umtu hempoh te cu sam in nung zotoh tin amu lakah cun lak hi .
44009042	Mahthu cu Joppa khua sung hempoh ah thang in mi tampi ten Topa cu um haw hi .
44009043	Piter cu Joppa khua ah savun in thil a bawltu Simon a tih haw mi pai lakah in ni tampi sung caam hi .
44010001	Sisaria ngam ah Kornelias a tih haw mipa um hi . Amah cu , “ Italy Ngaalkap honpi , ” tihmi Rom ngaalkap uktu ngaalbawi bothum hi .
44010002	Amah cu Pathian kihcazettu hi ; a innkua hawng haw in Pathian a bia leleng tu hi haw hi . Judah mi mi ca-ngah tampi te bawmtu le catngawl Pathian lakah thu a ngen lelengtu hi .
44010003	Veikhat cu taklam nazi pathum hun hawngin muhnak mu hi ; mah a muhnak ah cun Pathian ii vancungmi pakhat a lakah hung in , “ Kornelias ! ” tin a sam khi za hi .
44010004	Mah vancung mi cu lau thahzet in zo in , Topa ? tin don hi . Vancungmi cun , “ Pathian lak na thungetmi le mi ca-ngah na bopnak humah a lungdam in na thungetnak cu thei hi .
44010005	Mahhangin Joppa khua aa Simon Piter a tih haw mipa sam tukin mi tiik in hi .
44010006	Simon Piter cu Tuipi mawk aa a ummi savun tuan thil a bawltu Simon ii inn ah cam hi , ” tin ti hi .
44010007	Mahten vancung mi cu hawhta hi ; mah ceng ten Kornelias cun a inn aa a ummi umlawh panih le ngaalkap pakhat cu sam hi . Ngaalkap pa cu biaknak lam thatho zet le ngeikhei zet mi hi aa amah a cingtu lakpen pakhat hi bok hi .
44010008	Thil a piangmi hempoh khi a hilh ceng ten Joppa khua ah cun hawhtiik hi .
44010009	A zing ten hawh haw in Joppa khua a henkuan no haw ten Piter cu sunlaihtak hawng in thungen tukin inn humlamah cun kaito hi .
44010010	Piter cu a ngilkial in an ei nuam hi ; an a bawllih haw laihtak in muhnak nei hi .
44010011	Van khi hong in puanpeekpi bang thil pakhat a kiil pali in lei humah a khiaksuk haw mi cu mu hi .
44010012	A sungah cun ngamsa a phunphun le a bok in a vaakmi ngamsa le vano a phuphun um haw hi .
44010013	Aw pakhat cun a lakah in “ Piter , dingto in hi ; ngo in ei in hi ! ” tin ti hi .
44010014	Mahnaven Piter cun , “ Topa , mah ma hi ! A thiangngawlmi le a nawngkai mi cu ei hihiim mang hi , ” tin ti hi .
44010015	Aw cun hilh thuahleh in , “ Pathian ii thiang a tihmi cu thiang ngawlin ngaisung pah sun , ” tin ti hi .
44010016	Mahmi cu veithum tian langin mahnung ten mahmi thil cu vanah lato leh hi .
44010017	Mah muhnak ii sullam cu Piter in a ngaihsut lih laihtakin Kornelias iitiik mite cu Simon umnak inn ahcun heng haw in kongka pualam ah ding haw hi .
44010018	“ Hilaiah hin Simon tihmi mikhual um maw ? ” tin sam haw hi .
44010019	Piter cun a muhmi ii sullam a ngaihsut lih laihtak cun Hawvang cun , “ Ngai in , hi mi pathum ten nangmah zei haw hi !
44010020	Vaithawi inna hawhten hi ; mahten amu lakah na hawhtuk cu lungmu aicaan pahsun ; keima tiikmite hi haw hi , ” tin ti hi .
44010021	Mahhangin Piter cu tolhsuk in a zeitu tei lakah cun , “ Na zei uhmi cu keimah ing hi . A ii kaw na kin uh ? ” tin dong hi .
44010022	Amuh ten , “ Ngaalbawi Kornelias intiik hi . Amah cu mipha zet hi . Pathian bia mi hi aa Judah tei upat zet mi hi . Na hilh tukmi khi thei hen tin a inn ah nangmah pui tukin keimuhtiik hi ” tin ti haw hi .
44010023	Piter cun mahzan cu ama lakah caam hih tukin zawm in caam haw hi . A zing ten Piter cun vaithawi in amuh te tuah cun hawh haw hi ; Joppa khua aa Khrih umtu hekkhat tevang tel bok haw hi .
44010024	A zinglawi ten Sisaria ah cun hengin Kornelias cun a unaupih te le a sawmmi a ngualcamte tuah in ngak leng haw hi .
44010025	Piter cu a inn ah a hen ten Kornelias cun muak in a maiah kuun in a kebul ah bok hi .
44010026	Mahnaven Piter cun dingtiik in , “ Ding in ! Kei vaang mihing bok ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
44010027	Inn sungah a tumthah in Piter cun Kornelias cu otpih pepel hi ; inn sungah cun mi tampi khungkhawm haw hi .
44010028	Piter in amuh tei lakah , “ Eimu biaknak daan bangin titacun Judahmi ten Gentail mite dang leen tuk le phialtuk cu kham khawng mi hi tih cu na theihkhawng mi uh hi . Mahnaven kuamah mithiang ngawl le nawngkai in ngaihsut tuk mi hi ma hi tih khi Pathian in lakzo hi .
44010029	Mahhangin mitiik in na sam uh ten kamkhat no hei el ngawlin hung ing hi . Ita sam uh cim ? tihmi hilh un hi , ” tin ti hi .
44010030	Kornelias cun , “ Nithum zotoh hi , ka inn ah zanlam nazi pathum ten thungen ing . Thakhat in a dezet mi puan silh in mi pakhat ka maiah dingin ,
44010031	“ Kornelias , Pathian in na thungetnak thei in mi ca-ngah te na bop nak vaang melcik khawng hi .
44010032	Joppa ah Simon Piter a tih haw mi pa sam tukin mitiik in hi . Joppa ah cun Tuipi mawk aa a ummi savun tuah thil bawltu pa Simon ii inn ah caam hi , ” tin ti hi .
44010033	Mahhangin thakhat in sam ing hi ; mahten nangmah vang in hehpih in hung ci . Tu in Pathian maiah a venghawng uh in um ung aa Topan hilh tukin a tiikmi khi a ngaituk in ngak ung hi , ” tin ti hi .
44010034	Piter cun panto in , “ Pathian in a kuakua hei hihen a bangteen noin mihing te zo hi , tih khi tuin thei ing hi .
44010035	Itihbang miphun hei hihen Pathian lau in a maiah thilpha a bawltu a hipoh ta cun Pathian ii pom taak mi hi .
44010036	Mi hempoh tei Topa a himi Jesuh Khrih sungpen daihnak Thuthangpha cu Pathian in Israel mitei lakah pia hi , tih cu thei uh ci .
44010037	Johan in baptizam piaknak thu a hilh ceng ten Galilee penpan Israel ngamsung khua hempoh ah thil maktak a piangmi hei cu thei khawng uh ci .
44010038	Nazereth mi Jesuh ii humah i tibangin Pathian in Hawvang Thiangtho le huham buak him tihvang cu thei khawng uh ci . A lakah Pathian a um hangin khua hempoh ah hawhin thilpha bawl pepel hi . Satan ii khalhsiat mi hempoh te damtiik khawng hi .
44010039	Israel ngam sungah le Jerusalem pen a bawlmi hempoh a mutu le a theitu tetti cu keimuh hi ung hi . Mahten amah cu thinglamteh ah khenin that haw hi .
44010040	Mahnaven Pathian in thihnakpen tholeh tiik in keimu lakah langtiik hi .
44010041	Mi hempoh tei lakah hingawlin a thu theitu tukin a ten mitei lakah langtiik hi .
44010042	Mahten mitei lakah Thuthangpha hilh tukin le amah cu a nungmi le a thi mitei humah thu khentu in a bawlnak vaang a hilh tu tukintiik hi .
44010043	Kamsang hempoh ten ama thu cu hilh haw in Amah a umtu hempoh ten a min ii cahnak huham i hangin a sualnak haw ngaihdam hi tuk hi , tin ti haw , ” tin ti hi .
44010044	Mahtin Piter ii otlih laihtak cun a thuhilh mi a ngaitu hempoh tei humah Hawvang Thiangtho heng hi .
44010045	Joppa pen Piter tuah a hengmi Jesuh umtu Judah mite cu Gentail mitei lakte ah cun Pathian in a laksawng Hawvang Thiangtho buak tih khi a muh haw ten lamdangsa ngangai haw hi .
44010046	Itahimtitale mahmi pawlte cu awnphun dadangin awn in Pathian ii makzia a thangphat haw khi a theih haw hangin hi . Piter in ,
44010047	“ Eimuh ten a ngah zotoh uh bangin hi mite hei in Hawvang Thiangtho ngah bok haw hi . Mahtaak tuituah baptizam-nak la tukin a kua him a kham thei tuk , ” tin ti haw hi .
44010048	Mahhangin Jesuh Khrih minin baptizam-nak la tukin thu pia hi . Mahten amu lakah a caam hih tukin hen haw hi .
44011001	Nungzuite le Judah ngamsung ummi umtu hempoh ten Pathian ii thucu Gentail mite hei in pomngah zo haw tih khi thei haw hi .
44011002	Piter cu Jerusalem ah a hen ten Gentail mite vunceep tannak bawl tuk a deihtu pawlten Piter cu sonsia haw in ,
44011003	“ Vunceep tan ngawl Gentail mi pai inn ah ngiak in a lak haw ah an tian in ei ci , ” tin ti haw hi .
44011004	Mahtihbang ahih hangin Piter cun mahmi thu le la ah a pattungin thil a piangmi um daan hempoh te hilh khawng hi . A hilh mi cu ;
44011005	“ Joppa khua pen thu ka nget laih takin muhnak nei ing hi . Vanpen puan peekpi bangmi thil pakhat a kiil pali nei khiasuk haw in ka elno ah khun haw hi .
44011006	A sung phanoin ka zoten ngamsa le inn ngulh nganhing le bok aa a vaak theimi nganhing le hampalak aa vano te mu ing hi .
44011007	Mahten aw thei ing aa ka theih mi aw cun , ‘ Piter , ding in , ngo inna ei in hi , ’ tin ti hi .
44011008	Mahnaven kei cun , “ Topa , hi thei ma ! Biaknak lampen a thiangngawl le a nawngkai mi an cu ka kam sungah tum awng ma hi ” tin don ing hi .
44011009	Mahten vanpen aw thei leh ing aa , “ Pathian in thiang hi , a tihsa mi nangin thiangma hi tin ngaisung pahsuh , ” tin ti hi .
44011010	Mahtihcun veithum tian rori um in a dawltabel ten vanah cun lakiik leh ta hi .
44011011	Mahtibang ahih laihtak cun Sisaria pen atiik haw mi mi pathum te khi ka ngiahnak inn ah in heng haw hi .
44011012	Mahten imah aicaannak um ngawl no cun hawh tukin Hawvang cuntiik hi . Hi Joppa khua mi a unau uh paluk , Jesuh umtu ten Sisaria ahcun zuibok haw in ka venghawng uh cun Kornelias ii inn ah tum ung hi .
44011013	Kornelias in Vancungmi hungin a inn ah a dinnak thu khi hilh hi . Mah vancungmi cun Kornelias ii lakah , “ Joppa ah mitiik in na a minngai Simon Piter a tihhaw mipa samtiik in hi .
44011014	Aman thu hilhtuk aa mah a thu hilh mi i hangin nangmah le na innsang in nunpatnak ngah tuk uh ci , ” tin ti hi .
44011015	Mahten thuhilh pan ing aa a pattung in eimu humah Hawvang Thiangtho a hen bangin amu humah Hawvang Thiangtho cu hengbok hi .
44011016	Mahten Topan , “ Johan cun tui tuah in baptizam-nak pia hi ; mahnaven nohte cu Hawvang Thiangtho tuah in baptizam piak hi tuk uh ci , ” tin a tih mi phawkleh ing hi .
44011017	Pathian in Topa Jesuh a ummi oh tei lak ah Hawvang Thiangtho laksawng in a piak bangbok in , Gentail mitei lakah vang laksawng cu pia bok hi , tih cu a ciangzet mi hi . Itin kaw kei thongpoh ngawngaw in Pathian cu ka kham theih tuk ! ” tin ti hi .
44011018	Mahmi a theih hawten a sonsiatnak haw cu tawpin Pathian thang phat in , “ Pathian in Gentail mitei lakah vangin sualsihnak le nunnak hun pia bok hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44011019	Stefen a thahnung siah bawlsiatnak a um hangin Jesuh umtu hekkhat te cu khua hempoh ah khen dun khawng haw hi . Mi tampi te cu Fonisia , Saipras le Antiok tian ah hengin Judah mitebek ii lakah Thuthangpha cu hilh haw hi .
44011020	Mahnaven umtu hekkhat te cu Saipras le Sairin khua pen Antiok khua ahcun hawhin Topa Jesuh Khrih ii Thuthangpha cu Gentail mitei lakah hei in hilh haw hi .
44011021	Bawipai huham cu amu humah um in mi tampi ten saangin Topai lamah zuan haw hi .
44011022	Mahmi thu le la cu Jerusalem khua ah hengin Jerusalem Pawlpi ten Antiok khua ah Barnabas hah haw hi .
44011023	Barnabas cu Antiok khua a henten Pathian ii mipi tei lakah thupha a piak daante amuh ten a lungdam zet in a lungmu hempoh haw in Topa um in muantaakmi umtu ahih theih haw nak tukin thazaang pia hi .
44011024	Barnabas cu miphazet hi aa Hawvang Thiangtho le upkho nak tuah a dimmi pa hi . Mahticun mi tampi Bawipai lakah cun pui hi .
44011025	Mahten Barnabas cu Saul zei tukin Tarsas ah cun hawh hi .
44011026	Saul a muh ten Antiok ah cun hawhpihin kumkhat sung a panih haw in Pawlpi mihing te khi pumkhawm pih in mi tampi zilh haw hi .
44011027	Mahhun hawng cun kamsang hekkhat te cu Jerusalem pen Antiok ah hawhhaw hi .
44011028	A mu lak aa kamsang pakhat Agabas a tih haw mipa cu dingto in Hawvang ii huham tuah awn in , “ Leihum khua tihkim-ah paampi heng tuk hi , ” tin hilh ham hi . ( Mah paampi cu Klaudias ii Rom kumpi a deh sungin heng hi . )
44011029	Nungzuitu te cun a tihtheih tawk teen haw in Judah ngam aa a ummi umtu unaupihte bopnak pia tukin sonkhawm haw hi .
44011030	A son khawmhaw bangin a ngahmi haw tangka cu Barnabas le Saul ii khut ah Pawlpi upa te kuat haw hi .
