44012001	Hihun hawngin kumpi Herod in Pawlpi sungaa Khristian hekkhat te bawlsia pan hi .
44012002	Johan ii unaupih Jeim khi ngaalnam in thattiik in ,
44012003	Mahmi cun Judah mite lungdamtiik tih a muhten Piter vang cu mantiik hi . ( hihi cu Naman telngawl Cangho Puai bawl laihtak in hi . )
44012004	Piter vang cu man in thawngah khia haw hi ; thawnginn cingtu ngaalkap buli um haw in bukhat ah ngaalkap henli teen um in mahten mipi mai ah in Piter ii thucu son tukin Herod ii tuptah mi hi .
44012005	Mahtih cun Piter cu thawng sungah cun khum haw hi , mahnaven ama caa cun Pawlpi ten Pathian lakah nasia piin thunget sak haw hi .
44012006	Herod in , zingten mipi tei maiah Piter ii thuson tung tin ti in mahzan cu thawnginn cingtu ngaalkap panih tei laklawh ah Piter cu zautiik hi . Thiktaicin panih tuah khih in thawngin kongka vang cu cingkhawng hawhi .
44012007	Thakhat thu in Topai vancungmi pakhat dingin a zaunak khan haw cu vaaktiik khawng hi . Vancung mi cun Piter cu a ko pen hiingin , “ Manlangin tho in hi ! ” tin phong hi . Thakhat-in Piter ii khut pen thiktaicin cu caak cawm hi .
44012008	Mahten vancung mi cun , “ Na taikap kap inna , na kedam bun in hi , ” tin ti hi . A tihnak bangin Piter cun bawlin vancungmi in , “ Na puansilh inna zui in hi , ” tin ti hi .
44012009	Piter in zui in thawnginn pualam ahcun tuul haw hi ; vancung mi hi mahtih bangin a bawlcu thu ngaibel tuk tih ngai sung kha ma hi ; muhnak mu bel tung tin ngaisung hi .
44012010	Ngaalkap tei cinnak kongka pakhatnak cu letvawk ngah in a panihnak vangcu letvawk leleu haw hi . A tawpnak ten khuapi sung tuah a pehdun mi thik kongka ah heng haw hi . Mah kongka cu a mahno hong cawm in a panih hawcun suaktuul haw hi . Lampi cu zui haw in thakhat in vancungmi cu thamvut taa in Piter a mah nguakcang taang hi .
44012011	Mahten a hum aa thil piangmi cu cangcian zetin thei ngah in “ Tu cun a piang ngangai mi hi thei zo ing ! Herod ii thuneihnak sung pen le Judah mi pawl tei ka humah a hentiik tuk a thuduhsaam haw mi hempoh sungpen a luansuaktu tukin Topan a vancungmitiik na hi si ! ” tin ti hi .
44012012	Thil a piangmi a theihngah nung ten Johan Markaa ii nu Mary ii inn ah hawh hi ; mahlai ah cun mitampi khawm in thungen li haw hi .
44012013	Piter cun a pualam pen kongka cu kiu in umlawh nu Roda tihmi cun kong hong tukin hawh hi .
44012014	Piter ii awn hi tih khi Roda in a theihten a lungdam leita in kong hei hong man ngawlin , “ Inn pualam ah Piter ding leng ! ” tin au hi .
44012015	Amuh ten , “ A sil cim maw ? ” ti haw hi . Mahnaven , thungaivei , tin a tih lo hangin , “ Amah cingtu vancungmi hi beltuk ” ti thawtho haw hi .
44012016	Mahsung hempoh cu Piter cun tawp ngawlin kongka cu kiu leleng hi . Dawltabel ten kongka cu hon haw in Piter ahih lam a muh hawten lamdangsa ngangai haw hi .
44012017	Piter cun , “ Mengdeen in um un hi ! ” tin a khutzaapin , Topai thawng sungpen a suahtul nak thu khi amu lakah cun hilh hi . “ Hi thu hi Jeim le a dang nungzuitu te hilh un hi , ” tin ti ta in tul in mun dangah hawh hi .
44012018	Zinglam khua a vaak ten thawnginn cingtu ngaalkap te cu buai nasia zet haw hi . “ Piter i tibang um nantim ? ” tin amthong haw hi .
44012019	Piter zei tuk in Herod cun thupia hi ; mahnaven mu haw ma hi . Mahhangin thawnginn cingtu te cu a thu haw dongkan tiikin thah tuk in thupia hi . Mahnungten Judah ngam pen Herod cu tuulin Sisaria khua ahcun hun tawkfang sung um hi .
44012020	Herod cu Tai-ar le Sidon mitei humah a thin-uuk ngangai hi . Mahhangin mahmi khua pawlte cu Herod tawk tuk cun a hon in hawh haw hi . A masabel in kumpi pai inn aa hotu bel Blastas khi a mu lakah tang tuk in zawm haw hi . Mahten Herod lakah hawh hawin daihnak le lemnak bawl tukin ngen haw hi . Ita mahtin ngen haw him titale a ngamsung mitei an a ngah haw micu Herod kumpi pai ukmi ngamsung pen a ngah haw hangin hi .
44012021	A ni tep hawmi ni cun Herod kumpi pa cu a kumpi-thuam tuah a khunnakah khungin mipi tei lakah thu hilh hi .
44012022	“ Hitin a awnli tu hi mihing hikha na maw le , pathian si ! ” tin au haw hi .
44012023	Thakhatin Topai vancungmi in Herod cu nat siava in natiik hi , itahimtitale Pathian khi upatnak a piakngawl hangin hi . Herod cu nguut in a sunglam zong ei khawngin thi hi .
44012024	Pathian ii thu cu pungin khang tawto hi .
44012025	Barnabas le Saul tecu a nadeh haw tukmi a deh ceng haw hangin Jerusalem pen Johan Markaa pui in kikleh haw hi .
44013001	Antiok khua Pawlpi sungah kamsang le saya hekkhat te um haw hi . Amuh te cu Barnabas , Semeon ( mihaang tihvangin ti haw , Sairin khua mi ) Lusias , ( Mangki Herod tuah a khangcuntu ) Minian le Saul te hi haw hi .
44013002	Amuh te cu Pathian bia in an a can hawlaih in Hawvang Thiangtho in , Barnabas le Saul cu ka thiahmi naabek dektukin a dangno in um tiikun , ” tin ti hi .
44013003	Ancang in thu a nget nung hawten a lu hum hawah a khut haw suangin Barnabas le Saul cu hah haw hi .
44013004	Hawvang Thiangtho in a hah bangin Barnabas le Saul cu Sileusia ah hawh haw in mahlai pen Saipras tuikulh ah heng haw hi .
44013005	Salamis khua a hen haw ten Judah mitei Pumkhawmnak ah Pathian thu hilh haw hi . A nadeh haw bawmtu tukin Johan , Markaa pui haw hi .
44013006	Saipras tuikulh kuamsung zin pepel in Pafos khua tian in heng haw hi . Mahlaiah cun mitzialthiam Bar-Jesuh a tih haw mi cu tawk haw hi . Amah cu Judah mi hi aa kamsang ing tin a ti cop mipa hi .
44013007	Amah cu Saipras tuikulh uktu mangki Serzias Paulas ii ngualcam pa hi . Serzias Paulas cu miciipzet hi . Pathian thu theih a nuam hangin Barnabas le Saul cu ama lakah in sam hi .
44013008	Mahnaven mitzialthiam Elimas cun lem ma hi ; ( Elimas tih cu a Grik min hi . ) Serzias Paulas cu a hilh hawmi a sang tuk ngawlin so het hi .
44013009	Mahten Saul , Paul tih hei in sammi pa cu Hawvang Thiangtho tuah dimin Paul cun mitzial thiampa cu maicang zo in ,
44013010	“ Nang Satan capa ! Thilpha hempoh a dodaltu cu nangmah ci . Mi zolnak a phuphun tuah dimin Topai thudik khi zolthu ngehin cangtiik khawng tum ci .
44013011	Atu rori in Topai khut cu na humah in heng tuk hi , na mitcaw tuk aa tawkfang sung cu khuamu thei tuk ma ci , ” tin ti hi . Thakhatin Elimas ii mit cu meingo hang in khuh in amah kaaitu tuk zei in vaak li hi .
44013012	Mahtihbangin a piangmi cu mangki bawipan amuh hangin umtu in cang hi ; itahimtitale Topai thu a zilh haw mi ah lamdang sa zet hi .
44013013	Paul le a ngualcam te cu hawmkuang tuah Pafos pen hawhin Pamfilia ngam Perga khua ahkhin henghaw hi . Mahlai pen Johan Marka cun zam san in Jerusalem ah pin hi .
44013014	Perga pen hawh lehleu in Pisidia ngam Antiok khua ah heng haw hi . Mahlaiah Sabbath ni in Judah mitei pumkhawmnak ah hawhin khungtum haw hi .
44013015	Akhawmmi pawlte cun Moses laibu le Kamsang tei ngatmi laibu sung a ta a sial ceng hawten pumkhawm hotu te cun , “ Unaupih te aw , ka mipi uh tei caa in thapiaknak na nei nuam uh tale hilh un hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44013016	Paul cu dingto in a khut zaak thah cun thu hilh pan hi . “ Ka phunpih Israel mi le hilai a Pathian a bia-mi Gentail mi hempohten , ngai un hi !
44013017	Israel ii Pathian in a pulepa te uh teng in Izip ngamah a umhaw laihin miphun ngengpin bawl hi . Mah Pathian cun mah Izip ngam pen a maksanmi a huham tuah a khuthawpen doksuah tul in ,
44013018	ngamkhing sungah kumsawmli sung umpih in cingkhawi hi .
44013019	Kanaan ngam a ummi miphun phun salih te khi siatsuah khawngin ama miphun Israel te khi mah ngamluahtu in bawl hi .
44013020	Hitihbangin thil a piangmi hi kum zali le sawmnga sung ngei hi . Mahnungten kamsang Samuel khan a hen laihngawl sung cu Thukhentu te koih hi .
44013021	Mahten Israel miten kumpi ngen haw in Pathian in kumsawmli sung a kumpi haw tuk in Benjamin minam sungpen Khrih i capa Saul khi a kumpi tukin pia hi .
44013022	David ii thucu Pathian in hitihbangin ti hi : “ Jesse capa David cu ka deihmi hi . Ka bawltiik nuam hempoh khi bawl tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
44013023	Mahten David casuan Jesuh cu a tepsanak bangin Pathian in Israel te nunpantu tukin bawl hi .
44013024	Jesuh ii nadeh patdeuh laihngawlin , Johan in Israel mi hempoh tei lakah in a sualnak haw siik tukin le baptizam-nak la tukin thu hilh hi .
44013025	Mahten Johan in a nadeh a dehkhawng kuan noten mipi tei lakah , “ Keihi a kua tin ti kam uh ci ? ” tin dong hi . “ Na ngahlih uhmi cu kei kha mang hi ! Mahnaven ngaiun hi ! Amahcu keima nungten hung tuk aa kei cu a kedam khau duuktu tuk hei in taakmang hi , ” tin ti hi .
44013026	Ka phunpih Israel mi , Abraham ii casuan te le hi lai aa Pathian a biatu Gentail mite , hi nunpatnak thuthanghi a venghawnguh cain piakmi hi .
44013027	Itahimtitale Jerusalem ah a ummi mipi te le a hotu haw pawlten Jesuh cu Nunpantu hi tih khi thei haw ma hi . Kamsang tei ngatsami Sabbath nisial in a sialhaw mi thuhei khi a tihnopnak thei haw ma hi . Mahnaven Jesuh a thahnak haw in kamsang tei awnkam khi kimtiik haw hi .
44013028	Mahten a muhten Jesuh a thah theih haw nak tukin thu zei li haw hi .
44013029	Mahten Lai Thiangtho ii a thulela a hilhsa mi hempoh te khi a bawlkhawng ceng haw ten thinglamteh hum pen khi asuk in thaan ah phumhaw hi .
44013030	Mahnaven Pathian in thihnak pen tholehtiik in ,
44013031	amah tuah Galilee pen Jerusalem tian khual a zintu tei lakah nitam pi sung langhi . Tucun ama-ai in mah mite cu Israel mitei lakah thuthei tu hi haw hi .
44013032	Thuthangpha cu tu in nangmuh tei lakah pua ung hi . Apu le pa uh tei lakah Pathian cun thutiam in tuin a casuan haw keimuh tei lakah Pathian in Jesuh cu thihnak pen tholehtiik in mah a thutep mi cu kimtiik hi . Mahmi cu Saam panihnak sungah : “ Nangmah cu ka Capa ci , tuni in na Pa hi zo inghi ; tin um hi .
44013033	
44013034	Mahten Jesuh cu khaansungah muat tuk ngawlin tholeh tuk hi tih thu ah Pathian in hitin hilh zotoh hi . “ David lakah a thiangtho mile muantaak a himi thupha muicu ka tepsami cu nangmah pia tung hi , ” tin ti hi .
44013035	Mahten Saam mundang ah hei ah in , “ Muanhuaizet mi na salpa cu khaan sungah muat lalthong phal tukmaci , ” tin ti hi .
44013036	Itahimtitale David cu ama nun sungah Pathian deihmi ana cu dekbok naven , a thihten a pule pai lakah phum haw in a taksa cu khaan sungah muat ta hi .
44013037	Mahnaven Pathian in khaanpen a thawh tiikmi pai humah cun mahtih bang hima hi .
44013038	Ka phunpih Israel te , na venghawng un ciangzetin na theih tuk uh a kulmi cu : Jesuh min in sual ngaihdamnak thuthang cu nangmuh tei lakah phuan in umzo hi ; na sualnak sung pen Moses ii Daan cun luattiik theima hi , mahnaven Jesuh a umtu hempoh te cu sualnak sungpen luat haw hi , tih hi na theih uh kuul hi .
44013039	
44013040	Mahtihbang ahih hangin ngaalling un hi , a nuailam aa kamsang pawl tei son mi hi nangmu humah heng khapang tuk hi . Kamsang pawlten ;
44013041	“ Zo un hi ! Noh mi nuihcip mang pawlte ; mangbangin na thi ta un ! Itahimtitale tuni aa ka bawlmi hi , miten nangmu lakah a sonciang haw vangin , na san tukuh ngawlmi thil hi , tin hilh haw hi , ” tin ti hi .
44013042	Paul le Barnabas cu Pumkhawmnak pen tul hawin mipi ten mai Sabbath niten a hungleh tukin le mah thuthang a hilh leh tukin zawm haw hi .
44013043	Mipi pumkhawmnak pen a tawpkhek haw nungten Paul le Barnabas cu Judah mi tampi le Judah biaknak ah a tum mi Gentail mi tampi ten zui hawhi . Nungzuitu ten a muh tei lakah thu hilh in Pathian hehpihnak sungah nung leleng tukin thazaang pia haw hi .
44013044	Amai pi Sabbath ni in mi tampi , khuasung mi hempoh tih awh ngangai in Pathian ii thu thei nuam in tuul khawm haw hi .
44013045	Mahmi cu Judah mi pawlten amuh haw ten iksik in Paul ii thu hilh micu el in amuh te vangin zawnsak haw hi .
44013046	Mahnaven Paul le Barnabas cun ngaalhang seseem in thu hilh haw hi . “ Pathian ii thu cu nangmu lakah hilh masak tuk cu a kuulmi hi . Mahnaven nohten deihma uh ci , nohten el in kumkhua nunnak ngahtuk taakin na ngaihsut uh ngawl hangin zamsan tuk ung a ma , Gentail mitei lakah in hawhtuk ung hi .
44013047	Itahimtitale Topai thukham piakmi cu hitih banghin hi . “ Leihum pumpi hi nunpat ahih theihnak tuk , nohte cu Gentail mitei ca in khuavaknak in bawlzo toh ing hi , ’ ti hi ” tin ti haw hi .
44013048	Mahmi thucu Gentail miten a theih hawten lungdam mahtak haw in Bawipai Thuthangpha cu pahcawi haw hi . Mahten kumkhua nunnak ca in ten mite cu umtu in cang haw hi .
44013049	Topai thucu mahlai ngam hempoh ah in thang hi .
44013050	Mahnaven Judah mi pawlten khuasung aa upate le Pathian umtu upat taakmi Gentail numeite khi tokpil haw in mah pawlte cun Paul le Barnabas cu bawlsia in a ngamsung hawpen hawlvawk haw hi .
44013051	Paul le Barnabas cun a hum haw ah lungkim ngawl langtiiknak in a ke haw aa leivul cu thing taa in Ikoniam ah hawh haw hi .
44013052	Antiok khua aa umtu te cu lungdamnak le Hawvang Thiangtho tuah in dim haw hi .
44014001	Mahtihbang bok leleng cun Ikoniam khuaah hei in Paul le Barnabas cu Pumkhawmnakah hawh in nasiazet in thuhilh hawhi . Judahmi le Gentail mi tampi umtu in cang haw hi .
44014002	Mahnaven a sang nuam ngawl Judah mi pawl ten Gentail mite khi tokpil in umtu te khi dotiik haw hi .
44014003	Nungzuitu te cu mahlai ah cun ngeipi um haw in ngaalhang zetin Topai thu cu hilh li haw hi . Topai hehpihnak thu a hilh haw mi cu a maan hi tih langtiiknak in Topan nalamdang le thasiahuai bawltheihnak huham pia hi .
44014004	Khuasung mite cu khendun khawng haw hi . Mi hekkhatten Judah mite pan in hekkhat lam ten nungzuitu te pan haw hi .
44014005	Mahten Gentail mi hekkhat tale Judah mi hekkhat ten a hotu haw te tuah in nungzuitu te bawlsiat tuk le suang in sep tukin thu soncat haw hi .
44014006	Mahmi cu nungzuitu ten a theih hawten Likhonia ngamsung aa Listra khua , Derbe khua le a elkiim ngamte ah cun taai haw hi .
44014007	Mahlaiah cun Thuthangpha cu phuang haw hi .
44014008	Listra khua ah in pianpih kezawng in vei khat no hei a ciah thei ngawl pa um hi .
44014009	Paul ii thuhilhnak cu a khungin ngai hi . Paul i thu hilhmi cu na up uhten damnak ngah thei tih mi upnak nei hi tih khi Paul in a theih ten cangcian zet no zo in ,
44014010	ngingzetin , “ Tho inna ding in ! ” tin ti hi . Mahpa cu dawkto in lamciah thei hi .
44014011	Mahtihbang in Paul ii bawl mi cu mipi ten a muh haw ten amu Likaonia awnin , “ Pathiante mihing bang cang in eimu lakah hung suk haw si maw ! ” tin au leilui haw hi .
44014012	Barnabas cu a pathian ii min Zeus tin sa in Paul cu a awn litu bel ahih bangin a pathian ii min Hermes tin sa haw hi .
44014013	A khuahial haw ahcun a pathian haw Zeus biaknak inn um hi : mah lai aa thiampi cun khuicang le paakte cu kongka ah cawihi , itahimtitale amah le mipi ten nungzuitu tei lakah biakpiaknak a neih nuam haw hangin hi .
44014014	Mahtin a bawl tum mi haw cu Barnabas le Paul ten a theih haw ten a puan haw botkeek in a au thah cun taaingut haw hi
44014015	“ Hitih bangin itakaw bawl na tum uh ? Kohte cu nangmuh bang mihing bok ung hi ! Amah in manpha ngawl mi thil na bawlnak uh pen lei le van le tuipi le a sung a ummi hempoh a bawltu Pathian nung lakah na kihlehnak tuk uh in Thuthangpha hilh tukin hung ung hi .
44014016	Nidang laih cun a kuakua heihihen amu nuanuam mi lampi zui tukin hon hi .
44014017	Mahnaven thilpha bawlmi in amah um tih khi langtiik leleng hi : van pen nguahzutiik in a hun le caan ten anci te potiik hi ; tui le an pia in na lu-nguh muangzet in bawlhi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44014018	Mahtin a hilh haw nung heiten dawi biakpiaknak bawl tuk ngawlin nungzuitu ten mipi cu haksazet in kham thei haw hi .
44014019	Judah mi mi hekkhat te Pisidia ngam Antiok khua pen le Ikoniam khua te pen hungin mi honpi te khi amu lam ah tang tukin a bawl theih haw nung ten Paul cu suangin sep haw in ; thi zotoh tin ngaisung in khuahial ah dok in zam hawhi .
44014020	Mahnaven umtu te a el ah atawh dun khawm haw ten Paul cu tholeh in khua sungah cun hawh leh hi . A zing ten Barnabas tuah Darbe khua ah hawh haw hi .
44014021	Paul le Barnabas ten Thuthangpha cu Darbe khua ah hilh haw in nungzuitu tampi ngah hawhi . Mahnung ten Listra khua , Ikoniam khua le Pisidia ngam Antiok ah kikleh haw hi .
44014022	Umtu te khi thapia thah pepel in upnak sungah muanhuaizet in um tukin so pepel hawhi . “ Pathian Uknak sungah a tumtukmi a hi uh tacun haksatnak tampi a tawh tuk hihiim uh mi hi , ” tin zilh pepel hawhi .
44014023	Pawlpi umnak pawpoh ah cun Pawlpi upa koih pepel in thungetnak le an cannak tuah a muanhawmi a Topa haw ii lakah apnak bawl pepel hawhi .
44014024	Pisidia ngamah a lehvawk nung haw ten Pamfilia ngamah heng hawhi .
44014025	Thuthangpha Perga khua ah hilh in mahnung ten Attalia khua ah hawh haw hi .
44014026	Mahlai pen hawmkuang in Antiok khua ah kik leh haw hi . Antiok khua cu tu aa a celhhawmi a nadeh haw dek tukin Pathian lakah a piakdunnak haw khua khi hi .
44014027	Antiok khua a hen haw ten Pawlpi mizapi te cu samkhawm in Pathian ii a muh te a man ziadaan le Gentail mite Pathian thusang tukin lampi a honsaknak te khi hilh hawhi .
44014028	Mahlai ahcun umtu te tuah in ngeipi sung um langkhat haw hi .
44015001	Mi hekkhat Judah ngam pen Antiok khua ah cun hung in , “ Moses daan ii tiiknak bangin vunceep tannak na bawl uh tangawlcun nunpatnak ngah thei tuk ma uh ci , ” tin zilh li haw hi .
44015002	Mah thu cu Paul le Barnabas in nasiazet in el haw hi ; mahten a tawpnak ah hithu ahhin nungzuitu te le Pawlpi upa te Jerusalem pen tawkdun tukin Paul le Barnabas le Antiok khua aa upa pawltetiik haw hi .
44015003	A hawh haw ten Pawlpi te cun hen hawhi . Mahten Fonisia le Samaria ngam pal thah in mahlai aa Gentail mite i tibangin Pathian lamah thinthek zo haw toh tih khi theitiik pepel hawhi . Mahthu a theih hawten umtu te cu a lungdam mahtak haw hi .
44015004	Jerusalem a hen hawten nungzuitu te le Pawlpi te le Pawlpi upa ten muak hawin , a muaktu tei lakah cun amuh mangin Pathian ii nadehnak khi akim no in hilh haw hi .
44015005	Mahnaven Farasi tei lakah a tel mite umtu hekkhat pawlten , “ Gentail mite cu vunceep a tan hihiim haw kuul , Moses daanzui tukin a hilh uh kuul hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44015006	Mahhangin nungzuitu te le Pawlpi upa te cu mahthu sonkhawm tukin tawkdun khawm haw hi .
44015007	Hun ngeipi a eeldun ceng haw ten Piter cu dingto in , na theihsa uh bangin , kei hi nangmu lakpen Gentail miten Thuthangpha thei haw in a uptheih bok hawnak tukin Thuthangpha a mu lakah hilh tukin Pathian in a tennak ngeizo hi .
44015008	Mahten mi hempoh tei ngaihsutnak a theikhawngtu Pathian in Gentail mite vang cu pom hi ; mah a pomnak cu eimu lak aa Hawvang Thiangtho a piak bang bokin amu lakah vangcun Hawvang Thiangtho a piaknak pen lang tiikbok hi .
44015009	Pathian in amuh le eimu laklawh ah deidannak i mah nei ma hi ; a upnak haw i hangin a sualnak haw vang ngaithiam hi .
44015010	Mahtihbang ahih hangin i takaw a pu le pa uh te hei in hihen , eimuh hei in hihen , a puaktheih uh ngawlmi vanngit cu umtu tei ngum ah suan in Pathian cu khingkhai na nuam uh ?
44015011	Mahtin khama ! Eimuh te vang amuh bang bok kekin upnak nei in Topa Jesuh ii hehpih ningnatnak thawmin nunpatnak ngah hung hi , ” tin ti hi .
44015012	Paul le Barnabas hei cun thu hilh bok haw in Pathian in amuh te mangin Gentail mitei lakah na lamdang le thasiahhuai a phuphun a bawlmi hempoh khi a hilh haw ten a venghawng haw in dai khipkhep in ngai haw hi .
44015013	A hilh ceng haw ten Jeim dingto in , “ Ute naute , ngai un !
44015014	Simon ii a tunoin a hilhmi cu thei uh ci ! Gentail mite vangin Pathian in amu ca ngaisungin amu lakpen mi hekkhat te cu A mata hi tukin teng hi , tin hilh ciang zo hi .
44015015	Kamsangte hei khin hitih bang leng in hilh zo hawtoh hi . Lai Thiangtho in :
44015016	“ Topan , hinungten , Kiiklehtung a ma Atu sazo mi David ii uknak cu tungding lehtung . Asia sa mi cu Satung aa khoh leh tiiktung .
44015017	Mahtihcun leihum miphun hempoh Ka lakah hunghaw tuk aa Ka samsami Gentail mi hempoh te vang cu hung hawtuk hi .
44015018	Taanglaih penpan hithu a thei tiiktu Topan ti hi , ” tin ti hi .
44015019	Mahhangin kei ka ngaihsutnak ah cun : Pathian zuantu Gentail mite hi buainak pia tuk ma hung .
44015020	Mah saangin amuh tei lakah milim biaknak an thiangngawl eituk ngawlin le nupa sualnak bawl tuk ngawlin le ngawngawk in thah mi ciik le sathi pawpoh ei tuk ngawlin laikuat saw nung .
44015021	Itahimtitale Sabbath nisial in Pumkhawmnak ah Moses ii Daancu kum ngeipi sung sial lih zotoh pohtaak Pathian ii thu vangcu khua tihkim ah phuan hi zotoh , ” tin ti hi .
44015022	Mahten nungzuitu te , upa te le Pawlpi sung hempoh pen mi hekkhat tengin Paul le Barnabas te tuah Antiok khua ah hah tukin vaihawm hawhi . Amu sungpen umtu tei upatzetmi panih , Barsabbas tihei in a samhawmi Juda le Silas cu teng haw in ,
44015023	A nuailam aa laikuat hi a khut haw ah saan haw hi ; “ Na unau uh a himi keimuh nungzuitu te le upa pawl ten Antiok , Siria le Silisia ah a ummi , Gentail unaupih te na venghawng uh ii lakah nuksatnak lai kuat unghi .
44015024	Hilai aa eimu pawl sung pen nangmu lakah a heng mi hekkhat ten a awnkam haw in haksatnak pia haw in buaitiik haw hi tihthu thei ung hi . Hitihbang a ot haw mite khi keimu ottiik hi ma hi .
44015025	Mahhangin tawkdun khawm ung aa keimu sung pen ten mi palai nangmu lakah kuat ung hi .
44015026	A Topa uh Jesuh Khrih ii nadehnak tukin nunnaktian in a piangam tu a ihuhmi Paul le Barnabas hung haw tuk hi .
44015027	Mahtihcun Juda le Silas nangmu lakah kuat ung aa amuh ten a laisung aa ka ngat uh mi hi hilh haw tuk hi .
44015028	Hawvang Thiangtho le oh te cu lungkimnak nei hung aa hi a kuulmi daan te sialngawl a dang vanngit nohtei humah koih tuk cu nuam ma unghi .
44015029	Milim biaknak an ei pahsuh un hi ; sathi ei pahsuh un ; ngawngawkin thahmi ciik ei pahsuh un ; mahten nupa sualnak bawl pahsuh un hi . Hi mite hi bawl ngawlin na pial thei uh a hitale pha khawng tuk hi . Damno in um ta un , ” tin ngan hawhi .
44015030	A tiikhawmi a palai haw te cu hawh haw in Antiok khua heng haw hi . Mahlai aa umtu hempohte khi sam khawm haw in a puak hawmi laikuat cu pia hawhi .
44015031	Mahmi a sial haw ten mipi thapiaknak thu ahih hangin lungdam mahtak hawhi .
44015032	Juda le Silas te vang cu kamsang hi haw aa mipi tei lakah ngaalphatnak le thacahnak thu ngeipi hilh haw hi .
44015033	Mahlaiah cun tawkfang a um nung haw ten umtu pawl ten ngimta zet noin hen haw in amuh te a tiiktu Pawlpi tei lakah cun kikleh haw hi .
44015034	( Mahnaven Silas cu mahlaiah cun taangta hi . )
44015035	Paul le Barnabas cu ngeithim Antiok ah um haw in midang tampi te tuah in Pathian thu cu zilhin phuang haw hi .
44015036	Demlaih a ngeinung ten Paul cun , “ Topai thu a hilhnak uh ah khin hawh leh nung mah khua hempoh a unaupih te veh leh in a umdaan haw te zo leh tuk hung , ” tin Barnabas lakah cun ti hi .
44015037	Barnabas cun Johan Marka khi amu lakah hawhpih nuam hi .
44015038	Mahnaven Paul cun Johan Markaa pui tuk cu pha hi tin ngaisung ma hi , itahimtitale Johan Marka cun a khualzinnak haw a tawptian zui ngawlin Pamfilia pen a kihsan hangin hi .
44015039	Mah thu ahcun Paul le Barnabas cu nasiapi in eeldun in kheek hawhi . Barnabas cun Johan Marka cu pui in Saipras ah hawmkuang in hawh hawhi .
44015040	Paul cun Silas pui in umtu ten Topai hehpihnak tuah hawhtapoh un hi tin hen haw hi .
44015041	Paul le Silas cu Siria ngam le Silisia ngamsung palthah in Pawlpite khi tha pia thah pepel hawhi .
44016001	Paul cu Darbe khua le Listra khua ah heng hi ; mahlaiah cun tapidaw mi Timote um hi . A nu cu Judah mi hi aa tapidaw hi bok hi , a pa cu Grik mi hi .
44016002	Listra le Ikoniam khua ah a um miten Timote cu phatson zet hawhi .
44016003	Paul in Timote a puinak hangin a vunceep tansak hi . Ita a vunceep tan him titale mahlai khua sungah a ummi Judah miten Timote ii pa cu Grikmi hi tih a theih khawng haw hangin hi .
44016004	Khua pakhat nung pakhat heng pepel haw in Jerusalem khua anungzuitu te le Pawlpi soncatmi daante khi umtu teilakah hilh pepel in zuituk vangcun so hawhi .
44016005	Mahhangin Pawlpi te cu Khristian upnak ah cak dedeuh in nikhat nung nikhat in mihing tam seseem haw hi .
44016006	Asia ngam sungah Thuthangpha hilh tukin Hawvang Thiangtho in a phalngawl hangin Frizia le Kalati ngam sungah cun khualzin haw hi .
44016007	Misia ngamngi henghaw in Bithinia ngam sungah tum tukin ngaisung haw , mahnaven Jesuh ii Hawvang cun phalma hi .
44016008	Mah hangin misia ngam cu kalvawkin Troas khua ah hawh haw hi .
44016009	Mahzancun Paul cun muhnak muin mah a muhmi ahcun Mesidonia mi pakhat dingto in , “ Mesidonia ah hungin na , bawmin hi , ” tin hehpih kun hi .
44016010	Paul ii muhnak a muhceng bekten Mesidonia ahcun a hawh tukin vaithawi unghi , itahim titale mahlai mitei lakah Thuthangpha hilh tukin Pathian in sam hi tin ngaisung ung hi .
44016011	Troas pen timbaw in hawhung aa Samothrace ah hawh ngut ung ; mahten a zingten Dipolis ah heng ung .
44016012	Mahlai pen keciah in Filipi khua heng ung . Filipi khua cu Mesidonia ngam sung aa Uknak ngam pakhat ii khuapi hi . Rom tei ukmi hi sih hi . Mahlaiah cun nitampi caam unghi .
44016013	Sabbath ni in khuapi pen tui mawkah cun hawh ung hi ; mahlaiah cun Judah mitei thungetnak munkhat um beltuk tin ngaisung unghi . Khung ung aa mahlaiah a hungmi numei te thusonpih ung hi .
44016014	Amu lakpen pakhat , ka thu uh a ngaitu cu Thiatira khua mi Lidia hi aa amah cu puan sandup zuaktu hi . Amah cu Pathian biatu hi aa Paul ii thu hilhmi pha noin a ngai tukin Topan a thinsung kongka hong hi .
44016015	Amah le a innsang te cu baptizam-nak a lakcelh haw ten , “ Topa muang tatak tin na ngaisung uh a hitale ka inn ah caam zazal bokun hi ! ” tin zawm hi . Mahtihcun a zawp hangin hawh ung hi .
44016016	Nikhat cu thungetnak mun ah ka hawh lih uhlaihin , khuasia polhmi mailam thu a hilhham theitu sila numei nu pakhatin muak hi . Mailam thu a hilhhamnak cun amah le a bawi tei ca cun tangka tampi ngah hi .
44016017	Paul le keimuh cu zui pepel in , “ Hi mi pawl te hi Cungnungbel Pathian ii sal te hi haw hi ! Nunpatnak thu nangmu lakah phuang haw hi ! ” tin au pepel hi .
44016018	Mahtihcun ni tampi sung bawl in a tawpnakten Paulcu a thin-uuk in nunglam heek vut in a khuasia ii lakah cun , “ Jesuh ii minin thupia ing hi ; hi nui sung pen tul in hi ! ” tin ti hi . Thakhatin a khuasia cu tul hi .
44016019	Amah a neitu ten tangka ngahnak lampi um lehma toh tih a theih haw ten Paul le Silas cu man in thu neitu bawi tei lak tangkhopnak ah cun dok haw hi .
44016020	Rom acozah bawi tei maiah hawhpih haw in , “ Hi mite hi Judah miphun te hi haw in ka khua sunguh ah buainak suaktiik haw hi .
44016021	Keimu daan tuah a kaihdun ngawlmi daan zilh haw in ; koh te cu Rom Acozah ii mihing ung aa hi a zilhmi haw daan hi pom thei ma ung , a zui hei zuima ung , ” tin ti haw hi .
44016022	Mahticun mipi te vangcu Paul le Silas hua tu ah telbok hawhi . Mahnung tecun Acozah bawi ten Paul le Silas tei puan cu bawhkek sakin vah tuk in thupia haw hi .
44016023	Nasiazetin a vah nung haw ten thawng sungah khumin thawnginn uktu pacu phanoin tawh kalh tukin thu pia hawhi .
44016024	Mah thupiak a ngahnak bangin thawnginn uktu pacun thawnginn sungta khaan sungah cun khumin a ngitzetmi thingtum panih in kol bulh hi .
44016025	Zan laihtak in Paul le Silas cu thungen haw in Pathian thangphatnak lasa haw hi ; mahten thawngta dang pawl ten ngai haw hi .
44016026	Thakhat in hinhing in thawnginn cu a bultian in hiing khawng hi . Thakhat in kongka te cu hong cawm khawng in thawng ta hempoh tei khut khihnak thiktaicin cu duukcawm khawng hi .
44016027	Thawnginn uktu cu khanglo to in thawnginn kongka hempoh hong khawng tih a muh ten thawngta te taaikhawng zo haw tin ngaisung in , a ngaalnaam dawkin amah le mah thah tum hi .
44016028	Mahnaven Paul cun a aw neihtawp suahin auin “ Nangmah le nangmah tuahmawh duncop pahsun hi ! Ka venghawng uh in umkhawng leng ung hi , ” tin ti hi .
44016029	Thawnginn cingtu pa cun meivaak un hi , tin ti in thawnginn sungah cun manlangzet in tum in caan tawtok thah in Paul le Silas tei kebul ah bok hi .
44016030	Mahten a pualam ah puitul in , “ Ka bawipa-te nunpatnak ngah thei tukin i bawl kamnang ? tin dong hi .
44016031	Amuh ten , “ Topa Jesuh um in na , nangmah le na innkua hawng un nunpatnak ngah tuk uh ci , ” tin ti hawhi .
44016032	Mahten Pathian thu cu amah le a innsang hempoh tei humah cun hilh hawhi .
44016033	Mahzan rori ah thawnginn uktupa cun hawhpih in a liamma haw te cu somsak hi ; mahceng bek ten amah le a innsang venghawng ten baptizam-nak la haw hi .
44016034	Mahten Paul le Silas cu a inn ah pui in an eih tuk pia hi . Amah le a innsang venghawngin Pathian a up ngah haw hangin lungdamnak tuah in dim haw hi .
44016035	Azing ten Rom acozah bawi pawl ten palik bawi tetiik in “ Hite khi hah un hi , ” tin thupia haw hi .
44016036	Mahhangin thawnginn uktupan Paul cu “ Bawi pawl ten nangmah le Silas hah tukin thu pia haw hi . Mahhangin tuul un na , dapno in hawh ta un hi , ” tin ti hi .
44016037	Mahnaven Paul cun palik bawi tei lakah cun , “ Sualnak i mah nei ma nave ungin mipi tei mai rori pen navah uh-Rom kumpi tei mihing hi bok si ung ! Mahhum pen thawngah khia lalaih si uh si . Mahten tu in tale a kuhno in maw na hawh tiiktum uh ? Hawh hihim tuk mang ! Rom Acozah bawi amuh rori hilah hung in suah haw hen ! ” tin ti hi .
44016038	Mahtin atihmi cu palik bawi pawl ten Rom Acozah bawi tei lakahcun hilh haw in ; mahten Paul le Silas cu Rom Acozah ii mihing tih a theih haw ten lau haw hi !
44016039	Mahhangin Paul le Silas tei lakah cun hawh in ngaihthiamnak ngen haw hi ; mahten thawnginn pen suahin khuasung pen mundang ah hawh un hi , tin ngen haw hi .
44016040	Paul le Silas cu thawnginn pen suakin Lidia ii inn ah cun hawh haw hi . Mahlaiah umtu te tawkin thathonak tuk thu a sosuah ceng haw ten mahlai khua pen tuul haw hi .
44017001	Paul le Silas cu Afipolis le Appolonia zin haw in Tesalon khua ah heng haw hi . Mahlaiah cun Judah mitei Pumkhawminn um hi .
44017002	A bawldaansa keel bangin Paul cu pumkhawm inn ah hawh hi . Mahlai ahcun Sabbath ni nithum rori mipi te tuah thu el dun in ,
44017003	Messiah cu thihnak thuaktuk aa tholeh tuk hi tih khi Lai Thiangtho sung pen langtiik in hilh ciang pepel hi . “ Noh tei lak aa ka phuanmi Jesuh cu Messiah hi , ” tin Paul cun ti hi .
44017004	Mi hekkhatte cu a lungmu haw ciang ngangai in Paul le Silas khi kop haw hi . Mahbang bokin numei hotu te le Pathian a biatu Grik mi tampi a bupi in Paul le Silas lakah in khawm bok haw hi .
44017005	Mahnaven Judah mi pawlten halhsik in lampi lakah a vaaklak mi mi lolak hekkhat pawl te khi komkhawm in mi bupi in suak haw hi . khua sungah au in , kio in nasiazet in khua sungah buainak henpih hawhi . Jason a tihhawmi pai inn cu kiil in mahlai aa Paul le Silas te khi man in mipi maiah dok lettuk tum hawhi .
44017006	Mahnaven mahlai inn ah Paul le Silas cu mu haw ma hi . Jason le umtu hekkhat pawl lehlam te khi khuasung upa tei maiah pui in “ Khua hempoh ah buainak a hengtiiktu te , tuin eimu khuasung ah in heng haw hi .
44017007	Jason in a inn sungah in umtiik hi . A son hawmi cu ” Jesuh tihmi kumpi dang pakhat um , “ tin ti in mahtihcun Rom kumpi pai daan siatsuah hawhi , ” tin au tawtok haw hi .
44017008	Mahtihbangin a aunak haw i hangin mihonpi le khuasung upa te buaitiik khawng haw hi .
44017009	Thuneitu pawl ten Jason le a ngualcam te cu a kuulzah tangka kuantiik in mah nung ten hahleh haw hi .
44017010	Khua a thimbekten umtu pawl ten Paul le Silas cu Berea khua ah hen haw hi . Berea khua a hen haw ten Pumkhawminn ah hawh haw hi .
44017011	Mahlai aa mipi te cu Tesalon te saangin a lungmu haw taaituang saw deuh hi . Athu hilh haw mite cu lungmu tak tuah ngai in , a nisial Paul ii hilhmi cu hi ngangai maw , hi ngangaima him tin Lai Thiangtho sial in zo teh dun haw hi .
44017012	Mi tampi ten um in ; Grik numei muantaakmi le upat mite le Grik pano pawl ten um haw hi .
44017013	Mahnaven Tesalon aa a ummi Judah miten Berea khua ah hei cun Paul in Pathian ii thu hilh hi tihthu a theih haw ten Berea khua ahcun hung in mipi te so in buaitiik pepel haw hi .
44017014	Thakhat in umtu pawl ten Paul cu tuipi lamah in hawhtiik haw hi ; mahnaven Silas le Timote cu Berea ah cun taang haw hi .
44017015	Paul a hentu umtu pawl ten Paul cu Athen khua tian in zui haw hi ; mahten a zuitu te cu kikleh haw in Silas le Timote cun a manlang theitawp in hilleh haw tahen , tin thu cah ta hi .
44017016	Paul cun Silas le Timote khi Athen khua pen a ngah laiah khin mahlai khuapi cu milim zuk dim-uk in a muh hangin a thasia mahtak hi .
44017017	Mahhangin Judah mite le Pathian a biatu Grik mite tuah in pumkhawmnak inn Pumkhawmnak ah thu eeldun mek haw in mi zapi tawhdunnak mun hei pen a hung mite tuahin eldun leleng haw hi .
44017018	Epikurian thu zilhtu saya hekkhat le Stoik thu zilhtu saya hekkhat te tuah in thu eeldun haw hi . Mi hekkhat ten , “ Hipa imah theingawl , mimai ah langtaak nuamzet pa hi i heng a ot lih bok ? ” tin ti haw hi . Mi hekkhat lamten , “ Ngamdang tei Pathian ii thu a son li bang um , ” tin ti haw . Ita mahtin ti haw hum titale Paul in Jesuh le a thawhlehnak thu a hilh hangin hi .
44017019	Mahhangin Paul cu Agreopagas a tihhawmi a khua haw aa c kawnsil lakah henpih haw in , “ Thuthak na zilhmi hi a i him , tih thei nuam ung hi ,
44017020	A hekkhat na hilhmi ka theihmi uh cu lamdang zet in a sullam atih ai him tih thei nuam ung hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44017021	( Ita mahtin ti haw him titale Athen khua mi hempoh te le hi khua ah a ummi ngamdang mite cu thuthak le thilthak khi a hun neih haw hempoh mangin zali le hilhlih a nuam thei bel mi pawl te hi haw hi . )
44017022	Paul cu khua khonsil tei maiah dingin amu lakah cun , “ Noh Athen mite hi biaknaklam pohpoh ah cun teimazet uhci tih cu mu ing hi .
44017023	Itahimtitale na khuapi sunguh te ka hawh ten Pathian na biaknak uh te ka zoten biaklaan dawh pakhat humah ! A theih uh ngawlmi Pathian lakah , ” tin na ngatuhmi mu ing hi . Mahtin thei ngawl napi in na biakuhmi Pathian cu atu nangmu lak aa ka phuanmi hi hi .
44017024	Leipi le a sungummi hempoh a bawltu Pathian cu lei le van ii Topa hi aa mihing tei bawlmi biakinn sungah umma hi .
44017025	Mah ii humah Pathian cu mi hempoh tei humah nunnak le haihawh le thildang hempoh a piatu Pathian ahih hangin mihing ten ama inn a bawluhmi khi a kuulmi ii mamah um ma hi .
44017026	Mihing pakhat ii sung pen leihum mihing hempoh bawl in leihum pumpulukah umtiik khawng hi . Mihing tei um laih ngawl cawngin mihing tei nuncaak daantuk le , i lai muntian um thei haw tuk him , tih khi a laitek ham khawng sa hi .
44017027	Ita hitin laitek ham khawng him titale Pathian khi zei in a muh suak theih hawnak tukin hi . Mahnaven Pathian cu a thu ngangai in kua mah tuahin khawla ma hi .
44017028	Mi pakhat ii sonhamsa hi , “ A ma sungah nung hung hi , ngamta in khuasa hung hi ! ” Na la phuahtu uh hekkhat tei tihnak bangin , “ Ohte vang hi a cate hung hi . ”
44017029	Mahtihbangin Pathian ii cano te ahih uh bangin thil thiammi le zuksuai thiammitei sui milim le ngun milim , le suang milim a bawlmi haw te hi pathian in a ngaihsut tukuh ngawlmi hihim hi .
44017030	Mihing tei Pathian theih ngawl hun khi Pathian aman a mu ngawl bangin umsan thong hi ; Mahnaven a tucun a nundaan haw a phangawlmi khi nungheeksan tukin mi hempoh tetiik hi .
44017031	Itahimitale a tensami mipakhat in leihum buppi hi diknak tuah thukhencat tukin ni ciangtan zo hi . Mahmi thu cu thihnak pen tholehtiik zo toh hi , ” tin ti hi .
44017032	Thihnakpen tholeh zo tihmi Paul ii hilhnak a theih hawten mi hekkhate cun nuihsan haw ; mahnaven midang ten , “ Hilhleh hih laih leci deih ung , ” tin ti hawhi .
44017033	Mahnung ten Paulcu a khawmnaksung haw pen tul ta hi .
44017034	Mi hekkhat ten zui in sang haw hi . A umtu tei lakpen khonsil upa Dionisias tel in , Damaris a tih haw numei nu pakhat le midang hekkhat vang tel haw hi .
44018001	Mahnung ten Paul cu Athen pen tuul in Kawrin khua ah heng hi .
44018002	Mahlaiah cun Pontius ngam pen a suakmi Judah mi Akuila tawk hi . Akuila cu a nupi Priscilla tuah in Italy pen a taaimi hi haw hi . Itahimtitale Rom kumpi Klaudias in Judah mi hempoh te cu Rom khua pen a hawlvawk hangin taai haw hi . Paul in a inn ah lengin ,
44018003	amu lakah caamin amuh te tuah in na dek hi . Akuila le Priscilla te cu puanbuuk khui in pumcawmmi hi haw hi amuh te bang in Paul cu puanbuuk bawl in pumcawm bok hi .
44018004	Sabbath nisial in Pumkhawminn ah Judah mi le Grik mite a lungmu haw ciangtiik tukin thu sonkhawm meek haw hi .
44018005	Mesidonia pen Silas le Timote tei hen ten Paul cu a hun neihmi hempoh te Pathian thu sonnak in mangin Jesuh cu Messiah tatak hi tin Judah mitei lakah cun hilh het hi .
44018006	Amuh ten Paul ii thucu el in awn siasuak tianin a don haw hangin Paul cun a lungkim ngawl a laknak in a puanlak aa leivul thing ta in , “ Na phathong uh tale cu nangmu sual hi tuk hi . Kei mawhsiat pahsuh un hi ! Tu penpan Gentail mitei lakah hawh tung hi , ” tin ti hi .
44018007	Mahten tuul in Titias Jastas a tihhawmi pai inn ah um hi ; Titias Jastas cu Pathian a biatu hi aa a inncu Pumkhawminn elno ah um hi .
44018008	Pumkhawm inn uktu upabel Krispas vangcu a innkua te tuahin Topa um mite hi haw hi ; mahten Kawrin khua aa mi tampi te vangcun Pathian thucu thei in a uphaw hangin baptizam-nak la haw hi .
44018009	Zankhat cu Paul cun muhnak nei in mahlai sung pen , “ Paul , lau pahsun ! Hilh lipoh in thasia him pahsun .
44018010	Nangma lakah um ing hi . Kua mah in haksatnak pia thei haw tuk ma hi , itahimtitale hi khuasung aa mi tampi te cu ka mihing te hi haw hi , ” tin ti hi .
44018011	Mahhangin Paul cu kumkhat le a lang sung um in mipi lakah cun Pathian thu cu hilh leleng hi .
44018012	Gallio in Akhaia ngam uktu Rom mangki a dehlaih in Judah mite tawkdun khawm in Paul cu man in zung ah henpih haw hi .
44018013	“ Hipa hin mi tampi tei lakah keimu daan tuahin a kaihdun ngawlmi Pathian biakdaan zilh hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44018014	Paul ii ot tuk keek ten Gallio cun Judah mitei lakah cun , “ Thil sual le thil phangawl pakhakhat bawlnak i hangin ahitale Judah mite nangmu humah thinsauzet in um tung .
44018015	Mahnaven tu cun na biaknak uh ii awnkam , min le na daan uh te hang in nangmuh no soncat ta un ! Mahtihbang thu ahcun thukhentu hithei tuk mang , ” tin ti hi .
44018016	Mahten a zung pen Judah mite cu hawlvawk khawng hi .
44018017	Pumkhawmnak inn uktu Sosthenes cu a venghawng in man in zungmai rori pen vat haw hi . Mahnaven Gallio cun i mah in thupi sakha ma hi .
44018018	Paul cu Kawrin khua aa umtu pawl te tuah in ni tampi sung a um ceng haw ten Priscilla le Akuila tuah bekin Siria ah cun hawh haw hi . Kenkhria pen hawmkuang in a hawh haw laihngawlin thutiamnak a bawl zotohnak bangin Paul in a sam meet hi .
44018019	Efesa khua ah heng haw in mahlaiah in Akuila le Priscilla cu zam hi . Pumkhawm ah tum in Judah mite tuah in thuson dun khawm haw hi .
44018020	Ngeideuh um tukin kun haw naven a lungkim ma hi .
44018021	Atul tuk ten thucah taa in , “ Pathian ii lungkimnak ahitacun nangmu lakah hungleh tung hi , ” tin ti hi . Mahten Efesa pen timbaw khung in hawh hi .
44018022	Sisaria a hen ten Jerusalem khua ah letvawk in mahlai aa Pawlpi te otpih vawk thah in Antiok ah hawhleh hi .
44018023	Mahlaiah tawkfang sung a um nung ten thawn lehleu in Kalatia le Frizia ngamah zin in umtu hempoh te thazaang caktiik hi .
44018024	Mahlaicun Elexandria pen a suakmi Judah mi Apollos a tihhawmi khi Efesa khua ah heng hi . Amah cu thuson thiamzet in Lai Thiangtho vang a theizetmi hi .
44018025	Topai Lampi thu ah zilhsa mi hi aa , lungthozet le maan cikcek in Jesuh ii thu le la cu son in zilh hi . Mahnaven a theihmi cu Johan ii zilh mi Baptizam thu bek hi .
44018026	Ngaal pha zet in Pum khawm inn ah thu zilh in a thu zilh mi cu Priscilla le Akuila ten a theih haw ten amu inn ah sam in Pathian ii Lampi thu khi ciangdeuh in hilh haw hi .
44018027	Mahten Apollos Akhaia ngam ah hawh atum hangin Efesa khua aa umtu pawl ten bawm in Akhaia khua aa umtu tei lakah Apollos a caam theihnak tukin lai ngatsak haw hi . Akhaia khua a hen ten Pathian hehpihnak hangin umtu tei ca in bawmtu phazet in cang hi .
44018028	Itahimtitale mi thu el daan thiamzet in Jesuh cu Messiah tatak hi , tin Lai Thiangtho sungta la in sonciangtiik in mahtihcun mipi tei maiah thu nialdun in Judah mite khi neh thei leleng hi .
44019001	Apollos cu Kawrin khua ah a um laih in Paul cu mahlai ngamsung ah khualzin in Efesa ah heng hi . Mahlaiah cun nungzuitu hekkhat te khi tawk in ,
44019002	Paul in , “ Umtu hi zotoh ve uh cin Hawvang Thiangtho co uh cim ? ” tin dong hi . Amuhten “ Hawvang Thiangtho um tihhei thei awng ma ung , ” tin don haw hi .
44019003	“ Mahtin ahitale itihbang baptizam-nak kaw na laak uh , ” tin Paul in dong hi . Amuh ten , “ Johan ii baptizam-nak ” tin don haw hi .
44019004	Mahten Paul in , “ Johan ii baptizam-nak cu sualnak pen a sikleh mitei ca hi . Johan in ka nung pen a hung tukmi pa khi Israel miten a up haw tuk mi pa hi . Mahmi cu Jesuh hi , ” tin ti hi .
44019005	Mahmi a theih haw ten Jesuh min in baptizam-nak nei haw hi .
44019006	Paul cun a hum haw ah a khut suan in , Hawvang Thiangtho cu heng hi ; awn phun dadang tuah awn in Pathian thu phuang haw hi .
44019007	Amuh te cu pasal tiptep sawm le panih pawl haw hi .
44019008	Paul cu a pumkhawmnak inn haw Sinakok ah hawh in ha thum sung ngaalphazet in mipi lakah thu hilh hi . Amuh te tuah thu son langkhat in Pathian Uknak thu khi a lungmu sung haw ah a tum ngah tukin hilh hi .
44019009	Mahnaven hekkhat te cu a lungmu haw khohzetin sang nuam haw ma hi ; Mahhangin mipi maiah in Topai Lampi thu cu sonsia li haw hi . Mahhangin Paul cun taisan in umtu te khi tulpih in Tirannas a tih haw mi pai thuhilhnak innpi ah nisial in thuzilh hi .
44019010	Mahtihcun kumnih sung dekin Asia ngamsung ummi Judah mi hihen , Gentail mi hihen , a venghawng haw in Topai thu thei haw hi .
44019011	Pathian cun Paul khi mangin thasiahhuai , nalamdang te khi bawl hi .
44019012	A pavua le a taaihetnak puan te cawm in mina tei lakah a ken hawten a natnak hawte dam in a sunghaw pen manah te tul haw hi .
44019013	Mun tihkim ah vaakin manah hawlvawktu Judah mi hekkhat te cun Topa Jesuh ii min in Paul bangin bawlbok tum haw hi . Amuh ten manah tei lakah , “ Paul ii tihmi Jesuh min in hawlvawk ing hi , ” tin ti bok haw hi .
44019014	Judah mi Thiampi Saang a min Skeva a tihhawmi pai capa unau salih ten mahtihbangcun bawl li haw hi .
44019015	Mahnaven manahten amu lakah cun , “ Jesuh thei ing ; Paul ii thu le la vang thei ing . Mahnaven nohte a kua kam uh ci ? ” tin ti hi .
44019016	Manahtei luhnak mipa cun amuh te cu buan in nehkhawng hi . Maliamin a puante balkhawng in a inn pen tai haw hi .
44019017	Mahmi thu le la cu Efesa khua ah a ummi Judahmi le Gentail mi hempoh ten atheih hawten lau mahtak in Jesuh ii min cu upat sesem haw hi .
44019018	Umtu tei sung pen mi tampi te hung in mizapi tei maiah thil a bawl meekmi hawte khi phuang hawhi .
44019019	Mitzial a bawltu tampi ten a mitzial laibu hawte cu munkhat ah khawm in mipi tei muh cilcel in haal haw hi . Mahtih bangin a haal hawmi mitzial laibu te cu a man atuat haw ten ngun tangka thawngsawm nga hi .
44019020	Mahtihcun Topai thu cu nasiazetin khangin zai dedeuh hi .
44019021	Mahtihbang thil a um nung ten Paul cun Mesidonia ngam le Akhaia ngamah zin in Jerusalem ah lehvawk tuk khi a lungmu in ngaisung hi . “ Mahlai ka hen nung ten Rom vaang cu ka muh thah kul bok tuk ” tin ti hi .
44019022	Mahten amah a bawmtu lakpen mi panih Timote le Frasta te vaang Mesidonia ahcun hawh in amah cu Asia ngam lamah hun khat sung mang hi .
44019023	Mahhun laihawngin Efesa khua ah Topai thu le la lampen buainak ngengpi um hi .
44019024	Ngun in thil a bawltu Demetrias a tih hawmi pan Artemis khuahuai nui biakinn zuk khi ngun in bawl aa a nadek tu tei ca in tangka a miat tampi ngah hi .
44019025	Mahhangin a nadektu te le amah bangin nadektu dadang te hei khi samkhawm in amuh tei lakah , “ U te naute , hi a nadeh uhmi ii hangin neinung in umhung tih cu na theihkhawng uhmi hi .
44019026	Mahnaven tuin Paul a tih hawmi pan itibangin nadek him tihcu nangmuh rori in na muh mi uh le na theih uhmi hi . “ Mihing tei bawlcopmi pathian hi haw ma hi , ” tin ti in Efesa khua le Asia ngam venghawng awndiak in mi tampi tei thin sungah a hilhmi thucu tum ngah hi .
44019027	Mahtihbang ahih hangin hi a nadeh uhmi hi a minsia tuk toh tih hi lauhuai ngangai hi . Mah ii humah Asia ngam le leihum khua hempoh ah mi hempoh tei biakmi a thupi zetmi Artemis khuahuai nui biakinn hi miten imah in sial leh haw tuk ma toh in a thupinak hi , bo vawkta tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
44019028	Mahmi cu mipi ten a theih haw ten a thin haw uukzet in , “ Efesa khua aa Artemis cu thupi zet hi , ” tin au tawtok haw hi .
44019029	Mahtin a au hawmi cu khuasung hempoh ah thang khawnghi . Mipi cun Mesidonia mi panih Paul tuah khual a zin langkhatmi Kaias le Aristarkas te khi man in puaizohnak inn pi ah henpih haw hi .
44019030	Mipi tei lakah Paul cu hawh nuam naven , umtu pawl ten kham haw hi .
44019031	Mahlai ngamsung aa thu neitu a ngualcampih hekkhat ten mahlai inn ah cun hawh hihim tuk ngawlin thucah sih haw hi .
44019032	Mahtihcun puaizohnak inn ahcun buai li haw in ; a nuanuamin au hawhi ; mitam saw ten mahlai ah ita heng kam hung tih hei thei haw ma hi .
44019033	Judah miten Alexander hi maiah a tuultiik haw hangin mitam pi te cun hi thubuai a tuultiiktu hi amah hi bel tuk tin ngaisung haw hi . Mahten Alexander cun dai un , tin a khut in mipi te cu lak in ama dinmun tangin thuson tum hi .
44019034	Mahnaven Judah mi ahihlam mipi ten a theih haw ten amu au keel au tawtok leh leu in , “ Efesa khua aa Artemis cu thupi hi , ” tin nazi panih sung au hawhi .
44019035	A tawpnak tecun mah khuasung aa thuneitu lak aa laingantu pan mipi te cu daitiik deuh in a muh tei lakah cun , “ Efesa khua mite , Efesa khua cu a thupimi Artemis ii biakinn le vancung pen a caaksukmi suang thiangtho umnak mun hi tih cu mi hempoh tei theihmi hi .
44019036	A el theitu a kua um him ? Kuamah in el thei haw tuk ma hi . Mahhangin daino in um unna komno ngaisung ta ngawlin imah bawl pahsuh un hi .
44019037	Hi pawlte hin biakinn sung aa thil ngu haw masi , a khuahuai nu uh sonsia haw ma naven hilai ah henpih uh ci .
44019038	Demetrias le a nadektu pawl ten kuakua i humah sual mawhsiat tuk a neihaw a hitale tazacoih theihnak zung nei si hung ; thukhen ni le thuneitu upa vang nei si hung . Mahlai ah cun tazacoih theih hi .
44019039	Mah saangin a thupi deuh na deih uh a hitale eimu daan bangin khuasung mipi pum khawmnak ah soncat tukmi hi .
44019040	Itahimtitale tuni aa thil cangmi ii hangin buainak hengtiik uh ci tin mawhsiat a tawhtuk uh lau huai hi . Hitih bang lawlawm in thubuainak piang tuk in sullam imah um ma hi ; mahten i ta buai uhcim tin a ti haw bang a hin ka ot theih nak tuk um sih ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
44019041	Mahtin a tih cengten a taangkhawm mite cu pinkheektiik hi .
44020001	Mah thubuai cu dai in Paul cun umtu te cu munkhat ah samkhawm in thapiaknak awnkam in a sohsuah ceng ten daino in um tapoh un , tin tita in Mesidonia ngamah hawh hi .
44020002	Mah ngam ah zin pepel in thapiaknak thu hilh pepel hi . Mahten Akhaia cu hengin ,
44020003	mahlai ahcun ha thum sung caam hi . Siria ah hawh tuk tum naven , a vaithawih lih laihtakin Judah miten zuak tum haw hi tihthu a theih hangin Mesidonia lampen hawh tukin ngaisung leh hi .
44020004	Berea khua mi Pirhas ii capa Sopater le Tesalon khua mi Aristarkas le Sekundas , Darbe khua mi Kaias , Asia ngam pen tiikikas le Trofimus , le Timote te tuah hawh langkhat haw hi .
44020005	Hawh ham haw in Troas pen ngak haw hi .
44020006	Naman tel ngawl Cangho Puai celh ten Filipi pen timbaw in hawh ung aa ninga nungten Troas pen pha laih ung hi . Troas ahcun pikhat cam ung hi .
44020007	Niluk ni taklam in Topa taak-eih kiil khawm tukin tawkdun khawm ung . A hungkhawm tei lakah Paul in thu hilh in azing ten hawhleh tuk ahih hangin zan khuanu thimtian in thu hilh hi .
44020008	Humta khaan ah khawm ung aa meiinn tampi vaak haw hi .
44020009	Tangval pakhat Zutiikhas a tihhawmi pa cu tukvelh ah khung in Paul in ngeipi thu a hilh hangin ahihbuh sung in ahihbuh ci dedeuh taak cu mahmi inn thuah thumnak pen lei ah caak suk hi . A khul haw ten thi zo toh hi .
44020010	Mahnaven Paul cu tolhsuk in mah tangvalpai humah boksuk in pom hi . Paul cun , “ Thinsu pahsuh un hi , nunglaih hi , ” tin ti hi .
44020011	Mahten Paul cu humta khaan ahcun kaito leh in cangho khi botkeek in ei haw hi . Paul cu ngeipi , zinglam nisuak tian thu a hilh ceng ten hawh ta hi .
44020012	Mah tangval pa cu a nungin a inn ah hawhpih haw in a thin haw nopzet hi .
44020013	Timbaw humah khung ung aa , mahmi tembaw tuah Assos ahcun haw hung hi . Assos ahcun Paul zawm thah tuk ung hi . Mahtin zopthahtuk mi cu ama son hamsa hi , itahimtitale amah cu ke in hawhtum hi .
44020014	Assos ka hen uh ten Paul in pha leh zo aa tembaw khung langkhat in Mitilene ah hawh unghi .
44020015	Mitilene pen tuulleh in a zingten Khios zawntawk ah heng ung , a zinglawi ten Samos ah heng ung , a lawileh ten Miletas ah heng ung hi .
44020016	Paul cun Asia ngamsung ah ngei caam tuk a nuam ngawl hangin Efesa ah letvawk tuk tum hi . Jerusalem ah manlangin heng nuam hi ; a cang theituk a hitale Penticost ni khel in hen tum hi .
44020017	Paul cun Miletas pen mitiik in Efesa khua aa Pawlpi upa ten amah tawk tukin thucah hi .
44020018	A hen haw ten Paul in , “ Asia ngam ka hen ni penpan ka hun hempoh te cu nangmu lakah i tibangin mangkam hing tih cu thei khawng poh uh ci .
44020019	Niamkhiatnak le mit hitui tuah in Topai sal ka hihnak bangin Judah mi pawl ten thah a umnak haw hangin haksa samahtakin a na dek li ing hi .
44020020	Mipi maiah hihen , nangmu inn sungah heihihen , thu hilhnak tuk hun ka neih ten nangmu caa in bawmtu tuk hi tin ka thei hempoh te imah suup ngawlin hilh ing tihvang cu thei uh ci .
44020021	Judah mitei lakah hihen , Gentail mitei lakah hihen , a sualnak haw zam in Pathian lakah kikleh in a Topa uh Jesuh a up haw a kuul hihiim tin ka hilh ii humah a celzet no in ngaallinak tuk vangin hilh ing hi .
44020022	Mahten tu in Hawvang Thiangtho i lamhoihnak zui in Jerusalem ah hawh tum ing hi ; mahlaiah a i cang tuk hing ngim tih i mamah thei malaih ing hi .
44020023	Khua hempoh ah thawngtaaknak leh haksatnak bebek in ngak hi tih bek khi Hawvang Thiangtho ii ngaallinnak a piaknak i hangin thei ing hi .
44020024	Mahnaven ka caa in ka nunnak hi imah in sial mang hi ; Topa Jesuh in deh tukin a piakmi Pathian ii hehpihnak Thuthangpha phuantuk hi cangkim zetin phuantuk bek hi ka thuduhsaammi hi .
44020025	Na venghawng uh lakah a suk a to ah vaak in , Pathian ii uknak thu hilh ing hi . Mahnaven tu cun kuamah in mu leh tuk matoh uh ci , tih hi thei ing hi .
44020026	Mahhangin tuni hin ciangzet in nangmu lakah phuang ing ; nangmu lak pen pakhakhat in Pathian tuah khen in siatnak na tawk uh a hitale kei dehvo hi leh matoh hi .
44020027	Itahimtitale Pathian ii tuptah mi khi suupmi imah nei ngawlin a venghawngin nangmu lakah phuangkhawng ing hi .
44020028	Mahtihbang ahih hangin nangmuh le nangmuh cingkhawi thiam unna Hawvang Thiangtho ihnak khut sungah a koihmi tuuhon te khi phano in cingkhawi un hi . Pathian in a Capa ii thihnak ii hangin a mata in a bawlsami Pathian ii Pawlpi cingtu na hi taun !
44020029	Keima hawh nungten a lauhuai cingne haang hengin tuuhon te hi zothong hawtuk mahi , tih thei ing hi .
44020030	Nangmu sung hei pen mi hekkhat cun amu lam ah puinuam in zolthu tuah umtu te hi a puisual hawnak tuk hun hengtuk hi .
44020031	Mahhangin ngaalling un na asun azan in hitui tuah kumthum sung ka zilhmi thu te na venghawngun phawkngil pahsuh un .
44020032	Tucun Pathian ii kilkhawinak le hehpihnak thu sungah apzo inghi . Aman khangtotiik tuk aa a mihing tei ca in a koihsami thupha khi pia tuk hi .
44020033	Kuamah ii tangka , sui , nikcen puan silh te hei haza awng mang hi .
44020034	Keima khut rori in na dek ing aa keimah le ka ngualcam tei ka kul uhmi thil te khi bawl bok ing tihcu na theihkhawng uhmi hi .
44020035	I hempoh ah nasiapi in dek in saantaai ngawl mite bawm tuk hung tih khi lak zotoh ing ; Topa Jesuh hei in , “ Ngahlam saangin piaklam ah lungdamnak tam saw , tihcu cing leleng un hi ” tin thu cah hi .
44020036	Paul in mahtin thu a hilh cengten a khukdin in a venghawng haw cun thungen langkhat haw hi .
44020037	Paul cu pom in , nam in , damno in hawh in hi , ti thah cun a venghawng haw in kap leilui haw hi .
44020038	Kuamah in mu leh tuk matoh uhci a tih hangin a thasiat cuangnak haw cu nahi hi . Mahten timbaw umnak tian hen haw hi .
44021001	Keimuh vang cun , “ Dam no in , ” tin nuksat ta in hawh ung hi . Lawng cu i mahlaiah bangvawk ngawl hawh in Kos ah hengung hi ; a zing ten Rhodes tuikulh ah hengin mah laipen Patara ah cun letvawk ung hi .
44021002	Mahlaiah cun , Fonisia ah a hawhtukmi lawng cu tawk ung , mahlai lawng ahcun khung in hawh ung hi .
44021003	Saipras tuikulh a langtheinak mun hengin mahlaipen hang lamah kawn in Siria lamah letvawk ung hi . Tai-ar khua ah tolh in lawng ii van puak te cu suah hawta hi .
44021004	Mahlaiah cun umtu hekkhat te um haw in nipi khat sung cam ung hi . Hawvang ii huham in Paul cu Jerusalem ah hawh tuk ngawlin kham hi .
44021005	Mahnaven amuh te tuah ka um khawmnak uh hun a boten tuul in hawh ta ung hi . Amuh te vangcun a nupi le a cate haw tuah tuipi mawktian in hen haw hi . Mahlaimun pen ka venghawng uh in khukdin in thungen ung hi .
44021006	Mahten pakhat le pakhat “ Dam no in , ” tin ti dun in kohte cu lawng humah kaai in amuhte cu inn ah pin haw hi .
44021007	Tai-ar khua pe cun Lawng cu hawh ngut in Ptolomais ah in heng ung hi . Mahlaiah cun umtu unau pihte tawk thah in amu lakah ni khat caam ung hi .
44021008	A zingten tuul lehleu in Sisaria ah heng ung . Mahlaiah cun Jerusalem aa upa salih teelmi sung pen evangelist Filip ii inn ah caam ung hi .
44021009	Pasal nei laihngawl canu pali nei , mah mite cu Pathian thu phuangtu hi haw hi .
44021010	Ni tam thim ka um nung uh ten Judah ngam pen kamsang pa khat Agabas a tih haw mi cu heng hi .
44021011	Keimu lakah hungin Paul ii taikhap a laakcelh ten a khut le a ke khi mah taikhap tuah keen in , “ Hawvang Thiangtho in hi tin ti hi , taikhap a neitu pa hi Jerusalem khua ah Judah miten hi tih bang hin keen haw tuk aa , Gentail mitei khut ah pia haw tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
44021012	Mahmi thu ka theih uh ten keimuh hihen , midangte hei hihen , Paul cu Jerusalem ah hawh tuk ngawlin kham ung hi .
44021013	Mahnaven amah cun “ Ita hitin um kam uh ci ! Hibangin na kap uh tacun ka thin natiik sesem tuk si uh ci . Topa Jesuh ca cun keen le khih bek hei in tham ngawlin thih tuk tian in mansa zotoh ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
44021014	Imamah in ka kham theih uh ngawl hangin kham leh ngawl in , “ Topai deihnak bangin hi tahen , ” tin ti ngawn ung hi .
44021015	Mahlaiah hun can tawkmawh sung ka um nung uh ten ka na uh te heng lehleu in Jerusalem ah cun hawh ung hi .
44021016	Sisaria ah a ummi nungzui hekkhat ten zuibok haw in ka caamnak tuk uh Mnason ii inn ah hawhpih haw hi . Mnason cu Saipras mi hi aa , a tunglaih in umtu masa na hi hi .
44021017	Jerusalem ah ka hen uh ten , umtu pawlten lungdam mahtak in muak haw hi .
44021018	A zing ten Jeim tawk tukin Paul tuah hawh ung aa Pawlpi upa tevang kimkhawng haw hi .
44021019	Paul cun a khut haw leen thah in a hum haw aa a lungdamnak thute khi hilh in , a nadehnakte mangin Pathian in Gentail mitei lak aa a dehmi hempoh te khi cangkimzet in hilh hi .
44021020	Mahmi a theih haw ten a venghawng haw in Pathian khi thangphat haw hi . Mahten amuh ten , “ Unau pa Paul , Judah mitei sung pen thawng a i zong him ? umtu , mahten Daan a zui hawnak pen itihzah in teima suah haw him tihcu na theih sa uh poh hi .
44021021	Gentail tei ngam sungah a ummi Judah mi hempoh tei lakah Moses ii daan nung heek tuk in le a cate haw vunceep tannak bawl leh tukngawl toh in le Judah Daan zui leh tuk ngawl toh in Paul in zilh hi , tin himi pawlten thei haw hi .
44021022	Atu hilai na hen zotohnak hi thei haw tuk ven i tin bawl kam nung ?
44021023	Hitin bawl le ci tin ngaisung ung . Hi laiah hin thutiamnak a bawl zotoh mi pali um haw hi .
44021024	Amuhte tuah hawh in thianlimnak tuk in bawlmeekmi daanbang cun bawlpih inna a bo hawmi tangka khi piaksak in hi ; Mahtecun a lu haw meet thei hawtuk hi . Mahtihcun nangmah rori in Moses Daan khi zui in na thu a theihsa mi haw pawl te khi thumaan i mah um ma tih khi thei khawng haw tuk hi .
44021025	Gentail mite umtu a cang mitei thu le la ahcun keimun laikuat zotoh ung hi . Ka laikuat uhmi sungah milim mai aa a piaksa mi an ei pahsuh un , sathi ei pahsuh un , ngawng awk in thahmi sa ei pahsuh un na , nulepa sualnak bawl pahsuh un tin ka son cat sa mi uh hitin kuat zo ung hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44021026	Mahhangin a zingten Paul in mah mi pali te cu hawhpih in amuh tuah amuh daan bangin thianthonak cu bawl hawhi . Mahnung ten biakinn sungah tum in thianthonak ni hi i tuk ni ten bo tuk tih le i tuk ten biakpiaknak pia tek haw tuk tih te khi hilh hi .
44021027	Ni salih ni a kim kuan no ten Asia ngam pen a hungmi Judah mi hekkhat pawl ten Biakinn sungah Paul khi mu haw hi . Mipi te khi sosuah in Paul cu man hawhi .
44021028	“ Israel mite aw , bawm un hi ! Hipa hi khua hempoh ah hawh in , Israel mite sonsia in , Moses Daan te sonsia in , le hi Biakinn sonsia in thu zilh pepel tu hi . Tu hei in hi biakinn sungah hin Gentail mite vang hunpih in , hi mun thiangtho hi nawngkai tiikzo hi , ” tin au haw hi .
44021029	( Hitin a aunak haw cu Efesa khua mi Trofimus khi Paul tuah Jerusalem khua sungah mu in Biakinn sungah tumpih hi tin a ngaihsut haw hangin hi . )
44021030	Khuapi sung cu buainak tuah dim in mipi te cu a veng hawnghaw in taai in Paul cu man in Biakinn sungpen dok tuul hawhi . Manlang zet in Biakinn kongka te khak khawng hawhi .
44021031	Mipi ten Paul cu that tuk , a ngaihsut haw hangin Jerusalem ah a khuabup-pi in ngaaltho hawhi tin Rom ngaalkap hotu ngaalbawi lakah thu than haw hi .
44021032	Thakhat in mah ngaalbawi pa cu ngaalbawi dang le ngaalkap te tuah cun tai haw hi . Mipi te cun ngaalkap te le mah ngaal bawipa a muh haw ten Paul a vahlih haw cu tawp haw hi .
44021033	Ngaal bawipa cu Paul i lakah hawh in a mat celh ten thiktaicin panih in khih tuk thu pia hi . Mahten mipi te cu , “ Hipa hi a kua him ? a i sualnak kaw a bawl ? ” tin dong hi .
44021034	Mipi sungpen mi hekkhat in phun khat in au haw . A dang mihek khat-ten phun dangin au haw hi . Thubuai leita lawlawm in ngaalbawi pa cun i tin thu pianghim tih a theih ciang ngawl hangin a ngaalkapte khi kahsam ngaalnan nak inn ah hawhpih tuk in thu pia hi .
44021035	A hawhpih hawten kailawn tian bek hen thei haw hi ; mahnungsiah cu mipi te a neh theih haw ngawl hangin Paul cu ngaalkap ten a zawng in zawng hawhi .
44021036	A nunghaw pen zuan tutup in “ That un ” tin au pepel haw hi .
44021037	Ngaalkap ten kahsam nannak inn sungah a tumpih haw tuk ten Paul cun ngaalbawi pai lakah in , “ Thu pakhat no hilh thei nang maw ? ” tin dong hi . Ngaalbawi pa cun , “ Grik awn thiam cim ?
44021038	Mahtihbang ahitale nunglam hun ngeithimlaih aa ngaaltho in mi thawngli hiamnam tuah ngunphil lawnah a taaipihtu Izip pa hi khapang bel tuk ci mei ? ” tin dong hi .
44021039	Paul cun , “ Kei cu Judahmi ing hi . Silisia ngam Tarsas khua pen a piangmi khuapi minthang mun ah a um mi ing hi . Mipi tei lakah thu hilhnak hun pia zazal in hi , ” tin ngen hi .
44021040	Ngaalbawi pa cun thu hilhnak hun pia hi , Paul cu kailawn humah cun ding in mipi te cu dai un hi tin a khutzaap hi . Mipi te a daih haw ten , Paul in Hebru awm in amuh te cu thu hilh hi .
44022001	Paul in , “ U te naute , nu le pa te , nangmu maiah ka sihsan khualnak thu ka hilh bok te hi ngaibok un hi ! ” tin ti hi .
44022002	Hebru awn in a ot hangin mipi te cu dai diudeu haw hi . Mahten Paul cun peh leh in :
44022003	“ Keimah hi Judah mi inghi . Silisia ngam Tarsas pen piangmi ing hi . Mahnaven Jerusalem khua pen khangto mi ing hi , Kamaliel ii khutnuai a tawngta pakhat inghi . a pupa uh tei daan felzet in le khohzet in zilhmi ing hi . Tuni hilaiah a hungmi nangmuh bangbok in Pathian lakah pumpiatu bok ing hi .
44022004	Topa lampi zuitute bawlsia in that ing hi . Numei tingawl , pano tingawl man in thawngah khia ing hi .
44022005	Thiampi Saang le khonsil upa pawlten thumaan ka hilhkhi thei bok haw hi . Mah upa teilakpen Damaskas khua a Judah unaupihtei lakah piaktuk lai cawi ing hi ; Mah laisungah cun Topai lampi a zui mite man in thiktaicin khih in Jerusalem khua ah hawhpih tuk in le bawlsia tuk cun Damaskas khua ahcun hawhing hi .
44022006	“ Mahtihcun hawh ing aa Damaskas khua ka hen kuan sunlaih tak in vanpen a dezetmi vaaknak cun ka elkiim cu deet hi .
44022007	Lei ah lum ing aa , aw pakhat in , “ Saul , Saul , i tahim keimah na bawlsiat lih ? a tih khi za ing hi .
44022008	‘ Topa , a kua cim ? ’ tin dong ing hi . Aman , “ Na bawlsiatmi Nazereth mi Jesuh ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
44022009	Ka lakah a um pawl ten vaaknak cu mu bok haw naven ka lakah a otmi cu za haw ma hi .
44022010	‘ Ikaw ka bawltuk Topa ? ’ tin dong inghi . Topan , ‘ Tho in na , Damaskas khua ah hawh in hi , na bawl tuk Topan a tuptahsa mi hempoh khi hilh haw tuk hi , ’ tin ti hi .
44022011	A de leita hangin ka mitcaw in ngualcam ten ka khut pen Damaskas khua ah kaai haw hi .
44022012	Mah khuapi ahcun Ananias a tih haw mi pa um in amah cu Judah mi hempoh ten a upat zet haw mi pa hi .
44022013	Ananias cu ka el ah dingin ‘ Unaupa Saul , khua mu leh in hi ’ tin ti hi . Mah a tih bek ten khuamu leh in amah cu zo ing hi .
44022014	Aman , Apu le pa uh tei Pathian in ama deihnak a theitu tukin le a maanmi a Salpa tukin le ama aw rori a theitu tukin teng zotoh hi .
44022015	Mahhangin na muhmi le na theihmi hi mi hempoh tei lakah a hilhtu tukin ama thu theitu tetti hi tuk ci .
44022016	Mahtihbang ahih hangin ngeipi ngakpah sun ! Tho in baptizam-nak la inna ama lak aa na thungetnak hangin na sualnak te cu thiantiik hi tuk ci , ’ tin ti hi .
44022017	Mahnungten Jerusalem ah kik leh ing aa Biakinn sung aa ka thunget laih in muhnak nei inghi .
44022018	Mah ka muhnak ah cun Topa cu mu ing ka lakah , Tho inna manlangzet in Jerusalem pen tul in hi , itahimtitale hi khua mi pawl ten ka thu na phuanmi hi pom haw tuk ma hi , ’ tin ti hi .
44022019	Keiman , ‘ Topa , a pumkhawmnak inn haw Sinakok ah hawh in nangmah a umtu pawlte khi man in ka vah lih meek te khi a theih khawng mite haw hi .
44022020	Mahten na thu theitu Stefen a thah haw ten keimah rori umbok ing a that hawvang ka lungkimpih i hum ah a thattu tei puan te a cawisaktu ing hi , ’ tin ti hi .
44022021	Topa cun , ‘ Hawh ta poh inna , ngam khua lapi Gentail mitei lakah tiiktung hi . ’ tin ti hi .
44022022	Mahtin a hilh tian cu mipi ten a phano in ngai haw hi . Mahnaven mahnung ten a aw neihtawp haw in , “ Hipa cu lal ta hen ! That un hi ! A nung tukin taakma hi , ” tin au haw hi .
44022023	A venghawng haw cun au in , kiau in , a puan haw te zaap in leivui khi van ah in thehto haw hi .
44022024	Rom ngaalbawi pan a ngaalkap te cu Paul hi ngaalnan nak inn ah hawhpih unna i hangin mipi ten hitih lawlawm in hua in ausan li haw him tih theihnak tukin vaat un , tin thupia hi .
44022025	Mahnaven vaat tukin a keen celh hawten mahlai munah a dingmi bawi pakhat i lakah , “ Rom mihing a himi pa , a sualnak a i thu him tih sonciang laihngawl in na vaat uh cu daan hi ni maw ? ” tin dong hi .
44022026	Mahmi cu mah bawipan a theih ten ngaal bawipai lakah hawh in , “ I kaw na bawl ? Hipa khi Rom mihing pahcuh ! ” tin ti hi .
44022027	Mahhangin Paul i lakah hawh in , “ Rom mi cim ? Hilh in hi ” tin ngaalbawi pan dong hi . “ Hi zuh ing hi , ” tin Paul in don hi .
44022028	Ngaalbawi pan , “ kei mah vang tangka tampi ka piak nungten mahbok ing hi , ” tin ti hi . Paul in , “ Kei cu ka suahkehnak pen Rom mi toh ing hi , ” tin don hi .
44022029	Mahbekten , Paul thu dong tukin a tumtu te cu nungkik leh khawng haw hi . Ngaalbawi pa vangin Paul cu Rom mi hi tih a theih i hum ah Rom mi thik taaicin in a khih khi a theih leh ten lau leh mahtak hi .
44022030	Ngaalbawi pa cun Judah mitei Paul i hum ah sual a notmi haw hi a i bel nantim tih thei ciang nuamin a zingten Paul ii thiktaicin cu duktiik in Thiampi upa te le khonsil upa a venghawng haw in tawkdun khawm tuk in thu pia hi . Mahten Paul cu pui in a mai haw ah dingtiik hi .
44023001	Paul cun Khonsil upa te cu mai cang zo in , “ Ka phunpih Israel te , tuni tian Pathian mai aa ka nunzia te ah hin lungmu thianngawlnak demno hei nei manghi , ” tin ti hi .
44023002	Thiampi Saang Ananias cun Paul i el ah a dingmi pawl te khi “ Paul cu a muk pen beeng un hi , ” tin thupia hi .
44023003	Mahten Paul in , “ Singo noih pangbang ! a himi pa , Pathian in nang mah beeng tuk hi . Daan bangin ka thu son tukin hilaihcun khung ci ; mahnaven ‘ Beeng un hi ’ tin thu napiak nak hangin mahmi Daan cu pah cat saw ci ” tin don hi .
44023004	Paul i el aa a ummi pawl te cun , “ Pathian ii Thiampi-Saang zawnsak ci , ” tin Paul cu ti haw hi .
44023005	Paul in , “ Israelmi u le nau te aw , Thiampi Saang hi tih thei mang hi , Lai Thiangtho sungah , “ Na miphun a uktu sonsia pahsun , tin um hi , ” tin ti hi .
44023006	Paul in a hung mitei lakpen a heek te cu Sadusi te hi haw in a heek te cu Farasi te haw hi tih khi a muh ten Khonsil upa tei mai ahcun au in , “ Ka miphunpih Israel te aw , kei hi Farasi ing hi . Farasi pawl tei capa ing hi . Athi mite nungleh haw tuk tih ngaihsut sannak ka neih hangin atu hilah hin tazacoihnak tawk ing hi ” tin ti hi .
44023007	Mahtin a hilh celh bekten Farasi le Sadusi pawl te cu haudun in khenkhek haw hi .
44023008	( Itahimtitale Sadusi pawl ten mihingte hi a thih nung haw ten tholeh haw tuk ma toh hi ; vancung mitevang um ma , hawvang tih hei um ma tin ti haw hi . Mahnaven Farasi te cun a pathum in um hi tin um haw hi . )
44023009	A au haw cu ngingdedeuh in Farasi a mi Daanthiam hekkhat te cu dingto in nasiazet in au bok haw hi . “ Hipai sualnak hi neuno hei mu ma ung hi Hawvang a himatale vancungmi in a lakah hilh ngangai thei meen hi , ” tin ti haw hi .
44023010	A hauhdunnak haw cu a nasia leita hangin Paul cu botkeek let thong haw tuk tin ngaal bawipan lau hi . Mahhangin a ngaalkap te khi mipi tei lakpen Paul cu pui in ngaalnan nak innpi ah hawh pih tukin thu pia hi .
44023011	Mahzan in Topa cu Paul ii el ah dingin , “ I mamah lau pahsun hi ! Hilai Jerusalem khua ah keima caa in ka tetti hi zotoh ci , hitih bangbok lengin Rom khua ah vangin ka tetti hi tuk laih ci , ” tin ti hi .
44023012	Azing ten Judah mi hekkhat te tawkdun khawm in thu ngaisung khawm haw hi . Paul a thah theih uh maceng an ei tukma hung , tui hei in tukma hung , tin , thutiamnak bawl haw hi .
44023013	Hitin munkhat in thu a ngaisungtu te hi mihing sawmli saangin tam saw hawhi .
44023014	Mahtin Thiampi upa le upa dang tei lakah hawh in , “ Paul thah laihngawl cun an hei ei tukma hung tin thutiamnak bawl zotoh ung hi .
44023015	Mahhangin nangmuh le Khonsil upa pawl ten Rom ngaal bawipai lakah thucah unna , Paul ii cungcang a kim deuh in thei nuam ung tin ti dun cop un na Paul cu hi laiah hung tiikun hi . Mahten koh ten pangham tuk ung hi , hilai a hen man laih ngawlin that tuk hung , ” tin ti hawhi .
44023016	Mahnaven Paul ii celnu ii capa in mahtihbangin a sawm lihhaw cu a theih hangin ngaalnannak innpi ahcun hawh in Paul lakah hilh hi .
44023017	Mahten Paul cun ngaalbawi pakhat sam in a lakah , “ Hi naupang pa hi ngaalbawi pai lakah hawhpih in na ; thu son tuk pakhat nei hi , ” tin ti hi .
44023018	Mah ngaalbawicun pui in a hotuhaw ngaal bawipai lakah cun hawhpih in , “ Thawngta pa Paul in keimah sam in , hi tangvalpa hi nangma lakah hawhpih tuk intiik hi , itahim titale thu pakhat hilhtuk nei , ” tin ti hi .
44023019	A hotu haw ngaalbawi pa cun tangval pa cu a khut in kai in amu panih bek hawh in , “ Ibel kaw na sonpih nuam mi cu , ” tin dong hi .
44023020	Tangval pacun , “ Judah mi hotu pawl ten Paul ii cungcang ah Khonsil upa pawl ten a cangkim deuh in thei nuam ung tin ti heem in azingten Khonsil upa tei lakah hawhpih tuk ngentuk in lungkimnak nei zo haw hi .
44023021	Mahnaven a thu haw cu ngai pahsun hi ; itahimtitale mihing sawmli sang tam saw ten Paul cu pang haw tuk hi , Paul a thah ngawl ma ceng imah eituk ngawl le i mah in tuk ngawlin thutiamnak bawl haw hi . Atu hin ngaalling ham khawng zo hawtoh in nangma thu soncat tukmi bek ngak haw hi , ” tin hilh hi .
44023022	Bawipa cun , “ Keima lak aa na sonmi hi kuama lakah son pahsun hi , ” tin piintiik hi .
44023023	Mahten ngaalkap hotu ngaal bawipa cun a khutnuai aa ngaalbawi panihte cu sam in , “ Siria ngamah hawh tukin ngaalkap zanih tuangtim un hi . Mahten sipuh humkhung ngaalkap sawmsalih le ceipi ngaalkap zanih vaang tuangtim un na , tuzan nazi kua ten a tuul thei tuk in ngaalling un hi .
44023024	Paul ii khunnak tuk cipuh vaang vaihawm unna mangki bawipa Felix lakah himdamzet noin henpih ta un hi , ” tin ti hi .
44023025	Mahten ngaal bawipan a nuailam aa bangin laikuat hi .
44023026	Klaudias Lisias in mangki bawipa Felix lakah laikuat inghi . Dam laih cim ?
44023027	Na lakah ka kuatmi pa hi Judah miten manin thah tum hawhi . Rom mi hi tih ka theih ten ngaal kapte tuahin luan ung hi .
44023028	Sual a notmi haw hi a ibel him tih thei nuamin Khonsil upa tei lakah hawhpih ing hi .
44023029	Ka theih ngah ten thahtaak sualnak hi ma hi , thawngsung khumtaak sualnak hei hima hi ; sual a not haw mi cu a mudaan ii thu le la men thong khi na hi hi .
44023030	Mahten a mah hi thah tuk in ngai sung haw hi tih ka theih hangin thakhatin na lakah kuat ing hi . Sual a nawntu te vaang na lakah hungin nang ma mai rori ah tazacuai tukin hilh inghi , ” tin ti hi .
44023031	Ngaalbawi pai thupiaknak bangin ngaalkap te cun bawl haw hi . Paul cu pui in mahzan loli cun Antipatris tian hawhpih hawhi .
44023032	Azing ten keciah ngaalkap te cu kiik in sipuh ngaalkap pawlten zui hawhi .
44023033	Sisaria khua henpih haw in mangki bawipai lakah laikuat cu a piak ceng haw ten a khut sungah Paul cu ap haw hi .
44023034	Mangki bawipan laikuatcu sial in i lai ngam pen hung cim ? tin Paul cu dong hi . Silisia pen tih a theihten , Paul ii lakah cun “ Tazacuaitu tei hen ten nathu cu son leh tung , ” tin ti hi .
44023035	Mahten Kumpi Herod i sakmi innpi mangki bawipai zung sungah ngaalkap tei cin tukin thu pia hi .
44024001	Ninga nungten Thiampi Saang Ananias cu upa hekkhat tele sihni Tertulla tuah cun Sisaria ah hawh hawhi . Mangki bawipa Felix maiah cun hungin Paul taza a coihnak haw cu hilh haw hi .
44024002	Mahten Paul cu samhaw in sihni Tertulla cun Paul ii sualnak a notnakthu cu anuailam bangin hilh hi . “ Mangki bawipa , cihnak tuah nangma lampui hangin huncaan ngeipi daihnak ngah ung aa ka ngam uh phatnak tukin le lep kuul mite cu lep hi zotoh hi .
44024003	Mahmi hi ka muh uh ten lungdamzet in sang ung hi .
44024004	Na hun tam leita laaksak kawn ung tih ka lau hangin ka hilhnuam mi uh khi a com theitawp in hilhtuk ung hi , hehpihnakin ngai zazal in hi .
44024005	Hipa hi mibuaizet tiikthei pa le lauhuaizet mi hi tin mu ung hi . Leihum mun tihkim aa Judah mite buaitiik leleng in , Nazarin a tihmi haw sung pen amah hi a lamhuaitu hi .
44024006	Ka Biakinn uh nawngkaitiik tumin a um laih tak in man ung hi . Mahten keimu Daan bangin a thu son nuam ung hi ;
44024007	Mahnaven ngaal bawipa Lisias hung in lonsak lo hi .
44024008	Mahnungten Lisias in Paul taza a cuai nuam pawlte cu nangma lakah hin hawh haw hen tin thu pia hi . Nangman hipa hi thu na dong a hin a ma lak pen sual ka not uh mite hi nangmah rori in thei tuk ci , ” tin ti hi .
44024009	Mahtin a hilh mi cu Judah miten bawm haw in a hilhmi hi a venghawng in maan khawng hi tin ti haw hi .
44024010	Mangki bawipan Paul cu thuson in hi , tin a khutzaap hi , mahten Paul cun mangki bawipai lakah : “ Nangmah cu hi ngam sungah hin kum ngeipi thu sontu , nadektu tihcu thei ing hi , atu na maiah ka sihsan khualnak thuson theihnak thu ka neih hangin ka lungdamzet ing hi .
44024011	Jerusalem ah Pathian bia tuk in ka hawhnak hi nisawm le ninih saangin tamsaw malaih tih cu thei tuk ci .
44024012	Biakinn sung pen kuamah tuah hei in thu eeldun awngma ung tih cu Judah mite vaangin thei khawng haw hi . A pumkhawmnak haw inn Sinakok ah hihen , khuapi sung mun dadang ah hei in hihen , mipi te ka tokpilnak mu hihiim haw tukma hi .
44024013	Mahten atu na mai aa sual a notmi haw hei hi maan tatak hi tih hei in lak thei bok ma hi .
44024014	Bawl ngai rori ing tin na maiah ka tihnuammi cu hiti hin hi . Ka pu le pa uh tei Pathian bia ing a ma , mahtin ka biaknak ah cun Lampi ka tihuh mi cu zui ing hi ; amuh ten mahmi Lampi cu maan ma hi tin ti haw hi . Mahnaven Moses ii Daan sung aa ngatmi hempoh le kamsang pawltei ngatmi laibu sung aa a ummi hempoh tevang a venghawng ka upmi na hi khawng hi .
44024015	Amuh te bangbokin keimah vang cu Pathian lakah uansannak nei bok ing hi . Mahmi muansannak cu , mi hempoh in , mipha hihen , phangawl hei hihen , thihnakpen tholeh haw tuk tihmi hi .
44024016	Mahtihcun Pathian mai le mihing tei mai ah lungmu thiang nei tukin ka zuam theih tawk in zuam leleng ing hi .
44024017	“ Kum ngeipi sung Jerusalem khua ka hen leh ngawl hangin ka miphun te bopnaktuk tangka pia tukin le biakpiaknak bawl tukin Jerusalem ah in hawh ing hi .
44024018	A daan bangin thianthonak ka bawl cengten a hum aa ka hilh mite ka bawl lih laihtak in Biakinn sungah cun keimah cu mu haw hi . Mahlaihtak in ka lakah mihonpi cu um haw ma hi ; buainak vaang um ma hi .
44024019	Mahnaven mahlai ahcun Asia ngam pen a hungmi Judah mi hekkhat um haw hi . Mah mite ka hum ah lungkim ngawlnak a nei haw ahitale na mai rori ah a muh hung rori in a mawhsiatnak haw cu a hilh bok haw tuk mi hi .
44024020	Mah ahimatale hilai aa a ummi pawl te hin , khonsil upa tei maiah ka din laih hin ka sualnak a muh haw mi son haw hen .
44024021	Amu mai aa ka din laih hin thil pakhat bek ka son mi um . “ Mithi mite nunnakah tholeh haw tuk ” tin ka up hangin tusun hin tazacuai haw hi ” tin hilh hi .
44024022	Mahten Felix cu mahmi Lampi thu a pha no in a theitu ahih taak a thu son mi haw cu cawltiik in , “ Ngaal bawipa Filias i henten na thu uh cu son leh tung , ” tin ti hi .
44024023	Paul cingtu ngaalbawi pa cu , “ Paul hi phano in cing un na , dawmno luattiik deuh in , a kuul a sap mite cu a ngualcam ten pia haw hen , ” tin ti hi .
44024024	Ni dawmlaih ngei nungten Felix cu a zi Drusilla tuah in hung haw hi . Drusilla cu Judah mi hi . Paul cu sam in Paul cun Jesuh Khrih upnak thu khi hilh in mahmi cu ngai haw hi .
44024025	Mahnaven Paul cun phatnak thu , mah le mah suupnak thu , le a heng tuk mi thukhennak thu te a hilh ten Felix cu a thinsu in , “ Tu cun kikleh hih ten hi . Hun ka neih ten sam leh tung , ” tin ti hi .
44024026	Felix cun Paul in tangka pia leh tin ngaihsut kuhnak nei hi . Mahtaak Paul cu sam lelem in thuson pih meek hi .
44024027	Kumnih a tin nungten ngam uk tu Felix cu Porsius Festas in a nadeh cu thek hi . Judah mitei lakpen maipha a ngah nuam hangin Felix cun Paul cu suah ngawl in thawngsung ah cun zam hi .
44025001	Festas cu mahlai ngam ah a hen nung nithum ten Sisaria pen Jerusalem ah in hawh hi .
44025002	Mahlaiah Thiampi upa te le Judah mi hotu pawl ten Paul i hum aa sual a notnak haw thu te cu hilh haw hi .
44025003	Paul cu lampi pen that tuk a ngaihsut haw hangin Jerusalem ah pui tuk in Festas i lakah cun ngen haw hi .
44025004	Festas cun , “ paul cu Sisaria ah thawngta mi hi aa keimah vaang Sisaria ah kikleh pal tung hi .
44025005	Na hotu te uh cu keimah tuah Sisaria ah hung haw leh , hipa hin sualnak a nei a hitale hilh hen , ” tin ti hi .
44025006	Fastas cu amu lakah niliat matale nisawm hawng a caam nungten Sisaria ah cun pin leh hi . Inn a hen ni zingten Festas cu a thu sonnak zung sungah khung in Paul cu ama lakah hunpih tukin thu pia hi .
44025007	Paul cu heng in Jerusalem pen a hungmi Judah mite cu a el ah ding menmun in nasiazet in sual nawn haw hi . Mahnaven sual a not haw mi cu maanzet hi tih cu langtiik thei haw ma hi .
44025008	Mahven Paul vangin sihsan khual bok in , “ Judah mitei Daanthu ah hihen , Biakinn thu ah hihen , Rom kumpi pai thu ah hihen , sualnak i mamah bawl mang , ” tin ti hi .
44025009	Mahnaven Judah mitei lakpen maipha a ngah nuam hangin Festas in Paul cu , “ Jerusalem ah hawh in mahlai pen ka maiah taza a cuai haw a hin na lungkim thei ni cim ? ” tin dong hi .
44025010	Paul in , “ Rom kumpi pai thu sonnak maiah atu hi ding vengin hi laipen taza cu cuai hawhen . Nangman na theih bangin Judah mitei lakah thil sual i mamah bawl mang hi .
44025011	Daan palcat in thihnaktham thilsual ka bawlmi a um a hi vangin ka luat a hin tin ngen mang hi . Mahnaven sual a not haw ah hin thumaan i mah a um ma ahitale kuamah in Judah mitei khutsung ah kuamah in hen thei haw tuk ma hi . Rom kumpi lakah azukhaan ing hi .
44025012	Mahten Festas cun amah ngaihsutnak piatu pawlte tuahin a khunkhawm nung haw ten Paul cu , “ Rom kumpi lakah azu na khan bangin a lakah hawhtuk ci , ” tin ti hi .
44025013	Mahnung hun tawkfang a ngeinung ten kumpi Agripas le Bernis cu Festas nuksat in le otpih tuk in Sisaria ahcun zin haw hi .
44025014	Ni ngeithim a caam nung hawten Festas cun Paul ii thu le la cu kumpi Agripas i lakah cun hilh hi . “ Felix in thawngah a khiak taa mi pakhat Sisaria ah hin um hi .
44025015	Jerusalem ah ka zin laihin Judah mi thiampi upa pawl te le upa dang pawl ten tazacuai haw in a mah-cu thah tuk in ngen haw hi .
44025016	Mahnaven ka hilhmi cu : Oh Rom mite cun mi pakhakhat taza a coih haw ten tazacuaitu tuah maiton in a ma sihsankhual nak a neih bok laih ngawlin tazacoihmi pa khi a khut sung haw a piaktuk cu a daan uh hi ma hi , ” tin ti ing hi .
44025017	Hilai ah a hun haw ten nikhat hei ngak ngawlin a zing rori ten thu sonnak munah khung in mahpa cu pui un hi tin thupia ing hi .
44025018	Amah a deihngawl tu ten dingto in thu cu hilh haw hi , sual nawn haw beltuk tin ka ngaihsut zah cun nawn haw ma hi .
44025019	A biaknak haw thu le Jesuh a tih haw mi pa cu thi in , “ Paul cun , Nungleh hi , ” tin a hilh nak i hangin thu eeldunnak nei haw hi .
44025020	Hi thu te ah hin i tin kaw thu a ciangin ka theihtheih tuk , tih ka lungmu khenkhuai thei mang hi : mah hangin Paul cu Jerusalem ah hawh in sual a not haw mi thu hi mahlai ah son a hin na lungkim ni cim ? “ tin dong ing hi .
44025021	Mahnaven Paul in azukhaan in amah vang cu a cinghih tukin le Rom kumpi in a thu son leh tukin ngen hi . Mahhangin amah cu Rom kumpi lakah ka kuat theih laihngawl sung cu ngaalkap tei cin tukin thu pia ing hi , ” tin ti hi .
44025022	Agripas cun Festas cu , “ Mahmi pai thu sonmi cu keimah rori in thei bok nuam ing hi , ” tin ti hi . Festas cun , “ Zing ten thei tuk ci , ” tin ti hi .
44025023	A zing ten Agripas le Berius cu sunglawizet le thupizet in tawhdun khawm nak khaan sungah cun tum haw in ngaalbawi upa bel pawl te le khuasung taangsuak upa pawl ten zui haw hi . Mahten Festas ii thu piak nak bangin Paul cu hun pih haw hi .
44025024	Festas cun , “ Kumpi Agripas le hilaiah a hung mite ; hi na muhmi pa uh hi Judah mi hempoh ten , hilai ah hihen , Jerusalem ah hihen , a deih haw ngawlnak thu keima lakah a hengtiik haw hi . Nungtaak ma hi tih tian in au haw hi .
44025025	Mahnaven thah tuk tham in sualnak a bawlmi mu thei mang hi . Mahten a man Rom kumpi lakah azu a khatnak i hangin mahlai ah kuat tukin thu soncat zotoh ing hi .
44025026	Mahnaven Rom kumpi pai lakah a thu le la ngat tuk a ciang in thei zet mang hi . Mahhangin tu in nangmu maiah in puitiik ing hi . Kumpi Agripas , nangma mai rori ah tul pih ing hi . A thu le la ka dot ciang celh ten ngat tuk i poh beek nei nave nang maw , tih ka nuam nak in hi .
44025027	Itahimtitale keima ca hihiim in thawngta pakhat a sualnak thu te laiah imah a ciangno in ngan ngawlin kuat cu mawima hi , ” tin ti hi .
44026001	Agripas cun Paul ii lakah , “ Na thu cu hilh thei ci , ” tin ti hi . Paul cun a khut tungto in a sihsankhual nak thu cu hitin son hi .
44026002	Kumpi Agripas , tuni nangma maiah Judah mitei sual a notnak haw thu te son theihnak hun ka ngah hangin mi bawngphazet ing tin ngaisung ing hi .
44026003	Judah mitei daan hempoh le thu a eeldunnak haw thu te a theikhawng tu nahih hangin mi bawngpha in ka ngaihsut cuangnak cu na hi hi . Thin sauzet in ngai zazal in hi tin hehpih kun ing hi .
