44026004	“ Judah mi hempoh ten ka nuncan daan cu ka naupang laih pen pan in theikhawng haw hi . Ka nun khawsak daan thu pawl te , a masabel in keima ngam ah , a dawl ten Jerusalem ah , a venghawng haw in thei hawng haw hi .
44026005	Ka thu le la cu a son nuam haw tale son haw hen , a theih haw mi poh hi . apattung penpan kei cu keimu biaknak lam pen a khohkhah zetmi Farasi mi sungtel ing hi .
44026006	Tuni hilaiah keima thu son tukin ka dinnak heihi Pathian in ka pu le pa uh tei lakah thutepnak a bawlmi khi muansannak ka neihnak hangin hi .
44026007	Mahtin muansannak ka neihmi cu ka miphun uh phunsawm le phunnih pawl ten Pathian khi sun le zan a biak haw laih in muansan nak a neih haw mi leleng khi hi . Mahmi muansannak i hangin , kumpi bawipa aw , Judah miten taza a coihnak bel cu na hi hi .
44026008	Hilaiah a hungmi le , Pathian in mithi tholehtiik tih hi ita sang thei ngawl uh cim ?
44026009	Nazareth mi Jesuh ii thu cu ka do theih zah in do tung , tin keimah rori in ka ngaihsut awng mi hi .
44026010	Mahmi cu Jerusalem pen ka bawl lih awng mi hi . Thiampi upa pawl tei lak pen thutheihnak ngahin Pathian ii mihing te tampi thawngah khia ing hi . Thah tuk in a thu haw soncat ahih hawten lungkimpihnak in ka khuttung li bok ing hi .
44026011	Veitampi Pumkhawmnak rori pen bawlsiatiik in , a upnak haw tawp leh hawhen tin ka zuam theihtawp in zuaming hi . A hum haw ah ka thin uk leita in amuh bawlsia tukin ngamdang khua te tian in heng awng ing hi .
44026012	“ Mahtihcun amuh bawlsia nuam rori in Thiampi upa pawltei lakpen thuneih theihnak la in Damaskas khua ahcun hawhing hi .
44026013	Maw kumpipa sunloih taak , Damaskas lampi ah ka hawh lih laihtak in ni saangin a vaaksaw mi van pan hungsuk in keimah le ka hawhpih mitei el kim cu deetsuk hi .
44026014	Ka venghawng uh in lum ung a ma , Hebru awn in aw pakhat ka zaak micun , “ Saul , Saul , i takaw kei nabawlsiat lih ? Khuicang in a neitu ii ngolh a saih ten a mah a nattiik saw bangin nangmah natiik saw ci , ” tin ti hi .
44026015	Topa a kua kam ci ? tin dong ing hi . Mahten Topan , “ Na bawlsiat mi Jesuh ing hi .
44026016	Tho in na , na ke in ding in hi . Ka sila in ka ten nuam hangin na lakah lang ing hi . Tuni keimah na muh mi le mailam ten ka laktuk mite khi midangtei lakah in hilh in hi .
44026017	Nangmah cu Israel mile Gentail mitei lakah kuattung aa , a mu khut sung pen luansuaktung hi .
44026018	Amit haw haktiik tuk ci a ma , khuathimnak sung pen khuavaknak ah satan cahnak sung pen Pathian ii lakah kiklehtiik tuk ci . Mahtih cun keimah a upat nak haw i hangin a sualnak hawte cu ngaihdap hihawtuk aa , Pathian ii mihingten mi sungah tel bok hawtuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
44026019	“ Mahtihbang ahih hangin , Kumpi Agripas aw , van pen muhnak ka muhmi ii thucu eelthei mang hi .
44026020	Amasabel in Damaskas khua ah , mahten Jerusalem khua ah , mahnungten Judah ngam sung hempoh ah le Gentail mitei lakah vang hawh in , Na sualnak uh te siik un na , Pathian lakah kikleh un hi ; mahten sual na sihleh nak uh khi dek nak tuah langtiik un hi , ” tin hilh pepel ing hi .
44026021	Mahtin ka tihnak hangin Judah miten Biakinn sung pen man in thah tuk tian in bawl haw hi .
44026022	Mahnaven tuni tian ah hin Pathian in bawm in , tu hin nangmuh te a neu a ngeng ti ngaisung ngawlin na venghawng uh tei maiah ka muhmi thu cu hilh ing hi . Ka hilhmi thu hi Moses in hihen , kamsang pawlten hihen , a piang tuk mi a hilhham haw mi hi .
44026023	Mahtin a hilhhaw mi cu a i him titale-a vaakmi nunpatnak thu cu Judah mi le Gentail mitei lak ah than tukin Messiah cun thuaknak tawk tuk aa , mahnungten thihnak pen a nunglehtu masabel hituk hi , tih khi hi , ” tin ti hi .
44026024	Paul cun , a sihsankhual nak thulela mahtih cun a hilhten Festas cun , “ Paul , silzet sisi ! Na cun tamnak in siltiik zo si , ” tin au to hi .
44026025	Mahten Paul cun , “ Bawipa , sil mang hi . Thumaan lakpen thumaanbel hilh ing hi !
44026026	Maw kumpi Agripas nangma lakah cun ngaalphazet in awn ing hi ; itahim titale nang cu hithu hempohte hi a thei khawngtu hi ci . Pakhat no hei phawkngil ngawlin sialsiah khawng bel tuk ci , tin muang ing hi ; itahimitale hitih bangin ka hilh mite hi kuamah i theih ngawlmi , a ningnawi ah seelthong mite hi haw ma hi .
44026027	Kumpi Agripas , kamsang te sang cim ? Sang ci , ti thei ing hi ! ” tin ti hi .
44026028	Agripas in Paul cu , “ A hi hun comno sung hin Khristian ah suaktiik nang ngei , tin maw na ngaihsut ? ” tin ti hi .
44026029	Paul cun , “ Hun comno sung hihen , hun saupi sung hihen , hi ka khut aa thiktaicin sialngawl , tuni nangmah le hilai aa ka thu a ngaitu hempoh , na venghawng un keimah bang hi thei le uh ci tih hi ka thungetnak hi , ” tin ti hi .
44026030	Mahten kumpi bawipa , mangki bawipa Bernis le , midangte vangcu dingto in ,
44026031	a hawh nunghaw ten pakhat le pakhat , “ Hipa hi thahtuk taakngai in le thawngta tuk ngai in sualnak a bawl imah um ma hi , ” tin ti dun li haw hi .
44026032	Mahten Agripas cun Festas lak ah cun , “ Rom kumpi lakah a zu a khaan mata a hin , hipa hi hahtheih mi hi , ” tin ti hi .
44027001	Italy ah timbaw in hawh tuk hung tih a soncat nung haw ten , Paul le thawngta dang pawl te cu Rom ngaalkap , “ Kumpipai ngaalkap honpi ” tihmi hotu ngaalbawi Julius ii khut ahcun ap haw hi .
44027002	Asia ngam aa tembaw colhnak mun te ah a cawlthah pepel tukmi Adramittium khua pen a hungmi tembaw ah khung in hawh ung hi . Mesidonia ngam aa Tesalon khuami Aristarkas vang cu kei mu lakah in tel bok hi .
44027003	A zingten Sidon ah heng ung . Julius cun Paul ii humah hehpihnak lungmu nei in Paul ii kinmi thilte a ngahtheihnak tukin le , a ngualcam te leen le tawh theihnak tuk hun te pia hi .
44027004	Mahlai pen hawh lehleu in huihcu keimu lam bebek ah a theu hangin Saipras tuikulh huihdeemnak a langlam mawk tawn in hawh ung hi .
44027005	Tuipi cu Silisia le Pamfilia zawn kek pen tanvawk in Lisia ngam Mira khua ah heng ung hi .
44027006	Mahlaiah ngaalbawi pa cun Elexandria pen Italy ah a hawhtukmi tembaw cu mu in mahmi tembaw ah cun khungtiik hi .
44027007	Dawm hehet no in hawh ung aa , ni tampi ngei nung , a dawltawp nak ten haksazet in Sinidas khuazawn ah cun heng ung hi . Mahlailam tawn in hawhtuk cu huih in a kham hangin Khrit tuikulh lei ii lipnak lam huihdeem nak lam pen tawn in , Salomon ngam pen hawh ung hi .
44027008	Tuipi mawklam neek deuh in hawh ung aa , Himnak timbaw colh nak a tihhaw mi mun ah cun heng ung hi . Mahmi cu Lasia khua pen khawla ma hi .
44027009	Mahlaiah ngeipi cawl ung aa , Sual thiannak Ni a luan zotoh hangin timbaw tuah khualzin cu lauhuai hi zo toh hi . Mahhangin Paul in amu lakah cun hitihbangin ngaihsutnak pia hi .
44027010	“ Ute naute , hi laipen a lampi uh cu a lauhuai mi hi zo toh hi . Napuak uh mi van te le timbaw hi siatsuahnak tawk tuk a ma , mihing te vangin a nunnak uh bo tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
44027011	Mahnaven timbaw mawngtu pai ot le timbaw neitu pai otmi saw khi ngaalbawi pai lungmu sungah tum saw hi . Paul i sonmi cu a thin sungah tumkha ma hi .
44027012	Mah tembaw a colhnak haw cu phalbi hun ten umnak a pha ngawl hangin mi tam saw ten a angthei ahitale Finiks hengtian hawh lawlaw in mahlaiah phalbi sung zong um tuk khi nuam haw hi . Finiks cu Khrit tuikulh ii tembaw colhnak mun hi aa , hanglam nitumnak lamle saklam nitumnak lam heek in a um mi hi .
44027013	Hanglam pen huih neemno theu in a tuptahnak uh bangin hawh thei tukhung tin ngaisung in tembaw khihnak thikkawi khi tuisungpen dok in Khrit tuikulh mawkngut tawn in hawh ung hi .
44027014	Mahnaven a ngeican um ngawl in , “ Saklam insuahnak huih , ” a tih haw mi tuikulh lampen nasiazet in theu hi .
44027015	Ka timbaw uh cu seplok in mahmi huih cu ka pahvawkzawh uh ngawl hangin amthong in um ung hi , ka tembaw uh cu huih in a nuam nanaak ahcun hawhpih pepel hi .
44027016	Kawda tuikulh ii hanglam ka hen uh ten huih a demdeuh hangin a zia um deuh hi . Mahlai ahcun haksazet in tembaw ii kenmi hawmkuang cu lemcang deuh in koih ung hi .
44027017	Tembaw humah cun dok haw in hawmkuang cu khau in khimzet in keen haw hi . Libia ngam tuimawk eel a , tuisung a phiilneel mual tuan khi pahpangsual kawnhung tih a lauhaw hangin tembaw cu a puanzaak niamdeuh ah khiasuk haw in huih ii a hawhpih nanaak ah hawhpih pohhen tin ti haw hi .
44027018	Huihpi cu theu leleng in a zing ten tembaw ii puakmi van a hekkhat te cu tui sungah in vawk haw hi .
44027019	A zinglawi ten tembaw ii naa hekkhat te vawk lehleu haw hi .
44027020	Ni tampi sung , Ni le Aksi te muthei ma ung ; huih cu nasiazet in theu leleng hi . A dawltawpnak ten nungtukhung tih neuno hei muansannak nei leh ma toh ung hi .
44027021	Tembaw humah mihing te cu an ei ngawlin ni tampi a um nung haw ten a mai haw ahcun Paul cu dingto in , “ U le nau te aw , ka thu hilhmi ngai in Khrit tuikulh pen hawh ngawlin a um uh taahin hi tihbangin sunnak le buainak te um tuk ma hung hi .
44027022	Mahnaven a tu hei cun thinsu pahsuh un tin hilh ing hi . Tembaw cu sungtuk nave hungin eimuh cu lalthong tuk ma hung hi .
44027023	Itahimtitale zantaak in keimah neitu le ka biakmi Pathian ii vancungmi ka lakah hungin ,
44027024	Paul , laupah sun hi , Rom kumpipai maiah nadin kuul hi ! Pathian na hum ah a phat hangin nangmah tuah a hawhmi pawl te cu pakhat no hei thi ngawl in a nunnak haw khawih khawng tuk hi ” tin ti hi .
44027025	Mahhangin unaupih te , lau pahsuh un hi ! Itahimtitale Pathian muang ing hi , a hilhsa bangkeek in hi tukpoh hi .
44027026	Mahnaven tuikulh pakhakhat ahcun huih in nuainek tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
44027027	Zansawm le zanli nak zo hi , Mediterranean tuipi ahcun huihpi in nuainek hi . Zanlaih hawng cun tembaw cingtu pawl ten lei lam naideuh bel tuk toh hung tin um mawh deuh haw hi .
44027028	Mahtaak khau in thik tumpi cu khih in khiasuk haw hi , tui cu pi zakhat le pi sawmnih in thuuk hi . A ngei ngawl in khia suk lehleu haw in pi sawmkuah thuk hi .
44027029	Tembaw in suang ngengpi sawhkha ekawn tih a lau haw hangin tembaw ii nunglam pen tembaw khihnak thikkawn pali khiasuk in khuavak tian thungen thah in ngak haw hi .
44027030	Mahten tembaw cingtu tecu taai tuk in ngaisung haw hi ; hawmkuang khi tuiah khia in tembaw ii mailam pen tembaw khihnak thik kawn hekkhat a khiasuk tukbang in um heem haw hi .
44027031	Mahnaven ngaalbawi pa le ngaalkap tei lak ahcun Paul in , “ Tembaw cingtu te tembaw sungah a um haw ma tale na nunnak tuk uh muansan nak i ma-mah um ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
44027032	Mahhangin hawmkuang a leentu khau cu ngaalkap ten satcat in hawmkuang cu tuitaaitiik haw ta hi .
44027033	Khua vaakdeuh laihngawlin Paul cun an eitukintiik hi . Nisawm le nili sung thinsu in um zotoh uh ci , mahsung zong imah eima uh ci .
44027034	Hehpih kuun ing hi ; an dembeek ei un hi . Na nunnak tuk uh in kuul hi . Na lu hum uh a samzang pakhat no hei paaithong tuk ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
44027035	Mahtin a tih ceng ten Paul cun , cangho demno cu la in , avenghawng haw tei maipen Pathian lakah thungen in cangho cu bothem in ei hi .
44027036	Midang te vang a lungmu haw khoh deuh in an cu demno tek ei haw hi .
44027037	Tembaw sungah a ummi , a venghawng in zanih le sawmsalih le paluk ung hi .
44027038	Tawkfang a eih celh haw ten sangvut hempoh te cu tui sungah vawk khawng haw hi , mahten timbaw khi zaang deuh in bawl haw hi .
44027039	Khua a vaak ten tembaw cingtu ten tuimawk a muhmi haw khi ilai hum tih thei haw ma hi . Mahnaven tuimawk pakhat ii tuikel mawk pakhat muhaw in a cang thei tale mahlai ahcun a tembaw haw cu colhtiik tukin ngai sung haw hi .
44027040	Mahhangin a tembaw khihnak khau te cu satcat in thikawn cu tuipi sungah khiasuk haw hi . Mahten tembaw hotnak khau tuah a khih haw mi cu duuk in tembaw malambel ah a puanzaak khi zaak in huih in mailamah muut in tuimawklam ah cun hawh ung hi .
44027041	Mahnaven tembaw cun phiilneel vun sawhkha in taang hi . A mailam cu phil sungah dawt tum in doktuul leh thei ma hi ; a nunglam cu tui hualpi in sual in kehlet khawng hi .
44027042	Ngaalkap te cun thawngta te khi tuivat in tuimawk a hen haw ten tai kuh khawng haw tuk tih lau in thah khawng tum haw hi .
44027043	Mahnaven ngaalbawi pan Paul cu a hupnuam hangin kham hi . Mahten tuivat thei te cu tembaw pen dawk un na , tuimawk ah vat un tin thupia hi .
44027044	A taangmi pawl te cun thingpheeng maw , tembaw kehmawk thingphel pom in zui haw hi . Mahtihcun ka venghawng un tuimawk ahcun himdamno in hengkhawng ung hi .
44028001	Himdam noin tuimawk ka hen uh ten mah tuikulh cu Malta tuikulh tih thei ung hi .
44028002	Mahlai a um mihing te cu keimu hum ah phazet haw hi . Nguahzu in a dap leita hangin keimu caa in meipi tuah sak haw in , pha zet no in zo haw hi .
44028003	Paul cun thingkang te cawmkhawm in mei sungah cun lawn hi . A sa leita hangin meisung pen ngul tul in Paul ii khut pen cik in khai liakluak hi .
44028004	Paul ii khut aa ngul khai liakluak a muh haw ten , mahlai tuikulh aa mihing te cun , “ Hipa hi laithat hibel tuk , tuipi sung pen luat naven a pathian in nungtiik tukma , ” tin ti haw hi .
44028005	Mahnaven Paul cun a ngulcu mei sungah thingvawk in i mamah poisa ma hi .
44028006	I tuk keek ten bum ianuan tukhim , mahma tale i tukten a lup ua-uan in a thih tuk tih khi zoleng haw hi . Ngeizet zo leng haw naven i mah in a um ngawl lam a muh ten a lungmu haw kheel leh in , “ Amah hi pathian hi bel tuk , ” tin tili haw hi .
44028007	Mahlai pen a naithimnak ah lo ngam zalthim um in , a neitu cu mahlai tuikulh aa lalpa Publias hi . Publias cun phano zo in , nithum sung cu a mikhual in suak ung hi .
44028008	Publias ii pa cu khuasik nattun le vonsawk thisan nat naa in ih khun ahcun zau leleng hi . A zaunak khaan sungah Paul cu tum in a hum ah a khutsuang in thu a nget ten dam hi .
44028009	Mahthu a theih haw ten mah tuikulh aa minaa hempoh te cu hung haw in damkhawng bok haw hi .
44028010	Laksawng tampi pia haw in , tembaw tuah ka hawh uh ten lampi lakpen ka kuultuk uh mite vaangcu lawng humah cun koihsak haw hi .
44028011	Ha thum nungten Elexandria pen a hungmi , “ Pathian Caphil ” a tih haw mi tembaw khung ung . Mah tembaw cu phalbi sung mah tuikulh ah a ummi hi .
44028012	Sirakus khuapi ah heng in nithum caam ung hi .
44028013	Mahlaipen tul lehleu in Razium a tih hawmi khua ah heng ung hi . A zing ten hanglam huih cu theu in a ninih nungten Poteuli ah heng ung hi .
44028014	Mahlaiah cun umtu te um haw in amu lakah ni pikhat sung caam tukin ngen haw hi . Mahten mahlai pen Rom khua ah heng ung hi .
44028015	Rom khua aa ummi umtu pawlten ka thawmvang uh a theih haw ten Appius Dawr a tih haw mi khua le ngiahbuuk pathum a tih haw mi khua tian hung in muak haw hi . Paul cun amuh te a muhten Pathian lakah a lungdam in a tha tho ngangai hi .
44028016	Rom khua ka hen uh ten Paul cu a mahnguak umtiik haw in ngaalkap pakhat bek cingtiik haw hi .
44028017	Nithum nungten mahlai hawng aa ummi Judah upa te tawkdun khawm tuk in Paul cun sawm hi . A hun haw ten Paul cun amuh tei lakah cun , “ Ka phunpih Israel mite , a Israel miphun uh le a pupa uh tei lakpen ngahmi a nundaan uh i humah i mah siatsuahnak bawl ma navengin Jerusalem ah thawng a khiak haw i hum ah Rom tei khut ah pia haw hi .
44028018	Thu a dot ceng haw ten thihnak tham sualnak i mah ka bawl ngawl mi a muh haw ten Rom te cun hah nuam haw hi .
44028019	Mahnaven Judah miten a el hawten ka phunpih tei hum ah mawhsiat tuk imah neima navengin Rom kumpi lakah a zukhan ngawl cu cang leh ma toh hi .
44028020	Mahhangin nangmuh ka tawhnuam nak le thu ka hilhnuam nak hi . A ngangai in hitih bangin taicin khih ka hihnak cu Israel mitei muansan leleng mi pa i hangin hi , ” tin ti hi .
44028021	Amuh ten Paul i lakah , “ Na thu le la ah hin Judah ngam pen laikuat ka ngah uh i mamah um ma hi . Na thu le la a sia le a pha a hilhtu tukin mahlai lam pen a hengtu a mihing uh pakhat nohei um ma hi .
44028022	Mahnaven na ngaihsutnak cu thei nuamzet ung . Itahimtitale na Pawlpi thu uh khua le vannuai ah miten sonsia haw tihcu thei ung , ” tin ti haw hi .
44028023	Mahhangin Paul tuah cun a nikhiahdun in Paul ii umnak ah cun mipi te cu tuul haw hi . Zingpen zantian , Pathian Uknak thu cu hilh ciang in Moses Daan laibu sung pen kamsang tei laingat mite la in Jesuh ii thu khi a lungmu sung haw ah a tum tukin hilh hi .
44028024	A hilhmi thu cun mi hekkhat te cu a lungmu haw ciangtiik , bangnaven a hekkhat lamten sang haw ma hi .
44028025	Paul cun thu pakhat hilh in , mahthu hangin a lungmu haw cun thei ngawl in khenkhek dun khawng haw hi . A hilhmi cu Hawvang Thiangtho in , Kamsang Isaiah mangin , napu napa uh tei lakah thu a hilhmi cu maanzet hi .
44028026	A hilh micu : “ Hi mihing tei lakah hawh inna , hilh in hi . Ngai li tuk nave cin theithei tuk ma uh ci ; Zoli tuk nave uh cin mu tuk ma uh ci .
44028027	Itahimtitale a lungmu haw bing in , a beng haw bul in , a mit haw caw hi . Mah ta ngawl cun a mit haw in mu tuk hi , a beng haw in za tuk aa , a lungmu haw cun theitum haw tuk hi . Keima lam hekkik haw tuk aa damtiik tung , tin Pathian in ti hi , ” tih hi hi .
44028028	Mahten Paul cun a dawl ta bel in , “ Pathian ii nunpatnak Thuthang cu Gentail mitei lakah hentiik hi zotoh , tih hi na theih uh kuul hi . Amuh ten mah thuthang cu ngai haw tuk hi ” tin ti hi .
44028029	( Paul cun mahtin a hilh celh ten Judah mite cu tul khek in amuh le muh cu nasia zet in mah thu ahcun eeldun li haw )
44028030	Paul cu a zawn mi inn ah cun kumnih sung um hi , amah tawknuam in a hungmi hempoh te khi phazet no in tawk hi .
44028031	Ngaalpha zet le zaleen zet in Pathian Uk-nak thu zilh in Topa Jesuh Khrih thu vang zilh hi .
45001001	Khrih Jesuh ii sal le Pathian in a Thuthangpha phuangtu tukin a sammi le a tenmi nungzuitu keimah Paul in lai kuat ing hi .
45001002	Lai Thiangtho sung aa a ngat bangin mah Thuthangpha cu Pathian in a kamsang tei lakah a tepsami hi .
45001003	Mah Thuthangpha cu a Capa a Topa uh Jesuh Khrih ii thu cungcang hi , mihing ahihnak lam pecun David casuan sung pen a suakmi hi .
45001004	Pathian ahihnak le a thianthonak lam ah , thihnak pen thawhtiik ahihnak hangin Pathian Capa ahihnak cu a nasiazetmi huham tuah in langtiik zotoh hi .
45001005	Khrih Amah hangin mi hempoh ten saangin a thu a zui theih hawnak tukin Pathian in nungzuitu hihnak covo keimah pia hi .
45001006	Noh Rom khua aa a um mitevang Jesuh Khrih ta hi tukin Pathian ii sammi ah a tel mite hi bok uh ci .
45001007	Mahhangin Rom khua aa a um Pathian ii ihmi le ama mihingte hi tukin a sammi na venghawng uh lakah hi laikuat hi ngan ing hi . A Pathian uh le Topa Jesuh Khrih hehpih ningnatnak le daihnak cu nohtei lakah um zaal tahen .
45001008	Jesuh Khrih ii hangin leihum buppi ah na upnak thu uh a khang ahih taak na venghawng uh ii ca in ka lungdamnak thu Pathian lakah hilh masa ing hi .
45001009	Ama Capa ii Thuthangpha cu ka lungmu hempoh tuah hilh in a na ka deh mite cu maan hi tin Pathian in theihpih hi . Thu ka nget sial ten nangmuhte phawkngil awng mang tih cu Pathian in thei hi .
45001010	Pathian in lem atitale veikhat beek nangmu lakah zin leh thei tukin Pathian ama lakah ngen leleng ing hi .
45001011	Itahimtitale nangmuh te thazaang kho tiiktu tukin Pathian ii Hawvang laksawng na co theih boknak tuk uh in nangmuh tei lakah zin nuam zet ing hi .
45001012	Mahtin ka tih ten keima upnak in nangmu upnak thakhotiik in nangmu upnak in keima upnak thakhotiik bok tuk ka tihnak hi .
45001013	U le naute hihi cing leleng un , vei tampi nangmu lakah zin tukin tumli zo ing hi , mahnaven a i te hangin him a zin tul suak thei ngawlin a khaktu um leleng thong hi . Gentail mitei lakah thin thekmi ka umtiik theih bangin nangmu lakah vangin thinthekmi a um thei a hin tih deihzet ing hi .
45001014	Itahimtitale mi hempoh lakah in deh tuk vo leiba nei ing hi ; miciip le misil lakah hihen , laithiam le thiamngawlmi lakah hihen leiba nei ing hi .
45001015	Mahhangin Rom khua aa a um nangmu lakah vang Thuthangpha phuang tuk cu ngak hel mahtak ing hi .
45001016	Thuthangpha cu zahcaak pih hihim mang hi ; Itahimtitale Pathian ii huham hangin umtu hempoh ten nunpatnak ngah haw hi . A masa cun Judah mitei caa hi , mahten Gentail mitei caa hei hi bok hi .
45001017	Itahimtitale Pathian in Amah le mihing tei laklawh ah itin lemnak bawl him tih khi langtiik in ; mahmi cu a patnak pen a tawpnak tian upnak hangin hi . Lai Thiangtho vangin “ Upnak hangin Pathian tuah a lemdunmi cu nung haw tuk , ” tin ti hi .
45001018	Pathian ii thin-uuknak cu van hum pen mihing tei sualnak le phat ngawlnak hempoh humah in lang hi ; mahmi mihing tei phat ngawlnakte cu thumaan theihtheihnak tuk a khaktute na hi haw hi .
45001019	Pathian ii cawhkuan tawk haw hi , itahimtitale Pathian Aman a theih ciangtiik zo bangin mihing tei Pathian theihtheihnak cu ciangzet in lang zo hi .
45001020	Pathian in hi leipi a bawl penpan muh theih ngawlmi a nundan hihen , kumkhua in a neihmi huham le Pathian ahihnak zia hihen ciangzet in muh theihmi na hihi . Pathian ii thil bawl mitei hum pen muh theih hi . Mahhangin kuamah in pha thei haw tuk ma hi .
45001021	Pathian cu thei leng haw hi ; mahnaven maizahnak le upatnak pia haw ma hi ; a humah lungdam thu hei hilh haw ma hi . A ngaihsutnak haw cu imah ngawl cang khawng in a lungmu hawmhol pi haw cu khuathimnak tuah in dim hi .
45001022	Ciip ung tin ti duncopli haw naven misil hi haw hi .
45001023	Kumkhua nungmi Pathian bia saw ngawlin a thi theimi mihing , vano , ngamsa le a bokvak ngamsate bangin bawlmi zukte saw khi bia haw hi .
45001024	Mahhangin mahtihbang mihing ten a lungmu sung haw aa , a bawl nuam haw thil nawngkai ningdelhhuai nate bawl tuk cun Pathian in kham nuam ngawlin hahzau hi . Mahten zahcaakhuai nu le pa sualnak te bawl haw hi .
45001025	Pathian ii thudik le thumaan cu zolthu in thek haw hi ; Siamtu Pathian ai in a seemsuah cop mi mihing saw tei na dek in bia haw hi . Siamtu saw khi kumkhua in biak tuk mi hi . A men .
45001026	Hitihbangin thil a bawlnak haw hangin Pathian in mihingte cu a zahcakhuai mi amu tisa nopnak sungah hengtiik hi . Numeite hei in numei ahihnak na khi a daanbang mang ngawlin , daan tin hei nei ngawlin numei le numei sual haw hi .
45001027	Mahbangbok leng in pano te vang cun numei tuah pawldunnak zamin a tisa deihnak haw hangin pano le pano sual haw hi . Pano ten pakhat le pakhat mahtihbang zahcaakhuai thil sual a bawlnak haw hangin a thaman haw cu amu humah heng hi .
45001028	Hitihbang mihing ten Pathian thudik cu a lungmu sung haw ah cencihtiik a nuam haw ngawl hangin lungmu nawngkainak sungah Pathian in hengtiik hi . Mahhangin bawl tuk ngawl nate khi bawl haw hi .
45001029	Amuhte cu siatnak , phatngawlnak a phunphun le hampumnak , suaksualnak namkim tuahin dim haw hi . Halhsiknak , mithahnak , dodunnak , mizolnak le huatdunnak , awklawlnak tuah in dim haw hi . Muuk le kam tam in , pakhat le pakhat sonsia dun haw hi .
45001030	Pathian ii mitkem zawng in nungin , ngaallin , pualthau in , mah le mah pahcawi copin phatngawlnak bawl tukcun lampi a phuphun zei in nu le pa tei thu ngai nuam haw ma hi .
45001031	Asia le apha khen thiam theihnak lungmu nei ngawlin a kamtiam hawte zui leh ngawlin midang caa hehpihnak le deihsaknak imamah nei haw ma hi .
45001032	Hitihbang a nungca pawlte cu thihtaak hi tin Pathian ii daan piakmi um tihvang thei haw hi . Mah ii humah hitihbang thil pha ngawlte amuh rori in a bawl haw bek sial ngawlin midang tei bawl ten vang in lungkimpih haw hi .
45002001	Midang tei humah thu a khentu , nang na sualnak cu sel thei tuk ma ci . Itahimtitale nangmah rori midang tei humah thu na khen ten midang tei thu na khennak hangin nangmah le nangmah misual ing hi tin thu khen cop zotoh ci .
45002002	Hitihbang naa phangawl a bawltu tei humah Pathian in thu a khen ten thildik bawl hi tih thei hung hi .
45002003	Mahhangin ka ngualcam pa aw , midang ten naa pha ngawl bawlin a thu haw na son ten nangmah cu amuh bang bok ci . Pathian ii thu khennak pen luat tung hi tin ngaisung cim ?
45002004	Mah ahimatale Pathian hehpihnak , mi a zeptheizia le a thinsaunakte a nasia leita mi hi imamah sumsialngawl in um cim ? Pathian hehpihnak cu na sualnakte siik tukin a ngaisung tiiktu hi tihcu ciangzet in thei ci .
45002005	Mahnaven nang cu thinlian le lungmu ngengzet in um ci . Mahhangin Pathian in a thin-uuknak le thudik thuman tuah thu a khen Ni ten na tawh tuk mi cawhkuan cu a ngeng dedeuh tukin nangmah le nangmah bawl cop ci .
45002006	Itahimtitale Pathian in kuakua heihihen amuh tei dehnak bangin thaman pia tuk hi .
45002007	Mi hekkhat ten thilpha bawl leleng in sunloihnak , minphatnak , le kumkhua nunnak zei haw hi ; Mah mite cu Pathian in kumkhua nunnak pia tuk hi .
45002008	Mi hekkhatte cu mai matan bek ngaisung in a phasawmi zam in a pha ngawl sawmi zui haw hi . Mah tei hum ahcun Pathian in a thin-uuknak cu meiling bangin leih suk tuk hi .
45002009	A pha ngawl a bawltu hempoh ten haksatnak le cimnak thuak haw tuk hi . A masa in Judah ten thuak haw tukaa , a nungten Gentail ten thuak bok haw tuk hi .
45002010	Mahnaven thilpha a bawltu hempoh tei lakah Pathian in sunloihnak , minphatnak le daihnak pia tukin , a co masatu cu Judahte hi tuk aa , a co dawltu cu Gentailte hi haw tuk hi .
45002011	Itahimtitale Pathian in kua mamah deihdannak nei ngawlin bangteen in mi humah thu khen hi .
45002012	Gentail mite cu Moses ii Daan nei haw ma hi ; a sual haw ten Daan nei ngawlin phathong haw hi . Judah mite cun Moses ii Daan nei haw hi , a sual haw ten Daan bangin thukhennak thuak haw hi .
45002013	Pathian mai pen midik hihnak cu Daan sung um mitei caa in beng i zaak bek hi ngawlin ; Daan ii tiikmi dehnak in hi saw hi .
45002014	Gentail mite cu Daan nei haw ma hi ; Mahnaven sia le pha a khen theihnak haw cu amu ca in a daan haw na hi bok hi .
45002015	A bawlmi haw ziaza in Daan ii tiikmi thukham cu a lungmu sung haw ah ngat in um hi , tih langtiik hi . Mahmi cu maan hi tin sia le pha a khen theihnak haw lungmu cun langtiik hi . Itahimtitale vei khakhat ten a lungmu haw cun mawhsiat in vei khakhat ten phat cotiik hi .
45002016	Pathian in Jesuh Khrih mangin mi hempoh tei lungmu sungah a ngaihsut kuhmi haw te , thu a khen ni ten , ka phuanmi Thuthangpha bang hin thu khen hi tuk hi .
45002017	Mahtihbang ahitale no Judah mi pawl te awlaw ? Judah mi ing tin Moses Daan cu muang zetuh ci , Pathian thu lam pe cun uang cop dun zet uh ci .
45002018	Pathian in bawl hen a tihmi cu thei uh ci , a pha miten tuk vang cu daan sung pen thei khawng zotoh uh ci .
45002019	Mitcaw te lamhuaitu ung hi , thimnak sung um mitei ca in vaaknak ung hi tin muang dun copzet uh ci .
45002020	A sil mite , zilhtu ung hi ; imamah a thei ngawl tei lakah saya dek ung tin ti uh ci Daan sung thu theih kimnak le thudik cangkim zet in nei ung tin muangzet uh ci .
45002021	Hilhtu sayate , midangte zilhtu hi na pi in itakaw nangmuh le nangmuh zilh dun ma si uh si ! “ Nguca pahsun , ” tin hilh uh ci ; nangmuh awlaw ngu uh cim ?
45002022	“ Nu le pa sualnak bawl pahsuh uh , ” ti ve uh cin ; nangmuh awlaw sual uh cim ? Milim cu a ning in ningdelh uh ci ; mahnaven milim biakinn aa na thilte ngu uh cim ?
45002023	Pathian ii daan nei ung tin uangzet ve uh cin , mahmi daan palcat in Pathian lakah zahcaaknak hengtiik awng uh cim ?
45002024	Lai Thiangtho sungah , “ Noh Judah mite hangin Gentail miten Pathian nautat haw , ” tin um hi .
45002025	Daan na zui uh tacun vunceep na tan uh hi a man nei hi ; mahnaven Daan na palcat uh tacun vunceep tan awng ngawlte tuah bangteen uh ci .
45002026	Gentail mite cu vunceep tan awng haw ma naven Daan sung aa a ummi thukham khi a zui haw tacun vunceep tan thu ah Pathian in ngaihsutsak tuk ma maw ?
45002027	Mahhangin noh Judah mite , vunceep tanmi hi uh ci , Daan vang lai aa ngat rori in nei nave uhcin mahmi Daan na palcat uh hangin Gentail mitei mawhsiat tawk tuk uh ci .
45002028	Amuhte vunceep tanmi hi haw ma naven Daan zui haw hi . Thu ngangai in a ti uh ahitale a kuakaw Judah mi ngangai le vunceep tanmi ngangai ahih tuk ? A pualam bek pen Judah mi hi tin , vunceep tan cu taksa hum aa bawlnak bek ahihtak Judah mi ngangai hi ma hi .
45002029	A sunglam saw in Judah lungmu in vunceep tannak a ngahtu te khi Judah mi ngangai hi haw hi . Mahmi cu ngatmi Daan ii bawlmi hi kha ma hi . Pathian Hawvang ii bawlmi hi . Mahtihbang mihing cu mihing lak pen hi ngawlin Pathian lak pen thangphatnak ngahtu hi .
45003001	Mahbang ahitale Judah mite hi Gentail tei humah a cuangcungnak haw um maw ? Vunceep a tannak haw khi i poh a man neihcuangnak um maw ?
45003002	A phuphun in a cuangcungnak haw cu um hi . Amasabel in Pathian in a Thuthangpha cu Judah mite cingkhawitiik hi .
45003003	Mahnaven Judah mi hekkhat muantaak ngawlin a um haw a hin a i cang kam ni ?
45003004	Pathian vangin amu humah muantaak ngawl hi bok ni maw ? Mahtin hi ma hi ! Mi hempohte zolthu sontu ngeh a hi haw vangin , Pathian cu a maanmi le muantaakmi hi tuk hi , Lai Thiangtho in : “ Na ot ten na otmi maan hi tih langtiiknak tukin le thukhen ten na neh theihnak tukin hi , ” tin ti hi .
45003005	Mahnaven thil pha ngawl a bawlmi uh hin Pathian ii a maan in a bawlmi ciangzetin a langtiik ta cun , itin tuk kaw ? Pathian in nun a hilh ten sual hi tin ti tuk hung maw ? ( Mihing daan in hilh ing hi )
45003006	Ti hihim pahsun ; Pathian cu maan hi ; a maan ma ahitacun itin kaw leihum thu a khen theih tuk ?
45003007	Mahnaven ka maan ngawlnak hin Pathian sunloihnak saw ah naa dek in a maannak khi langciangtiik saw ahitale itin tuk him ? Itakaw keimah lehlam misual tin mawhsiatnak ka co ?
45003008	Itinkaw , “ A phami lang tukin a phangawl bawl tuk hung , ” tin a tih uh ngawl ? Mahngai mi hekkhat ten mahtihbang kek cun hilh ci tin nawn in zawnsak haw hi . Mahbang mihingte cu mawhsiattaak ahih haw hangin mawhsiat hi haw tuk hi .
45003009	Mahtin ahitale Judah mi ahihnak uh ah Gentailte saangin a phatcuangnak uh um cuang ma maw ? Um hihim ma ! Ciangzet in ka langtiik zotoh bangin Judah mi hihen , Gentail mi hihen , a venghawng uh in sualnak ii huham nuaiah um khawng hung hi .
45003010	Lai Thiangtho in , “ A maanmi kuamah um ma hi ,
45003011	A ciipmi pakhat hei um ma hi ; Pathian biatu hei um ma hi .
45003012	A venghawng haw in Pathian lakpen lam pial khawng in , zindang zui khawng zo toh haw hi . Kua mamah thilmaan a bawltu um haw ma hi , pakhat no hei um ma hi .
45003013	A awnkam haw cu thihpih taakmi mi zolnak ngeh hi . A lei haw pen a lauhuaimi zol thu sonnak tul hi . A muuk haw pen thihsi , ngul ngu bang tul hi .
45003014	A otmi haw tale mitamnak ngeh in dim hi .
45003015	Mi tuahmawhtuk le misuamtuk lamah a zuan haw ngangzet hi .
45003016	A hawhnak haw hempoh ah in siatnak le lalnak in zui hi .
45003017	Daihnak lampi thei awng haw ma hi ;
45003018	Pathian kihcaknak hei cung awng haw ma hi , ” tin atihbangkhin hi haw hi .
45003019	Tucun Daan sung aa thu piakmi hempoh cu Daan ii delhcih mitei ca in hi , tih thei hung hi . Mahmi cu kua mamah ii phelh theih tuk ngawlin le , lei buppi hi Pathian ii thukhennak nuaiah henpih tukin hi .
45003020	Itahimtitale kuamah in Daan zuinak hangin Pathian mai ah thianconak ngah thei ma hi . Daan ii nadehnak cu mihing tei sual theihtiiknak bek hi .
45003021	Tucun Pathian in Amah le mihing tei laklawh ah lemnak lampi langtiik zo hi . Mah lemnak lampi cu Moses Daan le kamsang tei tetti khatmi hi naven , Daan tuah in i mamah seng dun ma hi .
45003022	Jesuh Khrih a upnak haw ii hu le thawm in Pathian in mihing tuah in lemnak bawl hi . Khrih a umtu hempoh ca in hitihcun Pathian in bawl hi ;
45003023	Mahhangin deidat dunnak imah um ma toh hi ; a venghawng uh in misual hung aa , Pathian ii sunloihnak co baan ma hung hi .
45003024	Mahnaven eimuhte a luattiiktu Jesuh Khrih ii hangin Pathian in a hehpihnak laksawng cu pia in amah tuah lemdunnak bawlsak zotoh hi .
45003025	Pathian in Jesuh Khrih ii thisan hangin , misual ngaidamnak a um theihnak tukin a tuptahmi hi , mah ngaihdapnak cu amah upnak hangin ngah haw tuk hi . Pathian ii hibang thil a bawlmi hi Ama diknak a langnak tukin hi . Nidanglaihin Pathian cu a thinsau in , mihing tei sualnakte imah poisa ngawlin um san thong hi . Mahnaven tucun ama diknak khi langciang tukin mihing tei sualnak khi um san thong thei leh ma toh hi ; mahtihcun a diknak cu langtiik in Jesuh a umtu hempohte diknak cotiik hi .
45003026	
45003027	Mahtin ahitale ipoh tuangkhawn tuk nei hung maw ? Um hihim ma hi ! A i hangin kaw ? Daan a zui uh hangin maw ? Mah kha ma ! A upnak uh hangin hi .
45003028	Itahimtitale Daan ii thu piakmi zui hang hi ngawlin upnak bek hangin mihing cu Pathian tuah lemdunnak um hi ; tih hi ka thu tawpnak hi .
45003029	Mah matale Pathian hi Judah mite bek ii Pathian maw ? Gentail mitei Pathian bok ma maw ? Hizuh hi , Gentail mitei Pathian hei hi bok hi .
45003030	Pathian cu pakhat hi , Judah mite cu a upnak haw hangin Amah tuah lemdun lehtiik tuk hi , Gentail mitevang cu a upnak haw hangin Amah tuah lemduntiik tuk hi .
45003031	Mah ahitale hi upnak hangin Daan cu vawk ta hung tihnak hi tuk maw ? Mah tinhima hi , Daan khotiik hi saw hi .
45004001	Ohtei hin le nam cihahtu a pu uh Abraham thu ah , itinkaw a ngaihsut tuk uh ? Amuh le a tawh mite hi itibang kaw ?
45004002	Thil a bawlmi ihangin Pathian tuah in lemdunnak co a ti uh an , tuangkhawn tuk demlaih cu nei bel tuk hi ! Mahnaven Pathian ii mai ahcun tuangkhawn tuk imah nei ma hi .
45004003	Lai Thiangtho in , “ Abraham cun Pathian um in , mah a upnak hangin Pathian in midik bangin sang hi , ” tin ti hi .
45004004	Mi pakhat in naa a deh ten a nadeh man cu pia haw hi , mahmi cu laksawng hi tin ngaihsut tuk mi hi ma hi . Ama nadeh man a lawhmi a thaman hi .
45004005	Mahnaven nadehnak hi ngawlin upnak a neitu , sualnak neimi , sualnak neingawl in a bawltu , Pathian a muangtu ii upnak cu Pathian in Amah tuah lemdunnak tukin a san sakmi hi .
45004006	Pathian in mi pakhat cu dehnak demno hei tel hihiim ngawl in midik bangin a co sansakmi pai lungdamnak David in a son ten , a son nuam san cu hi mi hi hi .
45004007	“ Pathian in a phat ngawlnak hawte a ngaihthiammi le , a sualnak haw a zahsak mite cu mi lungdam mite hi haw hi .
45004008	Topan a sualnak haw a sialsak ngawl mi le , a sualnak haw caziin sungah a khum khak ngawl mite cu , mi lungdam mite haw hi , ” tin ti hi .
45004009	David ii otmi lungdamnak hi vunceep tan mite bek ii co theihmi hi ni maw ? Mah hihim ma hi ! lungdamnak cu vunceep tan ngawl mite hei i co thei mi bok hi . Itahimtitale a hilh zotoh mi uh Lai Thiangtho in , “ Abraham cun Pathian cu umin mah a upnak hangin Pathian in midik bangin sang hi , ” tin ti hi .
45004010	Mahmi cu i tuk laih in kaw ? Abraham ii vunceep tan laih ngawl in maw , tan cengten kaw ? A tan ceng ten hi ma , a tan laih ngawlin hi . Midik in a san ceng ten Abraham in vunceep tannak bawl hi .
45004011	Pathian in vunceep a tan lai ngawl hei in a upnak hangin midik ah sang hi tih melciknak in vunceep tannak bawl hi . Mahtibang ahih hangin vunceeptan ngawl pawlte in amu upnak hang Pathian ii midik tin a cosaanmi pawl tei ca in Abraham cu Hawvang lamah pa bel hi .
45004012	Itahimtitale vunceep tan mite cu vunceep a tan haw bek sial ngawlin a pa uh Abraham ii vunceep tan laihngawl in a nun bangin upnak tuah a nung mite hi haw hi .
45004013	Pathian in Abraham le a casuante cu , hi leipi hi na taa uh hi tuk hi tin thu a tep ten Abraham ii Daan a zui hangin hi ma hi . Mahnaven Abraham in um in Pathian in midik in a cosaan hang in hi .
45004014	Pathian ii thutepnak cu Daan a zuitei lakah piak hi a ti uh tabangahin , mihing tei upnak cu phukthong tuk hi , Pathian ii thutep cu man nei ngawlin cang khawngthong tuk hi .
45004015	Daan cun Pathian thin-uuknak hengtiik hi ; mahnaven daan um ngawlnak mun ahcun Daan zui ngawl sualnak hei um bok ma hi .
45004016	Mahhangin thutepnak cu upnak humah a dingmi hi , Abraham casuan hempoh tei lakah Pathian ii ningnatnak laksawng hi tin aamahkhaan in thutepnak hi . Daan a zuitu tei caa bek hi ngawlin Abraham bangin a umtu tei ca vang in hi bok hi . Itahimtitale Abraham cu hawvang lam pen a venghawng uh ii pa hi .
45004017	Lai Thiangtho vangin , “ Nangmah cu mi phun tampi tei pa in bawl zotoh ing hi , ” tin ti hi . Mahhangin mah thutepnak cu Abraham ii upmi Pathian mai aa a khomi thu tepnak hi . Mah Abraham ii upmi Pathian cu mithi a nungtiiktu le , a thu in a piang ngawlte piangtiik theitu Pathian hi .
45004018	Abraham cun um in muansan tuk imah um leh ngawl toh hei ten muansannak a neih nawm laih hangin , “ Mi phun tampi tei pa ” in cang hi . Lai Thiangtho in , “ Na casuan te cu aksi zah haw tuk hi , ” atihmi khi kim hi .
45004019	Mahlaih cun Abraham cu kum zakhat awndiak hi ; mahnaven a thi pal tukmi a tisa a zoh ten hihen , Sarah ii nau neih theih ngawl thu a ngaihsut ten heihihen , a upnak cu kiam cuang ma hi .
45004020	Pathian ii thutiammi vang cu sang ngawlin um cuang ma hi ; a upnak in thakhohnak pia saw in Pathian khi thangphat hi .
45004021	Thu a tepsami cu Pathian cun bawlsuak tuk tih cu nasiazetin muang hi .
45004022	Mahhangin upnak hang , Abraham cu , “ Pathian in midik in sang hi , ”
45004023	Mahten , “ midik in sang , ” tihmi awnkam hi ama caa bek in ngatmi hi ma hi .
45004024	Topa uh Jesuh thihnak pen a tho leh tiiktu Pathian a upnak uh hangin midik in san comi eimuh tei ca vangin hi bok hi .
45004025	Eimu sualnak hangin thihnak ah hentiik hi ama , Pathian tuah a lemdunnak tuk uh in nunnak ah thawhtiik leh na hi hi .
45005001	Tucun upnak hangin thiamco tiikmi hi zotoh hung hi ; a Topa uh Jesuh Khrih hangin Pathian tuah lemdun zotoh hung hi .
45005002	Upnak hangin a co uh mi Pathian ii hehpihnak sungah Aman henpih in tuhin mah a hehpihnak sungah um hung . Mahhangin Pathian ii vangletnak co theibok tuk hung tih muansannak a um hangin thinnopzet hung hi .
45005003	Mahten haksatnak a thuak uh hei ten lungdam leleng hung hi ; itahimtitale haksatnak in thuaktheihnak hengtiik hi .
45005004	Thuaktheihnak in Pathian lungkimmi hi tih langtiik hi , mahten ama lungkimnak pen muansannak tultiik theih hung hi .
45005005	Hi muansannak in a lung uh siatiik ma hi , itahimtitale Pathian in a itnak cu Hawvang Thiangtho mang in eimu thin sungah buak zo hi . Mah Hawvang Thiangtho cu Pathian piakmi laksawng hi .
45005006	Imah tih theih a neih uh ngawl laihtak in Pathian ii hun a sehnak bangin Khrih cu misual tei ca in thi hi .
45005007	Midang tei ca in mi pakhakhat a thih tuk cu thil baihmi hi ma hi . Mipha tei ca cun thi ngamtu pakhakhat hei um thei men .
45005008	Mahnaven Pathian cun itihzah in it him tih khi langtiik hi ; misual ahih uh laitak in eimu ca in Khrih cu thi hi !
45005009	A thisan hangin ohte cu Pathian tuah lemdun zotoh in , itihzah in kaw Pathian ii thin-uuknak pen aman a pat suak sesem tuk .
45005010	Nidanglaih cun Pathian ngaal hi hung hi , mahnaven tucun a Capa ii thisan hangin a ngualcam in bawl zotoh hi . Pathian ii ngualcam ahih zotoh uh hangin Khrih ii nunnak in Itihzah in oh te cu patsuak tuk him ?
45005011	Hibek hei himalaih hi ; Pathian ngualcam in a bawlsaktu a Topa uh Jesuh Khrih hangin Pathian ii thil bawlmi ah hin lungdam zet hung hi .
45005012	Sualnak cu mi pakhat ii hangin leihum ah heng in , mah sualnak cun thihnak ah henpih hi . Mahhangin thihnak cu mi hempoh lakah heng hi . Mahhangin a kua a bang sual khawng hi .
45005013	Daan a um laih ngawlin sualnak cu leihum ah um zotoh hi ; mahnaven Daan um ngawlnak mun ahcun sual cu sual in sial khak hi ma hi .
45005014	Adam khan pen Moses khan tian mi hempoh cu thihnak in uk khawng hi ; Adam in Pathian thupiakmi zui ngawlin a sual bangbokin sual haw ma naven thihnak in uk leleng hi .
45005015	Adam cu mailam cawng ten a heng tukmi pai lim lakhamtu hi . Mahnaven mahmi panihte cu bangteen haw ma hi , itahimtitale Pathian ii laksawng cu Adam ii sualnak bang hi kha ma hi . Mi pakhat ii sualnak hangin mi tampi ten thihnak tawk haw hi , tih cu thumaan hi . Mahnaven Pathian ii hehpih ningnatnak cu mah saangin ngeng saw laih hi ; Jesuh Khrih amah pakhat ii hehpih ningnatnak hangin mitampi tei lakah Pathian ii laksawng cu ngeng saw ngangai hi .
45005016	Mahten Pathian ii laksawng le mi pakhat ii sualnak cu dangdun zet hi . Mahmi veikhat sualnak cengten a hengmi thukhennak cu “ sual uh ci , ” tih hi hi . Mahnaven sualnak tamzet nung ten cophu hei hi ngawl napi in a hengmi laksawng cu , “ Sual ma uh ci , ” tihmi thu khennak hi .
45005017	Adam ii sualnak hangin thihnak in mi uk hi tih mi cu thudik hi . Mahnaven Jesuh Khrih mi pakhat ii dehnak in itihzah phatnak ngeng sesem him a umtiik ! Pathian hehpihnak cangkim a ngahtu le Amah tuah lemnak laksawng a cotu hempohte cu Khrih ii hangin a nunsung nehtu hi haw tuk hi .
45005018	Mahbang ahih hangin sualnak pakhat bawlmi in mi hempoh te sual a puaktiik bangin diknak pakhat bawlmi in mi hempohte luattiik in nunnak vang pia hi .
45005019	Mahten mi pakhat ii thu ngaih ngawlnak hangin mi hempoh misual in cantiik ahih bangin , mi pakhat ii thungaihnak hangin mi hempoh cu Pathian tuah lemdun haw tuk hi .
45005020	Sualnak khangtiiktu tukin Daan cu heng hi . Mahnaven sual a tamnak mun ah cun Pathian ii hehpih ningnatnak vang cu tam seseem bok hi .
45005021	Mahhangin sualnak in thihnak tuah mi a uk bangin Pathian ii hehpih ningnatnak in diknak tuah mihing te uk bok hi ; mahtihcun , a Topa uh Jesuh Khrih ii hangin kumkhua nunnak sungah pui hi .
45006001	Mahtale itin ti kam nung ? Pathian ii hehpih ningnatnak khang seseem hen tin sualnak bawl dedeuh nawm tuk lai hung maw ?
45006002	Bawl hihim tuk ma hung . Sualnak ah thi ceng zotoh ahih uh hangin , itinkaw a sungah a um leh theih tuk toh uh ?
45006003	Khrih Jesuh tuah pehzom dunnak sungah nipcih zo ahihnak uh hi , a thihnak sungah vangin nipcih hi zotoh hung hi tih hi phawkngil zotoh uh cim ?
45006004	Tui sungah a nip uh te hin amah tuah phum cih hi hung hi , a thihnak ah thi bok hung hi ; mahbangbokin Pai sunloihnak huham in Khrih cu thihnak pen a thawhtiik bangbokin eimuh vang a thak in nung bok tuk hung hi .
45006005	A thihnak ah amah tuah a thi cihmi ahih uh hangin thihnak pen thawhtiik ahihnak ah eimuh vang cu amah tuah tho cih bok hung hi .
45006006	Mahmi cu sualnak tuah a dimmi a nunnak lun uh ii cahnak huham cu bo khawng tuk hi tihnak hi . Mahtihcun sualnak ii sila hi leh matoh hung hi .
45006007	Itahimititale mi pakhat cu a thih ten sualnak huham in a humah thunei leh ma tohhi .
45006008	Khrih tuah a thih langkhat uh hangin , nun ah vang amah tuah nung langkhat tuk hung tin um hung hi .
45006009	Khrih cu thihnak pen thawhtiik hi zotoh ahih bangin thi leh tuk matoh tih cu thei hung hi ; thihnak cun a humah thu nei matoh hi .
45006010	Mahten a thih zotoh hangin sualnak in uk leh thei matoh hi A tu aa nunnak cu Pathian tuah pehzom in nung hi .
45006011	Mahtihbang bokin nangmuh vang sualnak lam pen mithi hung tin ngaisung bok unna , nunnak lam thu ahcun Khrih Jesuh ii hangin Pathian tuah phial dun in nung hung , tin ngaisung un hi .
45006012	Tisa nuamnak khi zui tuk ngawlin a thi theimi na taksa uh khi sualnak in uk leh matoh hen .
45006013	Na pumpi hum uh aa , a ummi thil dangte vang cu thilpha ngawl sual bawlnak in mang pahsuh un . Mah saangin thihnak pen nunnak ah thawh tiikmi na hih uh bangin , na i hempoh uh Pathian lakah pia saw unna , na nunnak uh a venghawng in thilpha bawlnak in mang saw un hi .
45006014	Sualnak cu nangmuh uktu bawi hi leh matoh hen ; itahimtitale daan nuaiah um leh ma toh uh ci , Pathian hehpih ningnatnak nuaiah nung zotoh uh ci .
45006015	Mahtin ahitale itin tuk kaw ? Daan nuaiah um ngawlin Pathian ii hehpih ningnatnak nuaiah a um uh hangin sual bawl tuk laih hung maw ? Bawl hihiim tuk ma hung !
45006016	Nohten mi pakhakhat ii lakah a umlawh le a thungai tukin na pia dun uh ta cun , thungangai in a thu na ngaih uh mi cu nangmu bawi hi , nohte cu a sila hi uh ci ; mahmi cu ciangzet in thei zotoh uh ci . Sualnak ii thu na zui uh ta le sualnak ii suahpihmi cu thihnak ahih hangin thihnak thuak tuk uh ci ; mahnaven Pathian thu na zuinak ii suahpi mi cu lemnak ahih hangin Pathian tuah lemdunnak co tuk uh ci .
45006017	Mahnaven Pathian lakah thangphatnak um ta hen ! Itahimtitale nohte cu sualnak ii sila hi awng zo na ve uh cin tucun zilhnak na ngahmi uh sung aa thudik khi na lungmu hempoh uh in zui zotoh uh ci .
45006018	Sualnak pen luat in diknak ii sal cang zotoh uh ci .
45006019	( Na theih theihnak tuk uh in nisial man mi awn mang ing hi ! ) Nidang cun a pha ngawlmi bawlnak in na pumpi uh cu a niinmi le a pha ngawlmi i sila in pia dun uh ci . Mahtihbang bok leng in tucun a thianghtho mi bawlnak in na pumpi uh cu a venghawng in diknak ii sila hi tukin pia dun un hi .
45006020	Sualnak ii sila na hih laih uh cun diknak ii ukmi hi ma uh ci .
45006021	Mahnaven sualnak ii sila na hihnak uh in a miat na ngah uh neuno beek um maw ? Imah ngah ma uh ci . Mahbang thil sual na bawlnak uh hangin tuin na ngahuhmi cu zakca in na umnak uh hi hi .
45006022	Mahtihbang thilsual ii thaman cu thihnak hi ! Mahnaven tucun sualnak pen luattiik hi zotoh uh ci , Pathian ii sila in cang zotoh uh ci . Na miatmi uh cu Pathian lakah nunnak na ap khawng uhmi nunnak thiang hi , mahmi ii tulpihmi cu kumkhua nunnak hi .
45006023	Itahimtitale sualnak ii thaman cu thihnak hi ; mahnaven Pathian ii laksawng cu a Topa uh Jesuh Khrih tuah a pehzopnak uh hangin kumkhua nunnak hi .
45007001	U le naute , nohte cu na venghawng uh in daanthu theitu na hih uh hangin , tu aa ka hilhtukmi vang cu na theihuhmi hi tuk hi .
45007002	Mihing te hi nunsung bek daan in uk hi . Tehkipnak in , pasal nei numei pakhat cu a pasal ii nun sung bek daan in uk hi ; A pasal a thi ahitale a pasal tuah a kopkawmtiiktu daan pen luat hi .
45007003	Pasal te nungleng napi in pano dang tuah a um kawm haw ahitale nupa sualnak a bawltu hi ; mahnaven a pasal a thi a hitacun midang a pasal vang cun nupa sualnak bawltu hi leh matoh hi .
45007004	U le naute , nangmu thu ah vang mahtihbang leleng in hi . Daan thu son ka hitacun , nohte cu Khrih pumpi ii khenkhat na hih zotoh uh hangin a thimi hi uh ci . Mahnaven tucun Pathian ii nadehnak ah nemcuammi na hih theihnak tuk uh in thihnak pen thawhleh tiikmi pai ta hi zotoh uh ci .
45007005	Itahimtitale mihing ii daan in a nun laih uh cun a taksa uh ii sualnuamnak cu daan in a taksa sung uh ah na dektiik in a ngah a muhmi uh cu thihnak hi .
45007006	Mahnaven tucun Daan pen luat zo hung hi ; itahimtitale sila in a cangtiiktu daan ii ca ah cun mithi hi zo hung hi . Lai in ngatmi daan ii lampi lun tuah hi ngawlin hawvang ii piakmi lampi thak sungah Pathian ii naa dek hung hi .
45007007	Mahtihbang ahitale itin ti kam nung ? Daan hihim hi sualnak hi , ti tuk hung maw ? Ti hihim tuk ma ! Mahnaven sualnak cu sualnak hi tin a theitiiktu cu Daan hi hi . Daan cun , “ Midang tei thil haza pahsun , ” a tima a hin , midang tei thil hazak cu aihim tih thei tuk ma hung hi .
45007008	Mahven sualnak cun mah thukham cu mang in ka pumpi sungah deihnak le nuamnak a phunphun suaktiik hi . Keimah hei hi daan tel ngawlin a nungmi ing hi ; Daan um ngawlnak ah sualnak cu a thi hi .
45007009	Keimah vang daan tel ngawlin a nungmi ing hi , mahnaven thu kham hangin sualnak nung in kei cu thi ing hi .
45007010	Nunnak piatu tuk tihmi thu kham cu kei ca in thihnak hi .
45007011	Sualnak cun hunpha ngah in thukham cu a hiamnam in mang in , zol in kei cu that hi .
45007012	Daan amah ngangai cu thiangtho in thukham vang cu thiangtho hi , a maanmi hi aa phazet hi .
45007013	Mahtin ahitale a phami cu kei ca in ka thihnak in cang tumsial , hi aa maw ? Hi naisaima ! Thihnak a bawltu ngangai cu sualnak hi . Sualnak in sualnak ngangai ii ahih daan ciangzetin langtiik tukin phatnak mangin ka humah thihnak hengtiik hi . Mahhangin thukham in sualnak cu mulzakhuai sualnak ahih zia langtiik hi .
45007014	Daan cu hawvang lam thil hi tih khi thei hung hi ; mahnaven kei cu tisa mi ing ama , sualnak ii sila tukin zuakmi ing hi .
45007015	Thil ka bawlmi hi a matlap thei mang hi , itahimtitale ka bawl nuammi khi bawl ngawlin ka nuam ngawlmi saw khi bawl ing hi .
45007016	Bawl ka nuamngawl mi ka bawl hangin Daan cu maan hi tin ka lungkim pihnak lang hi .
45007017	Mahhangin hi tin a bawllitu ngangai cu keimah hi kha mang hi ; ka sung aa a ummi sualnak na hi saw hi .
45007018	Mihing ka hihnak sung tatak ahcun imamah phatnak um ma tih cu thei ing hi . Itahimtitale a phami bawl nuamnak cu ka sungah a um tavang in a phami bawl thei hihim mang hi ;
45007019	Apha bawl nuammi khi bawl mang hi ; a pha ngawl , bawl tuk ka nuam ngawl sawmi bawl ing hi .
45007020	Ka bawl nuam ngawlmi bawl ka hi ta cun a sullam cu a bawltu khi kei kha mang hi , ka sungah a nungmi sualnak hi saw hi .
45007021	Mahhangin eimu sung aa , thil a can daan hi thei ing hi a phami bawl tuk ka nuam ten , ka ten ngahmi cu a pha ngawlmi ngeh na hi saw hi .
45007022	Ka lungmu ngil cun Pathian ii daan ahcun lungdam hi .
45007023	Mahnaven ka taksa sungah daandang na dek boktu um hi ; mahmi daan cu ka lungmu sung ii pha a tihmi a dotu daan khi hi . Mahmi cun ka taksa sung aa naa a dekmi sualnak ii daan nuaiah cun sila bangin taangtiik hi .
45007024	Thinnop ngawl mi mihing hi thongsing maw ! Thihnak lam ah a kholtu hi taksa pumpi pen a kon pan suak thei tuk him ?
45007025	Pathian lakah thangphatnak um ta hen ; Pathian a man a Topa uh Jesuh Khrih ii hangin pansuak hi . Ka hihdan ngangai cu hi bangin hi , keima bul cun ka lungmu bek in Pathian ii daan cu zui ing hi ; mahnaven mihing ka hihnak tatak cun sualnak daan zui hi .
45008001	Tucun Khrih Jesuh tuah a pehdun mitei caa cun sual thukhennak pen luat zo haw toh hi .
45008002	Itahimtitale Khrih Jesuh tuah pehzopnak hangin nunnak a piatu Hawvang ii daan in sualnak le thihnak daan sung pen luattiik zo hi .
45008003	Mihing hihnak hi a nawmtaam leita hangin daan ii bawl theihngawlmi khi Pathian in bawlsak hi . Ama Capa rori pia in mihing hihnak sung aa a ummi sualnak khi thukhennak pia hi ; mah a Capa cu sualnak bothaltiik tukin mihing hihnak tuah in hung hi .
45008004	Hitihbangin Pathian in naa a dehnak cu mihing nundaan in nung ngawlin Hawvang ii deihnak in a nungmi oh tei sungah hin daan ii tiikmi , a maanmi le a dikmi kimtiik ahihnak tukin hi .
45008005	Mihing hihnak ii tiikmi bangin a nungmi pawl tei lungmu cu mihing hihnak ii deihnak in uk hi . Hawvang ii tiikmi bangin a nung mitei lungmu cu Hawvang i deihnak in uk bok hi .
45008006	Mihing hihnak ii uk mitei tawhtukmi , cu thihnak hi ; Hawvang ii uk mitei co tukmi cu nunnak le daihnak hi .
45008007	Mahangin mi pakhat mihing hihnak ii ukmi cu Pathian ii ngaal hi ; itahimtitale Pathian ii daan zui ma hi ; a zui nuam ngawl thong hei hi ngawlin a zui thei ngawl hi .
45008008	Mihing hihnak ii daan a zuitu te cun Pathian lungdamtiik thei haw ma hi .
45008009	Mahnaven nohte cu na mihing hihnak uh in nung ma uh ci ; Pathian ii Hawvang cu nangmu sungah a um tatak tacun Hawvang ii tiiknak bangin nung saw uh ci . Kua heihihen Khrih ii Hawvang a nei ngawltu cu Khrih ii ta hi ma hi .
45008010	Khrih nangmu sungah a nung tale Hawvang cu nangmuh teica in nunnak hi ; itahimtitale sualnak ii hangin na pumpi uh cu thi tuk naven nohte cu Pathian tuah lemdun tiikmi hi zotoh uh ci ,
45008011	Thihnak pen Jesuh a tho tiiktu Pathian ii Hawvang nangmu sungah a nung tacun thihnak pen Khrih a tho leh tiiktu Pathian in nangmu sungah a Hawvang a um tiiknak hangin a thi thei mi na taksa pumpi uh cu nunnak pia bok tuk hi .
45008012	Mahhangin ka u le naute aw , mihing hihnak ii deihzawng in a nung tuk te hi ma hung hi .
45008013	Mihing na hihnak uh ii deihzawng in na nung uh ahitale thi tuk uh ci ; Mahnaven sualnak na bawl mekmi uh te khi Hawvang ii bopnak in na that uh ahitale nung tuk uh ci .
45008014	Pathian Hawvang ii lampui mite cu Pathian ii cate hi haw hi .
45008015	Itahimtitale Pathian ii piakmi Hawvang cu sila in a bawltu Hawvang hi ma hi ; a lauli tukin a bawltu Hawvang hei hi ma hi . Mah Hawvang cun Pathian ii cate in bawl in , Pathian lakah , ka Pa , ka Pa tin a au theihnak uh thazaang a piatu hei cu Hawvang hi .
45008016	Mahtin a au uh ten Pathian ii Hawvang cun eimu hawvang pehzom in Pathian ca ahihnak uh khi ciangtiik hi .
45008017	Ca ahih uh hangin Pathian in a mihing teica in a koihsami thupha a cotu tukte hung hi ; mahten Pathian in Khrih ii ta tukin a koihsami vang Khrih tuah co langkhat tuk hung hi . Itahimtitale Khrih thuaknak a thuakboktu a hi uh tacun a vangletnak vang cu co bok tuk hung hi .
45008018	Atu hun aa haksatnak a thuakmi uh hi eimu lakah a langleh tuk laihmi vangletnak tuah tekip taak in ngaisung hihim mang hi .
45008019	Siammi hempoh in Pathian ii a cate a langtiik tuk khi ngaakhel mahtak haw hi .
45008020	Itahimtitale siammi na hempoh tei tuptahmi cu a lalthong tukin teeksa hi . Mahmi cu amu nuam thu hi ngawlin Pathian ii deihnak hi . Mahven muansan tuk cu um laih hi .
45008021	Ni khakhat ten siammi hempoh te hi a lalthong tukmi saltaannak pen luattiik khawng hi tuk aa , Pathian ca tei comi a sunglawi luatnak cu co leh bok haw tuk hi .
45008022	Tuni hun tian in siammi hempoh ten nauhing tuk tau bangin a tau haw cu thei hung hi .
45008023	Siammi bek hi ngawlin Pathian ii laksawng masabel Hawvang a cotu le a teptu ohte vang taksa pumpi luatnak tukin le Pathian ca cantheihnak tuk ngak in a sunglam uh in tauli bok hung hi .
45008024	Itahimtitale muansannak bek tuah in nunpatmi hi hung hi . A muansanmi uh khi a mu thei uh tacun muansannak ngangai hi ma hi . Kuakaw a mit in a muhtheihmi cu a muansan awng ?
45008025	Mahnaven a muh uh ngawlmi muansan ahi uh tacun thinsau in ngaklo hung hi .
45008026	Mahtihbangbok leng in oh te cu a nawmtaammi ahih uh hangin eimuh bawm tukin Hawvang heng hi . Itahimtitale , itinkaw thu nget tuk tih hei a theih uh ngawl laih in awn ah hei a tul thei ngawlmi a taunak uh cu Hawvang cun Pathian lakah in ngetsak hi .
45008027	Mahten eimu lungmu a mutu Pathian in Hawvang ii ngaihsutmi cu a i him tih khi thei hi ; itinhimtitale Pathian ii deihzawngin a mihing tei ca tukin Hawvang cun Pathian lakah ngetsak hi .
45008028	I hempoh ah hin Pathian in amah a ittu te le ama tuptahnak bangin a sam mitei caa cun a phatnak haw tukin nadek hi tih cu thei hung hi
45008029	Pathian in a tensa mite cu a Capa bang tukin a dangdeuh in koih hi ; mahtihcun unau tampi lakah a Capa cu pakhatnak ahihnak tukin hi .
45008030	Mahhangin Pathian ii a dangtum in a koihsa mite cu sam vang sam hi . Mahten a sam mite cu thiancotiik in a vangletnak vang cu pia bok hi .
45008031	Hite hempoh a theih nung uh ten a i kaw a hilh hih tuk uh ? Pathian eimu lamah atang tacun ohte a kua in dodal thei tuk him ?
45008032	A dodaltu cu Pathian hi ma hi , a Capa neihcalam no hei khawih ngawlin eimuh venghawng ca in pia zo hi ! Ama Capa rori hei a pia a hitacun thil dadangte hi a thawnthong in pia tuk ma maw ?
45008033	Pathian ii tenmi a mihingte cu a kua in kaw sual a not theih haw tuk ? Pathian amah hei in a sual haw mai zo hi tin thu than hi !
45008034	Akua in kaw sual a nawn tuk ? Khrih Jesuh in mawhsiat tuk ma hi ; amah cu eimuh tei ca thi in thawhlehtiik ahih nung ten Pathian ii taklam ah um in eimu ca in Pathian lakah nget sak hi .
45008035	Mahtih ahitacun a kua in kaw Khrih ii itnak pen a khen thei tuk ? Haksatnak hihen , thuaknak in hihen , bawlsiatnak in hihen , ngilkialnak in hihen , zawngkhal tingsapnak in hihen , launak le thihnak in hihen , mah miten khen thei haw aa ni maw ? Khen thei tuk ma hi !
45008036	Lai Thiangtho sungah . “ Nangma hangin nisial thih lau in um ung , ngawh tuk koih mi tuu bangin bawl haw hi , ” tin um hi .
45008037	Hi tihbang hi napi in , ohte a ittu ii hangin hi thil hempoh ii humah nehtu hi hung hi .
45008038	Itahimtitale ama itnak ii hangin imamah in khen thei tuk ma hi , thihnak hihen , nunnak hihen , vancungah a ummi van mi le uktu le huham neitu te hihen , a tukhan hihen , mailam khan hihen ,
45008039	leihum ummi hihen , leinuai ummi hihen khen thei haw tuk ma hi . A Topa uh Jesuh Khrih hangin a taa uh Pathian ii itnak pen a khentheitu tuk siammi sung hempoh pen imamah um ma hi .
45009001	Ka hilhmi hi thumaan hi . Khrih taa ka hihtaak zolthu son mang hi . A pha le a sia khenkhuai theihnak Hawvang Thiangtho ii ukmi ka lungmu hin zolthu ka son ngawlnak cu ciangzet in hilh hi .
45009002	Ka thasiatnak cu ngeng ngangai hi ; ka thi le ka sa ka phunpih tei caa in , ka thin natnak cu bo ni nei ma hi .
45009003	Amuhte hangin keimah sawn hi Khrih pen khenkhekmi le Pathian ii tamsiatnak nuai a ummi ka hi saw an nuam ing hi .
45009004	Amuhte cu Pathian ii mihingte hi haw hi ; Pathian cun a cate in bawl in a vangletnak cu amu lakah in langtiik hi . Amuh tuah thutepnakte hei bawl in a mu lakah cun Daan te vang pia hi . A dikmi biaknak cu nei in Pathian ii thutiamnak a cotu hi haw hi .
45009005	A muhte cu Hebru mi mi minthang zette ka pi le pu uh tei sung pen a tul mite hihaw hi ; mahten mihing lam in a ngaisung uh a hitale Khrih vang cu a nampih haw na hi hi . I hempoh a uk khawngtu Pathian cu kumkhua in thangphat hi tahen . Amen .
45009006	Israel mi a venghawng haw in Pathian ii mihing hi khawng haw ma hi ; hinaven Pathian ii thutepnak cu kim suakma ka tih nuamnak hi ma hi .
45009007	Abraham ii casuante hei a veng hawng haw in Pathian cate hi khawng saap haw ma hi . Pathian in Abraham lakah , “ Casuante tin ka sam tuk mite cu Isak sung suakte hi haw tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
45009008	Hi mi ii a tih nuamsanmi cu : mihing hihnak daan in hinmi cate cu Pathian cate tihnak hi ma hi ; Pathian ii thutepnak in hin mi casuante bek khi casuan tatak in sialtukmi hi , tihnak hi .
45009009	Itahimtitale Pathian ii thutepnak cu hitin um hi : “ Ahun a kim ten hung leh tung aa , Sarah in capa nei tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
45009010	Hi bek hi ma laih hi . Itahimtitale Rebeka ii capa panih ten pa nei in amah cu keimuh a hingtu ka pu uh Isak hi .
45009011	Mahnaven tenmi capa pakhat in Pathian ii tuptahmi a kimtheihnak tukin Pathian in Rebeka lak ahcun “ A u in a nau ii nadek tuk , ” tin ti hi . Pathian in hi thu hi amuh tei pian lai ngawlin um zo hi , a pha a sia imah a bawl haw lai ngawlin a hilhmi hi . Mahhangin Pathian in mi a ten ten , a thilbawlnak haw in hi ngawlin aman a sam hangin hi saw hi .
45009012	
45009013	Lai Thiangtho hei cun , “ Jakob cu it ing , Esau cu hua ing , ” ti hi .
45009014	Mahbang a hitacun Pathian cu dikma hi tin ti nung maw ? Ti thei hihim ma hung !
45009015	Itahimtitale Moses lakah , “ Hehpih ka nuammi humah hehpih tung , ningnatnak neih ka nuammi humah ningnatnak nei tung , ” tin ti hi .
45009016	Mahhangin i hempoh mihing tei deihnak le a bawlnak haw hang hi ngawlin Pathian ii hehpihnak a um hangin hi saw hi .
45009017	Izip ngam a Faro kumpi pai thu ah hei in , Lai Thiangtho in , “ Nangmah cu kumpi in bawl ing a , leihum hempoh ah ka cahnak huham langtiik tukin le , ka min na thantiiknak tukin teng ing hi ” tin ti hi .
45009018	Mahhangin Pathian in a deihmi poh khi hehpih in a deihmi poh khi a lungmu haw khohtiik hi .
45009019	Mahnaven nangmu lakpen pakhakhat in ka lakah , “ Hitihbang ahi ngangai ta cun , itinkaw Pathian in mi a mawhsiat theih tuk ? Pathian ii deihmi le a tumtahmi cu a kon el thei tuk him ? ” tin dong tuk uh ci .
45009020	Mahnaven , ngualcam pa , mahtin Pathian a don ngamtu a kua uh cim ? Beel in beel bawl pai lakah , “ Itakaw kei hi tin na bawl ? ” tin dong awng maw ?
45009021	A thu ngangai ti ahin beel bawl pa cun beel lei khi a dedeih in bawl theihnak thu nei hi ; a nuamtale beellei lomkhat pen beel panih hei bawl thei ; pakhat cu hun sunglawi hun ten man tuk , pakhat cu nisial manthong tukin bawl thei hi .
45009022	Mahtihbang bok leng in Pathian ii thil bawldaan ah hei in hi bok hi . A thin-uuknak langtiik tukin le kuakua heihihen a huham muhnak tuk khi deih hi . Mahnaven a thin-uuknak a thuaktu tuk le siatsuahnak a tawktu tuk tei humah cun a thinsauzet in hehpihzet sih hi .
45009023	Mahten a cangkim mi a vangletnak hei cu langtiik nuam in a cotu tukin teek sa ahih uh hangin a hehpihnak a dongtu oh tei humah a vangletnak cu leihsuk hi .
45009024	Itahimtitale ohte cu ama mihing aa a sam mite hung hi ; Judah mitei sung pen sammi bek hi ngawlin Gentail tei sung pen sammite hung hi .
45009025	Hosea laibu sungah Pathian in , ‘ Ka mihing , ’ a hi ngawl mite khi ‘ Ka mihing ’ tin ti tung ka deih ngawl mi minam vang ‘ Ka ihmi ’ tin sam tung .
45009026	“ Nohte cu ka mihing hi kha ma uh ci tin a tihnak mun ah khin amuhte cu A nungmi Pathian ii ca te , tin sam hi haw tuk hi ” tin ti hi .
45009027	Mahten kamsang Isaiah in Israel mitei thu ah “ Israel mite cu tuipi thuanthum mawk a ngunphil zah in a tam haw hei in mi dawm no bek nunpat hi haw tuk hi .
45009028	Itahimtitale a ngeican um ngawlin hi leihum thu Pathian in khen tuk , ” tin ti hi .
45009029	A laih ngawl deuh in Isaiah leleng in , “ Cungnung bel Topan casuan hekkhatte khawih ngawlin a um ta a hin Sodom bangin cang zotoh in Gomorah bangin hi zo tuk toh hung hi , ” tin a tih bangkeek khin hi .
45009030	Mah ahih hangin , hitin hilh ung ; Pathian tuah lemdunnak bawl awng ngawltu Gentail mite cu a upnak haw ii hangin Pathian tuah lemdun zo haw hi .
45009031	Mahnaven Pathian ii mihingte Pathian tuah lemdun nuam in daan a zeilitute cun mah lemnak cu tawk haw ma hi .
45009032	A i hangin kaw ? Upnak muang ngawlin a deh haw mi a muansaw haw hangin hi . Mahtih cun , “ Bahnaksuang , ” humah cun bah haw hi .
45009033	Mah suang thu ah cun Lai Thiangtho in : “ Zo in , Zion ah suang pakhat koih ing , mahmi hangin mi tampi bah in lum haw tuk hi , mah suang cun mi tuutiik tuk hi , mahnaven mah a muangtute cu , lungkiamnak nei haw tuk ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
45010001	U le naute , ka phunpih mihing ten nunpatnak ngah zaal haw leh tih cu ka lungmu hempoh tuah ka deihmi hi . Izah tian in him amu ca tukin thu ka nget .
45010002	Pathian caa ahcun tangzet haw hi tih cu a theihpihtu ing hi ,
45010003	Mahnaven a tannak haw maan ma hi . Pathian in Amah le mihing laklawh ah itih bangin lemdunnak lampi bawl hum tih khi thei haw ma hi ; amuh no amu zei cop mi lampi bawl haw ; mahhangin Pathian in mihing tuah lemdunnak a bawlmi lampi sungah tum nuam haw ma hi .
45010004	Khrih in Daan cu a botiik zotoh hangin kua heihihen a tu penpan amah a umtu hempoh cu Pathian tuah lemdunnak ngah haw hi .
45010005	Moses in Pathian tuah lemdunnak cu Daan zuinak bek in hi tin ngan in , “ Kua heihihen Daan ii thupiakmi a zuitu cu nung tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
45010006	Mahnaven Lai Thiangtho in upnak hangin Pathian le mihing tei laklawh ah lemnak thu ahcun hi tin ti hi . “ Akua kaw vancungah a kai tuk ? tin mah le mah dot dun tuk hi ma hi , ” ( A tih nuammi cu Khrih khi van pen tolh suk tuk tih ai hi )
45010007	“ Lei nuai ah a kuakaw a tolh tuk ? tih hei in dong pahsun . ” ( mahtin a tihmi cu Khrih khi thihnak pen kaih suah tul tuk tih nak hi )
45010008	A hilhmi ngangai cu “ Pathian ii phuanmi thu cu na el ah um , na muk ah um in , na lungmu ah vangin um hi , ” tin ti hi . Mahmi cu ka phuanmi uh upnak ii thu cu na hi hi .
45010009	Jesuh cu Topa hi tin na muk in phuang in Pathian in thihnak pen tho lehtiik , tin na lungmu in na um tatak na hi ta cun nunpat hi tuk ci .
45010010	Upnak hangin Pathian tuah in lemdunnak co hung hi ; a phuannak uh hangin patnak ngah hung hi .
45010011	Lai Thiangtho in , “ Amah a umtu pawpoh cu a lungmu kiam haw tuk ma hi , ” tin ti hi .
45010012	Hi tih hin ‘ A umtu pawpoh cu , ” a tih ten , akua abang in tel khawng hi , itahimtitale Judah mi le Gentail mitei laklawh ah deidat dunnak um leh matoh hi . Pathian cu mi hempoh tei Topa , hi aa , Ama a min samtu hempoh tei lakah thupha muicu tampi in pia hi .
45010013	Lai Thiangtho in , “ Kua heihihen Topai min a samtu hempoh in patnak ngah haw tuk hi , ” a tihmi khi kim hi .
45010014	A umngawltu ten itin amin sam thei haw tuk him ? A thu le la a thei haw ta ngawl cun i tin um thei haw tuk him ? A thu cu phuan a hi ta ngawl cun i tin him a theih theih haw tuk ?
45010015	Kamtai hahmi a um ta ngawl cun i tin kaw a phuan theih haw tuk ? Lai Thiangtho in “ Thuthangpha a phuangtu Kamtai tei ke khi itihzah in mawi him ? ” tin ti hi .
45010016	Mahnaven mi hempoh ten Thuthangpha cu pom haw ma hi . Isaiah amah hei in , “ Topa , a kua kaw thuthang ka phuanmi uh a sang , ” tin ti hi .
45010017	Mahhangin upnak cu thuthang theihnak pen heng in , mah Thuthangpha cu Khrih ka phuannak uh pen heng hi .
45010018	Mahnaven ka thudot nuammi cu : “ Thuthangpha phuanmi hi thei awng ma ngangai haw maw , ” tih hi hi . Thei haw e ; itahimtitale Lai Thiangtho in : “ A awthawng haw cu leihum khua hempoh ah thang hi , A ot haw cu lei tawpnak tian in heng hi , ” a tihmi khi a maan hi .
45010019	Pakhat dong nuam laih ing : “ Israel miten alaw , thei haw ma maw ? Moses amah rori hi thudotnak a dontu masabel hi , tin don hi . “ Ka minam te iksiknak nei tiiktu tukin , miphun in sial tak ngawl pawl te mang tung , ” tin ti .
45010020	Hi saangin ngaalpha seseem in Isaiah cun awn in , “ Kei a zei ngawltu ten tawk in , ka thu a dong ngawltu tei lakah lang ing , ” tin ti hi .
45010021	Mahnaven Israel mitei thu ahcun : “ Thungai ngawl le mi dodaltu Israel tei lakah sunnilui in ka khut zaak ing ” tin ti hi .
45011001	Mahtihbang ahitale Pathian in a mite cu lawlni maw ? Lawl hihim tuk ma ! Keimah vang hi Israel mi , Abraham ii casuan Benjamin hin bok ing hi .
45011002	Pathian in a pattung in a tenmi a mihing te cu lawl ma hi . Lai Thiangtho sung a ngatmi , Israel mite mitkem in Elijah in Pathian lakah a otmi khi thei uh ci mei ? Elijah in ,
45011003	“ Topa , na kamsangte that in na biaklaandawhte phialet khawng in ; keimah pakhat
45011004	bek taang in , keimah hei hi thah tum haw hi ! ” tin ti hi . Mahten Pathian in itinkaw a don ?
45011005	Baal pathian a bia laih ngawlmi keima bul ca in mihing thawng salih nei laih ing hi . Mahbangbok leleng in atu hei in hi a hehpihnak hangin Pathian in a tenmi mihingte sung pen a taangmi um haw laih hi .
45011006	Hitihbangin a tennak cu a dehnak hang hi ngawlin a hehpih ningnatnak hangin hi . Itahimtitale Pathian ii ten mite hi a nadehnak haw hangin tenmi ahitacun a hehpihnak tihmi hi hehpihnak tatak hi tuk ma hi .
45011007	Mahtale itinkaw ? Israel miten zei li haw naven mu haw ma hi . A mutu cu Pathian ii tenmi midem no bek hi haw hi . Midangte cu a benghaw bul in Pathian ii samnak aw thei haw ma hi .
45011008	Lai Thiangtho in , “ Pathian in a lungmu mit haw thimtiik hi , tuni tian mu thei haw ma , theithei haw ma hi ” atihbangin hi ngangai hi .
45011009	Mahten David in , “ Apuai haw sung aa matmi le , thang ii awkmi hi haw hen , lum in bah haw hen na , cawh kuan mi hi haw ta hen .
45011010	Amuh theih haw tuk ngawlnak in mit cawtiik mihi haw tahen , a haksatnak haw van ngit ii nuai ah , a eel haw cu catngawlin kun haw ta hen , ” tin ti hi .
45011011	Mahbang ahitale Judah mite bah in a lup haw te khin , bah nomvawk haw tatuk maw ? Bah nom haw tuk ma ! Amuh tei sualnak hangin nunpatnak cu Gentail mitei lakah heng hi . Mahmi cu Gentail mitei humah Judah miten iksiknak nei haw hen , tih deihnak hi .
45011012	Judah mitei sualnak in hi leihum ah thupha tampi hengtiik hi ; a hawvang lam haw zawngkhalnak hangin Gentail mitei lakah thupha muicu tampi pia hi . Mahten Judah mite mahzah tin teekmi miphun cangkim zet in a ten bok haw te cun itihzah thupha tam seseem kam ni !
45011013	Tucun Gentail mite nangmu lakah thu hilh ing hi : Gentail mitei lakah tiikmi ka hih sungzong cu ka nadehmi ah mitmaipha nei tung hi .
45011014	Ka phunpih mihingte halhsiknak neitiik ta in mi hekkhatbek luan thei na ve nang maw tihnak in hi .
45011015	Itahimtitale Judah mite lawl ahih haw ten leihum mihingte cu Pathian ii ngaal ahihnak haw pen a ngualcam in cang haw hi . Amuh Judah mite cosaan ahih leh haw hun ten itihbang kam ni ? Mithi tei caa in nunnak hi tuk hi .
45011016	Cangho ahmasabel tinkhat khi Pathian lakah ap ahi tacun a phil pumpi in ama ta hi . Thingbul te Pathian lakah piak ahi tacun a kang tevang ama ta hi .
45011017	A ciin mi haw Olif kung ii a kangkaak hekkhatte cu tan in hampalak aa a po mi Olif kung kangkak tuah in peh haw hi . Noh Gentail mi pawlte cu ham lak a pomi olif kung tuah bang ve in Judah mitei Hawvang lam nunnak le a thazaang haw te co bok uh ci .
45011018	Mahhangin Olif kang tanmi bang a himite khi zawnsak pahsuh un hi . Itin kaw na pualthau theih tuk uh ? A kangkaak bebek ve uh cin a bulpi cu nohten cawm ma uh ci ; a bul in nohte cawm saw hi .
45011019	Nohte cun , “ Keimuh tei umnak thacangtiik tukin a kangte cu sattan haw hi . ” tin ti tuk uh ci .
45011020	Mahmi cu maan hi : amu Judah mite cu a up haw ngawlnak hangin tanmi hi haw hi ; nohte cu na up uh hangin hi mun hi luah uh ci , mahhangin pualthau in tisak kha pang pahsuh un hi ! A lau in lau saw un hi .
45011021	A bul tuah pehdun in a kangkaak ngangai bang a hi mi Judahte hei a khawih ta ngawl cun ohte cu khawih tuk hi tin maw na ngaihsut uh ?
45011022	Hi zawn pe cun Pathian cu hehpih ningnatnak neizet naven a thu cu khoh zet leleng hi tih cu mu ing . Abah le a lum mitei lakah cun a thu cu khohzet hi , mahnaven nohtei lakah cun hehpihnak neizet hi . Mah hehpihnak sungah na um leleng uh tacun hehpih leleng tuk hi ; mahnaven na um leleng uh ma tacun ehtuahmi hi bok tuk uh ci .
45011023	Mahten Judah mi pawlte sang ngawlin a umnak haw a dinmun haw khi a zamsan haw tacun a nidang aa a umnak haw ah khin koih leh hi haw tuk hi , itahimtitale Pathian cun peh leh thei hi .
45011024	Noh Gentail mite cu hampa lakah a pomi olif kung bang uh ci aa , a daan bang hi ma naven sat tawng in , a cinmi olif tuah pehcihmi hi uh ci . Judah mite cu cinmi olif kung ahih haw hangin tansami a kang ahihaw hei in a kunglun ah peh leh cu Pathian i caa cun baih deuh ngangai tuk hi .
45011025	U le naute , a maanmi thu-ip um hi , mahmi cu na theih tuk uh in deih ing hi . Mahmi na thei uh a hitale miciip ung tin ngaisung tuk ma uh ci . Aihimtitale Israel mitei lungkhohnak hi kumkhua in hi tuk ma hi ; Pathian lakah Gentail mi a heng tuk zah a hen haw laih ngawl sung no tuk poh hi .
45011026	Mahten Israel mi hempoh nunpat ahihnak haw tuk cu hitih bangin tuk hi . Lai Thiangtho in , “ Zion pen luantu heng tuk aa , Jakob ii casuan hempoh tei phatngawlnak hempoh cu vawklet khawng tuk hi .
45011027	A sualnak haw ka laksak tecun amuh tuah thutiamnak hi bawl tung , ” atihbangin hi tuk hi .
45011028	Thuthangpha a kik haw hangin Judah mite cu Pathian ii ngaal in cang haw hi ; mahmi cu nangmuh Gentail mitei hangin hi . Mahnaven amu pulepa hawte hangin amuhte cu Pathian ii tenmi ngualcam hi haw hi .
45011029	Itahimtitale a kua teng , a kua thupha pia tih thu ah in Pathian cun a lungmu kheel awng ma hi .
45011030	Noh Gentail mite , a bosa hun ah in Pathian thu zui ngawltu hi uh ci ; mahnaven tucun Judah miten Pathian thu a ngaih haw ngawlnak hangin noh ten Pathian hehpihnak ngah zo uh ci .
45011031	Mahbang bok leng in Pathian hehpihnak na ngahmi uh khi amuh vangin a ngah bok haw nak tukin Judah mite cu Pathian thu ngai ngawlin um haw hi .
45011032	Itahimtitale , mi hempoh tei lakah hehpihnak a neihtheihnak tukin Pathian in a kuakua heihihen thu ngaih ngawlnak sungah thawngta bangin taangtiik khawng hi .
45011033	Pathian hehpihnak cu ngeng leita hi ! A theihnak le a cihnak hi thuuk leita hi ! A thuson cat mite a kua in kaw a hilhciang thei tuk ? A hawhnak lampi a kua in kaw a theithei tuk ?
45011034	Lai Thiangtho in , “ Topa lungmu cu a kua in kaw a thei ? Ngaihsutnak a pia theitu um haw maw ?
45011035	Ama lohleh tukin akua in kaw thil a pia awng ? ” tin a tihmi bangin hi .
45011036	Itahimtitale i hempoh hi . Ama bawlmi ngeh hi . I hempoh hi , Amah hangin um haw in Ama caa hi haw hi . Pathian lakah kumkhua in vangletnak um ta hen ! Amen .
45012001	Mahtihbang ahih hangin ka u le naute aw , Pathian ii hehpihnak hangin Pathian lakah na pumpi uh cu a nung in apmi biakpiaknak bangin pia un tin ngen ing hi . A nadehnak ah pum a piami le a lungdam tiiktu hi tukin sawm ing hi . Mahmi cu Pathian lakah na piaktuk mi uh biaknak tatak hi .
45012002	Hi leihum mihing nundaan hi zui kha toh pahsuh un ; mah saangin na sunglam uh pen Pathian in na lungmu uh thek khawng saw hen . Mahtihcun Pathian ii deihnak cu thei tuk uh ci aa , Pathian maiah a i hum a pha , a i hi a lungdamzawng tih le a i kaw a cangkim tih thei tuk uh ci .
45012003	Pathian in a hehpih laksawng a piaknak hangin nangmu pumpaak tek humah hitihbangin hilh ing hi : Na ngaihsut tuk uhmi saangin saang saw deuh in ngaisung pahsuh un hi . Itibang hing ngim tih khi thei saw un na , Pathian ii upnak a piakzat teen in na ngaihsut daan uh cu hihen .
45012004	A pumpi uh hi pakhat hi naven taksa khen tampi um haw in mah taksa khen tei nadehnak daan cu bang teen haw ma hi .
45012005	Mahtihbangin ohte vang cu mi tampi nave hungin Khrih tuah a pehdunnak uh ahcun pumkhat hung hi . A pumpi uh aa tisa khen tampi te a pehdun khawng haw bangin pehdun khawngbok hung hi .
45012006	Mahhangin laksawng phun dadang a ngahmi uh cu Pathian ii hehpihnak a co uh zah teen in mang nung hi . A ngahmi uh laksawng cu , Pathian Thuthang phuan ahitale upnak a co mi uh zah in phuang nung hi ,
45012007	Mahtihbang leleng in midang tei na dektu tuk ahitale dek tuk hung , zilhtu tuk a hitale zilh nung hi ,
45012008	Midang tei na dektu tuk a hi uh ta le dek tuk hung , zilhtu tuk ahiuhtale zilh nung hi . midangte thazaang pia tuk ahi uhtale pia nung hi . Aneihmi uh thil khi midangte tuah kawmdun tuk ahiuhtale phalzetin sawm nung hi . Hotu tuk ahiuhtale teimazetin dek nung hi , midang tei lakah hehpihnak langtiik tuk ahi uhtale lungdamzet in langtiik nung hi .
45012009	Itdunnak a tih uh ten lungmu tak tuah ihdun tukmi hi . A pha ngawlmi cu hua unna , a phami cu lenkhim un hi .
45012010	Khristian unau teen na hih uh hangin pakhat le pakhat sunsak dunzet no in itdun un hi . Pakhat le pakhat maizah dunnak thiam un hi .
45012011	Thazawng pahsuh un : Nasiapi in na dek un hi . Na lungmu uh venghawng pia in Topai naa cu dek un hi .
45012012	Na muansannak uh in na lu-nguh damtiik hen ; haksatnak na tawh uh ten thinsau in um un ; cat ngawl in thu ngen un .
45012013	A tingsam mi Khristian unaute tuah na neihmi uh khi mangkawm ten un hi . Mahten mikhual tei caa in na kongkhah uh khi hon un .
45012014	Nangmuh a bawlsiatu tei caa in Pathian thupha ngen un ; tamsiatnak in hi ngawlin thupha khi Pathian lakah ngen un .
45012015	Lungdam mite tuah lungdam teen unna , a kap mite tuah in kapteen un hi .
45012016	Nangmu zawn na ngaihsut uh bangin midang tei zawn hei khi ngaihsutsak bok un . Keimah hibel ing tin ngaisung pahsuh un ; nadeh neuno heihihen deh nuamnak lungmu nei un Ciip ing tin ngaisung dun pahsuh un .
45012017	Mi pakhakhat in na hum uh ah phatngawlnak a bawl hawten a hum haw ah phatngawl nak bok in lul pahsuh un . A kuakua hei in a pha a mawi a tihmi khi bawl tuk zuam un .
45012018	Mi hempoh tuah in a lemno in um tuk khi a cang thei tawk in zuam un .
45012019	Ngualcam te aw , itikhei in hihen phulak tukin ngaisung pahsuh un hi ; Pathian ii thin-uuknak saw in mah cu bawl ta hen . Itahimtitale Lai Thiangtho sungah , “ Keiman phula tung ; keiman lul tung , tin Topan ti hi , ” tin um hi .
45012020	Mahten Lai Thiangtho in , “ Na ngaal a ngil a kial ahitale an pia in hi ; a dangdum ahitale a in tuk tui pia in hi ; mahtin na bawlthei ahitale a zahcaaknak tuah meikaang bangin kaang tuk hi , ” tin ti hi .
45012021	Phatngawlnak in neh pahsuh hen ; siatnak khi phatnak tuah neh saw in hi .
45013001	Ngam uktu bawi tei a thu haw ngai un ; itahimtitale Pathian lungkim ngawlin kuamah thuneitu in um theima hi ; mahten tu aa thu neitute hi Pathian ii koih mite haw hi .
45013002	Kua heihihen thu neitute a dodaltu cu Pathian ii lungkim in a koihmi khi do hi . Mahtihbangin a dotu cu amah lala ii humah thukhennak heng tuk hi .
45013003	Uktu bawite hi thilpha a bawltute cun imah lautuk um ma hi ; phatngawlnak a bawltu te bek in a lau haw tuk hi . Thuneitu bawite khi laungawl in na um bangan nuam cim ? Na nuam ahitale a phami bawl inna pah co tuk hi .
45013004	Itahimtitale nangma phatnak bawltu tukin Pathian ii sila hi haw hi . Mahnaven thilpha ngawl na bawl ahitale thuneitu cu lau in hi . Itahimtitale mi bawlsia thei ngangai mi hi . Amah cu Pathian sila ahih bangin thilpha ngawl a bawltu tei humah Pathian ii cawhkuannak a heng tiiktu hi .
45013005	Mahhangin thuneitu bawite khi a thu haw ngai un hi ; Pathian ii cawhkuannak bek hi ngawlin a pha le a sia khen thiam theihnak na ngaihsutnak uh i ca vangin hi .
45013006	Mahhangin hi siah na piak uh cu ; thuneitu bawi ten a dehvo haw a deh suak haw ten Pathian ii caa in dek haw hi .
45013007	Mahhangin na piak tukmi uh cu pia un ; pumpaak ngahmi sungpen piak tukmi siah heihihen , van ca in piak tuk mi siah hihen pia un upat piaktaak mi ahitale upatnak pia un hi .
45013008	Pakhat le pakhat it dun un , itnak sial ngawl leiba pahsun . Itnak a neitu cu Daan zuitu hi .
45013009	thukham piakmi “ Nupa sualnak bawl pahsun ; mithat pahsun ; nguca pahsun ; midang neihmi thil haza pahsun , ” tih mite le a dang thukhamte hempoh cu , “ Nangmah na ih bangin , na inn neelte vang it in hi , ” tihmi thukham sungah kim khawng hi .
45013010	Mi pakhakhat na it ahitale ama caa in a pha ngawlmi bawl awng tuk ma ci . Mahhangin Daan a kim no in zui thei tihmi cu itdun tuk tihnak hi .
45013011	Hihi cu na bawl kul uh hihimmi hi , itahimtitale na hihbuhnak uh pen na khatlawhnak tuk uh hun heng zo hi tih thei uh ci . Nunpat ahihnak tuk uh huncaan cu a masa a up pattung uh laih saangin tuin nai seseem zo hi .
45013012	Zan bo awn toh in sun heng awntoh hi . Khuathim sung aa nadehte cu zam toh unna khuavak sungah ngaaldo tukin hiamnam la nung hi .
45013013	Sun khuavak aa a um mite bangbokin a ziaza uh cu mawitiik nung inna , mituah nunsualnak le zukhamnakte um leh ma toh hen ; nupa sual bawlnak le zoh mawingawl in nun cu um leh ma toh hen ; sualdunnak le iksiknak hei um leh matoh hen .
45013014	A Topa uh Jesuh Khrih khi ngaaldonak thuam bangin silh unna , tisa sual nuamnak le nopsaknakte khi tawp toh un hi .
45014001	Upnak lam pen a deldai mite khi komno in zo un ; ama pumpaak upnak khi eel li ngawn pahsuh un .
45014002	Mi pakhat ii upnak ah cun i hempoh eih theih hi , tin um hi ; mahnaven upnak a niam laih mite cu anceh sawlbawkte bek ei hi .
45014003	I pawpoh a eitu in a duh pawpoh a ei ngawltu pa khi nautat tuk hi ma hi , mahtih bangbok leng in anceh sawlbawk bek a eitu pa hei in i hempoh a eitu pa khi a sonsiat bok tuk ngawl mi hi ; itahimtitale amah cu Pathian ii cosaanmi hi bok hi .
45014004	Mi pakhat i umlawh thu ah a i hangin kaw thukhentu naa nadeh nuam lihuh ? A umlawh cu lawhting maw lawhsam kaw tih cu a Topai thuthu hi . Mahnaven a lawhtingmi hi kha meen tuk , itahimtitale Topan lawhting in bawl thei hi .
45014005	Mi pakhat in nidang tampi lak pen nikhat cu thupi cuang in bawl hi ; mahten midang pakhat cun ni hempoh cu a bangteen khawng in ngaisung hi . Amuh tek in a lungmu sung haw ah khen catnak nei cangcian tek haw ta hen .
45014006	Mi pakhat in nikhat cu a sunglawi cuang in a ngaisung tacun mahmi cu Topa upatnak in a bawlmi hi ; i hempoh a ei theitu pa hei cun Topa upatnak in a bawlmi hi ; Itahimtitale a eihmi an hangin Pathian lakah a lungdamnak langtiik hi . I hempoh a eingawltu hei in Topa upatnakin a bawlmi hi aa , Pathian lakah lungdamnakin langtiik bok hi .
45014007	Kuamah in eimu caa bek in nungma hung hi ; kuamah in eimu ca bek in thi ma hung hi .
45014008	A nung uh ahitale Topai caa in nung hung hi ; a thi uh ahitale Topai caa in thi hung hi , a nun uh ah hihen , a thih uh ah hihen Topa ii ta hung hi .
45014009	Itahimtitale a nungmi le a thi mitei Topa hi tukin Khrih cu thi in nung leh zo hi .
45014010	Mahtaak noh anceh sawlbawk ei mi pawl ten na unaupih uhte , ita sonsiali uh cim ? Mahten noh i hempoh eitute , itakaw na unaupih uhte na nautat lih uh ? A venghawng uh in Pathian maiah ding tuk hung aa , aman eimu thukhen tuk hi .
45014011	Lai Thiangtho sung ah , “ A nungmi Pathian keima mai ah , mi hempoh in khuk din in , mi hempoh in Pathian ka hihnak khi phuang haw tuk hi , tin Topan ti hi , ” tin um hi .
45014012	Mahhangin kuakua heihihen a venghawng uh in a nunnak uh le a dehnak uh cu Pathian maiah hilh ciang leh teen tuk hung hi .
45014013	Mahhangin pakhat le pakhat sonsiat dunnakte cawl toh nung hi . Mah saangin na unau pih sualnak uh a lup tuk ngawlnak khi ngaisung saw un hi .
45014014	An eih thiang ngawl tih imamah um ma tih khi Topa Jesuh tuah ka pehzopnak thawm in thei ing . Mahnaven an hekkhatte cu eih thiang ngawl haw hi tin mi pakhat in a um ta cun mahtin a umtu pai ca cun mah an cu a thiang ngawlmi hi .
